anya-e0803n:26: Yasmā na hoti sammoho, akkharesu padesu ca.
anya-e0803n:33: Tasmā tadatthikā suddhaṃ, nayaṃ nissāya viññunaṃ;
anya-e0803n:36: Sandhināmādibhedo ca, padānaṃ tu vibhatti ca.
anya-e0803n:40_0: Tattha dhātūti kenaṭṭhena dhātu? Sakatthampi dhāretīti dhātu, atthātisayayogato paratthampi
anya-e0803n:40_1: dhāretīti dhātu, vīsatiyā upasaggesu yena kenaci upasaggena atthavisesakāraṇena paṭibaddhā
anya-e0803n:40_2: atthavisesampi dhāretīti dhātu, “ayaṃ imissā attho, ayamito paccayo paro”tiādinā
anya-e0803n:40_3: anekappakārena paṇḍitehi dhāriyati esātipi dhātu, vidahanti viduno etāya saddanipphattiṃ
anya-e0803n:40_4: ayalohādimayaṃ ayalohādidhātūhi viyātipi dhātu. Evaṃ tāva dhātusaddassattho veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:43_0: Atha vā jinamate “tato gotamidhātūnī”ti ettha dhātusaddo liṅgavipallāse vattati “pabbatāni
anya-e0803n:43_1: vanāni cā”ti ettha pabbatasaddo viya, na panettha vattabbaṃ “aṭṭhivācakattā napuṃsakaniddeso”ti
anya-e0803n:43_2: aṭṭhivācakattepi “dhātuyo”ti itthiliṅgadassanato. Bhūvādayo saddā dhātavo. Seyyathidaṃ?
anya-e0803n:43_3: Bhū i ku ke takka taka taki sukaiccādayo. Gaṇato te aṭṭhavidhā bhūvādigaṇo rudhādigaṇo
anya-e0803n:43_4: divādigaṇo svādigaṇo kiyādigaṇo gahādigaṇo tanādigaṇo curādigaṇo cāti. Idāni tesaṃ
anya-e0803n:43_5: vikaraṇasaññite paccaye dassessāma. Anekavidhā hi paccayā nānappakāresu nāmanāma
anya-e0803n:43_6: kitanāma samāsanāma taddhitanāmākhyātesu pavattanato. Saṅkhepato pana duvidhāva nāmapaccayo
anya-e0803n:43_7: ākhyātapaccayo cāti. Tatrāpi ākhyātapaccayā duvidhā vikaraṇapaccayanovikaraṇapaccayavasena.
anya-e0803n:43_8: Tattha vikaraṇapaccayo akārādisattarasavidho aggahitaggahaṇena pannarasavidho ca.
anya-e0803n:43_9: Novikaraṇapaccayo pana kha cha sādinekavidho. Ye rūpanipphattiyā upakārakā atthavisesassa
anya-e0803n:43_10: jotakā vā ajotakā vā lopanīyā vā alopanīyā vā, te saddā paccayā.
anya-e0803n:44: Paṭicca kāraṇaṃ taṃ taṃ, entīti paccayātha vā;
anya-e0803n:47: Nāmakappe yato tasmā, na taṃ vitthārayāmase.
anya-e0803n:50_0: Iccānekavidhesu paccayesu “vikaraṇapaccayā nāma ime”ti sallakkhetabbā. Kathaṃ? Bhūvādigaṇato
anya-e0803n:50_1: apaccayo hoti kattari, rudhādigaṇato akārivaṇṇekārokārapaccayā honti kattari, pubbamajjhaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n:50_2: niggahītāgamo ca, divādigaṇato yapaccayo hoti kattari, svādigaṇato ṇu ṇā uṇāpaccayā
anya-e0803n:50_3: honti kattari, kiyādigaṇato nāpaccayo hoti kattari, gahādigaṇato ppa ṇhāpaccayā honti
anya-e0803n:50_4: kattari, tanādigaṇato o yirapaccayā honti kattari, curādigaṇato ṇe ṇayapaccayā honti kattari.
anya-e0803n:51: Akāro ca ivaṇṇo ca, e okārā ca yo tathā;
anya-e0803n:52: Ṇu ṇā uṇā ca nā ppa ṇhā-yirā ṇe ṇayapaccayā.
anya-e0803n:55_0: Ye evaṃ niddiṭṭhehi vikaraṇapaccayehi tadaññehi ca sappaccayā aṭṭhavidhā dhātugaṇā
anya-e0803n:55_1: suttantesu bahūpakārā, tesvāyaṃ bhūvādigaṇo. Bhū sattāyaṃ, bhūdhātu vijjamānatāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:55_2: vattati. Sakammikākammikāsu dhātūsu ayaṃ akammikā dhātu, na pana “dhammabhūto”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:55_3: pattiatthavācikā aparā bhūdhātu viya sakammikā. Esā hi pariabhiādīhi upasaggehi yuttāyeva
anya-e0803n:55_4: sakammikā bhavati, na upa parā pātuādīhi upasagganipātehi yuttāpi. Ato imissā siddhāni
anya-e0803n:55_5: rūpāni dvidhā ñeyyāni akammakapadāni sakammakapadāni cāti.
anya-e0803n:57_0: Tatra bhavati ubbhavati samubbhavati pabhavati parābhavati sambhavati vibhavati,
anya-e0803n:57_1: bhoti sambhoti vibhoti pātubhavati pātubbhavati pātubhoti, imāni akammakapadāni.
anya-e0803n:57_2: Ettha pātuiti nipāto, so “āvibhavati tirobhavatī”tiādīsu āvi tironipātā viya bhūdhātuto
anya-e0803n:57_3: nipphannākhyātasaddassa neva visesakaro, na ca sakammakattasādhako. Uiccādayo upasaggā,
anya-e0803n:57_4: te pana visesakarā, na sakammakattasādhakā. Yesamattho kammena sambandhanīyo na hoti,
anya-e0803n:57_5: tāni padāni akammakāni. Akammakapadānaṃ yathārahaṃ sakammakākammakavasena attho kathetabbo.
anya-e0803n:57_6: Paribhoti paribhavati, abhibhoti abhibhavati, adhibhoti adhibhavati, atibhoti atibhavati,
anya-e0803n:57_7: anubhoti anubhavati, samanubhoti samanubhavati, abhisambhoti abhisambhavati, imāni
anya-e0803n:57_8: sakammakapadāni. Ettha pariiccādayo upasaggā, te bhūdhātuto nipphannākhyātasaddassa
anya-e0803n:57_9: visesakarā ceva sakammakattasādhakā ca. Yesamattho kammena sambandhanīyo, tāni padāni
anya-e0803n:57_10: sakammakāni. Sakammakapadānaṃ sakammakavasena attho kathetabbo, kvaci akammakavasenapi.
anya-e0803n:58_0: Tatra bhavatīti hoti vijjati paññāyati sarūpaṃ labhati. Ubbhavatīti uppajjati sarūpaṃ
anya-e0803n:58_1: labhati. Samubbhavatīti samuppajjati sarūpaṃ labhati. Pabhavatīti hoti sambhavati.
anya-e0803n:58_2: Atha vā pabhavatīti yato kutoci sandati, na vicchijjati, avicchinnaṃ hoti, taṃ taṃ
anya-e0803n:58_3: ṭhānaṃ visarati. Parābhavatīti parābhavo hoti byasanaṃ āpajjati avuddhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0803n:58_4: Sambhavatīti suṭṭhu bhavati vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati. Vibhavatīti ucchijjati
anya-e0803n:58_5: vinassati vipajjati, visesato vā bhavati sampajjati. Bhoti sambhoti vibhotīti imāni
anya-e0803n:58_6: “bhavati sambhavati vibhavatī”ti imehi yathākkamaṃ samānaniddesāni. Pātubhavatīti
anya-e0803n:58_7: pakāsati dissati paññāyati pākaṭaṃ hoti. Pātubbhavati pātubhotīti imāni “pātubhavatī”ti
anya-e0803n:58_8: iminā samānaniddesāni. Evaṃ akammakapadānaṃ yathārahaṃ sakammakākammakavasena atthakathanaṃ
anya-e0803n:59_0: Paribhotidukādīsu pana sattasu dukesu yathākkamaṃ dve dve padāni samānatthāni, tasmā
anya-e0803n:59_1: dve dve padāniyeva gahetvā niddisissāma. Tatra paribhoti paribhavatīti paraṃ hiṃsati
anya-e0803n:59_2: pīḷeti, atha vā hīḷeti avajānāti. Abhibhoti abhibhavatīti paraṃ ajjhottharati maddati.
anya-e0803n:59_3: Adhibhoti adhibhavatīti paraṃ abhimadditvā bhavati attano vasaṃ vattāpeti. Atibhoti
anya-e0803n:59_4: atibhavatīti paraṃ atikkamitvā bhavati. Anubhoti anubhavatīti sukhadukkhaṃ vedeti
anya-e0803n:59_5: paribhuñjati sukhadukkhapaṭisaṃvedī hoti. Samanubhoti samanubhavatīti sukhadukkhaṃ
anya-e0803n:59_6: suṭṭhu vedeti suṭṭhu paribhuñjati suṭṭhu sukhadukkhapaṭisaṃvedī hoti. Abhisambhoti
anya-e0803n:59_7: abhisambhavatīti paraṃ ajjhottharati maddati. Evaṃ sakammakapadānaṃ sakammakavasena
anya-e0803n:59_8: atthakathanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Katthaci pana gacchatīti pavattatīti evaṃ akammakavasenapi.
anya-e0803n:64_0: Bhāveti vibhāvetisambhāveti paribhāveti, evaṃ hetukattukriyāpadāni bhavanti. Ekakammakavasenesamattho
anya-e0803n:64_1: gahetabbo. Pacchimassa pana dvikammakavasenapi. Paribhāvāpeti abhibhāvāpeti anubhāvāpeti,
anya-e0803n:64_2: evampi hetukattukriyāpadāni bhavanti. Dvikammakavasenesamattho gahetabbo. Iccevaṃ
anya-e0803n:65_0: Tatra bhāvetīti puggalo bhāvetabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci bhāveti āsevati bahulīkaroti, atha
anya-e0803n:65_1: vā bhāvetīti vaḍḍheti. Vibhāvetīti bhāvetabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci vibhāveti visesena bhāveti,
anya-e0803n:65_2: vividhena vā ākārena bhāveti bhāvayati vaḍḍheti, atha vā vibhāvetīti abhāveti antaradhāpeti.
anya-e0803n:65_3: Sambhāvetīti yassa kassaci guṇaṃ sambhāveti sambhāvayati suṭṭhu pakāseti ukkaṃseti.
anya-e0803n:65_4: Paribhāvetīti paribhāvetabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci paribhāveti paribhāvayati samantato vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0803n:65_5: Evaṃ ekakammakavasenattho gahetabbo. Atha vā paribhāvetīti vāsetabbaṃ vatthuṃ paribhāveti
anya-e0803n:65_6: paribhāvayati vāseti gandhaṃ gāhāpeti. Evaṃ dvikammakavasenāpi attho gahetabbo. Paribhāvāpetīti
anya-e0803n:65_7: puggalo puggalena sapattaṃ paribhāvāpeti hiṃsāpeti, atha vā paribhāvāpetīti hīḷāpeti
anya-e0803n:65_8: avajānāpeti. Abhibhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalena sapattaṃ abhibhāvāpeti ajjhottharāpeti.
anya-e0803n:65_9: Anubhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalena sampattiṃ anubhāvāpeti paribhojeti.
anya-e0803n:67: Kriyaṃ sādheti etassa, dīpakaṃ sāsane padaṃ.
anya-e0803n:73_0: Tatridaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ kammatthadīpakaṃ, upayogasāmivacanānipi taddīpakāni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:73_1: Kathaṃ? Paribhāvāpetīti puggalo puggalaṃ sapattaṃ paribhāvāpetīti, tathā paribhāvāpetīti
anya-e0803n:73_2: puggalo puggalassa sapattaṃ paribhāvāpetīti. Sesāni nayānusārena niddisitabbāni.
anya-e0803n:73_3: Evaṃ sabbānetāni karaṇopayogasāmivacanāni kammatthadīpakāniyeva honti, tasmā dvikammakavasenattho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:76_0: Bhaviyate vibhaviyate paribhaviyate abhibhaviyate anubhaviyate paribhūyate abhibhūyate
anya-e0803n:76_1: anubhūyate, evaṃ kammuno kriyāpadāni bhavanti. Aññathā ca bhaviyyate vibhaviyyate
anya-e0803n:76_2: paribhaviyyate abhibhaviyyate anubhaviyyate paribhuyyate abhibhuyyate anubhuyyateti.
anya-e0803n:76_3: Ettha kammuno kriyāpadāniyeva kammakattuno kriyāpadāni katvā yojetabbāni. Visuñhi
anya-e0803n:77_0: Tatra bhaviyateti bhāvetabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci puggalena bhāviyate āseviyate bahulīkariyate,
anya-e0803n:77_1: atha vā bhaviyateti vaḍḍhiyate. Vibhaviyateti vibhāvetabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci puggalena vibhaviyate
anya-e0803n:77_2: visesena bhaviyate, vividhena vā ākārena bhaviyate vaḍḍhiyate, atha vā vibhaviyateti
anya-e0803n:77_3: abhaviyate antaradhāpiyate. Paribhaviyateti sapatto puggalena paribhaviyate hiṃsiyate,
anya-e0803n:77_4: atha vā paribhaviyateti hīḷiyate avajāniyate. Abhibhaviyateti sapatto puggalena abhibhaviyate
anya-e0803n:77_5: ajjhotthariyate abhimaddiyate. Anubhaviyateti sampatti puggalena anubhaviyate paribhuñjiyate.
anya-e0803n:77_6: Paribhūyatetiādīni tīṇi “paribhaviyate”tiādīhi tīhi samānaniddesāni. Sesāni pana
anya-e0803n:77_7: yathāvuttehi yaṃ kammameva padhānato gahetvā niddisiyati padaṃ, taṃ kammatthadīpakaṃ.
anya-e0803n:77_8: Tasmā kattari ekavacanena niddiṭṭhepi yadi kammaṃ bahuvacanavasena vattabbaṃ, bahuvacanantaññeva
anya-e0803n:77_9: kammuno kriyāpadaṃ dissati. Yadi panekavacanavasena vattabbaṃ, ekavacanantaññeva.
anya-e0803n:77_10: Tathā kattari bahuvacanena niddiṭṭhepi yadi kammaṃ ekavacanavasena vattabbaṃ, ekavacanantaññeva
anya-e0803n:77_11: kammuno kriyāpadaṃ dissati. Yadi pana bahuvacanavasena vattabbaṃ, bahuvacanantaññeva.
anya-e0803n:77_12: Kathaṃ? Bhikkhunā dhammo bhaviyate, bhikkhunā dhammā bhaviyante, bhikkhūhi dhammo
anya-e0803n:77_13: bhaviyate, bhikkhūhi dhammā bhaviyanteti. Iminā nayena sabbattha kammuno kriyāpadesu
anya-e0803n:77_14: vohāro kātabbo. Yasmiṃ pana kammuno kriyāpade kammatthadīpake kammabhūtassevatthassa
anya-e0803n:77_15: kattubhāvaparikappo hoti, taṃ kammakattutthadīpakaṃ, taṃ kammuno kriyāpadato visuṃ
anya-e0803n:77_16: na labbhati. Ayaṃ panettha atthaviññāpane payogaracanā. Sayameva paribhaviyate dubbhāsitaṃ
anya-e0803n:77_17: bhaṇaṃ bālo tappaccayā aññehi paribhūtopi, sayameva abhibhaviyate pāpakārī niraye
anya-e0803n:77_18: nirayapālehi abhibhūtopi tathārūpassa kammassa sayaṃ katattāti. Ettha hi sayameva
anya-e0803n:77_19: pīyate pānīyaṃ, sayameva kaṭo kariyatetiādīsu viya sukhābhisaṅkharaṇīyatā labbhateva,
anya-e0803n:80_0: Bhūyate bhaviyate ubbhaviyate, evaṃ bhāvassa kriyāpadāni bhavanti. Aññathā ca bhuyyate
anya-e0803n:80_1: bhaviyyate ubbhaviyyateti. Tatra yathā ṭhīyatepadassa ṭhānanti bhāvavasena atthakathanamicchanti,
anya-e0803n:80_2: evaṃ bhūyatetiādīnampi bhavanantiādinā bhāvavasena atthakathanamicchitabbaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0803n:80_3: ca ṭhānaṃ ṭhiti bhavanantiādīhi bhāvavācakakitantanāmapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhe chaṭṭhiyojanamicchanti,
anya-e0803n:80_4: na tathā ṭhīyate bhūyatetiādīhi bhāvavācakākhyātapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhe chaṭṭhiyojanā
anya-e0803n:80_6: Yasmiṃ payoge yaṃ kammuno kriyāpadena samānagatikaṃ katvā vinā kammena niddisiyati
anya-e0803n:80_7: kriyāpadaṃ, kattuvācakapadaṃ pana paccattavacanena vā karaṇavacanena vā niddisiyati,
anya-e0803n:80_8: taṃ tattha bhāvatthadīpakaṃ. Na hi sabbathā kattāramanissāya bhāvo pavattati. Evaṃ
anya-e0803n:80_9: santepi bhāvo nāma kevalo bhavanalavanapacanādiko dhātuatthoyeva. Akkharacintakā
anya-e0803n:80_10: pana “ṭhīyate bhūyate”tiādīsu bhāvavisayesu karaṇavacanameva payuñjanti “nanu nāma
anya-e0803n:80_11: pabbajitena sunivatthena bhavitabbaṃ supārutena ākappasampannenā”tiādīsu viya, tasmā
anya-e0803n:80_12: tesaṃ mate “tena ubbhaviyate”ti karaṇavacanena yojetabbaṃ. Jinamatena pana “so bhūyate”tiādinā
anya-e0803n:80_14: pana dhammasenāpatinā, dhajaggasuttante bhagavatā ca bhāvapadaṃ paccattavacanāpekkhavasenu’ccāritaṃ.
anya-e0803n:92_0: Tasmā rūpaṃ vibhaviyyati, rūpāni vibhaviyyanti, tvaṃ vibhaviyyasi, tumhe vibhaviyyatha,
anya-e0803n:92_1: ahaṃ vibhaviyyāmi, mayaṃ vibhaviyyāma, rūpaṃ vibhaviyyate, rūpāni vibhaviyyante iccevamādi
anya-e0803n:98: Siyā sakammakaṃ, netaṃ, tathā hotīti dīpaye.
anya-e0803n:100: Vinā yapaccayaṃ tiṭṭhe, na tathā tiṭṭhate idaṃ.
anya-e0803n:101: Na kattari bhuvādīnaṃ, gaṇe yapaccayo ruto;
anya-e0803n:103: Na bhūdhātu divādīnaṃ, dhātūnaṃ dissate gaṇe;
anya-e0803n:111: Sarūpato pakāseti, tasmā te pākaṭā ubho;
anya-e0803n:117: Yasmā ca kattubhāvena, bhāvo nāma na tiṭṭhati;
anya-e0803n:119: Yajjevaṃ kattuvohāro, bhāvassa tu kathaṃ siyā;
anya-e0803n:121: Iti ce nissayānaṃ tu, vasā nissitasambhavā;
anya-e0803n:129: Pāḷiṃ patvāna tesaṃ tu, vacanaṃ appamāṇakaṃ;
anya-e0803n:131: Pāṭho pāvacane diṭṭho, tasmā evaṃ vademase;
anya-e0803n:133: Vacanehi yutaṃ dvīhi, icchitabbanti no ruci;
anya-e0803n:137_0: Evaṃ suddhakattukriyāpadāni hetukattukriyāpadāni kammuno kriyāpadāni, bhāvassa kriyāpadāni
anya-e0803n:137_1: cāti catudhā, kammakattukriyāpadehi vā pañcadhā bhūdhātuto nipphannāni kriyāpadāni
anya-e0803n:137_2: nānappakārena niddiṭṭhāni, etāni lokiyānaṃ bhāvabhedavasena vohārabhedo hotīti dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:137_3: visuṃ visuṃ vuttāni. Atthato pana kammakattubhāvakārakattayavasena tividhāneva. Hetukattā
anya-e0803n:137_4: hi suddhakattusaṅkhāte kārake tassaṅgabhāvato saṅgahamupagacchati, tathā kammakattā
anya-e0803n:137_5: kammakārake, bhāvo pana kevalo. So hi gamanapacanalavanādivasenānekavidhopi kriyāsabhāvattā
anya-e0803n:137_6: bhedarahito kārakantaro. Evaṃ santepi dabbasannissitattā dabbabhedena bhijjati. Tena
anya-e0803n:137_7: pāvacane bhāvavācakaṃ padaṃ bahuvacanantampi dissati. Ākhyātikapade bhāvakārakavohāro
anya-e0803n:137_8: niruttinayaṃ nissāya gato, atthato pana bhāvassa kārakatā nupapajjati. So hi na kiñci
anya-e0803n:137_9: janeti, na ca kriyāya nimittaṃ. Kriyānimittabhāvoyeva hi kārakalakkhaṇaṃ. Iti mukhyato
anya-e0803n:137_10: vā hetuto vā bhāvassa kārakatā na labbhati. Evaṃ santepi so karaṇamattattā kārakaṃ.
anya-e0803n:137_11: Tathā hi karaṇaṃ kāro, kriyā, tadeva kārakanti bhāvassa kārakatā daṭṭhabbā. Yasmā
anya-e0803n:137_12: pana kriyānimittabhāvoyeva kārakalakkhaṇaṃ, tasmā nāmikapade kārakalakkhaṇe bhāvakārakanti
anya-e0803n:137_14: vohāro kariyati veyyākaraṇehi. Evaṃ niruttinayaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ bhāvakārakañca dve
anya-e0803n:137_15: ca kammakattukārakānīti kārakattayaṃ bhavati. Taddīpakañcākhyātikapadaṃ tikārakaṃ.
anya-e0803n:142_0: Idha bhāvakammesu attanopaduppattiṃ keci akkharacintakā avassamicchantīti tesaṃ mativibhāvanatthamamhehi
anya-e0803n:142_1: bhāvakammānaṃ kriyāpadāni attanopadavasenuddiṭṭhāni ceva niddiṭṭhāni ca. Sabbānipi
anya-e0803n:142_3: yojetabbāni. Pāḷiādīsu hi tikārakāni kriyāpadāni parassapadattanopadavasena dvidhā
anya-e0803n:142_4: ṭhitāni. Seyyathidaṃ? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. Samādhijjhānakusalā, vandanti
anya-e0803n:142_5: lokanāyakaṃ. Monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ. Atthābhisamayā dhīro, paṇḍitoti pavuccati. Kathaṃ
anya-e0803n:142_6: paṭipannassa puggalassa rūpaṃ vibhoti vibhaviyyati. So pahīyissati. Paṇḍukambale
anya-e0803n:142_7: nikkhittaṃ bhāsate tapate. Pūjako labhate pūjaṃ. Puttakāmā thiyo yācaṃ, labhante
anya-e0803n:142_8: tādisaṃ sutaṃ. Asito tādi vuccate sabrahmā. Aggijādi pubbeva bhūyate. So pahīyethāpi
anya-e0803n:142_9: no pahīyethāti evaṃ dvidhā ṭhitāni. Atridaṃ pāḷivavatthānaṃ –
anya-e0803n:149: Padānaṃ niddeso panati antiādīnaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ vacanānamanurūpena yojetabbo. Evaṃ tikārakakriyāpadāni sarūpato vavatthānato niddesato ca veditabbāni.
anya-e0803n:150: Idāni nopasaggākammikādivasena bhavatissa dhātussa vinicchayaṃ vadāma –
anya-e0803n:152: Sopasaggā sakammā ca, iti bhūti vibhāvitā.
anya-e0803n:156: Gahetvā catudhā hoti, iti ñeyyaṃ visesato.
anya-e0803n:158: Bhūdhātu kārite sante, ekakammā bhavanti hi.
anya-e0803n:171: Tatra yassa payogamhi, padassa kattunā kriyā;
anya-e0803n:172: Nipphāditā vinā kammaṃ, na hoti taṃ sakammakaṃ.
anya-e0803n:173: “Pacatī”ti hi vutte tu, yena kenaci jantunā;
anya-e0803n:174: Odanaṃ vā panaññaṃ vā, kiñci vatthunti ñāyati.
anya-e0803n:175: Yassa pana payogamhi, kammena rahitā kriyā;
anya-e0803n:191: Ettha bhavatidhātumhi, nayo eso na labbhati;
anya-e0803n:193: Ediso ca nayo nāma, pāḷiyaṃ tu na dissati;
anya-e0803n:196: Kārāpetī”ti yo pāṭho, niddese taṃ suniddise.
anya-e0803n:199: Etaṃ nayaṃ vidū ñatvā, yoje pāṭhānurūpato;
anya-e0803n:202: Sagaṇe sagaṇe tesaṃ, vuttiṃ dīpetumeva ca.
anya-e0803n:203: “Asmiṃ gaṇe ayaṃ dhātu, hotī”ti tehi viññuno;
anya-e0803n:205: Tathā hi bhāvakammesu, vihito paccayo tu yo;
anya-e0803n:208: Nānāvidho nayo evaṃ, mayā ettha pakāsito.
anya-e0803n:210: Te patvākhyātasadde avigatavimatī honti ñāṇīpi tasmā;
anya-e0803n:212: Yogaṃ tesaṃ payoge paṭutaramatitaṃ patthayāno kareyya.
anya-e0803n:220: Tatra ākhyātikassa kriyālakkhaṇattasūcikā tyādayo vibhattiyo, tā aṭṭhavidhā vattamānāpañcamīsattamīparokkhāhiyyattanajjatanībhavissantī kālātipattivasena.
anya-e0803n:221: Tatthati anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe iccetā vattamānāvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:222: Tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, taṃ antaṃ, su vho, e āmase iccetā pañcamīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:223: Eyya eyyuṃ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṃ eyyāmhe iccetā sattamīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:224: A u, e ttha, aṃ mha, ttha re, ttho vho, iṃ mhe iccetā parokkhāvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:225: Ā ū, o ttha, aṃ mhā, ttha tthuṃ, se vhaṃ, iṃ mhase iccetā hiyyattanīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:226: Ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, aṃ mhe iccetā ajjatanīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:227: Ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃ ssāmhe iccetā bhavissantīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:228: Ssā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃ ssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃ ssāmhase iccetā kālātipattivibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n:229_0: Sabbāsametāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni, tāni tāni parassapadāni
anya-e0803n:229_1: nāma. Yāni yāni pana parāni cha padāni, tāni tāni attanopadāni nāma. Tattha parassapadāni
anya-e0803n:229_2: vattamānā cha, pañcamiyo cha, sattamiyo cha, parokkhā cha, hiyyattaniyo cha, ajjataniyo
anya-e0803n:229_3: cha, bhavissantiyo cha, kālātipattiyo chāti aṭṭhacattālīsavidhāni honti, tathā itarāni,
anya-e0803n:230: Parassapadānamattanopadānañca dve dve padāni paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisā nāma. Te vattamānādīsu cattāro cattāro, aṭṭhannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ vasena dvattiṃsa, piṇḍitāni parimāṇāneva.
anya-e0803n:231: Dvīsu dvīsu padesu paṭhamaṃ paṭhamaṃ ekavacanaṃ, dutiyaṃ dutiyaṃ bahuvacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:232_0: Tatra vattamānavibhattīnanti anti, si tha, mi ma iccetāni parassapadāni. Te ante,
anya-e0803n:232_1: se vhe, e mhe iccetāni attanopadāni. Parassapadattanopadesupiti anti iti paṭhamapurisā,
anya-e0803n:232_2: sitha iti majjhimapurisā, mi ma iti uttamapurisā, te ante iti paṭhamapurisā, se vhe
anya-e0803n:232_3: iti majjhimapurisā, e mhe iti uttamapurisā.
anya-e0803n:233_0: Paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisesupi ti-iti ekavacanaṃ, anti-iti bahuvacananti evaṃ ekavacanabahuvacanāni
anya-e0803n:233_1: kamato ñeyyāni. Evaṃ sesāsu vibhattīsu parassapadattanopadapaṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisekavacanabahuvacanāni ñeyyāni.
anya-e0803n:234_0: Tattha vibhattīti kenaṭṭhena vibhatti? Kālādivasena dhātvatthaṃ vibhajatīti vibhatti,
anya-e0803n:234_1: syādīhi nāmikavibhattīhi saha sabbasaṅgāhakavasena pana sakatthaparatthādibhede atthe
anya-e0803n:234_2: vibhajatīti vibhatti, kammādayo vā kārake ekavacanabahuvacanavasena vibhajatīti vibhatti,
anya-e0803n:234_3: vibhajitabbā ñāṇenātipi vibhatti, vibhajanti atthe etāyātipi vibhatti, atha vā satipi
anya-e0803n:234_4: jinasāsane avibhattikaniddese sabbena sabbaṃ vibhattīhi vinā atthassā’niddisitabbato
anya-e0803n:234_5: visesena vividhena vā ākārena bhajanti sevanti naṃ paṇḍitātipi vibhatti. Tattha avibhattikaniddesalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:239: Tatra thera-iti avibhattiko niddeso, therānaṃ ayanti thero. Ko so? Vādo. Theravādo aññesaṃ vādānaṃ uttamoti ayamattho veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:243: “Bho khāda piva”iccatra, vade yo koci codako.
anya-e0803n:245: “Bhikkhu, bho purisi”ccādi, padampi, na hidaṃ tathā.
anya-e0803n:246: “Bhikkhu, bho purisi”ccādi, si ga lopena vuccati;
anya-e0803n:248_0: Evaṃ avibhattikaniddeso ākhyātesu na labbhati, nāmesuyeva labbhati. Tatrāpi “aṭṭha
anya-e0803n:248_1: ca puggala dhammadasā te”ti ettha chandavasena puggala iti rassakaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:248_2: na “kakusandha koṇāgamano ca kassapo”ti ettha kakusandha iti avibhattikaniddeso viya
anya-e0803n:248_3: avibhattikaniddeso daṭṭhabbo. “Bhikkhu nisinne mātugāmo upanisinno vā hoti upanipanno
anya-e0803n:248_4: vā”ti ettha pana bhikkhūti idaṃ bhikkhumhīti vattabbatthattā bhumme paccattantipi
anya-e0803n:248_5: adiṭṭhavibhattikaniddesotipi vattuṃ yujjati. Tattha pana chandavasena katarassattā
anya-e0803n:248_6: tāni padāni avibhattikaniddesapakkhampi bhajantīti vattuṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0803n:249: Tattha parassapadānīti parassa atthabhūtāni padāni parassapadāni. Etthuttamapurisesu attano atthesupi attanopadavohāro na kariyati.
anya-e0803n:253: Attanopadānīti attano atthabhūtāni padāni attanopadāni. Ettha pana paṭhamamajjhimapurisesu parassatthesupi parassapadavohāro na kariyati.
anya-e0803n:261: Tasmā idha paṭhamapurisādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ purisānaṃ vacanatthaṃ na pariyesāma. Rūḷhiyā hi porāṇehi tyādīnaṃ purisasaññā vihitā.
anya-e0803n:262_0: Ekavacanabahuvacanesu pana ekassatthassa vacanaṃ ekavacanaṃ. Bahūnamatthānaṃ vacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:262_1: bahuvacanaṃ. Atha vā bahuttepi sati samudāyavasena jātivasena vā cittena sampiṇḍetvā
anya-e0803n:262_2: ekīkatassatthassa ekassa viya vacanampi ekavacanaṃ, bahutte nissitassa nissayavohārena
anya-e0803n:262_3: vuttassa nissayavasena ekassa viya vacanampi ekavacanaṃ, ekattalakkhaṇena bavhatthānaṃ
anya-e0803n:262_4: ekavacanaṃ viya vacanampi ekavacanaṃ. Abahuttepi sati attagarukārāparicchedamātikānusandhinayapucchāsabhāgaputhucitta-
anya-e0803n:262_5: samāyogaputhuārammaṇavasena ekatthassa bahūnaṃ viya vacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ, tathā ye
anya-e0803n:262_6: ye bahavo tannivāsataṃputtasaṅkhātassekassatthassa rūḷhīvasena bahūnaṃ viya vacanampi
anya-e0803n:262_7: bahuvacanaṃ, ekassatthassa aññenatthena ekābhidhānavasena bahūnaṃ viya vacanampi
anya-e0803n:262_8: bahuvacanaṃ, ekassatthassa nissitavasena bahūnaṃ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṃ, ekassatthassa
anya-e0803n:262_9: ārammaṇabhedakiccabhedavasena bahūnaṃ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṃ. Evamimehi ākārehi
anya-e0803n:262_10: ekamhi vattabbe, ekamhi viya ca vattabbe ekavacanaṃ, bahumhi vattabbe, bahumhi viya
anya-e0803n:262_11: ca vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Puthuvacanaṃ, anekavacananti ca imasseva nāmaṃ.
anya-e0803n:265_0: Tasmā tadatthaviññāpanatthaṃ idha nāmikapayogehi sahevākhyātapayoge pavakkhāma –
anya-e0803n:265_1: “rājā āgacchati, sahāyo me āgacchati, ekaṃ citta” miccevamādayo ekassatthassa ekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:265_2: “Rājāno āgacchanti, sahāyā me āgacchanti, na me dessā ubho puttā, dve tīṇi” iccevamādayo
anya-e0803n:266_0: “Sā senā mahatī āsi, bahujjano pasannosi, sabbo taṃ jano ojināyatu, itthigumbassa
anya-e0803n:266_1: pavarā, buddhassāhaṃ vatthayugaṃ adāsiṃ, dvayaṃ vo bhikkhave desessāmi, pemaṃ mahantaṃ
anya-e0803n:266_2: ratanattayassa, kare pasādañca naro avassaṃ, bhikkhusaṅgho, balakāyo, devanikāyo,
anya-e0803n:266_3: ariyagaṇo”- iccevamādayo, “dvikaṃ tika”miccādayo ca samudāyavasena bavhatthānaṃ ekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:267_0: Katthaci pana īdisesu ṭhānesu bahuvacanapayogāpi dissanti. Tathā hi “pūjitā ñātisaṅghehi,
anya-e0803n:267_1: devakāyā samāgatā, sabbete devanikāyā, dve devasaṅghā, tīṇi dukāni, cattāri navakāni”
anya-e0803n:267_2: iccevamādayo payogāpi dissanti. Ime ekavacanavasena vattabbassa samudāyassa bahusamudāyavasena
anya-e0803n:267_3: bahuvacanapayogāti gahetabbā, saṅgayhamānā ca bavhatthabahuvacane saṅgahaṃ gacchanti
anya-e0803n:267_4: visuṃyeva vā, tasmā bahusamudāyāpekkhabahuvacananti etesaṃ nāmaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:268: “Pāṇaṃ na hane, sasso sampajjati” iccevamādayo jātivasena bavhatthānaṃ ekavacanapayogā, tabbhāvasāmaññena bavhatthānaṃ ekavacanapayogātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0803n:269: “Nāgaṃ raṭṭhassa pūjitaṃ, sāvatthī saddhā ahosi pasannā” iccevamādayo nissayavasena pavattānaṃ nissayavohārena vuttānamekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:270_1: dhammavinayo, cittaseno ca gandhabbo, natiyā asati āgatigati na hoti, āgatigatiyā
anya-e0803n:270_2: asati cutūpapāto na hoti” iccevamādayo ekattalakkhaṇe bavhatthānaṃ ekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:271: “Evaṃ mayaṃ gaṇhāma, amhākaṃ pakati, padhānanti kho meghiya vadamānaṃ kinti vadeyyāma” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa attavasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:272: “Te manussā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocuṃ ‘bhuñjatha bhante’ti, ahaṃ manussesu manussabhūtā, abbhāgatānā’sanakaṃ adāsiṃ” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa garukāravasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:273: “Appaccayā dhammā, asaṅkhatā dhammā” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa aparicchedavasena bahuvacanapayogā, aniyamitasaṅkhāvasena bahuvacanapayogā vā.
anya-e0803n:274_0: Keci pana “desanāsotapātavasena bahuvacanapayogā”tipi vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:274_1: Na hi tathāgato satisampajaññarahito dhammaṃ deseti, yutti ca na dissati “mātikāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:274_2: pucchāyaṃ vissajjane cāti tīsupi ṭhānesu appaccayādidhamme desento satthā punappunaṃ
anya-e0803n:275: “Katame dhammā appaccayā” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa mātikānusandhinayena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:276: “Ime dhammā appaccayā” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa pucchānusandhinayena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:277: “Katame dhammā no parāmāsā, te dhamme ṭhapetvā avasesā kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa pucchāsabhāgena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:278_0: “Atthi bhikkhave aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā santā paṇītā atakkāvacarā
anya-e0803n:278_1: nipuṇā paṇḍitavedanīyā, ye tathāgato sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetī”ti ayamekassatthassa
anya-e0803n:279: “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ mahāvane,
anya-e0803n:282: Iccevamādayo saddā ye ye bahavo, tannivāsataṃputtasaṅkhātassekatthassa rūḷhīvasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:283_0: “Sāriputtamoggallāne āmantesi ‘gacchatha tumhe sāriputtā kīṭāgiriṃ gantvā assajipunabbasukānaṃ
anya-e0803n:283_1: bhikkhūnaṃ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṃ karotha, tumhākaṃ ete saddhivihārino’ti”,
anya-e0803n:283_2: “kacci vo kulaputtā, etha byagghā nivattavho” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa aññenatthena
anya-e0803n:284: “Mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karonti” iccevamādayo ekassatthassa nissitavasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n:286: “Cattāro sammappadhānā”ti ayaṃ pana kiccabhedena ekassatthassa bahuvacanapayogo.
anya-e0803n:287_1: ekattalakkhaṇekavacananti pañcavidhaṃ ekavacanaṃ bhavati. Ettha pana jātyāpekkhekavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:288_4: kiccabhedabahuvacananti pannarasavidhaṃ bahuvacanaṃ bhavati. Iccevaṃ vīsadhā sabbāni
anya-e0803n:312_0: Idāni kālādivasena ākhyātappavattiṃ dīpayissāma – kālakārakapurisaparidīpakaṃ kriyālakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:312_1: ākhyātikaṃ. Tatra kālanti atītānāgatapaccuppannavasena tayo kālā, atītānāgatapaccuppannāṇattiparikappakālātipattivasena
anya-e0803n:315: Kārakanti kammakattubhāvā. Te hi upacāramukhyasabhāvavasena karonti karaṇanti ca “kārakā”ti vuccanti. Teva yathākkamaṃ kriyānimitta taṃsādhaka taṃsabhāvāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:316: Kammaṃ kattā ca bhāvo ca, iccevaṃ kārakā tidhā;
anya-e0803n:324: Kārakattaṃ tu bhāvassa, sacepi na samīritaṃ;
anya-e0803n:326: Kriyānipphatti natthīti, yuttitopi ca natthi taṃ;
anya-e0803n:329_0: Purisoti ekavacanabahuvacanakā paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisā. Tattha paṭhamapuriso ākhyātapadena
anya-e0803n:329_1: tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā tumhā’mhasaddavajjite paccattavacanabhūte
anya-e0803n:329_2: nāmamhi “abhinīhāro samijjhati, bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesuñāṇa”ntiādīsu viya payujjamānepi,
anya-e0803n:329_3: taṭṭhāniyatte sati “bhāsati vā karoti vā, pīḷiyakkhoti maṃ vidū, vuccatīti vacana”ntiādīsu
anya-e0803n:329_4: viya appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti. Katthaci pana pāḷippadese nāmassa appayuttattā
anya-e0803n:329_5: paṭhamapurisapayogattho duranubodho bhavati, yathā “dukkhaṃ te vedayissāmi, tattha
anya-e0803n:329_6: assāsayantu ma”nti. Tathā hi ettha “pādā”ti pāṭhaseso, tasmiṃ dukkhasāsanārocane
anya-e0803n:329_7: vattuṃ avisahanavasena kilamantaṃ maṃ devassa ubho pādā assāsentu, vissaṭṭho kathehīti
anya-e0803n:331: Tasmā upaṭṭhahaṃ gaṇhe, garuṃ garumataṃ vidū.
anya-e0803n:332_0: Tatrimāni bhūdhātādhikārattā bhūdhātuvasena nidassanapadāni. So paribhavati, te paribhavanti,
anya-e0803n:332_1: paribhavati, paribhavanti. Sapatto abhibhaviyate, sabbā vityā’nubhūyate, abhibhaviyate,
anya-e0803n:332_2: anubhūyateti. Yattha satipi nāmassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena
anya-e0803n:332_3: tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhati, tattha kammavācakaṃ paccattavacanabhūtaṃ tulyādhikaraṇapadaṃ
anya-e0803n:332_4: paṭicca paṭhamapurisādayo tayo labbhanti. Taṃ yathā? Paribhaviyyate puriso devadattena,
anya-e0803n:332_5: paribhaviyyase tvaṃ devadattena, paribhaviyyamhe mayaṃ akusalehi dhammehi. Ettha
anya-e0803n:332_6: panidaṃ vacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ “nindanti tuṇhimāsina’ntiādīsu satipi nāmassa kammavācakatte
anya-e0803n:332_7: apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhatīti paṭhamapurisuppatti
anya-e0803n:332_8: na siyā”ti. Kasmāti ce? “Nindanti tuṇhimāsina”ntiādīsu “janā”ti ajjhāharitabbassa
anya-e0803n:333_0: Majjhimapuriso ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā paccattavacanabhūte
anya-e0803n:333_1: tumhasadde payujjamānepi, taṭṭhāniyatte sati appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti.
anya-e0803n:333_2: Tvaṃ atibhavasi, tumhe atibhavatha, atibhavasi, atibhavatha. Tvaṃ paribhaviyase devadattena,
anya-e0803n:333_3: tumhe paribhaviyavhe. Yattha satipi tumhasaddassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā
anya-e0803n:333_4: ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhati, na tattha majjhimapuriso hoti. Itare
anya-e0803n:333_5: pana dve honti kammavācakaṃ paccattavacanabhūtaṃ tulyādhikaraṇapadaṃ paṭicca. Taṃ
anya-e0803n:333_6: yathā? Tayā abhibhaviyate sapatto, tayā abhibhaviye ahaṃ.
anya-e0803n:334_0: Uttamapuriso ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā paccattavacanabhūte
anya-e0803n:334_1: amhasadde payujjamānepi, taṭṭhāniyatte sati appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti.
anya-e0803n:334_2: Ahaṃ paribhavāmi, mayaṃ paribhavāma, paribhavāmi, paribhavāma. Ahaṃ paribhaviyyāmi
anya-e0803n:334_3: akusalehi dhammehi, mayaṃ paribhaviyyāma, paribhaviyyāmi, paribhaviyyāma. Yattha
anya-e0803n:334_4: satipi amhasaddassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā
anya-e0803n:334_5: na labbhati, na tattha uttamapuriso hoti. Itare pana dve honti kammavācakaṃ paccattavacanabhūtaṃ
anya-e0803n:334_6: tulyādhikaraṇapadaṃ paṭicca. Taṃ yathā? Mayā anubhaviyate sampatti, mayā abhibhaviyase
anya-e0803n:334_7: tvaṃ. Evaṃ yattha yattha sādhakavācakānaṃ vā kammavācakānaṃ vā nāmādīnaṃ paccattavacanabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0803n:334_8: ākhyātapadehi tulyādhikaraṇatte laddhe tattha tattha paṭhamapurisādayo labbhanti,
anya-e0803n:334_9: tasmā nāmādīnaṃ paccattavacanabhūtānaṃ tulyādhikaraṇabhāvoyeva paṭhamapurisādīnamuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0803n:335_0: Dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā purisānamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo. Ettha ekābhidhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:335_1: nāma ekato abhidhānaṃ ekakālābhidhānañca. Tañca kho casaddapayogeyeva, acasaddapayoge
anya-e0803n:335_3: bhavāma” iccevamādayo tappayogā. Tattha tumhe atthakusalā bhavatha – iccetasmiṃ vohāre
anya-e0803n:335_4: “so ca atthakusalo bhavati, tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, tumhe atthakusalā bhavathā”ti
anya-e0803n:335_5: evaṃ dvinnamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo. “Mayamatthakusalā bhavāma” iccetasmiṃ
anya-e0803n:335_6: pana “so ca atthakusalo bhavati, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā”ti
anya-e0803n:335_7: vā “tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā”ti
anya-e0803n:335_8: vā evampi dvinnamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo. “So ca atthakusalo bhavati, tvañca
anya-e0803n:335_9: atthakusalo bhavasi, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā”ti vā “so
anya-e0803n:335_10: ca atthakusalo bhavati, te ca atthakusalā bhavanti, tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, tumhe
anya-e0803n:335_11: ca atthakusalā bhavatha, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā”ti
anya-e0803n:335_12: vā evaṃ tiṇṇamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:336_0: Aparopi atthanayo vuccati – “tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, so ca atthakusalo bhavati,
anya-e0803n:336_1: tumhe atthakusalā bhavathā”ti vā “ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, so ca atthakusalo bhavati,
anya-e0803n:336_2: mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā”ti vā iminā nayena anekappabhedo atthanayo. Evaṃ sesāsu
anya-e0803n:336_3: vibhattīsu pañcamīsattamiyādīsu paropuriso gahetabbo. Sabbesu ca kriyāpadesu bavhatthavācakesu
anya-e0803n:336_4: bahuvacanantesu, na pana bahuvacanantesupi ekassattano vācakesu garukātabbassekassatthassa
anya-e0803n:336_5: vācakesu ca kriyāpadesu. Ettha codanāsandīpaniyo imā gāthā –
anya-e0803n:342: Pacchā vutto paro nāma, saññāya paṭipāṭiyā;
anya-e0803n:344: Paṭhamamhā paro nāma, majjhimo uttamopi ca;
anya-e0803n:345: Majjhimamhā paro nāma, uttamo puriso ruto.
anya-e0803n:348: “Tvañca bhadde sukhī hohi, eso cāpi mahāmigo”;
anya-e0803n:349: Iti pāṭho yato diṭṭho, tasmā evaṃ vademase.
anya-e0803n:350: “Tumhe dve sukhitā hotha”, iccattho tattha dissati;
anya-e0803n:355: Tvañca jānapadā ceva, negamā ca samāgatā”.
anya-e0803n:358: Etā gāthāpi etassa, atthassa pana sādhikā;
anya-e0803n:360: Evaṃ viññūhi viññeyyaṃ, bahunā bhāsitena kiṃ.
anya-e0803n:362: Na virujjhati ce attho, taṃ pamāṇaṃ sudhīmataṃ.
anya-e0803n:367: Saṅkhepatopettha purisappavatti evaṃ upalakkhitabbā “amhavacanatthe uttamo, tumhavacanatthe majjhimo, aññesaṃ vacanatthe paṭhamo”ti.
anya-e0803n:368: Tyādīnaṃ purisasaññā, yasmā vuttā tato idaṃ;
anya-e0803n:371: Kriyālakkhaṇanti ettha kathaṃ ākhyātikassa kriyālakkhaṇatā veditabbā?
anya-e0803n:372: Lakkhiyati kriyāyetaṃ, kriyā vā assa lakkhaṇaṃ;
anya-e0803n:373: Kriyālakkhaṇatā evaṃ, veditabbā tathā hi ca.
anya-e0803n:395_0: Evaṃ kālesu vibhattippavattiṃ ñatvā ye te suttantesu vicittā suvisadavipulatikhiṇabuddhivisayabhūtā
anya-e0803n:395_1: payogā dissanti, tesu pāṭavamicchantehi tyādikkamena vuccamānā kriyāpadamālā sallakkhitabbā
anya-e0803n:395_2: – bhavati, bhavanti. Bhavasi, bhavatha. Bhavāmi, bhavāma. Bhavate, bhavante. Bhavase,
anya-e0803n:395_3: bhavavhe. Bhave, bhavāmhe. Ayaṃ aññayogādirahitā kriyāpadamālā.
anya-e0803n:396_0: Dissanti ca suttantesu atthasambhavepi aññayogādirahitāni kriyāpadāni. Seyyathidaṃ?
anya-e0803n:396_1: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti, yadā paññāya passati. Yaṃ maṃ bhaṇasi sārathi. Aññaṃ sepaṇṇi
anya-e0803n:397_0: Ettha tividho kriyāpadesu yogo tayogo, mayogo, aññayogo ca. Tattha majjhimapurisā
anya-e0803n:397_1: tayogavasena gahetabbā, uttamapurisā mayogavasena. Paṭhamapurisā aññayogavasena.
anya-e0803n:400_0: Sotūnaṃ payogesu kosallatthaṃ aññayogādisahitamaparampi kriyāpadamālaṃ vadāma – so
anya-e0803n:400_1: bhavati, te bhavanti. Tvaṃ bhavasi, tumhe bhavatha. Ahaṃ bhavāmi, mayaṃ bhavāma.
anya-e0803n:400_2: So bhavate, te bhavante. Tvaṃ bhavase, tumhe bhavavhe. Ahaṃ bhave, mayaṃ bhavāmhe.
anya-e0803n:401_0: Dissanti ca suttantesu aññayogādisahitānipi kriyāpadāni. Seyyathidaṃ? “Yaṃpāyaṃ deva
anya-e0803n:401_1: kumāro suppatiṭṭhitapādo, idampimassa mahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0803n:401_2: tassimāni satta ratanāni bhavanti. Yo dandhakāle tarati, taraṇīye ca dandhati, tvaṃsi
anya-e0803n:401_3: ācariyo mama, ahampi daṭṭhukāmosmi, pitaraṃ me idhāgataṃ” iccevamādīni etassatthassa
anya-e0803n:402_0: Yo tumhasaddena vattabbe atthe nipatati, na pana hoti tumhatthavācako, neso saddo
anya-e0803n:402_1: kriyāpadassa tayogasahitattaṃ sādheti, aññadatthu aññayogasahitattaññeva sādheti.
anya-e0803n:402_2: Yo ca amhasaddena vattabbe atthe nipatati, na pana hoti amhatthavācako, na sopi saddo
anya-e0803n:402_3: kriyāpadassa mayogasahitattaṃ sādheti, aññadatthu aññayogasahitattaññeva sādheti.
anya-e0803n:403_0: Tatra tumhasaddena tāva vattabbatthe – “na bhavaṃ eti puññatthaṃ, sivirājassa dassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:403_1: Māyasmā samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami. Idha bhante bhagavā paṃsukūlaṃ dhovatū”ti
anya-e0803n:403_2: iccevamādayo payogā. Amhasaddena pana vattabbatthe “upāli taṃ mahāvīra, pāde vandati
anya-e0803n:403_3: satthuno. Sāvako te mahāvīra, saraṇo vandati satthuno”ti ca iccevamādayo payogā.
anya-e0803n:403_4: Idametthupalakkhitabbaṃ “tvaṃ tumhe ahaṃ maya”nti atthadīpaka tayoga mayogato añño
anya-e0803n:403_5: aññatthadīpano payogoyeva aññayogo nāma, tattha paṭhamapuriso bhavatīti.
anya-e0803n:404_0: Yajjevaṃ “sabbāyasaṃ kūṭamatippamāṇaṃ, paggayha so tiṭṭhasi antalikkhe. Esa sutvā
anya-e0803n:404_1: pasīdāmi, vaco te isisattamā”tiādīsu kathaṃ. Ettha hi majjhimuttamapurisasambhavoyeva
anya-e0803n:404_2: dissati, na tu paṭhamapurisasambhavoti? Vuccate – “sabbāyasaṃ kūṭamatippamāṇaṃ, paggayha
anya-e0803n:404_4: syādyantānaṃ padānaṃ dassanato accantamajjhāharitabbehi samānādhikaraṇattā tagguṇabhūtattā
anya-e0803n:404_5: ca majjhimuttamapurisasambhavo samadhigantabbo. Īdisesu payogesu syādyantānaṃ dassanavasena
anya-e0803n:404_6: avijjamānānipi ajjhāharitabbāni “tvamaha”miccādīni padāni bhavanti. Katthaci pana
anya-e0803n:404_7: paripuṇṇāni dissanti “sātvaṃ vaṅkamanuppattā, kathaṃ maddi karissasi. So ahaṃ vicarissāmi,
anya-e0803n:405: Ākhyātikassa kriyālakkhaṇattā aliṅgabhedattā ca tiṇṇaṃ liṅgānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaparidīpanatthaṃ aparampi kriyāpadamālaṃ vadāma –
anya-e0803n:406_0: Puriso bhavati, kaññā bhavati, cittaṃ bhavati, purisā bhavanti, kaññāyo bhavanti,
anya-e0803n:406_1: cittāni bhavanti. Bho purisa tvaṃ bhavasi, bhoti kaññe tvaṃ bhavasi, bho citta tvaṃ
anya-e0803n:406_2: bhavasi, bhavanto purisā tumhe bhavatha, bhotiyo kaññāyo tumhe bhavatha, bhavanto
anya-e0803n:406_3: cittāni tumhe bhavatha. Ahaṃ puriso bhavāmi, ahaṃ kaññā bhavāmi, ahaṃ cittaṃ bhavāmi,
anya-e0803n:406_4: mayaṃ purisā bhavāma, mayaṃ kaññāyo bhavāma, mayaṃ cittāni bhavāma.
anya-e0803n:407: Esa nayo attanopadesu, sesavibhattīnaṃ sabbapadesupi. Ayamākhyātikassa tiṇṇaṃ liṅgānaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaparidīpanī kriyāpadamālāva.
anya-e0803n:408_1: ko attho? Itthipumanapuṃsakānaṃ avisesattho vuccate “aliṅgabheda”miti. Yathā “puriso
anya-e0803n:408_2: gacchati, kaññā gacchati, cittaṃ gacchatī”ti. Catudhā uddiṭṭhakriyāpadesu yathā “bhavatī”ti
anya-e0803n:408_3: akārānantaratyantapadaṃ gahetvā “bhavati bhavanti bhavasī”tiādinā kriyāpadamālā sabbathā
anya-e0803n:408_5: ubbhavasī”tiādinā kriyāpadamālā sabbathā kātabbā. “Bhoti sambhotī”tiādīni pana okārānantaratyantapadāni,
anya-e0803n:408_7: padamālā kātabbā, nayidha vuttanayānusārena. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu duranubodhā kriyāpadagati.
anya-e0803n:408_8: Ato labbhamānavasena kriyāpadamālā kātabbā. Na hi loke lokiyā sabbe dhātusadde paccekaṃ
anya-e0803n:408_9: sabbehipi channavutiyā vacanehi yojetvā vadanti, evaṃ avadantānampi nesaṃ kathā aparipuṇṇā
anya-e0803n:408_10: nāma na hoti, tasmā vajjetabbaṭṭhānaṃ vajjetvā yathāsambhavaṃ padamālā kātabbā. Evaṃ
anya-e0803n:409_0: Ito paṭṭhāya pana yathuddiṭṭhapadāneva pariṇāmetvā pariṇāmetvā pañcamiyādīnaṃ mātikābhāvena
anya-e0803n:409_1: gahetabbāni. Idāni pana tayogādisahitāsahitavasena dvidhā kriyāpadamālāyo dassessāma
anya-e0803n:409_2: kvacādesavasena sambhūtāni ca rūpantarāni sotūnaṃ sukhadhāraṇatthañceva purisappayoge asammohatthañca.
anya-e0803n:410_0: Bhavatu, bhavantu. Bhavāhi, bhava, bhavatha. Bhavāmi, bhavāma. Bhavataṃ, bhavantaṃ.
anya-e0803n:410_1: Bhavassu, bhavavho. Bhave, bhavāmase. So bhavatu, te bhavantu. Tvaṃ bhavāhi, bhava,
anya-e0803n:410_2: tumhe bhavatha. Ahaṃ bhavāmi, mayaṃ bhavāma. So bhavataṃ, te bhavantaṃ. Tvaṃ bhavassu,
anya-e0803n:410_3: tumhe bhavavho. Ahaṃ bhave, mayaṃ bhavāmase. Ayaṃ pañcamīvibhattivasena kriyāpadamālāniddeso.
anya-e0803n:411_0: Bhaveyya, bhave, bhaveyyuṃ. Bhaveyyāsi, bhaveyyātha. Bhaveyyāmi, bhaveyyāma, bhavemu.
anya-e0803n:411_1: Bhavetha, bhaveraṃ. Bhavetho, bhaveyyāvho. Bhaveyyaṃ, bhaveyyāmhe iti vā, so bhaveyya,
anya-e0803n:411_2: bhave, te bhaveyyuṃ. Tvaṃ bhaveyyāsi, tumhe bhaveyyātha. Ahaṃ bhaveyyāmi, mayaṃ bhaveyyāma,
anya-e0803n:411_3: bhavemu. So bhavetha, te bhaveraṃ. Tvaṃ bhavetho, tumhe bhaveyyāvho. Ahaṃ bhaveyyaṃ,
anya-e0803n:411_4: mayaṃ bhaveyyāmhe iti vā. Ayaṃ sattamīvibhattivasena kriyāpadamālāniddeso.
anya-e0803n:412_0: Babhūva, babhūvu. Babhūve, babhūvittha. Babhūvaṃ, babhūvimha. Babhūvittha, babhūvire.
anya-e0803n:412_1: Babhūvittho, babhūvivho. Babhūviṃ, babhūvimhe iti vā, so babhūva, te babhūvu. Tvaṃ
anya-e0803n:412_2: babhūve, tumhe babhūvittha. Ahaṃ babhūvaṃ, mayaṃ babhūvimha. So babhūvittha, te babhūvire.
anya-e0803n:412_3: Tvaṃ babhūvittho, tumhe babhūvivho. Ahaṃ babhūviṃ, mayaṃ babhūvimhe iti vā. Ayaṃ
anya-e0803n:413_0: Abhavā, abhavū. Abhavo, abhavattha. Abhavaṃ, abhavamhā. Abhavattha, abhavatthuṃ.
anya-e0803n:413_1: Abhavase, abhavavhaṃ. Abhaviṃ, abhavamhase iti vā, so abhavā, te abhavū. Tvaṃ abhavo,
anya-e0803n:413_2: tumhe abhavattha. Ahaṃ abhavaṃ, mayaṃ abhavamhā. So abhavattha, te abhavatthuṃ. Tvaṃ
anya-e0803n:413_3: abhavase, tumhe abhavavhaṃ. Ahaṃ abhaviṃ, mayaṃ abhavamhase iti vā. Ayaṃ hiyyattanīvibhattivasena
anya-e0803n:414_0: Abhavi, abhavuṃ. Abhavo, abhavittha. Abhaviṃ, abhavimhā. Abhavā, abhavū. Abhavase,
anya-e0803n:414_1: abhavivhaṃ. Abhavhaṃ, abhavimhe iti vā, so abhavi, te abhavuṃ. Tvaṃ abhavo, tumhe
anya-e0803n:414_2: abhavittha. Ahaṃ abhaviṃ, mayaṃ abhavimhā. So abhavā, te abhavū. Tvaṃ abhavase, tumhe
anya-e0803n:414_3: abhavivhaṃ. Ahaṃ abhavaṃ, mayaṃ abhavimhe iti vā. Ayaṃ ajjatanīvibhattivasena kriyāpadamālāniddeso.
anya-e0803n:415_0: Ettha panajjataniyā uṃvacanassa iṃsumādesavasena bhavatino rūpantarānipi veditabbāni.
anya-e0803n:415_1: Seyyathidaṃ? Te bhaviṃsu, samubbhaviṃsu, pabhaviṃsu, parābhaviṃsu, sambhaviṃsu, pātubhaviṃsu,
anya-e0803n:415_2: pātubbhaviṃsu, imāni akammakapadāni. Paribhaviṃsu, abhibhaviṃsu, adhibhaviṃsu, atibhaviṃsu,
anya-e0803n:418_0: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi – “evaṃvihāriñcāvuso bhikkhuṃ rūpā adhibhosuṃ, na bhikkhu rūpe adhibhosī”ti.
anya-e0803n:418_1: Imāni sakammakapadāni, evamajjataniyā uṃvacanassa iṃsumādesavasena bhavatino rūpantarāni bhavanti. Apica
anya-e0803n:421: Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi – so tena kammena divaṃ samakkami, sukhañca khiḍḍāratiyo ca anvabhīti. Tattha anvabhīti anu abhīti chedo. Anūti upasaggo. Abhīti ākhyātikapadanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:422_0: Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Bhavissasi, bhavissatha. Bhavissāmi, bhavissāma. Bhavissate,
anya-e0803n:422_1: bhavissante. Bhavissase, bhavissavhe. Bhavissaṃ, bhavissāmhe iti vā, so bhavissati,
anya-e0803n:422_2: te bhavissanti. Tvaṃ bhavissasi, tumhe bhavissatha. Ahaṃ bhavissāmi, mayaṃ bhavissāma.
anya-e0803n:422_3: So bhavissate, te bhavissante. Tvaṃ bhavissase, tumhe bhavissavhe. Ahaṃ bhavissaṃ,
anya-e0803n:422_4: mayaṃ bhavissāmhe iti vā. Ayaṃ bhavissantīvibhattivasena kriyāpadamālāniddeso.
anya-e0803n:423_0: Abhavissā, abhavissaṃsu. Abhavisse, abhavissatha. Abhavissaṃ, abhavissāmhā. Abhavissatha,
anya-e0803n:423_1: abhavissisu. Abhavissase, abhavissavhe. Abhavissiṃ, abhavissāmhase iti vā, so abhavissā,
anya-e0803n:423_2: te abhavissaṃsu. Tvaṃ abhavisse, tumhe abhavissatha. Ahaṃ abhavissaṃ, mayaṃ abhavissāmhā.
anya-e0803n:423_3: So abhavissatha, te abhavissisu. Tvaṃ abhavissase, tumhe abhavissavhe. Ahaṃ abhavissiṃ,
anya-e0803n:423_4: mayaṃ abhavissāmhase iti vā. Ayaṃ kālātipattivibhattivasena kriyāpadamālāniddeso.
anya-e0803n:428: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:435_2: pakaraṇasaṃsandanā, vattamānādīnaṃ vacanatthavibhāvanā cāti navadhā vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:436_1: bhotisadda bhavesaddānamattho uddharitabbo. Tathā hete nāmikapadasaññitehi aparehi
anya-e0803n:436_2: bhotisadda bhavesaddehi samānasutikāpi asamānatthā ceva honti asamānavibhattikā ca.
anya-e0803n:436_3: Sāsanasmiñhi keci saddā aññamaññaṃ samānasutikā samānāpi asamānatthā asamānapavattinimittā
anya-e0803n:436_4: asamānaliṅgā asamānavibhattikā asamānavacanakā asamānantā asamānakālikā asamānapadajātikā ca bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:437_0: Tesamasamānatthatte “sabbañhi taṃ jīrati dehanissitaṃ. Appassutāyaṃ puriso, balibaddova
anya-e0803n:437_1: jīrati. Santo tasito. Pahu santo na bharati. Santo ācikkhate muni. Santo sappurisā
anya-e0803n:437_2: loke. Santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi”nti evamādayo payogā. Ettha jīratisaddadvayaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ
anya-e0803n:438_1: Ettha ca akataññūsaddadvayaṃ katākatājānanajānanapavattinimittaṃ paṭicca sambhūtattā
anya-e0803n:439_0: Asamānaliṅgatte “sukhī hotu pañcasikha sakko devānamindo. Tvañca bhadde sukhī hohi.
anya-e0803n:439_1: Yattha sā upaṭṭhito hoti. Mātā me atthi, sā mayā posetabbā”ti evamādayo. Ettha sukhīsaddadvayaṃ
anya-e0803n:440: Asamānavibhattikatte “āhāre udare yato. Yato pajānāti sahetudhamma”nti evamādayo. Ettha yatosaddadvayaṃ paṭhamāpañcamīvibhattisahitattā asamānavibhattikanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:442: “Yāya mātu bhato poso, imaṃ lokaṃ avekkhati;
anya-e0803n:443: Tampi pāṇadadiṃ santiṃ, hanti kuddho puthujjano”ti
anya-e0803n:447: Vikkosamānā tibbāhi, hanti nesaṃ varaṃ vara”nti.
anya-e0803n:448_0: Ādīsu pana bahuvacano. “Sīlavā vattasampanno. Etha tumhe āyasmanto sīlavā hotha.
anya-e0803n:448_1: Santo danto niyato brahmacārī. Santo have sabbhi pavedayanti. Mahārājā yasassī so.
anya-e0803n:449_0: Asamānantatte pana yattha samānasutikānaṃ asamānavibhattikattaṃ vā asamānavacanattaṃ
anya-e0803n:449_1: vā upalabbhati. Teyeva payogā. Taṃ yathā? “Sataṃ sampajānaṃ, sataṃ dhammo, santo
anya-e0803n:450_0: Asamānakālatte “nanu te sutaṃ brāhmaṇa bhaññamāne, devā na issanti purisaparakkamassa.
anya-e0803n:450_1: Te janā pāramissanti, maccudheyyaṃ suduttara”nti evamādayo. Ettha issantisaddadvayaṃ
anya-e0803n:451_0: Asamānapadajātikatte “sayaṃ samāhito nāgo, sayaṃ abhiññāya kamuddiseyyaṃ. Pathe dhāvantiyā
anya-e0803n:451_1: pati, ekaṃsaṃ ajinaṃ katvā, pādesu sirasā pati. Giriṃ caṇḍoraṇaṃ patī”ti evamādayo.
anya-e0803n:451_2: Ettha sayaṃsaddadvayaṃ nāmanipātavasena patisaddattayaṃ nāmākhyātopasaggavasena asamānapadajātikanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:452_0: Iminā nayena sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ. Evaṃ sāsanasmiṃ keci saddā aññamaññaṃ samānasutikā
anya-e0803n:452_1: samānāpi asamānatthā asamānapavattinimittā asamānaliṅgā asamānavibhattikā asamānavacanakā
anya-e0803n:452_2: asamānantā asamānakālikā asamānapadajātikā ca bhavanti. Etādisesu saddesu yo kriyāpadattaṃ
anya-e0803n:452_3: pakāseti, na so nāmikapadattaṃ. Yo ca nāmikapadattaṃ pakāseti, na so kriyāpadattaṃ.
anya-e0803n:452_4: Evaṃ santepi sutisāmaññato ekattena gahetvā atthuddhāro karaṇīyoti yathāvuttakriyāpadānaṃ
anya-e0803n:452_5: nāmapadehi samānasutikānaṃ bhotisadda bhave saddānamatthuddhāraṃ vadāma.
anya-e0803n:453_0: Kathaṃ? Bhotisaddo kattuyoge kriyāpadaṃ, kriyāyoge nāmikapadaṃ, tasmā so dvīsu atthesu
anya-e0803n:453_1: vattati kriyāpadatthe nāmikapadatthe ca. Tattha kriyāpadatthe vattamānavasena, nāmikapadatthe
anya-e0803n:453_2: panālapanavasena. Kriyāpadatthe tāva “eko bhoti”, nāmikapadatthe “mā bhoti paridevesi”. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0803n:456_2: sattamīvibhattisahitassa saddassa anumatiparikappatthesupi vattati. Tatridaṃ paṭhamatthassa
anya-e0803n:459: Ayaṃ pana sabbesaṃ tesamatthānaṃ sādhikā amhākaṃ gāthāracanā –
anya-e0803n:460: “Sukhī bhavati eso ca, ahañcāpi sukhī bhave;
anya-e0803n:461: Sukhī bhavatu eso ca, ahañcāpi sukhī bhave.
anya-e0803n:464: Sukhī bhaveyya eso ca, ahañcāpi sukhī bhave;
anya-e0803n:465: Sukhī bhaveyya ce eso, ahañcāpi sukhī bhave”ti.
anya-e0803n:474: Ettha pāḷippadesaṃ tu, āharissaṃ suṇātha me.
anya-e0803n:476: Kaṃ tvaṃ atthavasaṃ ñatvā, evaṃ vāyamase bhusaṃ.
anya-e0803n:477: Nisamma vattaṃ lokassa, vāyāmassa ca devate;
anya-e0803n:489_0: Evamayaṃ bhavesaddo pañcasu chasu vā kriyāpadatthesu pavattati. Tathā sattamīvibhatyantanāmikapadassa
anya-e0803n:489_2: tassa, bhave tassa na nandatī”tiādīsu vuddhimhi. “Bhave vicaranto”tiādīsu saṃsāre.
anya-e0803n:489_3: “Bhave kho sati jāti hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”ntiādīsu kammabhave. “Evaṃ bhavevijjamāne”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:489_4: upapattibhaveti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā nayena bhūdhātuto nipphannānaṃ aññatopi aññesaṃ
anya-e0803n:493_1: gacchati gacchaṃ gacchatosaddādayo viya visesasaddā, na yācanopatāpanatthādivācako
anya-e0803n:493_2: nāthatisaddo viya, na ca rājadevatādivācako devasaddo viya sāmaññasaddā. Ye cettha
anya-e0803n:493_3: visesasaddā, te sabbakālaṃ visesasaddāva. Ye ca sāmaññasaddā, tepi sabbakālaṃ sāmaññasaddāva.
anya-e0803n:494_0: Tatra gacchatītiādīnaṃ visesasaddatā evaṃ daṭṭhabbā – gacchatīti ekaṃ nāmapadaṃ,
anya-e0803n:494_1: ekamākhyātaṃ. Tathā gacchanti ekaṃ nāmapadaṃ, ekamākhyātaṃ. Gacchatoti eko kitanto,
anya-e0803n:494_2: aparo rūḷhīsaddo. Satipi visesasaddatte sadisattā sutisāmaññato tabbisayaṃ buddhiṃ
anya-e0803n:494_4: “gacchati patiṭṭhita”nti vutte sattamyantaṃ nāmapadanti viññāyati. “Gacchati tisso”ti
anya-e0803n:494_5: vutte panākhyātanti. Tathā “sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti vutte paṭhamantaṃ nāmapadanti
anya-e0803n:494_6: viññāyati. “Gacchaṃ puttanivedako”ti vutte ākhyātanti viññāyati. “Gacchato hayato
anya-e0803n:494_7: patito”ti vutte kitantoti viññāyati. “Gacchato paṇṇapupphāni patantī”ti vutte rukkhavācako
anya-e0803n:494_8: rūḷhīsaddoti. Iti visesasaddānaṃ ākhyātanāmānaṃ nāmākhyātehi samānasutikānaṃ atthābhisambandhādīsu
anya-e0803n:494_9: yo koci atthavisesañāpako sambandho avassamicchitabbo. Evaṃ “gacchatī”tiādīnaṃ ākhyātanāmattādivasena
anya-e0803n:495_0: “Nāthati devo”tiādīnaṃ pana ākhyātanāmānaṃ nāmākhyātehi asamānasutikānaṃ anekatthavācakānaṃ
anya-e0803n:495_1: sāmaññasaddatā eva daṭṭhabbā. Atthasambandhādīsu hi vinā yena kenaci sambandhena
anya-e0803n:495_3: vā attho paṭibhāti, tathā “devo”ti vutte “megho”ti vā “ākāso”ti vā “rājā”ti vā “devatā”ti
anya-e0803n:495_4: vā “visuddhidevo”ti vā attho paṭibhāti. Yadā pana saddantarābhisambandhena “nāthati
anya-e0803n:495_5: suppaṭipatti”nti vutte tadā “nāthatī”ti kriyāpadassa “yācatī”ti attho viññāyati,
anya-e0803n:495_7: vutte “issariyaṃ karotī”ti attho viññāyati. “Nāthati lokassa hita”nti vutte “āsīsatī”ti
anya-e0803n:495_8: attho viññāyati. Tathā “devo gajjatī”ti vutte “devo”ti nāmapadassa “megho”ti attho
anya-e0803n:495_9: viññāyati. “Viddho vigatavalāhako devo”ti vutte “ākāso”ti attho viññāyati. “Pivatu
anya-e0803n:495_10: devo pānīya”nti vutte “rājā”ti attho viññāyati. “Devo devakāyā cavati āyusaṅkhayā”ti
anya-e0803n:495_12: attho viññāyati. Iminā nayena aññepi sāmaññasaddā ñātabbā.
anya-e0803n:496_0: Sabbametaṃ ñatvā yathā attho saddena, saddo catthena na virujjhati, tathātthasaddā
anya-e0803n:496_2: vā “kiccāni bhavante”ti vā vutte “bhavante”ti idaṃ “bhavantī”timinā samānatthamākhyātapadanti
anya-e0803n:496_3: evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo. “Bhavante passāmī”ti vā “icchāmī”ti vā vutte upayogatthavaṃ
anya-e0803n:496_4: nāmapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo. “Bhavante jane pasaṃsatī”ti vā “kāmetī”ti
anya-e0803n:496_5: vā vutte paccattopayogatthavantāni dve nāmapadānīti evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo.
anya-e0803n:496_7: evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo. “Parābhavante janā icchanti amittāna”nti vutte “parābhavante”ti
anya-e0803n:496_8: imāni upayogapaccattatthavantāni dve nāmapadānīti evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo.
anya-e0803n:496_10: evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo. “Ete parābhave loke, paṇḍito samavekkhiyā”ti vutte
anya-e0803n:496_11: “parābhave”ti idaṃ upayogatthavaṃ bahuvacanaṃ nāmapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo.
anya-e0803n:496_13: ca saddo ca cintanīyo. “Tumhe me pasādā sambhave”ti vutte “sambhave”ti idaṃ “sambhavathā”timinā
anya-e0803n:496_14: samānatthamākhyātapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo. “Ehi tvaṃ sambhavavhe”ti
anya-e0803n:496_15: vutte “sambhavavhe”ti idaṃ sambhavāya nāma itthiyā vācakaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ sālapanaṃ
anya-e0803n:496_16: nāmikapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo. “Ehi tvaṃ sambhavavhepatiṭṭhita”nti
anya-e0803n:496_17: vutte sambhavanāmakassa purisassa vācakaṃ pulliṅgaṃ bhummavacananti evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo.
anya-e0803n:499_1: samānatthaṃ sanipātamākhyātapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo. “Pātu bhavante
anya-e0803n:499_2: jane”ti vutte “te jane bhavaṃ rakkhatū”ti atthavācakāni ākhyātakitantasabbanāmikapadānīti
anya-e0803n:499_3: evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo. “Pātubhavase tvaṃ guṇehī”ti vutte “pātubhavase”ti
anya-e0803n:499_4: idaṃ “pātubhavasī”timinā samānatthamākhyātapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo.
anya-e0803n:499_5: “Pātubhavase guṇe yo tva”nti vutte “pātubhavāhi attano guṇahetu tva”nti atthavācakāninipātayuttākhyātanāmapadānīti
anya-e0803n:499_6: evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo. “Ahamattano guṇehi pātubhave”ti vutte “pātubhave”ti
anya-e0803n:499_7: idaṃ “pātubhavāmī”timinā samānatthaṃ sanipātamākhyātapadanti evamattho ca saddo ca
anya-e0803n:499_8: cintanīyo. “Maṃ pātu bhave idaṃ puññakamma”nti vutte “maṃ rakkhatu saṃsāre idaṃ puññakamma”nti
anya-e0803n:499_9: atthavācakāni ākhyātanāmapadānīti evamattho ca saddo ca cintanīyo. Iminā nayena sabbattha
anya-e0803n:499_10: yathārahamatthasaddā cintanīyā. Tattha samānasutikānaṃ kesañci saddānaṃ “na tesaṃ
anya-e0803n:499_11: koṭṭhe openti. Na tesaṃ antarā gacche. Satta vo licchavī aparihānīye dhamme desessāmi,
anya-e0803n:499_12: ime te deva sattavo, tvañca uttamasattavo”tiādīsu samānasutikānaṃ viya uccāraṇaviseso
anya-e0803n:499_13: icchanīyo. Uccāraṇavisese hi sati padāni paribyattāni, padesu paribyattesu attho
anya-e0803n:499_14: paribyatto hoti, atthapariggāhakānaṃ atthādhigamo akiccho hoti, suparisuddhādāsatale
anya-e0803n:499_15: paṭibimbadassanaṃ viya, so ca gahitapubbasaṅketassa atthasambandhādīsu aññatarasmiṃ
anya-e0803n:499_16: ñāteyeva hoti, na itarathā. Vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi –
anya-e0803n:501: Na padamattato atthe, te aññātā pakāsakā”ti.
anya-e0803n:502: Yadidamettha vuttamamhehi “uccāraṇaviseso icchanīyo”ti. Atrāyamuccāraṇavisesadīpanī gāthā sahatthappakāsananayadānagāthāya.
anya-e0803n:503: “Na te saṃ koṭṭhe openti”, iti pāṭhe sumedhaso;
anya-e0803n:504: Padaṃ “na te”ti chinditvā, “saṃ koṭṭhe”ti paṭheyya ve.
anya-e0803n:505: “Saṃ na openti koṭṭhe te, bhikkhū”ti atthamīraye;
anya-e0803n:507_0: Atha yaṃ panidampi vuttaṃ “kesañcī”ti, taṃ kimatthaṃ? “Gacchati patiṭṭhitaṃ, gacchati
anya-e0803n:507_1: tisso, bhavante passāmi, atthakusalā bhavante, vadantaṃ ekapokkharā, vadantaṃ paṭivadatī”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:507_2: samānasutikānamuccāraṇaviseso na labbhatīti dassanatthaṃ. Tasmā idamettha sallakkhetabbaṃ
anya-e0803n:507_3: – yattha samānasutikānamuccāraṇaviseso labbhati atthaviseso ca padānaṃ vibhāgavasena
anya-e0803n:507_4: vā avibhāgavasena vā, tattha payoge samānasutikamekaccaṃ padaṃ vicchinditvā uccāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:507_5: Seyyathidaṃ? “Hetu hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena
anya-e0803n:507_6: paccayo. So tena saddhiṃ bhāsati, sotena vuyhati. Bhavante jane pasaṃsati, bhavante
anya-e0803n:507_7: passāmī”ti evamādayo payogā. Ettha “hetū”ti īsakaṃ vicchinditvā “hetusampayuttāna”nti
anya-e0803n:508_0: Sesaṃ pana samānasutikaṃ vicchinditvā na uccāretabbaṃ. Avicchindanīyasmiñhi ṭhāne
anya-e0803n:508_1: vicchinditvā paṭhitassa attho duṭṭho hoti. Evaṃ padavibhāgāvibhāgavasena samānasutikānamatthuccāraṇaviseso
anya-e0803n:508_2: veditabbo. Ettha hi “so tenā”tiādīsu dvipadatthaggahaṇaṃ vibhāgo, ekapadatthaggahaṇamavibhāgoti
anya-e0803n:508_3: adhippeto. Ettha ca visuṃ vavatthitānaṃ asamānasutikānaṃ ekato katvā samānasutikabhāvaparikappanaṃ
anya-e0803n:508_4: atthantaraviññāpanatthañceva uccāraṇavisesadassanatthañca. Na hi etāni “sappo sappo”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:508_5: viya ekasmiṃyevatthe samānasutikāni. Evaṃ santepi ekajjhakaraṇena laddhaṃ samānasutilesaṃ
anya-e0803n:508_7: vuttāni. Esa nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu. Idamettha sallakkhetabbaṃ –
anya-e0803n:509_0: Yattha samānasutikānaṃ aṭṭhārasākāresu yena kenaci ākārena atthaviseso labbhati,
anya-e0803n:509_1: vicchinditvā pana uccāraṇe saddavilāso na hoti, attho vā duṭṭho hoti, na tādisesu
anya-e0803n:509_2: payogesu samānasutikāni padāni vicchinditvā uccāretabbāni. Tatra katamena cākārena
anya-e0803n:509_3: atthavisesalābho bhavati? Padānaṃ vibhāgavasena vā avibhāgavasena vā akkharasannidhānavasena
anya-e0803n:509_4: vā padasannidhānavasena vā padakkharasannidhānavasena vā vicchāvasena vā kammappavacanīyavasena
anya-e0803n:509_5: vā bhayakodhādīsu uppannesu kathitāmeḍitavacanavasena vā guṇavācakasaddassa dviruttavasena
anya-e0803n:509_6: vā kriyāpadassa dviruttavasena vā saṃhitāpadacchedavasena vā agāravatthaparidīpanavasena
anya-e0803n:509_8: vā upamāne iva saddavasena vā itisaddaṃ paṭicca saddapadatthavācakatthaparidīpanavasena
anya-e0803n:509_9: vā tathāpavattacittaparidīpanavasena vāti imesuṭṭhārasākāresu, vitthārato pana chabbīsāya
anya-e0803n:509_10: ākāresu tato vādhikesu yena kenaci ākārena atthavisesalābho bhavati.
anya-e0803n:510_0: Ettha padānaṃ tāva vibhāgavasena vā avibhāgavasena vā samānasutikānamatthavisesalābhe
anya-e0803n:510_1: “sā naṃ saṅgati pāleti, abhikkamo sānaṃ paññāyati. Mā no deva avadhi, māno mayhaṃ
anya-e0803n:511_0: Akkharasannidhānavasena pana atthavisesalābhe “santehi mahito hito. Saṅgā saṅgāmajiṃ
anya-e0803n:511_1: muttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ. Dāṭhī dāṭhīsu pakkhandi, maññamāno yathā pure. Sabbābhibhuṃva
anya-e0803n:511_2: sirasāsirasā namāmi. Bhūmito uṭṭhitā yāva, brahmalokā vidhāvati. Acci accimato loke,
anya-e0803n:512_1: lokassa, kārako ñāṇacakkhudo, nirāpade pade ninno, anantañāṇaṃ karuṇālayaṃ layaṃ,
anya-e0803n:512_2: malassa buddhaṃ susamāhitaṃ hitaṃ. Namāmi dhammaṃ bhavasaṃvaraṃ varaṃ, guṇākarañceva
anya-e0803n:513_1: tilokamahito hito. Upagantvāna sambuddho, idaṃ vacanamabravī”ti evamādayo payogā.
anya-e0803n:524: Vicchāvasena atthavisesalābhe “gāme gāme sataṃ kumbhā, gāmo gāmo ramaṇīyo”ti evamādayo payogā. Ettha hi vicchāvasena sabbepi gāmā pariggahitā.
anya-e0803n:526: Icchato byāpituṃ icchā, sā vicchāti pakittitā.
anya-e0803n:527: Kammappavacanīyavasena atthavisesalābhe “rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pari vijjotate cando”ti payogā, rukkhānaṃ upari upari vijjotateti attho.
anya-e0803n:528_0: Bhayakodhādīsu uppannesu kathitāmeḍitavacanavasena pana atthavisesalābhe ime payogā
anya-e0803n:528_1: – bhaye tāva “coro coro, sappo sappo”iccādayo. Kodhe “vasala vasala, caṇḍāla caṇḍāla,
anya-e0803n:528_2: vijjha vijjha, pahara pahara”iccādayo. Pasaṃsāyaṃ “sādhu sādhu sāriputta, abhikkantaṃ
anya-e0803n:528_3: bhante abhikkantaṃ bhante”iccādayo. Turite “abhikkama vāseṭṭha abhikkama vāseṭṭha,
anya-e0803n:528_4: gaccha gaccha, lunāhi lunāhi”iccādayo. Kotūhale “āgaccha āgaccha”iccādayo. Acchariye
anya-e0803n:528_5: “aho buddho aho buddho”iccādayo. Hāse “aho sukhaṃ aho sukhaṃ, aho manāpaṃ aho manāpaṃ”iccādayo.
anya-e0803n:528_6: Soke “kahaṃ ekaputtaka kahaṃ ekaputtaka”iccādayo. Pasāde “bhavissanti vajjī bhavissanti
anya-e0803n:528_7: vajjī”iccādayo. Evaṃ bhayakodhādīsu uppannesu kathitāmeḍitavacanavasena atthavisesalābho
anya-e0803n:528_8: bhavati. Ettha pana atthantarābhāvepi daḷhīkammavasena padānamatthajotakabhāvoyeva atthavisesalābho.
anya-e0803n:533_0: Casaddo avuttasamuccayattho, tena garahāasammānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. “Pāpo pāpo”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:533_1: hi garahāyaṃ. “Abhirūpaka abhirūpakā”tiādīsu asammāne. “Kvāyaṃ abalabalo viyā”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:533_2: atisayatthe āmeḍitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Guṇavācakassa dviruttavasena atthavisesalābhe “kaṇho
anya-e0803n:533_3: kaṇho ca ghoro cā”ti evamādayo. “Kaṇho kaṇho”ti hi atīva kaṇhoti attho. Kriyāpadassa
anya-e0803n:533_4: dviruttavasena atthavisesalābhe “dhame dhame nātidhame”ti evamādayo. Tattha dhame
anya-e0803n:533_5: dhameti dhameyya no na dhameyya. Nātidhameti pamāṇātikkantaṃ pana na dhameyya. Saṃhitāpadacchedavasena
anya-e0803n:533_7: pavattaṃ anusocanaṃ kukkucca”nti evamādayo. Ettha pana viññūnaṃ paramakosallajananatthaṃ silokaṃ racayāma –
anya-e0803n:536_2: evamādayo. Nanirantaratthaparidīpanavasena atthavisesalābhe “khaṇe khaṇe pīti uppajjatī”ti
anya-e0803n:536_4: kumāre”ti evamādayo. Upamāne ivasaddavasena atthavisesalābhe “rājā rakkhatu dhammena,
anya-e0803n:536_5: attanova pajaṃ paja”nti evamādayo. Itisaddaṃ paṭicca saddapadatthavācakattaparidīpanavasena
anya-e0803n:536_6: atthavisesalābhe “buddho buddhoti kathayanto, somanassaṃ pavedayi”nti evamādayo.
anya-e0803n:536_8: sodhemahaṃ tadā”ti evamādayo. Evaṃ īdisesu payogesu samānasutikapadaṃ vicchinditvā
anya-e0803n:536_9: na uccāretabbaṃ. Vicchinditvā hi uccāraṇe sati saddavilāso na bhavati, katthaci pana
anya-e0803n:536_10: “katākatākusalākusalavisaya”nti evamādīsu vicchinditvā uccāritassa attho duṭṭho hoti,
anya-e0803n:536_11: tasmā vicchinditvā na uccāretabbaṃ, ekābaddhaṃyeva katvā uccāretabbaṃ. Iti samānasutikesu
anya-e0803n:536_12: vinicchayo chabbīsāya ākārehi adhikehi ca maṇḍetvā dassito.
anya-e0803n:537_0: Yasmā pana samānasutikesu vinicchaye dassite asamānasutikesupi vinicchayo dassetabbo
anya-e0803n:537_1: hoti, tasmā tampi dassessāma – yattha niggahītamhā parākāralopopi pāṭho paññāyati,
anya-e0803n:537_2: saṃyogabyañjanassa visaṃyogattampi. Tesu payogesu niggahītapadaṃ anantarapadena saddhiṃ
anya-e0803n:537_3: ekābaddhaṃyeva katvā uccāretabbaṃ. Katamāni tāni? “Sace bhutto bhaveyyāhaṃ-sā’jīvo
anya-e0803n:537_4: garahito mama. Pupphaṃ’sā uppajji. Khayamattaṃ na nibbānaṃ’sa gambhīrādivācato”ti
anya-e0803n:537_5: evamādayo. Ettha hi “sace bhutto bhaveyyāha”ntiādinā vicchedamakatvā anantare dvīsu
anya-e0803n:537_6: gāthāpadesu antarībhūtānaṃ dvinnaṃ samānasutikapadānaṃ ekato uccāraṇamiva anantarapadehi
anya-e0803n:537_7: saddhiṃ ekābaddhuccāraṇavasena “sace bhutto bhaveyyāhaṃ-sā’jīvo garahito mamā”tiādinā
anya-e0803n:537_8: uccāretabbaṃ. Evarūpoyeva hi uccāraṇaviseso sakalehipi porāṇehi viññūhi anumato uccārito
anya-e0803n:537_9: ca “assa ājīvo garahito mama, assā uppajji, assa gambhīrādivācato”tievamādiatthappaṭipādanassānurūpattā.
anya-e0803n:538_0: Yattha pana yādise uccāraṇe kariyamāne attho paribyatto hoti, tesu payogesu kvaci
anya-e0803n:538_1: casadda panasaddādiyogaṭṭhāne īsakaṃ vicchinditvā padamuccāretabbaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ?
anya-e0803n:538_2: “Vāḷā ca lapasakkharā. Accantasantā pana yā, ayaṃ nibbānasampadā, “idaṃ dukkha”nti
anya-e0803n:538_3: vācaṃ bhāsato “idaṃ dukkha”nti ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti? Āmantā. Iti ca danti ca duti ca
anya-e0803n:538_4: khanti ca ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti? Na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti evamādayo payogā.
anya-e0803n:539_0: Etesu hi paṭhamapayoge “vāḷā cā”ti īsakaṃ vicchinditvā “lapasakkharā”ti uccāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:539_2: sakkharā viya madhurā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmātra bahubbīhitappurisavasena dvidhā samāso
anya-e0803n:539_3: daṭṭhabbo “lapā sakkharā viya yāsaṃ tā lapasakkharā, lapehi vā sakkharā viyāti lapasakkharā”ti.
anya-e0803n:540: Dutiyapayoge “accantasantā pana”iti īsakaṃ vicchinditvā “yā”ti uccāretabbaṃ. Yā pana ayaṃ nibbānasampadā accantasantāti hi attho.
anya-e0803n:541: Tatiyapayoge iti ca danti ca duti ca khanti cāti etesu catūsu ṭhānesu ikārañca daṃkārañca dukārañca khaṃkārañca īsakaṃ vicchinditvā tadanantaraṃ ti ca saddā uccāretabbā.
anya-e0803n:542_0: Ettha hi avicchinditvā uccāraṇe sati aññathā gahetabbattā attho duṭṭho bhavati. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:542_1: Īdisesu ṭhānesu avicchinditvā uccāraṇe sati itisaddo evanti atthavācako nipāto siyā,
anya-e0803n:542_2: sandhivasena pana ikāratthavācako rūḷhīsaddo na siyā. Dantisaddo damanattho siyā,
anya-e0803n:542_3: daṃkāravācako na siyā. Dutisaddo niratthako siyā, dukāravācako na siyā. Khantisaddo
anya-e0803n:542_4: khamanattho siyā, khaṃkāravācako na siyā. Tasmā ikāra daṃkāra dukāra khaṃkārāni īsakaṃ vicchinditabbāni.
anya-e0803n:543_0: Ettha hi iiti daṃiti duiti khaṃitītiādinā saṃhitāpadacchedo veditabbo, parabhūtassa
anya-e0803n:543_1: ca ikārassa lopo. Na panettha idaṃ vattabbaṃ “sarūpasarānaṃ visaye parabhūtassa sarūpasarassa
anya-e0803n:543_2: lopo na hoti, pubbasarasseva lopo hoti tatrāyanti ettha viyā”ti “akilāsuno vaṇṇapathe
anya-e0803n:543_3: khaṇantā, udaṅgaṇe tattha papaṃ avindu”nti pāḷiyaṃ sarūpaparasarassa lopadassanato.
anya-e0803n:543_4: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi “pavaddhaṃ āpaṃ papa”nti attho saṃvaṇṇito. Tasmā “iti
anya-e0803n:543_5: cā”ti etthāpi iiti cāti chedaṃ katvā dvīsu ikāresu parassa ikārassa lopo kātabbo, na pubbassa.
anya-e0803n:544_0: Pubbasmiñhi ikāravācake ikāre naṭṭhe sati nipātabhūtena itisaddena ikārasaṅkhāto
anya-e0803n:544_1: attho na viññāyeyya, nipātabhūtassa pana itisaddassa ikāre naṭṭhepi so attho viññāyateva
anya-e0803n:544_2: “devadattoti me suta”nti ettha devadattapadattho viya. Tasmā itisaddassa parabhūtassa
anya-e0803n:544_3: ikārasseva lopo kātabbo, na pubbassa ikāravācakassa ikārassa. Kaccāyane pana yebhuyyappavattiṃ
anya-e0803n:544_4: sandhāya asarūpasarato parasseva asarūpasarassa lopo vutto, na sarūpasarato parassa
anya-e0803n:544_5: sarūpasarassa. Mahāpadesasuttehi vā sarūpassa parasarassa lopo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:545_0: “Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷanda”ntiādīsu pana casaddādiyogaṭṭhānepi sati vicchinditvā
anya-e0803n:545_1: padaṃ na uccāretabbaṃ. Yattha ca āgamakkharādīni dissanti, tesu payogesu pubbapadāni
anya-e0803n:545_2: vicchinditvā na uccāretabbāni, āgamakkharavantehi parapadehi saddhiṃyeva uccāretabbāni.
anya-e0803n:545_4: Yattha yesaṃ visuṃ visuṃ sambandho dissati, attho ca yujjati, tattha tāni atthānurūpaṃ
anya-e0803n:545_5: vicchinditvā uccāretabbāni. Seyyathidaṃ? “Nahāne ussukkaṃ akāsi, ussukkampi akāsi
anya-e0803n:545_6: yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṃ” iccevamādayo payogā. Ettha hi “nahāne ussukkaṃ akāsī”ti
anya-e0803n:545_7: vicchinditvā “ussukkampi akāsi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmi”nti uccāretabbaṃ. Evañhi
anya-e0803n:545_8: sati na kevalaṃ so bhikkhu nahāneyeva ussukkaṃ akāsi, atha kho yāguyāpi khādanīyepi
anya-e0803n:545_9: bhattasmimpi ussukkaṃ akāsīti atthappakāsane samattho bhavati, aṭṭhānappayutto samuccayatthavācako apisaddo.
anya-e0803n:546_0: Yattha pana yesamitarena vā itarena vā ekekapadena ubhayapadehi vā sambandho dissati
anya-e0803n:546_1: sahevatthayuttiyā, tattha tāni yathārahaṃ vicchinditvā uccāretabbāni. Seyyathidaṃ?
anya-e0803n:546_2: “So dhammaṃ desetiādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ
anya-e0803n:546_3: kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti. Paṭiccasamuppādaṃ vo bhikkhave
anya-e0803n:546_4: desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasikarotha. Ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāva”nti
anya-e0803n:554: Nattanomatiyā eso, attho ettha mayā ruto;
anya-e0803n:559: Cintayitvāna medhāvī, vohare na yathā tathāti.
anya-e0803n:561_0: Atthātisayayoge evaṃ upalakkhetabbaṃ – bhūdhātuatthātisayayogato vaḍḍhane diṭṭhā
anya-e0803n:561_1: “ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo licchavī udānaṃ udānesi ‘bhavissanti vajjī bhavissanti
anya-e0803n:561_2: vajjī’ti” iti vā “ahameva dūsiyā bhūnahatā, rañño mahāpatāpassā”ti vā “vedā na tāṇāya
anya-e0803n:561_3: bhavantidassa, mittadduno bhūnahuno narassā”ti vā “bhūnahaccaṃ kataṃ mayā”ti vā evaṃ vaḍḍhane diṭṭhā.
anya-e0803n:562: Vacanasaṅgahe evaṃ upalakkhetabbaṃ – vattamānāya vibhattiyā parassapadaṃ majjhimapurisabahuvacanaṃ pañcamiyā parassapadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena sadisaṃ. Tumhe bhavatha.
anya-e0803n:563: Vattamānapañcamīnaṃ parassapade uttamapurisacatukke ekavacanaṃ ekavacanena, bahuvacanampi bahuvacanena sadisaṃ. Ahaṃ bhavāmi, mayaṃ bhavāma.
anya-e0803n:564_1: dvīhi majjhimapurisekavacanehi sadisaṃ katthaci vaṇṇasamudāyavasena kiñci visesaṃ
anya-e0803n:564_2: vajjetvā, esa nayo uttaratrāpi yojetabbo. Tvaṃ bhavase, idaṃ vattamānāya rūpaṃ. Tvaṃ
anya-e0803n:565_1: ca parokkhāya parassapadena majjhimapurisekavacanena cāti dvīhi vacanehi sadisaṃ.
anya-e0803n:565_2: Ahaṃ bhave, idaṃ vattamānapañcamīnaṃ rūpaṃ. Tvaṃ babhūve, idaṃ parokkhāya rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:566_0: Vattamānāya attanopadaṃ uttamapurisabahuvacanaṃ parokkhajjatanīnaṃ attanopadehi dvīhi
anya-e0803n:566_1: uttamapurisabahuvacanehi sadisaṃ. Mayaṃ bhavāmhe, idaṃ vattamānāya rūpaṃ. Mayaṃ babhūvimhe,
anya-e0803n:566_2: idaṃ parokkhāya rūpaṃ. Mayaṃ abhavimhe, idamajjataniyā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:567_0: Pañcamiyā attanopadaṃ majjhimapurisabahuvacanaṃ parokkhāya attanopadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena
anya-e0803n:567_1: sadisaṃ. Tumhe bhavavho, idaṃ pañcamiyā rūpaṃ. Tumhe babhūvivho, idaṃ parokkhāya rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:568_0: Parokkhāya parassapadaṃ paṭhamapurisabahuvacanaṃ hiyyattaniyā parassapadena paṭhamapurisabahuvacanena
anya-e0803n:568_1: ca ajjataniyā attanopadena paṭhamapurisabahuvacanena cāti dvīhi vacanehi sadisaṃ.
anya-e0803n:568_2: Te babhūvu, idaṃ parokkhāya rūpaṃ. Te abhavu, idaṃ hiyyattanajjatanīnaṃ rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:569_1: ca hiyyattaniyā parassapadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena ca attanopadena paṭhamapurisekavacanena
anya-e0803n:569_2: ca ajjataniyā parassapadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena cāti catūhi vacanehi sadisaṃ.
anya-e0803n:569_3: Tumhe babhūvittha, so babhūvittha, imāni parokkhāya rūpāni. Tumhe abhavattha, so
anya-e0803n:569_4: abhavattha, imāni hiyyattaniyā rūpāni. Tumhe abhavittha, idamajjataniyā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:570_1: ca ajjataniyā attanopadenuttamapurisekavacanena cāti dvīhi vacanehi sadisaṃ. Ahaṃ
anya-e0803n:570_2: babhūvaṃ, idaṃ parokkhāya rūpaṃ. Ahaṃ abhavaṃ, idaṃ hiyyattanajjatanīnaṃ rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:571_1: sadisaṃ. Mayaṃ babhūvimha, idaṃ parokkhāya rūpaṃ. Mayaṃ abhavamha, idaṃ hiyyattaniyā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:572_1: ca ajjataniyā parassapadenuttamapurisekavacanena cāti dvīhi vacanehi sadisaṃ. Ahaṃ
anya-e0803n:572_2: babhūviṃ, idaṃ parokkhāya rūpaṃ. Ahaṃ abhaviṃ, idaṃ hiyyattanajjatanīnaṃ rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:573: Hiyyattaniyā parassapadaṃ paṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ajjataniyā attanopadena paṭhamapurisekavacanena sadisaṃ. So abhavā.
anya-e0803n:574: Hiyyattaniyā parassapadaṃ majjhimapurisekavacanaṃ ajjataniyā parassapadena majjhimapurisekavacanena sadisaṃ. Tvaṃ abhavo.
anya-e0803n:575_1: majjhimapurisabahuvacanena attanopadena paṭhamapurisekavacanena cāti dvīhi vacanehi
anya-e0803n:575_2: sadisaṃ. Tumhe bhavissatha, idaṃ bhavissantiyā rūpaṃ. Tumhe abhavissatha, so abhavissatha,
anya-e0803n:576_0: Bhavissantiyā attanopadaṃ majjhimapurisekavacanaṃ kālātipattiyā attanopadena majjhimapurisekavacanena
anya-e0803n:576_1: sadisaṃ. Tvaṃ bhavissase, idaṃ bhavissantiyā rūpaṃ. Tvaṃ abhavissase, idaṃ kālātipattiyā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:577_0: Bhavissantiyā attanopadaṃ majjhimapurisabahuvacanaṃ kālātipattiyā attanopadena majjhimapurisabahuvacanena
anya-e0803n:577_1: sadisaṃ. Tumhe bhavissavhe, idaṃ bhavissantiyā rūpaṃ. Tumhe abhavissavhe, idaṃ kālātipattiyā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:578_1: sadisaṃ. Ahaṃ bhavissaṃ, idaṃ bhavissantiyā rūpaṃ. Ahaṃ abhavissaṃ, idaṃ kālātipattiyā
anya-e0803n:578_2: rūpaṃ. Sesāni sabbāsamaṭṭhannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ vacanāni aññamaññaṃ visadisānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhavanti catra –
anya-e0803n:581: Midvayaṃ madvayañceva, tāsu vuttaṃ dvidhā dvidhā;
anya-e0803n:587: Ettayaṃ lapitaṃ tattha, ādo dvinnaṃ vasena tu.
anya-e0803n:602: Bavhattekattato vuttaṃ, majjhimo paṭhamo ca so;
anya-e0803n:625: Imāni tu payogāni, tattha viññū pakāsaye.
anya-e0803n:635: Etaṃ nayaṃ gahetvāna, vade sabbattha sambhavāti.
anya-e0803n:670_0: Kālavasena pana vibhattivacanasaṅgahe duvidho saṅgaho kālattayavasena saṅgaho, kālachakkavasena
anya-e0803n:670_1: saṅgaho cāti. Tattha vattamānāpañcamīsattamīvibhattiyo paccuppannakālikā, vattamānāpañcamīsattamīvibhatyantāni
anya-e0803n:670_4: padāni anāgatavacanāni. Kālātipattivibhatti pana katthaci atītakālikā katthaci anāgatakālikā,
anya-e0803n:670_5: tasmā tadantāni padāni atītavacanānipi anāgatavacanānipi honti. Ayaṃ kālattayavasena
anya-e0803n:671_4: āṇattikālikā, pañcamīvibhatyantāni padāni āṇattivacanāni. Sattamīvibhatti parikappakālikā,
anya-e0803n:671_5: sattamīvibhatyantāni padāni parikappavacanāni. Ettha pana “āṇattivacanānī”ti ca “parikappavacanānī”ti
anya-e0803n:671_6: ca idaṃ tathāsīsamattaṃ āsiṭṭhānumatyādīsu pañcamyādīnaṃ dissanato. Kālātipattivibhatti
anya-e0803n:671_7: kālātipattikālikā, kālātipattivibhatyantāni padāni kālātipattivacanāni. Evaṃ kālachakkavasena
anya-e0803n:672: Kālasaṅgahe tividho kālasaṅgaho kālattayasaṅgaho kālacatukkasaṅgaho kālachakkasaṅgaho cāti.
anya-e0803n:677: Nanu kaccāyane ganthe, kālo vutto catubbidho;
anya-e0803n:682: Na kālato vinimuttaṃ, ākhyātaṃ kiñci dissati.
anya-e0803n:683: Nanu cāvuttakāleti, attho tatra tu yujjati;
anya-e0803n:684: Tathā hi chabbidho kālo, niruttimhi pakāsito.
anya-e0803n:694: Paccuppanne bhavantīti, na tathā tattha bhāsitā.
anya-e0803n:699: Kasmāti ce āṇāpanaṃ, parikappo ca saccato;
anya-e0803n:700: Paccuppanne yato atthā, nipphannā dissare ime.
anya-e0803n:703: Atthānaṃ gamanādīnaṃ, nipphatti na tu dissati;
anya-e0803n:706: Kālo vā vuttakāloti, iccevaṃ gahito idha;
anya-e0803n:711: Evaṃ tidhā catudhāpi, vutto kālāna saṅgaho;
anya-e0803n:712: Chadhā idāni kālānaṃ, saṅgaho nāma niyyate.
anya-e0803n:720: Samānā pañcamī hoti, tasmā sā pañcamī matā.
anya-e0803n:721: Sattamī pana kiñcāpi, samānā tāhi sattamā;
anya-e0803n:722: Hoti yasmā tato vuttā, sattamītveva no mati.
anya-e0803n:725: Pañcamī tāya chaṭṭhassa, tulyattā ṭhānato nanu;
anya-e0803n:729: Tathā hi bhāsitā cūḷa-niruttimhi visuṃ ayaṃ;
anya-e0803n:735_0: Atridaṃ kālātipattiyā atītavacanaṃ – “sacāyaṃ bhikkhave rājā pitaraṃ dhammikaṃ dhammarājānaṃ
anya-e0803n:735_1: jīvitā na voropessatha, imasmiṃyevassa āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhu uppajjissathā”ti.
anya-e0803n:735_2: “Passānanda imaṃ mahādhanaseṭṭhiputtaṃ imasmiṃyeva nagare dveasītikoṭidhanaṃ khepetvā
anya-e0803n:735_3: bhariyaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya carantaṃ. Sace hi ayaṃ paṭhamavaye bhoge akhepetvā kammante
anya-e0803n:735_4: payojayissā, imasmiṃyeva nagare aggaseṭṭhi abhavissā. Sace pana nikkhamitvā pabbajissā,
anya-e0803n:735_5: arahattaṃ pāpuṇissā, bhariyāpissa anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahissā. Sace majjhimavaye bhoge
anya-e0803n:735_6: akhepetvā kammante payojayissā, dutiyaseṭṭhi abhavissā. Nikkhamitvā pabbajanto anāgāmī
anya-e0803n:735_7: abhavissā, bhariyāpissa sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahissā. Sace pacchimavaye bhoge akhepetvā
anya-e0803n:735_8: kammante payojayissā, tatiyaseṭṭhi abhavissā. Nikkhamitvā pabbajanto sakadāgāmī abhavissā,
anya-e0803n:735_9: bhariyāpissa sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahissā” iti vā, “sace satthā agāraṃ ajjhāvasissā,
anya-e0803n:735_10: cakkavattirājā abhavissā. Rāhulasāmaṇero pariṇāyakaratanaṃ, therī itthiratanaṃ, sakalacakkavāḷarajjaṃ
anya-e0803n:735_11: etesaññeva abhavissā” iti vā evaṃ kālātipattiyā atītavacanaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0803n:736_0: Kathaṃ kālātipattiyā anāgatavacanaṃ bhavati? “Cirampi bhakkho abhavissā, sace na
anya-e0803n:736_1: vivadāmase. Asīsakaṃ anaṅguṭṭhaṃ, siṅgālo harati rohitaṃ”itivā, “sace ānanda nālabhissā
anya-e0803n:736_2: mātugāmo tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ, ciraṭṭhitikaṃ
anya-e0803n:736_3: ānanda brahmacariyaṃ abhavissā”ti iti vā, “ayaṃ aṅgulimālassa mātā ‘aṅgulimālaṃ ānessāmī’ti
anya-e0803n:736_4: gacchati, sace samāgamissati, aṅgulimālo ‘aṅgulisahassaṃ pūressāmī’ti mātaraṃ māressati.
anya-e0803n:736_5: Sacāhaṃ na gamissāmi, mahājāniko abhavissā” iti vā evaṃ kālātipattiyā anāgatavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:736_6: bhavati. Kaccāyane pana yebhuyyena atītappavattiṃ sandhāya kālātipattivibhattiyā
anya-e0803n:745: Sattamī sattamīyeva, bhavate na tu aṭṭhamī.
anya-e0803n:749: Pañcamiyā tu sā esā, “chaṭṭhī”ti na samīritā.
anya-e0803n:754: Chaṭṭhiyā ca bhavitabbaṃ, na sā “chaṭṭhī”ti īritā;
anya-e0803n:756: Majjhe chaṭṭhiṃ adassetvā, evaṃ tu kathanampi ca;
anya-e0803n:763: Kaccāyanavhaye ganthe, kasmā evaṃ na bhāsitā;
anya-e0803n:774_0: Ettha hi yathā “mātāpitaro”ti vutte siliṭṭhakathanaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva vacane vipariyayaṃ
anya-e0803n:774_1: katvā samāsavasena “pitāmātaro”ti vutte siliṭṭhakathanaṃ na hoti, tasmā tādisī saddaracanā
anya-e0803n:774_2: apūjanīyā, “pitā mātā ca me dajju”nti pāṭho pana byāsavasena yathicchitappayogattā
anya-e0803n:774_4: evamādinā vutte siliṭṭhakathanaṃ na hoti, tasmā tādisī saddaracanā apūjanīyā siyā.
anya-e0803n:779: Tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti ca,
anya-e0803n:780: “Ye cabbhatītā sambuddhā, ye ca buddhā anāgatā;
anya-e0803n:783: Athopi viharissanti, esā buddhāna dhammatā”ti ca
anya-e0803n:784_1: aṭṭhasu vibhattīsu tisso paccuppannakālikā vibhattiyo ādimhi kathitā, tañca kathanaṃ
anya-e0803n:784_2: tāsaññeva vohārapathe yebhuyyena pavattito bahuppayogatāñāpanatthaṃ. Tāsu pana dvinnaṃ
anya-e0803n:787: Ādimhi kathanaṃ tañca, tāsaṃ pāyena vuttito;
anya-e0803n:792: Yadi evaṃ ayaṃ doso, āpajjati na saṃsayo;
anya-e0803n:793: Iti ce koci bhāseyya, atthe akusalonaro.
anya-e0803n:808: Vuttañhetaṃ abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ “yattha yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati, tattha tattha tathā tathā gahetabbo”ti.
anya-e0803n:810: Na panevaṃ gahetabbaṃ, ajānitvā vadanti te.
anya-e0803n:813: Upanidhāya paññatti, esā saññā yato tato;
anya-e0803n:815: Iccevaṃ kālachakkaṃ tu, saṅkhepena tidhā mataṃ;
anya-e0803n:818: Evaṃ tidhā catudhā vā, chadhā vāpi sumedhaso;
anya-e0803n:825_0: Idāni viññūnaṃ atthaggahaṇe kosallajananatthaṃ pakaraṇantaravasenapi imasmiṃ pakaraṇe
anya-e0803n:825_2: dvinnaṃ vibhattīnaṃ paṭipāṭiṭṭhapane pakaraṇasaṃsandanaṃ kathayāma – kātantappakaraṇasmiñhi
anya-e0803n:825_3: sakkatabhāsānurūpena dasadhā ākhyātavibhattiyo ṭhapitā, kaccāyanappakaraṇe pana māgadhabhāsānurūpena
anya-e0803n:825_5: chadhā ṭhapitā. Tesu hi kātante vattamānā, sattamī, pañcamī, hiyyattanī, ajjatanī,
anya-e0803n:825_6: parokkhā, svātanī, āsī, bhavissantī, kriyātipatti cāti dasadhā vibhattā. Kaccāyane
anya-e0803n:825_7: pana vattamānā, pañcamī, sattamī, parokkhā, hiyyattanī, ajjatanī, bhavissantī, kālātipatti
anya-e0803n:825_8: cāti aṭṭhadhā vibhattā. Iti etesu dvīsu kātantakaccāyanesu vibhattiyo visadisāya
anya-e0803n:825_9: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitā. Kiñcāpettha visadisā paṭipāṭi, tathāpetā niruttiyaṃ vuttātītādikālavibhāgavasena
anya-e0803n:825_10: ekato saṃsandanti samenti kiñci visesaṃ ṭhapetvā.
anya-e0803n:826_0: Kathaṃ? Kātante tāva hiyyattanī ajjatanī parokkhā cāti imā tisso ekantena atītakālikā,
anya-e0803n:826_1: svātanī āsī bhavissanti cāti imā tisso ekantena anāgatakālikā, vattamānā ekāyeva
anya-e0803n:826_2: paccuppannakālikā, sattamī pana pañcamī ca paccuppannānāgatakālavasena dvikālikā
anya-e0803n:826_3: “ajja puññaṃ kareyya, svepi kareyya. Ajja gacchatu, sve vā gacchatū”ti payogārahattā.
anya-e0803n:826_4: Kriyātipatti aniyatakālikā “so ce hiyyo yānaṃ alabhissā, agacchissā. So ce ajja anatthaṅgate
anya-e0803n:826_5: sūriye yānaṃ alabhissā, agacchissā. So ce sve yānaṃ alabhissā, agacchissā”ti payogārahattā.
anya-e0803n:827_0: Evaṃ vavatthapetvā ayamamhehi vuccamāno nayo sādhukaṃ sallakkhetabbo. Kathaṃ? Hiyyattanajjatanīparokkhāsvātanyāsībhavissantivasena
anya-e0803n:827_1: ekantātītānāgatakālikā vibhattiyo cha, vattamānavasena ekantapaccuppannakālikā vibhatti
anya-e0803n:827_2: ekāyeva, sā paṭipāṭiyā gaṇiyamānā sattamaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhajati. Evaṃ etasmiṃ vattamānāsaṅkhāte
anya-e0803n:827_3: sattamaṭṭhāne pakkhipituṃ niruttinayena “parikappakālikā”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ satthanayena
anya-e0803n:827_5: sattamīsaññaṃ katvā ṭhapesi. Tato punadeva svātanyāsībhavissantivasena ekantānāgatakālikā
anya-e0803n:827_6: tisso vibhattiyo gaṇetvā taṃ paccuppannānāgatakālikaṃ “sattamī”ti laddhasaññaṃ vibhattiṃ
anya-e0803n:827_7: anāgatakālikabhāvena tāhi tīhi saddhiṃ samānaṭṭhānattā catutthaṃ katvā niruttinayena
anya-e0803n:827_9: ekaṃ vibhattiṃ pañcannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ pūraṇena pañcamīsaññaṃ katvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e0803n:828_0: Kriyātipattiyā pana aniyatakālikattā taṃ vajjetvā ayaṃ vinicchayo kato, so ca kho
anya-e0803n:828_1: niruttinayaṃyeva nissāya. Ayaṃ tāva kātante vattamānānantaraṃ vuttānaṃ sattamīpañcamīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:828_2: anvatthasaññaṃ icchantānaṃ amhākaṃ ruci, esā saddhammavidūhi garūhi appaṭikkositā
anya-e0803n:828_3: anumatā sampaṭicchitā “evamevaṃ āvuso, evamevaṃ āvuso”ti. Veyyākaraṇehipi appaṭikkositā
anya-e0803n:828_4: anumatā sampaṭicchitā “evamevaṃ bhante, evamevaṃ bhante”ti. Evaṃ sabbehipi tehi pubbācariyehi
anya-e0803n:829_0: Kaccāyanappakaraṇe pana buddhavacanānurūpena aṭṭhadhā vibhattīnaṃ vuttattā vattamānāvibhatti
anya-e0803n:829_2: catasso vibhattiyo, vattamānavasena ekantapaccuppannakālikā vibhatti ekāyeva, sā
anya-e0803n:829_3: paṭipāṭiyā gaṇiyamānā pañcamaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhajati. Evaṃ etasmiṃ vattamānāsaṅkhāte pañcamaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n:829_5: vibhattiṃ pañcamībhūtāya vattamānāya samānaṭṭhānattā pañcamīsaññaṃ katvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e0803n:829_6: Tato paraṃ taṃ pañcamaṃ chaṭṭhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā parokkhā hiyyattanī ajjatanī bhavissantī
anya-e0803n:829_7: vattamānā pañcamīti evaṃ gaṇanāvasena cha vibhattiyo upādāya niruttinayena “parikappakālikā”ti
