anya-e0803n:829_8: saṅkhaṃ gataṃ “anuttakālikā”ti vuttaṃ vibhattiṃ sattannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ pūraṇena sattamīsaññaṃ katvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e0803n:830_0: Kālātipattiyā pana atītānāgatakālikattā taṃ vajjetvā ayaṃ vinicchayo kato, so ca
anya-e0803n:830_1: kho niruttinayaṃyeva nissāya. Ayaṃ kaccāyane vattamānānantaraṃ vuttānaṃ pañcamīsattamīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:830_2: anvatthasaññaṃ icchantānaṃ amhākaṃ ruci, esā ca saddhammavidūhi garūhi appaṭikkositā
anya-e0803n:830_3: anumatā sampaṭicchitā “evamevaṃ āvuso, evamevaṃ āvuso”ti. Veyyākaraṇehipi appaṭikkositā
anya-e0803n:830_4: anumatā sampaṭicchitā “evamevaṃ bhante, evamevaṃ bhante”ti. Evaṃ sabbehipi tehi pubbācariyehi
anya-e0803n:831_0: Yasmā hi kātantakaccāyanāni aññamaññaṃ visadisavibhattikkamānipi antarena kiñci visesaṃ
anya-e0803n:831_1: niruttiyaṃ vuttātītādikālavibhāgavasenekajjhaṃ saṃsandanti samenti, tasmā niruttinayaññeva
anya-e0803n:831_2: sārato gahetvā pañcamīsattamīvibhattīnaṃ anvatthasaññāparikappane amhākaṃ ruci pubbācariyehi
anya-e0803n:831_3: abbhanumoditā appaṭikkositā, tasmā eva yo koci imaṃ vādaṃ madditvā aññaṃ vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ
anya-e0803n:831_4: sakkhissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Ayañhi nayo atīva sukhumo duddaso ca paramāṇuriva,
anya-e0803n:831_5: dukkhogāḷho ca mahāgahanamiva, atigambhīro ca mahāsamuddo viya, tasmā imissaṃ saddanītiyaṃ
anya-e0803n:831_6: saddhāsampannehi kulaputtehi sāsanopakāratthaṃ yogo suṭṭhu karaṇīyo. Tathā hi idha
anya-e0803n:831_7: katayogehi nāmākhyātādīsu catūsu padesu uppannavādā paravādino jitāva honti.
anya-e0803n:837_0: Atha vattamānādīnaṃ vacanatthaṃ kathayāma – tattha vattamānāti kenaṭṭhena vattamānā?
anya-e0803n:837_1: Vattamānakālavacanaṭṭhena. Paccuppannabhāvena hi vattatīti vattamāno, paccuppannakriyāsaṅkhāto
anya-e0803n:837_2: kālo. Tabbācakavasena vattamāno kālo etissā atthīti ayaṃ ti antiādivibhatti vattamānā.
anya-e0803n:837_3: Tathā hi “gacchati devadatto”ti ettha devadattassa paccuppannaṃ gamanakriyaṃ vibhattibhūto
anya-e0803n:837_4: tisaddoyeva vadati, tasmā tabbācakavasena vattamāno kālo etissā atthīti vattamānāti
anya-e0803n:837_5: vuccati. Pañcamīti kenaṭṭhena pañcamī? Pañcamaṃ vattamānaṭṭhānaṃ gamanaṭṭhena, pañcannañca
anya-e0803n:837_6: saṅkhyānaṃ pūraṇaṭṭhena. Tathā hi niyogā atītānāgatapaccuppannakālikānaṃ parokkhāhiyyattanajjatanībhavissantīvattamānāsaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0803n:837_7: pañcannaṃ vibhattīnamantare pañcamībhūtāya vattamānāya sayampi paccuppannakālikabhāvena
anya-e0803n:837_8: samānaṭṭhānattā pañcamaṃ vattamānaṭṭhānaṃ gacchatīti pañcamī. Yathā nadantī gacchatīti
anya-e0803n:837_10: catasso vibhattiyo upādāya sayampi vattamānāvibhatti viya pañcannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ pūraṇīti
anya-e0803n:837_11: pañcamī. Sattamīti kenaṭṭhena sattamī? Sattannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ pūraṇaṭṭhena. Tathā hi
anya-e0803n:837_13: cha vibhattiyo upādāya sayampi paccuppannakālikā hutvā sattannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ pūraṇīti sattamī.
anya-e0803n:838_0: Parokkhāti kenaṭṭhena parokkhā? Parokkhe bhavāti atthena. Tathā hi cakkhādindriyasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0803n:838_1: akkhassa paro tirobhāvo parokkhaṃ, tabbācakabhāvena parokkhe bhavāti parokkhā. Hiyyattanīti
anya-e0803n:838_2: kenaṭṭhena hiyyattanī? Hiyyo pabhuti atīte kāle bhavā tabbācakabhāvenāti atthena.
anya-e0803n:838_3: Ajjatanīti kenaṭṭhena ajjatanī? Ajja pabhuti atīte kāle bhavā tabbācakabhāvenāti
anya-e0803n:838_4: atthena. Bhavissantīti kenaṭṭhena bhavissantī? “Evaṃ anāgate bhavissatī”ti atthaṃ
anya-e0803n:838_5: pakāsentī eti gacchatīti atthena. Kālātipattīti kenaṭṭhena kālātipatti? Kālassātipatanavacanaṭṭhena.
anya-e0803n:838_6: Tathā hi kālassa atipatanaṃ accayo atikkamitvā pavatti kālātipatti, labhitabbassa
anya-e0803n:838_7: atthassa nipphattirahitaṃ kriyātikkamanaṃ. Kāloti cettha kriyā adhippetā. Karaṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:838_8: kāro, kāro eva kālo rakārassa lakāraṃ katvā uccāraṇavasena. Ayaṃ pana vibhatti tabbācakattā
anya-e0803n:841: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:853: Tadevaṃ nāmikaṃ ñe yyaṃ, saliṅgaṃ savibhattikaṃ.
anya-e0803n:856: Paṭhamā dutiyā tatiyā, catutthī pañcamī tathā;
anya-e0803n:857: Chaṭṭhī ca sattamī cāti, honti satta vibhattiyo.
anya-e0803n:858: Liṅgatthe paṭhamā sāyaṃ, bhinnā dvedhā siyo iti;
anya-e0803n:859: Kammatthe dutiyā sāpi, bhinnā aṃ yo iti dvidhā.
anya-e0803n:860: Karaṇe tatiyā sāpi, bhinnā nā hi iti dvidhā;
anya-e0803n:861: Sampadāne catutthī sā, bhinnā dvedhā sa naṃ iti.
anya-e0803n:862: Apādāne pañcamī sā, bhinnā dvedhā smā hi iti;
anya-e0803n:863: Chaṭṭhī sāmimhi sā cāpi, bhinnā dvedhā sa naṃ iti.
anya-e0803n:864: Okāse sattamī sāpi, bhinnā dvedhā smiṃsu iti;
anya-e0803n:868: Yo karotisa kattātu, taṃ kammaṃ yaṃ karoti vā;
anya-e0803n:869: Kubbate yena vā tantu, karaṇaṃ iti saññitaṃ.
anya-e0803n:870: Deti rocati vā yassa, sampadānanti taṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0803n:871: Yatopeti bhayaṃ vā taṃ, apādānanti kittitaṃ.
anya-e0803n:872: Yassāyatto samūhovā, taṃ ve sāmīti desitaṃ;
anya-e0803n:876: Vinā ālapanatthaṃ liṅgatthādīsu paṭhamādivibhattuppatti upalakkhaṇavasena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:877_0: Idamettha niruttilakkhaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ – paccattavacane paṭhamā vibhatti bhavati,
anya-e0803n:877_1: upayogavacane dutiyā vibhatti bhavati, karaṇavacane tatiyā vibhatti bhavati, sampadānavacane
anya-e0803n:877_2: catutthī vibhatti bhavati, nissakkavacane pañcamī vibhatti bhavati, sāmivacane chaṭṭhī
anya-e0803n:877_3: vibhatti bhavati, bhummavacane sattamī vibhatti bhavati, āmantanavacane aṭṭhamī vibhatti
anya-e0803n:880_0: Tatra paccattavacanaṃ nāma tividhaliṅgavavatthānagatānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsakānaṃ paccattasabhāvaniddesattho.
anya-e0803n:880_1: Upayogavacanaṃ nāma yo yaṃ karoti, tena tadupayuttaparidīpanattho. Karaṇavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:880_3: Nissakkavacanaṃ nāma tannissaṭatadapagamaparidīpanattho. Sāmivacanaṃ nāma tadissaraparidīpanattho.
anya-e0803n:880_4: Bhummavacanaṃ nāma tappatiṭṭhāparidīpanattho. Āmantanavacanaṃ nāma tadāmantanaparidīpanattho.
anya-e0803n:881_0: Bhūto, bhāvako, bhavo, abhavo, bhāvo, abhāvo, sabhāvo, sabbhāvo, sambhavo, pabhavo,
anya-e0803n:881_1: pabhāvo, anubhavo, ānubhāvo, parābhavo, vibhavo, pātubhāvo, āvibhāvo, tirobhāvo,
anya-e0803n:882: Abhibhavitā, paribhavitā, anubhavitā, samanubhavitā, bhāvitā, paccanubhavitāti ākārantapulliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0803n:883: Bhavaṃ, parābhavaṃ, paribhavaṃ, abhibhavaṃ, anubhavaṃ, samanubhavaṃ, paccanubhavaṃ, pabhavaṃ, appabhavanti niggahītantapulliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0803n:886_0: Sayambhū, pabhū, abhibhū, vibhū, adhibhū, patibhū, gotrabhū, vatrabhū, parābhibhū,
anya-e0803n:886_1: rūpābhibhū, saddābhibhū, gandhābhibhū, rasābhibhū, phoṭṭhabbābhibhū, dhammābhibhū,
anya-e0803n:888_1: pasiddhaṃ “bhikkhu, hetu”iti. Tena saddhiṃ sattavidhāni pulliṅgāni honti, sabbānetāni
anya-e0803n:888_2: sabhāvatoyeva pulliṅgānīti daṭṭhabbāni. Ettha sattoti atthavācako bhūtasaddoyeva
anya-e0803n:889_0: Ye pana “yo dhammo bhūto, yā dhammajāti bhūtā, yaṃ dhammajātaṃ bhūta”nti evaṃ liṅgattaye
anya-e0803n:889_1: yojanārahattā aniyataliṅgā aññepi bhūtaparābhūtasambhūtasaddādayo sandissanti pāvacanavare,
anya-e0803n:889_2: tepi nānopasagganipātapadehi yojanavasena saddaracanāyaṃ sukhumatthaggahaṇe ca viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:890_0: Seyyathidaṃ? Bhūto, parābhūto, sambhūto, vibhūto, pātubhūto, āvibhūto, tirobhūto,
anya-e0803n:890_1: vinābhūto, bhabbo, paribhūto, abhibhūto, adhibhūto, addhabhūto, anubhūto, samanubhūto,
anya-e0803n:890_2: paccanubhūto, bhāvito, sambhāvito, vibhāvito, paribhāvito, anuparibhūto, paribhavitabbo,
anya-e0803n:890_3: paribhotabbo, paribhavanīyo, abhibhavitabbo, abhibhotabbo, abhibhavanīyo, adhibhavitabbo,

anya-e0803n:890_10: paribhuyyamāno, abhibhaviyamāno, abhibhūyamāno, anubhaviyamāno, anubhuyyamāno, samanubhaviyamāno,
anya-e0803n:890_12: pakkhittaliṅgāni. Evamokārantādivasena chabbidhāni pulliṅgāni bhūdhātumayāni pakāsitāni.
anya-e0803n:891: Bhāvikā, bhāvanā, vibhāvanā, sambhāvanā, paribhāvanāti ākārantaitthiliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0803n:893_0: Bhūrī, bhūtī, bhotī, vibhāvinī, parivibhāvinī, sambhāvinī, pātubhavantī, pātubhontī,
anya-e0803n:893_1: paribhavantī, paribhontī, abhibhavantī, abhibhontī, adhibhavantī, adhibhontī, anubhavantī,
anya-e0803n:893_2: anubhontī, samanubhavantī, samanubhontī, paccanubhavantī, paccanubhontī, abhisambhavantī,
anya-e0803n:896_1: pasiddhaṃ “dhātu, dhenu”iti. Tena saddhiṃ pañcavidhāni itthiliṅgāni honti, okārantassa
anya-e0803n:896_2: vā gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāve tena saddhiṃ chabbidhānipi honti, sabbānetāni sabhāvatoyevitthiliṅgānīti
anya-e0803n:896_3: daṭṭhabbāni. Etthāpi aniyataliṅgā bhūtaparābhūtasambhūtasaddādayo itthiliṅgavasena yujjante.
anya-e0803n:897_0: Kathaṃ? Bhūtā, parābhūtā, sambhūtāti sabbaṃ vitthārato gahetabbaṃ “anubhonto samanubhonto”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:897_1: nava padāni vajjetvā. Tāni hi īkārantavasena yojitāni. Imāni niyataliṅgesu pakkhittaliṅgāni.
anya-e0803n:897_2: Evaṃ ākārantādivasena catubbidhāni itthiliṅgāni bhūdhātumayāni pakāsitāni. Ayaṃ itthiliṅgavasena udāharaṇuddeso.
anya-e0803n:898_0: Bhūtaṃ, mahābhūtaṃ, bhavittaṃ, bhūnaṃ, bhavanaṃ, parābhavanaṃ, sambhavanaṃ, vibhavanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:898_1: pātubhavanaṃ, āvibhavanaṃ, tirobhavanaṃ, vinābhavanaṃ, sotthibhavanaṃ, paribhavanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:898_2: abhibhavanaṃ, adhibhavanaṃ, anubhavanaṃ, samanubhavanaṃ, paccanubhavananti niggahītantanapuṃsakaliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0803n:901_0: Sabbānetāni sabhāvatoyeva napuṃsakaliṅgānīti daṭṭhabbāni. Ettha sattabhūtarūpavācako
anya-e0803n:901_1: bhūtasaddoyeva niyogā napuṃsakaliṅgotipi daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etthāpi aniyataliṅgā bhūta parābhūta
anya-e0803n:902_0: Kathaṃ? Bhūtaṃ, parābhūtaṃ, sambhūtaṃ, vibhūtaṃ. Peyyālo. Samanubhavamānaṃ, paccanubhavamānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:902_1: anubhontaṃ, anubhavantaṃ, samanubhontaṃ, samanubhavantaṃ, paccanubhontaṃ, paccanubhavantaṃ,
anya-e0803n:902_2: sambhontaṃ, sambhavantaṃ, abhisambhontaṃ, abhisambhavantaṃ, pātubhontaṃ, pātubhavantaṃ,
anya-e0803n:902_3: paribhontaṃ, paribhavantaṃ, abhibhontaṃ, abhibhavantaṃ, adhibhontaṃ, adhibhavantaṃ,
anya-e0803n:902_4: bhāventaṃ, sambhāventaṃ, vibhāventaṃ, paribhāventaṃ, paribhāviyamānaṃ, paribhuyyamānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:902_5: peyyālo. Paccanubhaviyamānaṃ, paccanubhuyyamānanti imāni niyatanapuṃsakaliṅgesu pakkhittaliṅgāni.
anya-e0803n:902_6: Evaṃ niggahītantādivasena tividhāni napuṃsakaliṅgāni bhūdhātumayāni pakāsitāni. Ayaṃ
anya-e0803n:902_7: napuṃsakaliṅgavasena udāharaṇuddeso, evaṃ pulliṅgādivasena liṅgattayaṃ bhūdhātumayamuddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:903: Ettha me appasiddhāti, ye ye saddā pakāsitā;
anya-e0803n:905: O, ā, bindu, i, ī, u, ū-antime sattadhā ṭhitā;
anya-e0803n:907: Ā ivaṇṇo cuvaṇṇo ca, pañca antā sarūpato;
anya-e0803n:909: Bindu, i, u-ime antā, tayo ñeyyā vibhāvinā;
anya-e0803n:911: Antā satteva pulliṅge, itthiyaṃ pañca vā cha vā;
anya-e0803n:912: Napuṃsake tayo evaṃ, dasa pañcahi chabbidhā.
anya-e0803n:913_1: vuccamānā pākaṭā honti suviññeyyā ca, tasmā imesaṃ nibbacanādīni yathāsambhavaṃ vakkhāma
anya-e0803n:913_2: viññūnaṃ tuṭṭhijananatthañceva sotārānamatthesu paṭutarabuddhipaṭilābhāya ca. Tatra
anya-e0803n:913_3: bhūtoti khandhapātubhāvena bhavatīti bhūto, idaṃ tāva nibbacanaṃ. “Bhūto”ti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena
anya-e0803n:913_4: satto vuccati, idamabhidheyyakathanaṃ. “Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto. Sabbeva nikkhipissanti,
anya-e0803n:913_5: bhūtā loke samussaya”nti ca idametassa atthassa sādhakavacanaṃ. Atha vā bhūtoti evaṃnāmako
anya-e0803n:913_7: ca idametassa atthassa sādhakavacanaṃ. Yañca pana “satto macco pajā”tiādikaṃ tattha
anya-e0803n:913_8: tattha āgataṃ vacanaṃ, idaṃ sattoti atthavācakassa bhūtasaddassa pariyāyavacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:913_9: Yañca niddesapāḷiyaṃ “maccoti satto naro mānavo poso puggalo jīvo jagu jantu hindagu
anya-e0803n:913_10: manujo”ti āgataṃ, idampi pariyāyavacanameva. Tāni sabbāni piṇḍetvā vuccante –
anya-e0803n:914: Satto macco jano bhūto, pāṇo hindagu puggalo;
anya-e0803n:915: Jantu jīvo jagu yakkho, pāṇī dehī tathāgato.
anya-e0803n:916: Sattavo mātiyo loko, manujo mānavo naro;
anya-e0803n:918: Pajāti itthiyaṃ vutto, liṅgato, na ca atthato;
anya-e0803n:920: Yo so jaṅghāya ulati, so satto jaṅghalo idha;
anya-e0803n:922_0: Imasmiṃ pakaraṇe “pariyāyavacana”nti ca “abhidhāna”nti ca “saṅkhā”tiādīni ca ekatthāni
anya-e0803n:922_2: dissati, tappayogo upari atthattikavibhāge āvibhavissati. Bhāvakoti bhāvetīti bhāvako,
anya-e0803n:922_3: idaṃ nibbacanaṃ. Yo bhāvanaṃ karoti, so bhāvako. Idamabhidheyyakathanaṃ. “Bhāvako
anya-e0803n:922_4: nipako dhīro”ti idametassa atthassa sādhakavacanaṃ. “Bhāvako bhāvanāpasuto bhāvanāpayutto
anya-e0803n:922_5: bhāvanāsampanno”ti idaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ. Imāni “bhūto bhāvako”ti dve padāni suddhakattuhetukattuvasena
anya-e0803n:922_6: vuttānīti. Ito paraṃ nayānusārena suviññeyyattā “idaṃ nibbacana”nti ca ādīni avatvā
anya-e0803n:922_7: katthaci atthasādhakavacanaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ atthuddhārañca yathārahaṃ dassessāma.
anya-e0803n:922_8: Tesu hi sabbattha dassitesu ganthavitthāro siyā, tasmā yesamattho uttāno, tesampi
anya-e0803n:922_9: padānamabhidheyyaṃ na kathessāma, nibbacanamattameva nesaṃ kathessāma. Yesaṃ pana
anya-e0803n:923_0: Bhavanaṃ bhavo, bhavo vuccati vuddhi. Bhūsaddassa atthātisayayogato vaḍḍhanepi dissamānattā
anya-e0803n:923_1: bhavanaṃ vaḍḍhananti katvā. “Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño”ti idaṃ vuddhiatthassa
anya-e0803n:923_2: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Atha vā bhavoti vuccati sassataṃ. “Sassato attā ca loko cā”ti hi
anya-e0803n:923_3: sassatavasena pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi, tasmā bhavadiṭṭhī”ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n:923_4: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Tathā bhavoti bhavadiṭṭhi, bhavati sassataṃ tiṭṭhatīti pavattanato
anya-e0803n:923_5: sassatadiṭṭhi bhavadiṭṭhi nāma. Bhavadiṭṭhi hi uttarapadalopena bhavoti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:923_6: “Bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṃsū”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Etthāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:923_7: pāḷivacanattho – ekacce samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavadiṭṭhiyā vā kāmabhavādinā vā sabbabhavato
anya-e0803n:923_8: vimuttiṃ saṃsāravisuddhiṃ kathayiṃsūti. Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etenāti
anya-e0803n:923_9: bhavoti atthena sampattipuññāni bhavoti ca vuccanti. “Itibhavābhavatañca vītivatto”ti
anya-e0803n:923_10: idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Ettha panāyaṃ pāḷivacanattho – bhavoti sampatti,
anya-e0803n:923_11: abhavoti vipatti. Tathā bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti sassataṃ, abhavoti
anya-e0803n:923_12: ucchedo. Bhavoti puññaṃ, abhavoti pāpaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ vītivattoti.
anya-e0803n:924_0: Sahokāsā khandhāpi bhavo. “Kāmabhavo rūpabhavo” iccevamādi etassatthassa sādhakaṃ
anya-e0803n:924_1: vacanaṃ. Ettha pana khandhā “yo paññāyati, so sarūpaṃ labhatī”ti katvā “bhavati avijjātaṇhādisamudayā
anya-e0803n:924_2: nirantaraṃ samudetī”ti atthena vā “bhavā”ti vuccanti. Okāso pana “bhavanti jāyanti
anya-e0803n:924_3: ettha sattā nāmarūpadhammā cā”ti atthena “bhavo”ti. Apica kammabhavopi bhavo, upapattibhavopi
anya-e0803n:924_4: bhavo. “Upādānapaccayā bhavo duvidhena atthi kammabhavo, atthi upapattibhavo”ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n:924_5: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Tattha kammameva bhavo kammabhavo. Tathā upapatti eva bhavo upapattibhavo.
anya-e0803n:924_6: Etthūpapatti bhavatīti bhavo, kammaṃ pana yathā sukhakāraṇattā “sukho buddhānamuppādo”ti
anya-e0803n:924_7: vutto. Evaṃ bhavakāraṇattā phalavohārena bhavoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā bhāvanalakkhaṇattā
anya-e0803n:924_8: bhāvetīti bhavo. Kiṃ bhāveti? Upapattiṃ. Iti upapattiṃ bhāvetīti bhavoti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:924_9: Bhāvetītimassa ca nibbattetīti hetukattuvasenattho. Atha vā “bhavapaccayā jātī”ti
anya-e0803n:924_10: vacanato bhavati etenāti bhavoti kammabhavo vuccati.
anya-e0803n:927_0: Vuttalakkhaṇo saṃsāropi bhavo. “Bhave dukkhaṃ bhavadukkhaṃ, bhave saṃsaranto”ti imānetassatthassa
anya-e0803n:927_1: sādhakāni vacanāni. Tatra kenaṭṭhena saṃsāro bhavoti kathīyati? Bhavati ettha sattasammuti
anya-e0803n:938_0: Bhāvoti ajjhāsayo, yo “adhippāyo”tipi vuccati. “Thīnaṃbhāvo durājāno. Nāmacco rājabhariyāsu,
anya-e0803n:938_1: bhāvaṃ kubbetha paṇḍito. Hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetī”ti evamādi etassatthassa sādhakaṃ
anya-e0803n:938_3: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ, cittampi bhāvo. “Accāhitaṃ kammaṃ karosi luddaṃ, bhāve ca te kusalaṃ
anya-e0803n:938_4: natthi kiñcī”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Kriyāpibhāvo. “Bhāvalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:938_5: bhāvasattamī”ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Apica bhāvoti sattavevacananti
anya-e0803n:938_6: bhaṇanti, dhātu vā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tattha ajjhāsayo ca vatthudhammo ca cittañca
anya-e0803n:938_7: satto cāti ime bhavatīti bhāvo. Tathā pana bhāvetīti bhāvo, kriyā tu bhavananti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n:938_8: Sā ca bhavanagamanapacanādivasenānekavidhā. Apica bhāvarūpampi bhāvo, yaṃ itthibhāvo
anya-e0803n:938_9: pumbhāvo itthindriyanti ca vuccati. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti
anya-e0803n:938_10: vā bhavati etena cittaṃ abhidhānañcāti bhāvo.
anya-e0803n:941_0: Vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi “itthiyā bhāvo itthibhāvo, itthīti vā bhavati etena cittaṃ abhidhānañcāti
anya-e0803n:941_1: itthibhāvo”ti, tasmā pumbhāvoti etthāpi pumassa bhāvo pumbhāvo, pumāti vā bhavati
anya-e0803n:941_2: etena cittaṃ abhidhānañcāti pumbhāvoti nibbacanaṃ samadhigantabbaṃ. Idaṃ bhāvasaddassa
anya-e0803n:942_0: Abhāvoti na bhāvoti abhāvo, ko so? Suññatā natthitā. Sabhāvoti attano bhāvo sabhāvo,
anya-e0803n:942_1: attano pakati iccevattho. Atha vā sabhāvoti dhammānaṃ sati atthasambhave yo koci
anya-e0803n:942_2: sarūpaṃ labhati, tassa bhāvo lakkhaṇamiti saññito namanaruppanakakkhaḷaphusanādiākāro
anya-e0803n:942_3: iccevattho. “Sāmaññaṃ vā sabhāvo vā, dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ mata”nti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n:942_4: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Apica sabhāvoti salakkhaṇo paramatthadhammo. Kenaṭṭhena? Saha bhāvenāti
anya-e0803n:942_5: atthena. Sabbhāvoti sataṃ bhāvo sabbhāvo, sappurisadhammo iccevattho. Atha vā attano
anya-e0803n:942_6: bhāvo sabbhāvo. “Gāhāpayanti sabbhāva”nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Saṃvijjamāno
anya-e0803n:942_7: vā bhāvo sabbhāvo. “Evaṃ gahaṇasabbhāvo”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Idaṃ
anya-e0803n:943_0: Sambhavoti sambhavanaṃ sambhavo, sambhavanakriyā, yutti vā. Yutti hi sambhavoti vuccati
anya-e0803n:943_1: “sambhavo gahaṇassa kāraṇa”ntiādīsu. Atha vā sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo. Yato hi
anya-e0803n:943_2: yaṃ kiñci sambhavati, so sambhavo. Pabhavoti pabhavanaṃ pabhavo, acchinnatā, pabhavati
anya-e0803n:943_3: etasmāti vā pabhavo. Yato hi yaṃ kiñci pabhavati, so pabhavo. Ime pana sambhavapabhavasaddā
anya-e0803n:943_4: katthaci samānatthā katthaci bhinnatthāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Sambhavasaddo hi bhavanakriyampi
anya-e0803n:943_5: vadati yuttimpi paññattimpi sambhavarūpampi paccayatthampi, pabhavasaddo pana bhavanakriyampi
anya-e0803n:943_6: vadati nadippabhavampi paccayatthampi, tasmā paccayatthaṃ vajjetvā bhinnatthāti gahetabbā,
anya-e0803n:943_7: paccayatthena pana samānatthāti gahetabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ “paccayo hetu nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:943_8: sambhavo pabhavotiādi atthato ekaṃ, byañjanato nāna”nti.
anya-e0803n:946: Ayampi gāthā etassatthassa sādhikā. Idaṃ sambhavapabhavasaddānaṃ bhāvāpādānasādhanavasenatthakathanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:947_1: sampadānasādhanena sattavidhāni bhavanti, taṃ pana uttari āvibhavissati “dhanamassa
anya-e0803n:947_2: bhavatūti dhanabhūtī”tiādinā. Iccevaṃ kitakavasena sabbathāpi sattavidhāni sādhanāni
anya-e0803n:947_3: honti, yāni “kārakānī”tipi vuccati, ito aññaṃ sādhanaṃ natthi. Idha payogesvatthesu
anya-e0803n:947_4: ca viññūnaṃ pāṭavatthaṃ sādhananāmaṃ pakāsitaṃ. Tathā hi dunnikkhittasādhanehi padehi
anya-e0803n:947_5: yojitā saddappayogā dubbodhatthā honti, sunikkhittasādhanehi pana padehi yojitā subodhatthā
anya-e0803n:947_6: honti, tasmā payogāsādhanamūlakā, attho ca payogamūlako. Payogānurūpañhi aviparītaṃ
anya-e0803n:947_7: katvā atthaṃ kathanasīlā “yācitova bahulaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito”ti
anya-e0803n:947_8: evamādīsu sādhanavasena gahetabbesu atthesu, aññesu catthesu paṭutarabuddhino paṇḍitāyeva
anya-e0803n:947_9: ekantena bhagavato pariyattisāsanadharā nāma hontīti veditabbaṃ. Ito paraṃ nayānusārena
anya-e0803n:947_10: suviññeyyattā “idaṃ nāma sādhana”nti na vakkhāma, kevalamidha dassitesu payogesu
anya-e0803n:948_0: Pabhāvoti pakārato bhavatīti pabhāvo, soyamānubhāvoyeva. “Pabhāvaṃ te na passāmi,
anya-e0803n:948_1: yena tvaṃ mithilaṃ vaje”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Anubhavoti anubhavanaṃ
anya-e0803n:948_2: anubhavo, kiṃ taṃ? Paribhuñjanaṃ. Ānubhāvoti tejussāhamantapabhūsattiyo. “Tejasaṅkhato
anya-e0803n:948_3: ussāhamantapabhūsattisaṅkhāto vā mahanto ānubhāvo etassāti mahānubhāvo”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:950: Ānubhāvāti vuccanti, pabhāvāti ca te vade.
anya-e0803n:953_0: Atha vā ānubhāvoti anubhavitabbaphalaṃ. “Anubhavitabbassa phalassa mahantatāya mahānubhāvo”ti
anya-e0803n:953_1: idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Parābhavoti parābhavanaṃ parābhavo, atha vā parābhavatīti
anya-e0803n:953_2: parābhavo. “Suvijāno parābhavo”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Apica “dhammadessī
anya-e0803n:953_3: parābhavo”ti pāṭhānurūpato parābhavissatīti parābhavoti anāgatakālavasenapi nibbacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:953_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā parābhavanti etenāti parābhavo. Kiṃ taṃ? Dhammadessitādi. “Paṭhamo
anya-e0803n:953_5: so parābhavo”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Vibhavoti nibbānaṃ. Tañhi bhavato
anya-e0803n:953_6: vigatattā bhavato vigatoti vibhavo, bhavassa ca taṃhetu vigatattā vigato bhavo etasmāti
anya-e0803n:953_7: vibhavo. Vibhavanti ucchijjanti vinassanti ito ariyadhanavilomakā kilesamahācorātipi
anya-e0803n:953_8: vibhavo. Vibhavasaddassa nibbānābhidhānatte “evaṃ bhave vijjamāne, vibhavo icchitabbako”ti
anya-e0803n:953_9: idamettha sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Imāni pana nibbānassa pariyāyavacanāni –
anya-e0803n:954: Nibbānaṃ vibhavo mokkho, nirodho amataṃ samaṃ;
anya-e0803n:963: Santi asaṅkhatā dhātu, disā ca sabbatopabhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:976_0: Vibhavoti vā vināsasampattidhanucchedadiṭṭhiyopi vuccanti. Tattha vināso vibhavanaṃ
anya-e0803n:976_1: ucchijjanaṃ nassananti atthena vibhavo. “Vibhavo sabbadhammānaṃ, ittheke sato sattassa
anya-e0803n:976_2: ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapentī”ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Sampatti
anya-e0803n:976_3: pana visesato bhavatīti vibhavo. “Rañño sirivibhavaṃ daṭṭhukāmā”ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n:976_4: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Dhanaṃ pana bhavanti vaḍḍhanti vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti
anya-e0803n:976_5: sattā etenāti vibhavo. “Asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbattī”ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n:977: Dhanaṃ saṃ vibhavo dabbaṃ, sāpateyyaṃ pariggaho;
anya-e0803n:978: Oḍḍaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sakaṃ attho, iccete dhanavācakā.
anya-e0803n:979_0: Ucchedadiṭṭhi pana vibhavati ucchijjati “attā ca loko ca puna cutito uddhaṃ na jāyatī”ti
anya-e0803n:979_1: gahaṇato vibhavoti. “Vibhavataṇhā”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Vibhavataṇhāti
anya-e0803n:979_2: hi ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatāya taṇhāya nāmaṃ. Ettha atthuddhāro vuccati –
anya-e0803n:982_0: Pātubhāvoti pātubhavanaṃ pātubhāvo. Āvibhāvoti āvibhavanaṃ āvibhāvo, ubhinnametesaṃ
anya-e0803n:982_1: pākaṭatā iccevattho. Tirobhāvoti tirobhavanaṃ tirobhāvo, paṭicchannabhāvo. Vinābhāvoti
anya-e0803n:982_2: vinābhavanaṃ vinābhāvo, viyogo. Sotthibhāvoti sotthibhavanaṃ sotthibhāvo, suvatthibhāvo
anya-e0803n:982_3: sukhassa atthitā, atthato pana nibbhayatā nirupaddavatā eva. Atthibhāvoti atthitā
anya-e0803n:982_4: vijjamānatā avivittatā. Natthibhāvoti natthitā avijjamānatā vivittatā rittatā tucchatā
anya-e0803n:983_0: Abhibhavatīti abhibhavitā, paraṃ abhibhavanto yo koci. Evaṃ paribhavitā, anubhavatīti
anya-e0803n:983_1: anubhavitā, sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā anubhavanto yo koci. Evaṃ samanubhavitā.
anya-e0803n:983_2: Paccanubhavitā, ettha pana yathā “amatassa dātā. Anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:983_4: saddhiṃ yojanā dissati, tathā imesampi padānaṃ “paccāmittassa abhibhavitā”tiādinā
anya-e0803n:983_5: yojanā kātabbā. Evaṃ aññesampi evarūpānaṃ padānaṃ. Ākārantapulliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n:984_0: Bhavatīti bhavaṃ. Bhavissatīti vā bhavaṃ, vaḍḍhamāno puggalo. “Suvijāno bhavaṃ hoti,
anya-e0803n:984_1: suvijāno parābhavo. Dhammakāmo bhavaṃ hoti, dhammadessī parābhavo”ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n:984_2: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Atha vā yena saddhiṃ katheti, so “bhava”nti vattabbo, “bhavaṃ kaccāyano.
anya-e0803n:984_3: Bhavaṃ ānando. Maññe bhavaṃ patthayati, rañño bhariyaṃ patibbata”ntiādīsu. Ettha
anya-e0803n:984_4: pana dhātuatthe ādaro na kātabbo, sammutiattheyevādaro kātabbo “saṅketavacanaṃ saccaṃ,
anya-e0803n:984_5: lokasammutikāraṇa”nti vacanato. Vohāravisayasmiñhi lokasammuti eva padhānā avilaṅghanīyā.
anya-e0803n:984_6: Parābhavatīti parābhavaṃ. Evaṃ paribhavaṃ. Abhibhavaṃ. Anubhavaṃ. Pabhavati pahoti
anya-e0803n:984_7: sakkotīti pabhavaṃ, pahonto yo koci. Na pabhavaṃ appabhavaṃ, “appabhava”nti ca idaṃ jātake diṭṭhaṃ –
anya-e0803n:986: Sohaṃ appabhavaṃ tattha, sākhaṃ hatthehi aggahi”nti
anya-e0803n:988_0: Dhanabhūtīti dhanamassa bhavatūti dhanabhūti. Siribhūtīti sobhāya ceva paññāpuññānañca
anya-e0803n:988_1: adhivacanaṃ. Sā assa bhavatūti siribhūti. Evaṃ sotthibhūti, suvatthibhūti. Ikārantapulliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n:989_0: Bhāvīti bhavanasīlo bhāvī, bhavanadhammo bhāvī, bhavane sādhukārī bhāvī. Evaṃ vibhāvī.
anya-e0803n:989_1: Sambhāvī. Paribhāvīti. Tatra vibhāvīti atthavibhāvane samattho paṇḍito vuccati. Ettha
anya-e0803n:989_2: vidvā, vijjāgato, ñāṇītiādi pariyāyavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bhavanti catra –
anya-e0803n:990: Vidvā vijjāgato ñāṇī, vibhāvī paṇḍito sudhī;
anya-e0803n:991: Budho visārado viññū, dosaññū viddasu vidū.
anya-e0803n:992: Vipassī paṭibhāṇī ca, medhāvī nipako kavi;
anya-e0803n:993: Kusalo viduro dhīmā, gatimā mutimā cayaṃ.
anya-e0803n:994: Cakkhumā kaṇṇavā dabbo, dhīro bhūri vicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0803n:997: Sayambhūti sayameva bhavatīti sayambhū. Ko so? Antarena paropadesaṃ sāmaṃyeva sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sabbaññutaṃ patto sakyamuni bhagavā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0803n:998: “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0803n:1000: Ahañhi arahā loke, ahaṃ satthā anuttaro;
anya-e0803n:1002_0: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vigataviddhastaniravasesakileso
anya-e0803n:1002_2: khandhasantāno loke aggapuggaloti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “ekapuggalo bhikkhave
anya-e0803n:1002_3: loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso, katamo ekapuggalo? Tathāgato bhikkhave
anya-e0803n:1002_4: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti. So ekapuggalo etarahi “sabbaññū, sugato”tiādīhi yathābhuccaguṇādhigatanāmehi
anya-e0803n:1002_5: ca pasiddho, “gotamo ādiccabandhū”ti gottato ca pasiddho, sakyaputto sakko sakyamuni
anya-e0803n:1002_6: sakyasīho sakyapuṅgavoti kulato ca pasiddho, suddhodanimāyādevīsutoti mātāpitito
anya-e0803n:1002_7: ca pasiddho, siddhatthoti gahitanāmena ca pasiddho. Bhavanti catra –
anya-e0803n:1003: Yo ekapuggalo āsi, buddho so vadataṃ varo;
anya-e0803n:1006: Sakko iti ca avhito, tathā sakyamunīti ca.
anya-e0803n:1031: Sammāsambuddho iti so, ñāto sattuttamoti ca;
anya-e0803n:1038: Nāmaṃ guṇehi nissitaṃ, ko kavindo kathessati.
anya-e0803n:1049: Tathā hi satthavāho naravaro chaḷabhiññoti evaṃpakārāni abhidhānapadāni visesakapadāpekkhakāni. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:1056: “Chaḷabhiññassa sāsana”nti ca evaṃ visesakapadāpekkhakāni bhavanti. Buddho jino bhagavāti evaṃpakārāni pana no visesakāpekkhānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1057_0: Keci panettha evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu
anya-e0803n:1057_1: ravibandhūti evaṃpakārānaṃ idha vuttānamabhidhānānaṃ visesatthābhāvato punaruttidoso
anya-e0803n:1057_3: anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānānīti dvedhā dissanato. Tathā hi katthaci keci “sakyasīho”ti
anya-e0803n:1057_5: pāvacanepi hi “dviduggamavarahanutta’malatthā”ti pāṭho dissati. Tathā keci “dhammarājā”ti
anya-e0803n:1057_10: kuñja”ntiādīni abhisaṅkharonti. Pāvacanepi hi yaṃ padumaṃ, taṃ jalajaṃ nāmāti mantvā
anya-e0803n:1058_0: “Buddho bhagavā”ti abhidhānāni pana anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni. Vuttañhetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā
anya-e0803n:1058_1: āyasmatā sāriputtena “buddhoti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ, na pitarā kataṃ, na bhaginiyā
anya-e0803n:1058_2: kataṃ, na ñātisālohitehi kataṃ, na devatāhi kataṃ, vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1058_3: bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti,
anya-e0803n:1058_4: tathā “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ…pe… sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ bhagavā”ti.
anya-e0803n:1058_5: Evaṃ “buddho bhagavā”ti abhidhānāni anabhisaṅkhatābhidhānāni. Na hi tāni abhidhānāni
anya-e0803n:1058_6: ceva “satthā sugato jino”tiādīni ca aññaṃ kiñci abhidhānaṃ paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni,
anya-e0803n:1058_7: nāpi aññāni abhidhānāni etāni paṭicca abhisaṅkhatāni dissanti. Tathā hi “buddho”ti
anya-e0803n:1058_8: abhidhānaṃ paṭicca “bujjhitā bodhetā bodhako”tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni na abhisaṅkharonti.
anya-e0803n:1058_9: Tathā “bhagavā satthā sugato”tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni paṭicca “sampannabhago anusāsako
anya-e0803n:1058_10: sundaravacano”tiādīni nāmābhidhānāni nābhisaṅkharonti. Evaṃ imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0803n:1058_11: “munindo samaṇindo samaṇissaro yatissaro ādiccabandhu ravibandhū”tiādinā nayena punarutti
anya-e0803n:1058_12: amhehi katāti daṭṭhabbā. Evamaññatrāpi nayo netabbo. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0803n:1060: Dviduggamavaro buddho, iti nāmaṃ dvidhā bhave”ti.
anya-e0803n:1061_0: Pabhūti paraṃ pasayha bhavatīti pabhū, issaro. “Araññassa pabhū ayaṃ luddako”ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n:1061_1: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Abhibhūti abhibhavatīti abhibhū, asaññasatto. Kiṃ so abhibhavi?
anya-e0803n:1061_2: Cattāro khandhe arūpino. Iti cattāro khandhe arūpino abhibhavīti abhibhū. So ca kho
anya-e0803n:1061_3: niccetanattā abhibhavanakriyāyāsati pubbevā’saññuppattito jhānalābhikāle attanā adhigatapañcamajjhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1061_4: saññāvirāgavasena bhāvetvā cattāro arūpakkhandhe asaññibhave appavattikaraṇena abhibhavitumārabhi,
anya-e0803n:1061_5: tadabhibhavanakiccaṃ idāni siddhanti abhibhavīti abhibhūti vuccati. Apica niccetanabhāvena
anya-e0803n:1061_6: abhibhavanabyāpāre asatipi pubbe sacetanakāle sabyāpārattā sacetanassa viya niccetanassāpi
anya-e0803n:1061_7: sato tassa upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṃ yujjateva. Dissati hi loke sāsane ca sacetanassa
anya-e0803n:1061_8: viya acetanassapi upacārena sabyāpāratāvacanaṃ. Taṃ yathā? Kūlaṃ patitukāmaṃ, evaṃ loke. Sāsane pana –
anya-e0803n:1064_0: “Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāyā”ti ca “phalaṃ toseti kassaka”nti
anya-e0803n:1064_1: ca ādi. Abhibhūsaddassa asaññasattābhidhānatte “abhibhuṃ abhibhuto maññatī”ti idamettha
anya-e0803n:1064_2: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Atha vā abhibhavatīti abhibhū, paresamabhibhavitā yo koci. Visesato
anya-e0803n:1064_3: pana tathāgatoyeva abhibhū. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “tathāgato bhikkhave abhibhū anabhibhūto
anya-e0803n:1064_4: aññadatthudaso vasavattī”ti. Keci pana “abhibhū nāma sahasso brahmā”ti vadanti.
anya-e0803n:1065_0: Vibhūti visesabhūtoti vibhū, “bhavasotaṃ sace buddho, tiṇṇo lokantagū vibhū”ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n:1065_1: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Vibhūti hettha rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā visesabhūtoti attho. Āha ca –
anya-e0803n:1070: Dhārento brāhmaṇaṃ vaṇṇaṃ, bhikkhāya maṃ upāgamī”ti –
anya-e0803n:1071_0: Idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Patibhūti patibhūtoti patibhū, “goṇassa patibhū”ti
anya-e0803n:1071_1: idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Gotrabhūti gottasaṅkhātaṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:1071_2: katvā bhūtoti gotrabhū, sotāpattimaggassa anantarapaccayena sikhāppattabalavavipassanācittena
anya-e0803n:1071_3: samannāgato puggalo. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “katamo ca puggalo gotrabhū? Yesaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1071_4: samanantarā ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti, tehi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo gotrabhū”ti,
anya-e0803n:1071_5: idamevettha atthasādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Apica samaṇoti gottamattamanubhavamāno kāsāvakaṇṭhasamaṇopi
anya-e0803n:1071_6: gotrabhū. So hi “samaṇo”ti gottamattaṃ anubhavati vindati, na samaṇadhamme attani
anya-e0803n:1071_8: gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1071_9: Vatrabhūti sakko. So hi mātāpitibharaṇādīhi sattahi vattehi sakkattaṃ labhitvā aññe
anya-e0803n:1071_10: deve vattena abhibhavatīti vatrabhū. Āgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana bhūdhātumhi labbhamānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1071_11: pattiatthampi gahetvā “vattena aññe abhibhavitvā devissariyaṃ pattoti vatrabhū”ti
anya-e0803n:1071_12: vuttaṃ, “vatranāmakaṃ vā asuraṃ abhibhavatīti vatrabhū”ti ca, “vatrabhū jayataṃpitā”ti
anya-e0803n:1071_13: idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Ettha hi vatrabhūti vatranāmakassa asurassa abhibhavitā.
anya-e0803n:1071_14: Jayataṃ pitāti jayantānaṃ pitā. “Sakko indo purindado” iccādi pariyāyavacanaṃ. Idaṃ
anya-e0803n:1071_15: tu dhātādhikāre pakāsessāma. Parābhibhūti paramabhibhavatīti parābhibhū. Evaṃ rūpābhibhūtiādīsupi.
anya-e0803n:1071_16: Sabbābhibhūti sabbamabhibhavitabbaṃ abhibhavatīti sabbābhibhū. Sabbābhibhūti ca idaṃ
anya-e0803n:1077_0: Idāni aniyataliṅgānaṃ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṃ bhūtaparābhūta sambhūtasaddādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1077_1: niddeso vuccati. Tatra bhūtoti attano paccayehi abhavīti bhūto, bhūtoti jāto sañjāto
anya-e0803n:1077_2: nibbatto abhinibbatto pātubhūto, bhūtoti vā laddhasarūpo yo koci saviññāṇako vā aviññāṇako
anya-e0803n:1077_3: vā. Atha vā tathākārena bhavatīti bhūto, bhūtoti sacco tatho avitatho aviparīto yo
anya-e0803n:1077_4: koci, ettha yo bhūtasaddo saccattho, tassa “bhūtaṭṭho”ti idamettha sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1077_5: Parābhūtoti parābhavīti parābhūto. Suṭṭhu bhūtoti sambhūto. Visesena bhūtoti vibhūto.
anya-e0803n:1077_6: Vissuto bhūtoti vā vibhūto, “vibhūtārammaṇa”nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1077_7: Vibhavīti vā vibhūto, vinaṭṭhoti attho, “rūpe vibhūte na phusanti phassā”ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n:1077_8: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Pākaṭo bhūtoti pātubhūto. Āvi bhavatīti āvibhūto. Evaṃ tirobhūto.
anya-e0803n:1077_9: Vinābhūto. Bhavitumanucchavikoti bhabbo. Paribhaviyate soti paribhūto. Yena kenaci
anya-e0803n:1077_10: yo pīḷito hīḷito vā, so paribhūto. Gamyamānattho yathākāmacārī. Abhibhaviyyate soti
anya-e0803n:1077_11: abhibhūto. Adhibhaviyate soti adhibhūto. Evaṃ addhabhūto. Ettha adhisaddena samānattho
anya-e0803n:1077_12: addhasaddo, “cakkhu bhikkhave addhabhūtaṃ, rūpā addhabhūtā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ addhabhūta”nti
anya-e0803n:1077_13: idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ, tathā “idha bhikkhave bhikkhu na heva anaddhabhūtaṃ
anya-e0803n:1077_14: attānaṃ na addhabhāvetī”ti padampi. Tattha anaddhabhūtanti dukkhena anadhibhūtaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1077_15: Dukkhena anadhibhūto nāma manussattabhāvo vuccati, taṃ na addhabhāveti nābhibhavatīti suttapadattho.
anya-e0803n:1078_0: Anubhaviyate soti anubhūto. Evaṃ samanubhūto. Paccanubhūto. Bhāvito. Ettha bhāvitoti
anya-e0803n:1078_1: iminā samānādhikaraṇaṃ “satisambojjhaṅgo kho kassapa mayā sammadakkhāto bhāvito”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:1078_2: guṇīvācakaṃ padhānapadaṃ sāsane daṭṭhabbaṃ. Titthiyasamaye pana bhāvitoti kāmaguṇo
anya-e0803n:1078_3: vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “na bhāvitamāsīsatī”ti. Tatra bhāvitā nāma pañca kāmaguṇā,
anya-e0803n:1078_4: te na āsīsati na sevatīti suttapadattho. Sambhāviyate soti sambhāvito. Evaṃ vibhāvito.
anya-e0803n:1078_5: Paribhāvito. Anuparibhūto. Manaṃparibhūtoti manaṃ paribhaviyittha soti manaṃparibhūto.
anya-e0803n:1078_6: Ettha manaṃparibhūtoti īsakaṃ appattaparibhavano vuccati. Mananti hi nipātapadaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1078_7: “Atipaṇḍitena puttena, manamhi upakūlito, devadattena attano abuddhabhāvena ceva
anya-e0803n:1078_8: khantimettādīnañca abhāvena kumārakassapatthero ca therī ca manaṃ nāsito, manaṃ vuḷho
anya-e0803n:1078_9: ahosī”tiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo. Atra manaṃsaddassa kiñci yuttiṃ vadāma.
anya-e0803n:1080: Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hoti, manamhi upakūlitoti.
anya-e0803n:1081_0: Paribhavitabboti aññena paribhavituṃ sakkuṇeyyoti paribhavitabbo. Evaṃ paribhottabbo
anya-e0803n:1081_1: paribhavanīyo. Tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne hi sakkuṇeyyapadayojanā dissati “aladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:1081_2: laddhabbaṃ labhanīyaṃ laddhuṃ vā sakkuṇeyya”nti. Atha vā paribhavanamarahatīti paribhavitabbo.
anya-e0803n:1081_3: Evaṃ paribhottabbo paribhavanīyo. Tathā hi tabbapaccayaṭṭhāne arahatipadayojanā dissati
anya-e0803n:1081_4: “parisakkuṇeyyaṃ lābhamarahatīti laddhabba”nti. Ettha pana paribhottabboti padassa
anya-e0803n:1081_5: atthibhāve “khattiyo kho mahārāja daharoti na uññātabbo na paribhottabbo”ti pāḷi
anya-e0803n:1081_6: nidassanaṃ. Abhiadhipubbā bhūdhātuyo samānatthā. Sesāni dukāni nayānusārena ñeyyāni.
anya-e0803n:1081_7: Bhamānoti bhavatīti bhamāno, majjhe vakāralopo daṭṭhabbo. Atridaṃ vattabbaṃ –
anya-e0803n:1082: “Kiṃ so bhamāno saccako”, iccatra pāḷiyaṃ pana;
anya-e0803n:1084_0: Atrāyaṃ pāḷi “kiṃ so bhamāno saccako nigaṇṭhaputto, yo bhagavato vādaṃ āropessatī”ti.
anya-e0803n:1084_1: Vibhavamānoti vibhavatīti vibhavamāno. Evaṃ paribhavamānotiādīsu. Tattha “abhisambhonto”timassa
anya-e0803n:1084_2: karonto nipphādento iccevattho. “Sabbāni abhisambhonto, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti idametassatthassa
anya-e0803n:1084_3: sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Yasmā panimāni “bhavamāno”tiādīni vippakatapaccattavacanāni, tasmā
anya-e0803n:1084_4: saramāno rodati, gacchanto gaṇhāti, “gacchanto so bhāradvājo, addasa accutaṃ isi”ntiādīni
anya-e0803n:1084_5: viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā rājā bhavamāno sampattimanubhavatītiādinā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:1084_6: “Saramāno gacchanto”tiādīni hi “yāto gato patto”tiādīhi sadisāni na honti, uttarakriyāpadāpekkhakāni
anya-e0803n:1085_0: Paribhaviyamānoti paribhaviyate soti paribhaviyamāno. Evaṃ paribhuyyamānotiādīsupi.
anya-e0803n:1085_1: Imānipi vippakatapaccattavacanāni, tasmā “rājapurisehi nīyamāno coro evaṃ cintesī”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:1085_2: viya paripuṇṇuttarakriyāpadāni katvā aññehi paribhaviyamāno tāṇaṃ gavesati. Bhogo
anya-e0803n:1085_3: puggalenānubhaviyamāno parikkhayaṃ gacchatītiādinā yojetabbāni. Evaṃ sabbatra īdisesu
anya-e0803n:1085_4: vippakatavacanesu yojetabbāni. Ayaṃ aniyataliṅgānaṃ niyataliṅgesu pakkhittānaṃ bhūta
anya-e0803n:1085_5: parābhūta sambhūtasaddānaṃ niddeso. Iccevaṃ pulliṅgānaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ yathārahaṃ
anya-e0803n:1086_0: Idāni itthiliṅganiddeso vuccati – tatra bhāvikāti bhāvetīti bhāvikā. Yā bhāvanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1086_1: karoti, sā bhāvikā. Bhāvanāti vaḍḍhanā brūhanā phātikaraṇaṃ āsevanā bahulīkāro. Vibhāvanāti
anya-e0803n:1086_2: pakāsanā sandassanā. Atha vā vibhāvanāti abhāvanā antaradhāpanā. Sambhāvanāti ukkaṃsanā
anya-e0803n:1086_3: thomanā. Paribhāvanāti vāsanā, samantato vā vaḍḍhanā. Ākārantitthiliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n:1087_0: Bhūmīti sattāyamānā bhavatīti bhūmi, atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha thāvarā
anya-e0803n:1087_1: ca jaṅgamā cāti bhūmi. Bhūmi vuccati pathavī. “Paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:1087_2: pana lokuttaramaggo bhūmīti vuccati. Yā panandhabālamahājanena viññātā pathavī, tassimāni abhidhānāni –
anya-e0803n:1088: “Pathavī medanī bhūmi, bhūrī bhū puthuvī mahī;
anya-e0803n:1089: Chamā vasumatī ubbī, avanī ku vasundharā;
anya-e0803n:1090: Jagatī khiti vasudhā, dharaṇī go dharā”iti.
anya-e0803n:1091: Atra bhū ku gosaddā pathavīpadatthe vattantīti kutra diṭṭhapubbāti ce?
anya-e0803n:1093: Bhū ku goiti pathavī, vuccatīti vibhāvaye.
anya-e0803n:1094_0: Bhūtīti bhavanaṃ bhūti. Vibhūtīti vināso, visesato bhavanaṃ vā, atha vā visesato
anya-e0803n:1094_1: bhavanti sattā etāyāti vibhūti, sampattiyeva, “rañño vibhūti. Pihanīyā vibhūtiyo”ti
anya-e0803n:1095_0: Bhūrīti pathavī. Sā hi bhavanti etthāti bhūrīti vuccati, bhavati vā paññāyati vaḍḍhati
anya-e0803n:1095_1: cāti bhūrī, atha vā bhūtābhūtā tannissitā sattā ramanti etthāti bhūrī. Pathavīnissitā
anya-e0803n:1095_2: hi sattā pathaviyaṃyeva ramanti, tasmā sā imināpi atthena bhūrīti vuccati. Bhūrīsaddassa
anya-e0803n:1095_3: pathavīvacane “bhūripañño”ti atthasādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Apica bhūrī viyāti bhūrī, paññā,
anya-e0803n:1095_4: bhūrīti pathavīsamāya vitthatāya paññāya nāmaṃ, “yogā ve jāyatī bhūrī, ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo”ti
anya-e0803n:1095_5: ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ imassatthassa sādhakaṃ. Atha vā bhūte atthe ramatīti bhūrī,
anya-e0803n:1095_6: paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ, “bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā”ti ettha aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ imassatthassa
anya-e0803n:1095_7: sādhakaṃ. Atha vā paññāyeva rāgādayo dhamme abhibhavatīti bhūrī, rāgādiarayo abhibhavatītipi
anya-e0803n:1095_8: bhūrī. Tathā hi paṭisambhidāmagge āyasmatā sāriputtena vuttaṃ “rāgaṃ abhibhūyatīti
anya-e0803n:1095_9: bhūrī, paññā. Dosaṃ mohaṃ…pe… rāgo ari, taṃ ariṃ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā. Doso. Moho…pe…
anya-e0803n:1095_10: sabbe bhavagāmino kammā ari, taṃ ariṃ maddatīti bhūrī, paññā”. Ettha pana “gotrabhū”ti
anya-e0803n:1095_11: padamiva “aribhū”ti vattabbepi bhūsaddaṃ pubbanipātaṃ katvā sandhivasena bhūrīti
anya-e0803n:1095_12: padamuccāritanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Apica īdisesu nāmikapadesu vināpi upasaggena abhibhavanādiatthā
anya-e0803n:1095_13: labbhantiyeva, nākhyātikapadesūti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idaṃ pana paññāya pariyāyavacanaṃ –
anya-e0803n:1103: Ñāṇaṃ paññāṇamummaṅgo, sattho soto ca diṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0803n:1104: Mantā bodho buddhi buddhaṃ, paṭibhānañca bodhiti.
anya-e0803n:1105: Dhammo vijjā gati monaṃ, nepakkaṃ go matī muti;
anya-e0803n:1106: Vīmaṃsā yoni dhonā ca, paṇḍā paṇḍiccayampi ca;
anya-e0803n:1120_0: Bhūtīti bhūtassa bhariyā. Yathā hi petassa bhariyā “petī”ti vuccati, evameva bhūtassa
anya-e0803n:1120_1: bhariyā “bhūtī”ti vuccati. Bhotīti yāya saddhiṃ kathentena sā itthī “bhotī” iti vattabbā,
anya-e0803n:1120_2: tasmā iminā padena itthī vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā hi purisena saddhiṃ kathentena
anya-e0803n:1120_3: puriso “bhavaṃ” iti vohariyati, evameva itthiyā saddhiṃ kathentena itthī “bhotī”iti
anya-e0803n:1120_4: vohariyati. “Kuto nu bhavaṃ bhāradvājo, ime ānesi dārake”ti, “ahaṃ bhotiṃ upaṭṭhissaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1120_5: mā bhotī kupitā ahū”ti cettha nidassanaṃ. Atha vā idhekacco satto itthiliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:1120_6: laddhanāmo, so “bhotī”iti vattabbo, tasmā iminā padena itthīpi itthiliṅgena laddhanāmā
anya-e0803n:1120_7: anitthīpi vohariyatīti ca daṭṭhabbā. Tathā hi devaputtopi “devatā”ti itthiliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:1120_8: voharitabbattā devatāsaddamapekkhitvā “bhotī”iti voharito, pageva devadhītā. Tathā
anya-e0803n:1120_9: hi “bhotī carahi jānāti, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitā”ti ettha pana devatāsaddamapekkhitvā
anya-e0803n:1120_10: “bhotī”iti itthi liṅgavohāro kato. Atrāyaṃ suttapadattho “yadi so kuhako dhanatthiko
anya-e0803n:1120_11: tāpaso na jānāti, bhotī devatā pana jānāti ki”nti. Apica –
anya-e0803n:1122: Karomi te taṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mamā”ti –
anya-e0803n:1123_2: voharito. Aññatrāpi devatāsaddamapekkhitvā devaputto itthiliṅgavasena voharito –
anya-e0803n:1124: “Na tvaṃ bāle vijānāsi, yathā arahataṃ vaco”ti;
anya-e0803n:1126_0: Ettha pana “ehi bāle khamāpehi, kusarājaṃ mahabbala”nti ettha ca itthīyeva itthiliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:1126_1: voharitā, tasmā katthaci itthipurisapadatthasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ anapekkhitvā liṅgamattamevāpekkhitvā
anya-e0803n:1126_2: bhotī devatā, bhotī silā, bhotī jambū, bhotiṃ devatantiādīhi saddhiṃ paccattavacanādīni
anya-e0803n:1126_3: yojetabbāni. Katthaci pana liṅgañca atthañca apekkhitvā “bhotī itthī, bhotiṃ deva”ntiādinā
anya-e0803n:1126_4: yojetabbāni. Vibhāvinīti vibhāvetīti vibhāvinī. Evaṃ paribhāvinītiādīsupi. Īkārantitthiliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n:1127_0: Bhūti sattāyamānā bhavatīti bhū. Atha vā bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti cettha sattasaṅkhārāti
anya-e0803n:1127_1: bhū. Bhū vuccati pathavī. Abhūti vaḍḍhivirahitā kathā, na bhūtapubbāti vā abhū, abhūtapubbā
anya-e0803n:1127_2: kathā. Na bhūtāti vā abhū, abhūtā kathā. “Abhuṃ me kathaṃ nu bhaṇasi, pāpakaṃ vata
anya-e0803n:1127_3: bhāsasī”ti idametesamatthānaṃ sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ. Ūkārantitthiliṅganiddeso. Niyatitthiliṅganiddesoyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1128_1: niddeso nayānusārena suviññeyyova. Iccevaṃ itthiliṅgānaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ yathārahaṃ
anya-e0803n:1129_0: Idāni napuṃsakaliṅganiddeso vuccati – tatra bhūtanti catubbidhaṃ pathavīdhātuādikaṃ
anya-e0803n:1129_1: mahābhūtarūpaṃ. Tañhi aññesaṃ nissayabhāvena bhavatīti bhūtaṃ, bhavati vā tasmiṃ
anya-e0803n:1129_2: tadadhīnavuttitāya upādārūpanti bhūtaṃ. Atha vā bhūtanti satto bhūtanāmako vā. Bhūtanti
anya-e0803n:1129_3: hi napuṃsakavasena sakalo satto evaṃnāmako ca yakkhādiko vuccati. “Kālo ghasati bhūtāni,
anya-e0803n:1129_4: sabbāneva sahattanā. Yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatāni, ujjhāpetvāna bhūtāni, tamhā ṭhānā
anya-e0803n:1129_5: apakkamī”ti evamādīsu napuṃsakappayogo veditabbo. Gātābandhasukhatthaṃ liṅgavipallāsoti
anya-e0803n:1129_6: ce? Tanna, “yakkhādīni mahābhūtāni yaṃ gaṇhanti, neva tesaṃ tassa anto, na bahi ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1129_8: avagantabbaṃ. Mahābhūtanti vuttappakāraṃ catubbidhaṃ mahābhūtarūpaṃ. Tassa mahantapātubhāvādīhi
anya-e0803n:1129_9: kāraṇehi mahābhūtatā veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Mahantaṃ bhūtanti mahābhūtaṃ, māyākārasaṅkhātena
anya-e0803n:1129_10: mahābhūtena samantipi mahābhūtaṃ, yakkhādīhi mahābhūtehi samantipi mahābhūtaṃ, mahantehi
anya-e0803n:1129_11: ghāsacchādanādipaccayehi bhūtaṃ pavattantipi mahābhūtaṃ, mahāvikārabhūtantipi mahābhūtaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1129_12: Evaṃ mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtatā veditabbā. Atridaṃ suṭṭhupalakkhitabbaṃ –
anya-e0803n:1133: Yojetabbā tiliṅge te, iti ñe yyaṃ visesato.
anya-e0803n:1135: Idāni bhūto, cittāni, bhūtāni vimalāni tu.
anya-e0803n:1138: Bhavittanti vaḍḍhitaṭṭhānaṃ. Tañhi bhavanti vaḍḍhanti etthāti bhavittanti vuccati, “janittaṃ me bhavittaṃ me, iti paṅke avassayi”nti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1141: Bhūnanti bhavanaṃ bhūnaṃ vaddhi. “Ahameva dūsiyā bhūnahatā, rañño mahāpatāpassā”ti, “bhūnahaccaṃ kataṃ mayā”ti ca idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ vacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1142_0: Bhavananti bhavanakriyā. Atha vā bhavanti vaḍḍhanti ettha sattā puttadhītāhi nānāsampattīhi
anya-e0803n:1142_1: cāti bhavanaṃ vuccati geho, “pettikaṃ bhavanaṃ mamā”ti idametassatthassa sādhakaṃ
anya-e0803n:1142_2: vacanaṃ. “Geho gharañca āvāso, bhavanañca niketana”nti idaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ. Parābhavananti
anya-e0803n:1142_3: avaddhimāpajjanaṃ. Sambhavananti suṭṭhu bhavanaṃ. Vibhavananti ucchedo vināso vā.
anya-e0803n:1142_4: Pātubhavananti pākaṭatā sarūpalābho iccevattho. Āvibhavananti paccakkhabhāvo. Tirobhavananti
anya-e0803n:1142_5: paṭicchannabhāvo. Vinābhavananti vinābhāvo. Sotthibhavananti suvatthitā. Paribhavananti
anya-e0803n:1142_6: pīḷanā hīḷanā vā. Abhibhavananti vidhamanaṃ. Adhibhavananti ajjhottharaṇaṃ. Anubhavananti
anya-e0803n:1142_7: paribhuñjanaṃ. Samanubhavananti suṭṭhu paribhuñjanaṃ. Paccanubhavananti adhipatibhāvenapi
anya-e0803n:1143: Atthavibhāvīti atthassa vibhāvanasīlaṃ cittaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ vā kulaṃ vā atthavibhāvi. Evaṃ dhammavibhāvi. Ikārantanapuṃsakaliṅganiddeso.
anya-e0803n:1144_0: Gotrabhūti paññattārammaṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ vā gotrabhucittaṃ. Tañhi kāmāvacaragottamabhibhavati,
anya-e0803n:1144_1: mahaggatagottañca bhāveti nibbattetīti “gotrabhū”ti vuccati. Apica gotrabhūti nibbānārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:1144_2: maggavīthiyaṃ pavattaṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vā saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ vā phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1144_3: pavattaṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ. Tesu hi paṭhamaṃ puthujjanagottamabhibhavati, ariyagottañca
anya-e0803n:1144_4: bhāveti, gottābhidhānā ca nibbānato ārammaṇakaraṇavasena bhavatīti “gotrabhū”ti vuccati,
anya-e0803n:1144_5: dutiyaṃ pana saṅkhārārammaṇampi samānaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvena sasampayuttāni phalacittāni
anya-e0803n:1144_6: gottābhidhāne nibbānamhi bhāvetīti “gotrabhū”ti vuccati. Idaṃ pāḷivavatthānaṃ –
anya-e0803n:1149: Dīghabhāvena vuttaṃ tu, napuṃsakanti no vade;
anya-e0803n:1150: Binduvantī’tare bhedā, tayo iti hi bhāsitā.
anya-e0803n:1151: Īkārantā ca ūdantā, rassattaṃ yanti sāsane;
anya-e0803n:1153: Cittena saha bhavatīti cittasahabhu, cittena saha na bhavatīti nacittasahabhu, rūpaṃ. Ukārantanapuṃsakaliṅganiddeso. Niyatanapuṃsakaliṅganiddesoyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1154_1: nayānusārena suviññeyyova. Iccevaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgānaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ yathārahaṃ nibbacanādivasena
anya-e0803n:1154_2: niddeso vibhāvito. Iccevaṃ sabbathāpi liṅgattayaniddeso samatto.
anya-e0803n:1159: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1166: Vippakiṇṇakathā ettha, evaṃ vutte na hessati;
anya-e0803n:1170_0: Puriso, purisā. Purisaṃ, purise. Purisena, purisehi, purisebhi. Purisassa, purisānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1170_1: Purisā, purisasmā, purisamhā, purisehi, purisebhi. Purisassa, purisānaṃ. Purise,
anya-e0803n:1170_2: purisasmiṃ, purisamhi, purisesu. Bho purisa, bhavanto purisā.
anya-e0803n:1171_0: Ayamāyasmatā mahākaccānena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena katasmā niruttipiṭakato uddharito
anya-e0803n:1171_2: paccattavacanādīni bhavanti. Taṃ yathā? Puriso tiṭṭhati, purisā tiṭṭhanti. Tatra
anya-e0803n:1171_3: purisoti purisavacane ekavacane paccattavacanaṃ bhavati, purisāti purisavacane puthuvacane
anya-e0803n:1172: Purisaṃ passati, purise passati. Tatra purisanti purisavacane ekavacane upayogavacanaṃ bhavati, puriseti purisavacane puthuvacane upayogavacanaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1173_0: Purisena kataṃ, purisehi kataṃ, purisebhi kataṃ. Tatra purisenāti purisavacane ekavacane
anya-e0803n:1173_1: karaṇavacanaṃ bhavati, purisehi, purisebhīti purisavacane puthuvacane karaṇavacanaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1174: Purisassa dīyate, purisānaṃ dīyate. Tatra purisassāti purisavacane ekavacane sampadānavacanaṃ bhavati, purisānanti purisavacane puthuvacane sampadānavacanaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1175_0: Purisā nissaṭaṃ, purisasmā nissaṭaṃ, purisamhā nissaṭaṃ, purisehi nissaṭaṃ, purisebhi
anya-e0803n:1175_1: nissaṭaṃ. Tatra purisāti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṃ bhavati. Purisasmāti…pe…
anya-e0803n:1175_2: purisamhāti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṃ bhavati, purisehi, purisebhīti
anya-e0803n:1176: Purisassa pariggaho, purisānaṃ pariggaho. Tatra purisassāti purisavacane ekavacane sāmivacanaṃ bhavati, purisānanti purisavacane puthuvacane sāmivacanaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1177_0: Purise patiṭṭhitaṃ, purisasmiṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ, purisamhi patiṭṭhitaṃ, purisesu patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1177_1: Tatra puriseti purisavacane ekavacane bhummavacanaṃ bhavati, purisasminti…pe… purisamhīti…pe…
anya-e0803n:1178_0: Bho purisa tiṭṭha, bhavanto purisā tiṭṭhatha. Tatra bho purisaiti purisavacane ekavacane
anya-e0803n:1178_1: ālapanaṃ bhavati, bhavanto purisāiti purisavacane puthuvacane ālapanaṃ bhavatīti
anya-e0803n:1179_0: Yamakamahātherena katāya pana cūḷaniruttiyaṃ “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1179_1: vatvā “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi tādiso nayo
anya-e0803n:1179_2: niruttipiṭake natthi, tathāpi bahūnamālapanavisaye “bho yakkhā”itiādīnaṃ ālapanabahuvacanānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1179_3: jātakaṭṭhakathādīsu dissanato pasatthatarova hoti viññūnaṃ pamāṇañca, tasmā iminā
anya-e0803n:1179_4: yamakamahātheramatenapi “puriso purisā purisa”ntiādīni vatvā āmantane “bho purisa,
anya-e0803n:1179_5: bho purisā, bhavanto purisā”ti nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1180_0: Tattha purisoti paṭhamāya ekavacanaṃ. Purisāti bahuvacanaṃ. Purisanti dutiyāya ekavacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1180_1: Puriseti bahuvacanaṃ. Purisenāti tatiyāya ekavacanaṃ. Purisehi, purisebhīti dve bahuvacanāni.
anya-e0803n:1180_2: Purisassāti catutthiyā ekavacanaṃ. Purisānanti bahuvacanaṃ. Purisā, purisasmā, purisamhāti
anya-e0803n:1180_3: tīṇi pañcamiyā ekavacanāni. Purisehi, purisebhīti dve bahuvacanāni. Purisassāti chaṭṭhiyā
anya-e0803n:1180_4: ekavacanaṃ. Purisānanti bahuvacanaṃ. Purise, purisasmiṃ, purisamhīti tīṇi sattamiyā
anya-e0803n:1180_5: ekavacanāni. Purisesūti bahuvacanaṃ. Bho purisāti aṭṭhamiyā ekavacanaṃ. Bho purisā,
anya-e0803n:1181_2: tathāpi atthavasena asaṅkarabhāvo veditabbo. Kathaṃ? “Puriso tiṭṭhati, purisā tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0803n:1182_0: Tattha ca bhoti āmantanatthe nipāto. So na kevalaṃ ekavacanaṃyeva hoti, atha kho
anya-e0803n:1182_2: pana bahuvacanameva hotīti “purisā”ti puna vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iti yamakamahātherena
anya-e0803n:1182_3: “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ vatvā “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1182_4: vuttaṃ. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ca nipātabhūto bhosaddo ekavacanabahuvacanavasena
anya-e0803n:1182_5: dvidhā bhijjati. Atrimāni nidassanapadāni – “api nu kho sapariggahānaṃ tevijjānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1182_6: brāhmaṇānaṃ apariggahena brahmunā saddhiṃ saṃsandati sametīti, no hidaṃ bho gotama.
anya-e0803n:1182_7: Acchariyaṃ bho ānanda, abbhutaṃ bho ānanda, ehi bho samaṇa, bho pabbajita”iccādipāḷito
anya-e0803n:1182_8: aṭṭhakathāto ca bhosaddassa ekavacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṃ, “tena hi bho mamapi
anya-e0803n:1182_9: suṇātha. Yathā mayameva arahāma taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṃ, nāhaṃ
anya-e0803n:1182_10: bho samaṇassa gotamassa subhāsitaṃ subhāsitato nābbhanumodāmi, passatha bho imaṃ
anya-e0803n:1182_11: kulaputtaṃ. Bho yakkhā ahaṃ imaṃ tumhākaṃ bhājetvā dadeyyaṃ. Aparisuddho panamhi,
anya-e0803n:1182_12: bho dhuttā tumhākaṃ kriyā mayhaṃ na ruccati. So te purise āha bho tumhe maṃ mārentā
anya-e0803n:1182_13: rañño dassetvāva mārethā”ti iccādi pana pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca bhosaddassa bahuvacanappayoge
anya-e0803n:1182_14: pavattinidassanaṃ. Kaccāyanappakaraṇe pana “bho purisa, bho purisā”ti padadvayaṃ
anya-e0803n:1182_15: ālapanekavacanavasena vuttaṃ. Taṃ yathā āgamehi na virujjhati, tathā gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1183_0: Keci pana adūraṭṭhassālapane “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchanti,
anya-e0803n:1183_1: dūraṭṭhassālapane pana “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchanti. Adūraṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1183_2: dūraṭṭhānañca purisānaṃ itthīnañca ālapane na kiñci vadanti. Tathā adūraṭṭhāya dūraṭṭhāya
anya-e0803n:1183_3: ca itthiyā ālapane te pucchitabbā “adūraṭṭhānaṃ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapane kathaṃ
anya-e0803n:1183_4: vattabba”nti. Addhā te evaṃ puṭṭhā uttari kiñci vattuṃ na sakkhissanti. Evampi te
anya-e0803n:1183_5: ce vadeyyuṃ “bhavanto purisāti imināva adūraṭṭhānaṃ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1183_6: bhavatī”ti. Tadā te vattabbā “yadi bhavanto purisā”ti iminā advejjhena vacanena adūraṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1183_7: dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṃ bhavati, evaṃ sante “bho purisa”iti rassapadenapi
anya-e0803n:1183_8: dūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṃ vattabbaṃ, evaṃ avatvā kimatthaṃ adūraṭṭhassālapane
anya-e0803n:1183_9: “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ icchatha, kimatthañca dūraṭṭhassālapane
anya-e0803n:1184_0: Nanu “taggha bhagavā bojjhaṅgā, taggha sugata bojjhaṅgā”tiādīsu ālapanapadabhūtaṃ
anya-e0803n:1184_1: “bhagavā”iti dīghapadaṃ samīpe ṭhitakālepi dūre ṭhitakālepi buddhassālapanapadaṃ
anya-e0803n:1184_2: bhavitumarahateva, tathā ālapanapadabhūtaṃ “sugata”iti rassapadampi. Yasmā panetesu
anya-e0803n:1184_3: “bhagavā”ti ālapanapadassa na katthacipi rassattaṃ dissati, “sugatā”ti ālapanapadassa
anya-e0803n:1184_4: ca na katthacipi dīghattaṃ dissati, tasmā dīgharassamattābhedaṃ acintetvā “purisa”iti
anya-e0803n:1184_5: rassavasena vuttapadaṃ pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitassa purisassa āmantanakāle adūraṭṭhassālapanapadaṃ
anya-e0803n:1184_6: bhavati, āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisassa āmantanakāle dūraṭṭhassālapanapadaṃ
anya-e0803n:1184_7: bhavatīti gahetabbaṃ. Tathā “bhavanto purisā, bho yakkhā, bho dhuttā”tiādīni dīghavasena
anya-e0803n:1184_8: vuttāni ālapanabahuvacanapadānipi pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitapurisānaṃ āmantanakāle
anya-e0803n:1184_9: adūraṭṭhānamālapanapadāni bhavanti, āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisādīnaṃ āmantanakāle
anya-e0803n:1184_10: dūraṭṭhānamālapanapadāni bhavantīti gahetabbāni. Tathā hi brāhmaṇā katthaci katthaci
anya-e0803n:1184_11: rassaṭṭhānepi dīghaṭṭhānepi āyatena sarena majjhimāyatena sarena accāyatena ca sarena
anya-e0803n:1184_12: vedaṃ paṭhanti likhitumasakkuṇeyyena gītassarena viya. Iti sabbakkharesupi āyatena
anya-e0803n:1184_13: sarenuccāraṇaṃ labbhateva likhitumasakkuṇeyyaṃ, tasmā asampathamanotaritvā “bho purisa”iti
anya-e0803n:1184_14: vacanena dūraṭṭhassa ca adūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṃ bhavati, “bho purisā, bhavanto
anya-e0803n:1184_15: purisā”ti imehi vacanehipi dūraṭṭhānañca adūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṃ bhavatīti
anya-e0803n:1184_16: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iti dūraṭṭhassa adūraṭṭhānañca āyatena sarena āmantanameva pamāṇaṃ, na
anya-e0803n:1184_17: dīgharassamattāviseso, tasmā “bho sattha, bho rāja, bho gaccha, bho muni, bho daṇḍi,
anya-e0803n:1184_18: bho bhikkhu, bho sayambhu, bhoti kaññe, bhoti patti, bhoti itthi, bhoti yāgu, bhoti
anya-e0803n:1184_19: vadhu, bho kula, bho aṭṭhi, bho cakkhu”iccevamādīhi padehi adūraṭṭhassālapanañca
anya-e0803n:1184_20: dūraṭṭhassālapanañca bhavati. “Bhavanto satthā, satthāro, bhotiyo kaññā, kaññāyo”ti
anya-e0803n:1186: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, rañño puttaṃ adassayuṃ;
anya-e0803n:1195: Na katthacipi dīghattaṃ, iti nīti mayā matā.
anya-e0803n:1196_0: Idampettha vattabbaṃ “kuto nu bho idamāyātaṃ ‘dūraṭṭhassālapanaṃ adūraṭṭhassālapanami’ti”?
anya-e0803n:1196_1: Saddasatthato. Saddasatthaṃ nāma na sabbaso buddhavacanassopakārakaṃ, ekadesena pana hoti.
anya-e0803n:1197_0: Imasmiṃ pakaraṇe “bahuvacana”nti vā “puthuvacana”nti vā “anekavacana”nti vā atthato
anya-e0803n:1197_1: ekaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ, tasmā sabbattha “bahuvacana”nti vā “puthuvacana”nti vā
anya-e0803n:1197_2: “anekavacana”nti vā vohāro kātabbo, puthuvacanaṃ anekavacananti ca idaṃ sāsane niruttaññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1198_0: Kasmā pana imasmiṃ pakaraṇe dvivacanaṃ na vuttanti? Yasmā buddhavacane dvivacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1198_1: nāma natthi, tasmā na vuttanti. Nanu buddhavacane vacanattayaṃ atthi, tathā hi “āyasmā”ti
anya-e0803n:1198_2: idaṃ ekavacanaṃ, “āyasmantā”ti idaṃ dvivacanaṃ, “āyasmanto”ti idaṃ bahuvacananti?
anya-e0803n:1198_3: Tanna, yadi “āyasmantā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ dvivacanaṃ bhaveyya, “puriso purisā”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:1198_4: kataraṃ dvivacananti vadeyyātha, tasmā buddhavacane dvivacanaṃ nāma natthi. Teneva
anya-e0803n:1198_5: hi si yo aṃ yo nā hītiādinā ekavacanabahuvacanāneva dassitānīti.
anya-e0803n:1199_0: Nanu ca bho “suṇantu me āyasmantā, ajja uposatho pannaraso. Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1199_1: mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kareyyāmā”ti pāḷiyaṃ dve sandhāya “āyasmantā”ti
anya-e0803n:1199_2: vuttaṃ, “uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādīsu pana pāḷīsu bahavo
anya-e0803n:1199_3: sandhāya “āyasmanto”ti vuttaṃ, na ca sakkā vattuṃ “yathā tathā vutta”nti, parivāsādiārocanepi
anya-e0803n:1199_5: tiṇṇaṃ ārocentena ‘āyasmanto dhārentū’ti vattabba”nti vuttattāti? Saccaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1199_6: taṃ pana vinayavohāravasena vuttanti. Nanu vinayo buddhavacanaṃ, kasmā “buddhavacane
anya-e0803n:1199_7: dvivacanaṃ nāma natthī”ti vadathāti? Saccaṃ vinayo buddhavacanaṃ, tathāpi vinayakammavasena
anya-e0803n:1199_8: vuttattā upalakkhaṇamattaṃ, na sabbasādhāraṇabahuvacanapariyāpannaṃ. Yadi hi “āyasmantā”ti
anya-e0803n:1199_9: idaṃ dvivacanaṃ siyā, tappayogānipi kriyāpadāni dvivacanāneva siyuṃ, tathārūpānipi
anya-e0803n:1199_10: kriyāpadāni na santi. Na hi akkharasamayakovido jhānalābhīpi dibbacakkhunā vassasatampi
anya-e0803n:1199_11: vassasahassampi samavekkhanto buddhavacane ekampi kriyāpadaṃ dvivacananti passeyya,
anya-e0803n:1199_12: evaṃ kriyāpadesu dvivacanassābhāvā nāmikapadesu dvivacanaṃ natthi. Nāmikapadesu tadabhāvāpi
anya-e0803n:1199_13: kriyāpadesu tadabhāvo veditabbo. Sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ dvīsupi dvivacanāni santi, māgadhabhāsāyaṃ pana natthi.
anya-e0803n:1200_1: dīpeti. Tañhi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṃbhūtaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1200_2: tattha vā vuttehi atthehi visuṃbhūtassa atthassa vacanaṃ “puthuvacana”nti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1200_3: Kathamidaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṃbhūtaṃ vacananti
anya-e0803n:1200_4: ce? Yasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ “puthuvacana”nti vohāro natthi, tasmā idaṃ tehi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1200_5: vuttehi dvivacanabahuvacanehi visuṃbhūtaatthassa vacananti vuccati. Kathañca pana
anya-e0803n:1200_6: sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttehi visuṃbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti ce? Yasmā
anya-e0803n:1200_7: sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ dve upādāya dvivacanaṃ vuttaṃ, na ticatupañcādike bahavo upādāya,
anya-e0803n:1200_8: bahavo pana upādāya bahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ, na dve upādāya, ayaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāya viseso.
anya-e0803n:1200_9: Māgadhabhāsāyaṃ pana dviticatupañcādike bahavo upādāya puthuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā
anya-e0803n:1200_10: sakkaṭabhāsāyaṃ vuttehi atthehi visuṃbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti vuccati.
anya-e0803n:1200_11: Ayaṃ māgadhabhāsāya viseso. Tasmātra puthubhūtassa, puthuno vā atthassa vacanaṃ “puthuvacana”nti
anya-e0803n:1201: Idāni “puriso, purisā, purisa”nti niruttipiṭakato uddharitanayaṃ nissāya pakatirūpabhūtassa bhūtasaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n:1202_0: Bhūto, bhūtā. Bhūtaṃ, bhūte. Bhūtena, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṃ. Bhūtā,
anya-e0803n:1202_1: bhūtasmā, bhūtamhā, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṃ. Bhūte, bhūtasmiṃ, bhūtamhi,
anya-e0803n:1203_0: Atha vā “bho bhūtā”iti bahuvacanaṃ viññeyyaṃ. Yathā panettha bhūtaiccetassa pakatirūpassa
anya-e0803n:1203_1: nāmikapadamālā purisanayena yojitā, evaṃ bhāvakādīnañca aññesañca taṃsadisānaṃ nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:1203_2: purisanayena yojetabbā. Etthaññāni taṃsadisāni nāma “buddho”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ buddhaiccādīni pakatirūpāni.
anya-e0803n:1240_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “nanu bho ‘orodhā ca kumārā cā’ti pāṭhassa dassanato orodhasaddo
anya-e0803n:1240_1: itthiliṅgo”ti? Tanna, tattha hi “orodhā”ti idaṃ okārantapulliṅgameva, nā’kārantitthiliṅgaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1240_2: tumhe pana “ākārantitthiliṅga”nti maññamānā evaṃ vadatha, na panidaṃ ākārantitthiliṅgaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1240_3: atha kho “mātugāmā”tipadaṃ viya bahuvacanavasena vuttamākārantapadanti. Nanu ca bho
anya-e0803n:1240_4: sammohavinodaniyādīsu orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭā, kathanti ce? “Rukkhe adhivatthā
anya-e0803n:1240_5: devatā therassa kuddhā paṭhamameva manaṃ palobhetvā ‘ito te sattadivasamatthake upaṭṭhāko
anya-e0803n:1240_6: rājā marissatī’ti supine ārocesi. Thero taṃ kathaṃ sutvā rājorodhānaṃ ācikkhi. Tā
anya-e0803n:1240_7: ekappahāreneva mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsū”ti. Ettha hi “rājorodhāna”nti vatvā “tā”ti vuttattāva
anya-e0803n:1240_8: orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭāti? Tanna, atthassa duggahaṇato. Duggahito hi ettha
anya-e0803n:1240_9: tumhehi attho, ettha pana orodhasaddena itthipadatthassa kathanato itthipadatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:1240_10: sandhāya “tā”ti vuttattā “tā itthiyo”ti ayamevattho. Tumhe pana amātāpitarasaṃvaddhattā
anya-e0803n:1240_11: ācariyakule ca anivuṭṭhattā etaṃ sukhumatthamajānantā yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhārūḷhaṃ vadatha.
anya-e0803n:1241: Bhuñjanatthaṃ kathanatthaṃ, mukhaṃ hotīti no vade;
anya-e0803n:1242: Yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhārūḷhaṃ, vacanaṃ paṇḍito naroti.
anya-e0803n:1243_0: Na mayaṃbho yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhārūḷhaṃ vadāma, aṭṭhakathācariyānaññeva vacanaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0803n:1243_1: vadāma, aṭṭhakathāyeva amhākaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ, na mayaṃ tumhākaṃ saddahāmāti. Amhākaṃ
anya-e0803n:1243_2: saddahatha vā mā vā, mā tumhe “aṭṭhakathācariyānaññeva vacanaṃ gahetvā vadāmā”ti
anya-e0803n:1243_3: aṭṭhakathācariye abbhācikkhatha. Na hi aṭṭhakathācariyehi “orodhasaddo itthiliṅgo”ti
anya-e0803n:1243_4: vuttaṭṭhānamatthi, tasmāpi aṭṭhakathācariye abbhācikkhatha, na yuttaṃ buddhādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1243_5: garūnamabbhācikkhanaṃ mahato anatthassa lābhāya saṃvattanato. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0803n:1243_6: “attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati, tato attānañca khaṇatī”ti.
anya-e0803n:1244_0: Evaṃ abbhācikkhanassa ayuttataṃ sāvajjatañca dassetvā punapi te idaṃ vattabbā – jātakaṭṭhakathāyampi
anya-e0803n:1244_1: tumhehi āhaṭaudāharaṇasadisaṃ udāharaṇamatthi, taṃ suṇātha. Kosiyajātakaṭṭhakathāyañhi
anya-e0803n:1244_2: “satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ mātugāmaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Sā kirekassa
anya-e0803n:1244_3: saddhassa pasannassa upāsakabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā pāpadhammā”ti pāṭho dissati.
anya-e0803n:1244_4: Ettha hi “mātugāmaṃ ārabbha kathesī”ti vatvā “sā”ti vuttattā tumhākaṃ matena mātugāmasaddo
anya-e0803n:1244_5: itthiliṅgoyeva siyā, na pulliṅgo, kimidaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanampi na passatha, tadeva
anya-e0803n:1244_6: pana aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ passatha, kiṃ sā eva aṭṭhakathā tumhākaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ, na tadaññāti.
anya-e0803n:1245_0: Yadi tāsaddaṃ apekkhitvā orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgattamicchatha, etthāpi sāsaddamapekkhitvā
anya-e0803n:1245_1: mātugāmasaddassa itthiliṅgattamicchathāti. Evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā
anya-e0803n:1245_2: pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyeyyuṃ. Etthāpi mātugāmasaddena itthipadatthassa kathanato
anya-e0803n:1245_3: itthipadatthaṃ sandhāya “sā”ti vuttattā “sā itthī”ti ayamevattho. Katthaci hi padhānavācakena
anya-e0803n:1245_4: pulliṅgena napuṃsakaliṅgena vā samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittāpulliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:1245_5: vā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena vā niddisitabbattepi liṅgamanapekkhitvā itthipadatthamevāpekkhitvā
anya-e0803n:1245_6: itthiliṅganiddeso dissati. Taṃ yathā? “Idha visākhe mātugāmo susaṃvihitakammantā
anya-e0803n:1245_7: hoti saṅgahitaparijanā bhattumanāpaṃ carati, sambhataṃ anurakkhatī”ti ca, “ko nu
anya-e0803n:1245_8: kho bhante hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā
anya-e0803n:1245_9: dassanāya, daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca. Idha mallike ekacco
anya-e0803n:1245_10: mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā, appampi vuttā samānā abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati
anya-e0803n:1245_11: patitthiyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarotī”ti ca, “taṃ kho pana bhikkhave
anya-e0803n:1245_12: itthiratanaṃ rañño cakkavattissa pubbuṭṭhāyinī pacchānipātinī kiṃkārapaṭissāvinī”ti ca ime payogā.
anya-e0803n:1246_0: Katthaci pana padhānavācakena napuṃsakaliṅgena samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittā
anya-e0803n:1246_2: pulliṅganiddeso dissati. Taṃ yathā? “Pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ
anya-e0803n:1246_3: pabbate ciranivāsino ahesuṃ. Taṃ kho pana rañño cakkavattissa pariṇāyakaratanaṃ ñātānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1246_4: pavesetā aññātānaṃ nivāretā”ti. Katthaci padhānavācakena liṅgattayena samānādhikaraṇassa
anya-e0803n:1246_5: guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānurūpaṃ niddeso dissati. Taṃ yathā? Sā itthī “sīlavatī
anya-e0803n:1246_6: kalyāṇadhammā. Aṭṭhahi kho nakulamāte dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā
anya-e0803n:1246_7: parammaraṇā manāpakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. Saddho purisapuggalo,
anya-e0803n:1247: Seyyaiti saddo pana yebhuyyena okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato. Kathaṃ? Seyyo amitto matiyā upeto. Esāva pūjanā seyyo, ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo.
anya-e0803n:1252: Yaso ca appabuddhīnaṃ, viññūnaṃ ayaso ca yo;
anya-e0803n:1253: Ayasova seyyo viññūnaṃ, na yaso appabuddhinaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1254: Dummedhehi pasaṃsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
anya-e0803n:1257: Pavivekaṃ dukkhaṃ seyyo, yañce kāmamayaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1259: Maraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ seyyo, yañce jīve adhammika”nti.
anya-e0803n:1260_0: Evamayaṃ seyya iti saddo okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati. Katthaci
anya-e0803n:1260_1: pana ākārantabhāve ṭhatvā itthiliṅgānukūlo dissati “itthīpi hi ekacciyā, seyyā posa
anya-e0803n:1260_2: janādhipā”ti. Niggahītanto pana hutvā napuṃsakaliṅgānukūlo apasiddho. Evaṃpakāre
anya-e0803n:1260_3: payoge kiṃ tumhe na passathāti. Evaṃ vuttā ca te niruttarāva bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n:1261_0: Sacepi te ettha evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “tattha tattha suttappadese aṭṭhakathādīsu ca ‘mātugāmo’ti
anya-e0803n:1261_1: vā ‘mātugāmenā’ti vā okārantapulliṅgabhāvena mātugāmasaddassa dassanato pulliṅgabhūtaṃ
anya-e0803n:1261_2: mātugāmasaddaṃ anapekkhitvā itthipadatthameva apekkhitvā “sā itthī”ti itthīsaddena
anya-e0803n:1261_3: sāsaddassa sambandhaggahaṇaṃ mayaṃ sampaṭicchāma, ‘orodho’ti vā ‘orodhenā’ti vā okārantapulliṅgabhāvena
anya-e0803n:1261_4: ṭhitassa orodhasaddassa adassanato pana tumhehi vuttaṃ purimatthaṃ na sampaṭicchāmā”ti.
anya-e0803n:1261_5: Tadā tesaṃ imāni vinayapāḷiyaṃ āgatapadāni dassetabbāni “tena kho pana samayena rājā
anya-e0803n:1261_6: udeno uyyāne paricāresi saddhiṃ orodhena, atha kho rañño udenassa orodho rājānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1261_7: udenaṃ etadavocā”ti. Evaṃ imāni suttapadāni dassetvā suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “rāmo
anya-e0803n:1261_8: nāma rājā kuṭṭharogī orodhehi ca nāṭakehi ca jigucchamāno”ti vacanañca dassetvā “gacchatha
anya-e0803n:1261_9: tumhe garukulamupagantvā bhagavato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ sādhukaṃ padabyañjanāni
anya-e0803n:1262_0: Idāni mātugāmasaddādīsu kiñci vinicchayaṃ vadāma – mātugāmasaddo ca orodhasaddo ca
anya-e0803n:1262_1: dārasaddo cāti ime itthipadatthavācakāpi samānā ekantena pulliṅgā bhavanti. Tesu
anya-e0803n:1262_2: dārasaddassa ekasmiṃ atthe vattamānassāpi bahuvacanakattameva saddasatthavidū icchanti,
anya-e0803n:1262_3: na ekavacanakattaṃ. Mayaṃ pana dārasaddassa ekasmiṃ atthe ekavacanakattaṃ, yebhuyyena
anya-e0803n:1262_4: pana bahuvacanakattaṃ anujānāma, bavhatthe vattabbameva natthi. Pāḷiyañhi dārasaddo
anya-e0803n:1262_5: yebhuyyena bahuvacanako bhavati, ekavacanako appo. Tatrime payogā –
anya-e0803n:1264: Puttā ca dārā ca mayañca sabbe;
anya-e0803n:1266: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na miyyare”ti ca,
anya-e0803n:1268: Sahasā sampiyāyena, taṃ jaññāvasalo itī”ti ca,
anya-e0803n:1270: Dissati paradāresu, taṃ parābhavato mukha”nti ca,
anya-e0803n:1271: “Puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā”ti ca byāse, samāse pana “puttadārā disā pacchā, puttadārehi mattano”ti ca evamādayo bahuvacanappayogā bahavo bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:1272: Ekavacanappayogā pana appā. Seyyathidaṃ? “Garūnaṃ dāre, dhammaṃ care yopi samuñjakaṃ care, dārañca posaṃ dadamappakasmi”nti ca,
anya-e0803n:1274: Dhammena dāraṃ posenti, te namassāmi mātalī”ti ca,
anya-e0803n:1276: “Yo icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃ punappunaṃ;
anya-e0803n:1279_0: Samāhāralakkhaṇavasena panesa dārasaddo napuṃsakaliṅgekavacanopi katthaci bhavati.
anya-e0803n:1279_1: “Ādāya puttadāraṃ. Puttadārassa saṅgaho”iti evaṃ idha vuttappakārena liṅgañca atthañca
anya-e0803n:1279_2: sallakkhetvā “puriso purisā”ti pavattaṃ purisasaddanayaṃ nissāya sabbesaṃ “bhūto
anya-e0803n:1279_3: bhāvako bhavo”tiādīnaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ aññesañcokārantapadānaṃ nāmikapadamālāsu saddhāsampannehi
anya-e0803n:1280_0: Kiṃ pana sabbāni okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbappakārena ekasadisāneva hutvā paviṭṭhānīti?
anya-e0803n:1280_1: Na paviṭṭhāni. Kānici hi okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti,
anya-e0803n:1280_2: ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca, kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca
anya-e0803n:1280_3: honti, ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca, kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhāneva.
anya-e0803n:1280_4: Tatra katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena
anya-e0803n:1280_5: paviṭṭhāni ca? “Saro vayo ceto”tiādīni. Saroiti hi ayaṃsaddo ususaddasaravanaakārādisaravācako
anya-e0803n:1280_6: ce, purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭho. Rahadavācako ce, manogaṇapakkhikattā purisanaye
anya-e0803n:1280_7: ekadesena paviṭṭho. Vayoiti saddo parihānivācako ce, purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭho.
anya-e0803n:1280_8: Āyukoṭṭhāsavācako ce, manogaṇapakkhikattā purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭho. Ceto iti
anya-e0803n:1280_9: saddo yadi paṇṇattivācako, purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭho. Yadi pana cittavācako, manogaṇapakkhikattā
anya-e0803n:1280_10: purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭho. Manogaṇo ca nāma –
anya-e0803n:1286: Idāni yathāvuttassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ manasaddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālaṃ kathayāma –
anya-e0803n:1287_0: Mano, manā. Manaṃ, mano, mane. Manasā, manena, manehi, manebhi. Manaso, manassa,
anya-e0803n:1287_1: manānaṃ. Manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. Manaso, manassa, manānaṃ. Manasi,
anya-e0803n:1287_2: mane, manasmiṃ, manamhi, manesu. Bho mana, bhavanto manā.
anya-e0803n:1288_0: Atha vā “bho manā”iti bahuvacanampi ñeyyaṃ. Evaṃ vaco, vacā. Vacaṃ, vaco, vace. Vacasātiādinā
anya-e0803n:1288_1: nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Ahasaddassa pana bhummekavacanaṭṭhāne ahasi, ahe, ahasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:1289: Idāni rūpantaravisesadassanatthaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgassa manasaddassapi nāmikapadamālaṃ vadāma, aṭṭhāne ayaṃ kathitāti na codetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1290_0: Manaṃ, manāni, manā. Manaṃ, manāni, mane. Manena, manehi, manebhi. Manassa, manaso,
anya-e0803n:1290_1: manānaṃ. Manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. Manassa, manaso, manānaṃ. Mane,
anya-e0803n:1290_2: manasmiṃ, manamhi, manesu. Bho mana, bhavanto manā. Atha vā “bho manāni, bho manā”evampi
anya-e0803n:1291_0: Ettha ca pulliṅgassa manasaddassa paccattakaraṇasampadānasāmibhummavacanāni mano
anya-e0803n:1291_1: manasā manaso manasīti rūpāni ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni, napuṃsakaliṅgassa ca manasaddassa
anya-e0803n:1291_2: paccattavacanāni “manaṃ manānī”ti rūpāni ca, aṭṭhamyopayogavacanānaṃ “manaṃ manānī”ti
anya-e0803n:1291_3: rūpadvayañca ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni, tāni sabbāni kamato samasamāni.
anya-e0803n:1292_0: Keci okāranto manoiti saddo napuṃsakaliṅgoti vadanti, te vattabbā – yadi so napuṃsakaliṅgo
anya-e0803n:1292_1: siyā, tassadisehi vaco vayotiādisaddehipi napuṃsakaliṅgeheva bhavitabbaṃ, na “te
anya-e0803n:1292_2: napuṃsakaliṅgā”ti garū vadanti, “pulliṅgā”icceva vadanti. Yasmā ca pāḷiyaṃ “kāyo
anya-e0803n:1292_3: anicco; mano anicco”ti ca “kāyo dukkho, mano dukkho”ti ca “nicco vā anicco vāti anicco
anya-e0803n:1292_4: bhante”ti ca evamādayo pulliṅgappayogā bahavo diṭṭhā. Tena ñāyati manosaddo ekantena
anya-e0803n:1292_5: pulliṅgoti. Yadi pana napuṃsakaliṅgosiyā, “anicco dukkho”ti evamādīni taṃsamānādhikaraṇāni
anya-e0803n:1292_6: anekapadasatānipi napuṃsakaliṅgāneva siyuṃ. Na hi tāni napuṃsakaliṅgāni, atha kho
anya-e0803n:1292_7: abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattakāni vāccaliṅgāni. Evaṃ manosaddassa pulliṅgatā paccetabbāti,
anya-e0803n:1292_8: sace manosaddo napuṃsakaliṅgo na hoti, kathaṃ “manānī”ti napuṃsakarūpaṃ dissatīti?
anya-e0803n:1292_9: Saccaṃ “manānī”ti napuṃsakaliṅgameva, tathāpi manogaṇe pamukhabhāvena gahitassokārantassa
anya-e0803n:1292_10: manasaddassa rūpaṃ na hoti. Atha kiñcarahīti ce? Cittasaddena samānaliṅgassa samānasutittepi
anya-e0803n:1292_11: manogaṇe apariyāpannassa niggahītantasseva manasaddassa rūpaṃ. Manasaddo hi punnapuṃsakavasena
anya-e0803n:1292_12: dvidhā bhijjati “mano manaṃ”iti yathā “ajjavoajjava”nti. “Mano ce nappadussati. Santaṃ
anya-e0803n:1292_13: tassa manaṃ hotī”ti hi pāḷi. Yadi ca so manosaddo napuṃsakaliṅgo na hoti.
anya-e0803n:1297_0: Ettha manosaddena samānādhikaraṇo “patita”nti saddo napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvena kasmā sannihito.
anya-e0803n:1297_1: Yasmā ca samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvena sannihitaṃ, tasmā saddantarasannidhānavasena
anya-e0803n:1297_2: manosaddo napuṃsakaliṅgoti ñāyatīti? Tanna, samānādhikaraṇapadassa sabbattha liṅgavisesājotanato.
anya-e0803n:1297_3: Yadi hi samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ sabbattha liṅgavisesaṃ joteyya, “cattāro indriyānī”ti
anya-e0803n:1297_4: etthāpi “cattāro”ti padaṃ indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ kareyya, na ca kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0803n:1297_5: Indriyasaddo hi ekantena napuṃsakaliṅgo. Yadi tumhe “patita”nti samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ
anya-e0803n:1297_7: samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ nissāya indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ icchathāti. Na mayaṃ bho
anya-e0803n:1297_8: indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ icchāma, atha kho napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃyeva icchāma, “cattāro”ti
anya-e0803n:1297_9: padaṃ liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitattā “cattārī”ti gaṇhāma, tasmā “cattāri indriyānī”ti
anya-e0803n:1297_10: atthaṃ dhāremāti. Yadi evaṃ “patitaṃ asubhesu munissa mano”ti etthāpi “patita”nti
anya-e0803n:1297_11: padaṃ liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitanti mantvā “patito”ti atthaṃ dhārethāti. Na dhārema
anya-e0803n:1297_12: ettha liṅgavipallāsassa anicchitabbato. Yadi hi manosaddo pulliṅgo siyā, taṃsamānādhikaraṇapadaṃ
anya-e0803n:1297_13: “patito”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Kimācariyo evaṃ vattuṃ na jāni, jānamāno eva so “patito”ti
anya-e0803n:1297_14: nāvoca, “patita”nti panāvoca, tena ñāyati “manosaddo napuṃsakaliṅgo”ti. Mā tumhe
anya-e0803n:1297_15: evaṃ vadetha, samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ nāma katthaci padhānaliṅgamanuvattati, katthaci
anya-e0803n:1297_16: nānuvattati, tasmā na taṃ liṅgavisesajotane ekantato pamāṇaṃ. “Mātugāmo, orodho,
anya-e0803n:1297_17: āvuso visākha, ehi visākhe, cittāni aṭṭhīnī”ti evamādirūpavisesoyeva pamāṇaṃ. Yadi
anya-e0803n:1297_18: samānādhikaraṇapadeyeva liṅgaviseso adhigantabbo siyā, “cattāro ca mahābhūtā”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:1297_19: liṅgavavatthānaṃ na siyā. Yasmā evamādīsupi ṭhānesu liṅgavavatthānaṃ hotiyeva. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:1297_21: mano”ti etthāpi “patita”nti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ “mano”ti pulliṅganti vavatthānaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0803n:1297_22: Idaṃ sutvā te tuṇhī bhavissanti. Tato tesaṃ tuṇhībhūtānaṃ idaṃ vattabbaṃ – yasmā
anya-e0803n:1297_23: manogaṇe pavattānaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṃsakavasena yojetabbāni,
anya-e0803n:1297_24: tasmā manogaṇe pamukhassa manosaddassapi samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṃsakavasena
anya-e0803n:1297_25: yojitāni. Tathā hi pubbācariyā “saddhammatejavihataṃ vilayaṃ khaṇena, veneyyasattahadayesu
anya-e0803n:1297_26: tamo’payāti. Dukkhaṃ vaco etasminti dubbaco. Avanataṃ siro yassa soyaṃ avaṃsiro,
anya-e0803n:1297_27: appakaṃ rāgādi rajo yesaṃ paññāmaye akkhimhi te apparajakkhā”tiādinā saddaracanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1297_28: kubbiṃsu, na pana tehi vaco siro rajosaddādīnaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ īdisī
anya-e0803n:1297_29: saddaracanā katā, atha kho siromanosaddānaṃ manogaṇe pavattānaṃ pulliṅgasaddānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1297_30: katthacipi īdisānipi liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitāni samānādhikaraṇapadāni hontīti paresaṃ
anya-e0803n:1297_31: jānāpanādhippāyavatiyā anukampāya viracitā. Etthāpi tumhākaṃ matena manosaddassa
anya-e0803n:1297_32: napuṃsakaliṅgatte sati vaco siro iccādayopi napuṃsakaliṅgattamāpajjanti napuṃsakaliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:1297_33: samānādhikaraṇapadānaṃ niddiṭṭhattā. Kiṃ panetesampi napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ icchathāti.
anya-e0803n:1297_34: Addhā te idampi sutvā nibbeṭhetumasakkontā tuṇhī bhavissanti. Kiñcāpi te aññaṃ gahetabbakāraṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:1297_35: apassantā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “yadi bho mano saddo napuṃsakaliṅgona hoti, kasmā veyyākaraṇā
anya-e0803n:1297_36: ‘manosaddo napuṃsakaliṅgo’ti vadantī”ti? Te vattabbā – yadi tumhe veyyākaraṇamataṃ
anya-e0803n:1297_37: gahetvā manosaddassa napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ rocetha, nanu bhagavāyeva loke asadiso mahāveyyākaraṇo
anya-e0803n:1297_38: mahāpuriso visārado parappavādamaddano. Bhagavantañhi padakā veyyākaraṇā ambaṭṭhamāṇavapokkharasātisoṇadaṇḍādayo
anya-e0803n:1297_39: ca brāhmaṇā saccakanigaṇṭhādayo ca paribbājakā vādena na sampāpuṇiṃsu, aññadatthu
anya-e0803n:1297_40: bhagavāyeva mattavāraṇagaṇamajjhe kesarasīho viya asambhīto nesaṃ nesaṃ vādaṃ maddesi,
anya-e0803n:1297_41: mahante ca ne atthe patiṭṭhāpesi, evaṃvidhena bhagavatā vohārakusalena yasmā “kāyo
anya-e0803n:1297_42: anicco”ti ca “kāyo dukkho, mano anicco, mano dukkho”ti ca evamādinā vuttā manosaddassa
anya-e0803n:1297_43: pulliṅgabhāvasūcanikā bahū pāḷiyo dissanti, tasmā manosaddo pulliṅgoyevāti sārato
anya-e0803n:1297_44: paccetabboti. Evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyissanti.
anya-e0803n:1299_0: Saro, sarā. Saraṃ, sare. Sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. Sarassa, sarānaṃ. Sarā, sarasmā,
anya-e0803n:1299_1: saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. Sarassa, sarānaṃ. Sare, sarasmiṃ, saramhi, saresu. Bho
anya-e0803n:1300: Ayaṃ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa ususaddasaravanaakārādisaravācakassa sarasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:1301: Ayaṃ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa manogaṇapakkhikassa rahadavācakassa sarasaddassa nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n:1302_0: Saro, sarā. Saraṃ, saro, sare. Sarasā, sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. Saraso, sarassa,
anya-e0803n:1302_1: sarānaṃ. Sarā, sarasmā, saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. Saraso, sarassa, sarānaṃ. Sarasi,
anya-e0803n:1302_2: sare, sarasmiṃ, saramhi, saresu. Bho sara, bhavanto sarā, bho sarā iti vā.
anya-e0803n:1303: Vayo, vayā. Vayaṃ, vaye. Vayena, vayehi, vayebhīti purisanayena ñe yyo. Ayaṃ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa parihānivācakassa vayasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:1304_0: Ayaṃ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa manogaṇapakkhikassa āyukoṭṭhāsavācakassa
anya-e0803n:1304_1: vayasaddassa nāmikapadamālā – vayo, vayā. Vayaṃ, vayo, vaye. Vayasā, vayena, vayehi,
anya-e0803n:1304_2: vayebhīti mananayena ñeyyo. Tassa ceto paṭissosi, araññe luddagocaro. Cetā haniṃsu vedabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1305: Ceto, cetā. Cetaṃ, cete. Cetena, cetehi, cetebhīti purisanayena ñeyyo. Ayaṃ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa paṇṇattivācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:1306_0: Ayaṃ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa cittavācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:1306_1: – ceto, cetā. Cetaṃ, ceto, cete. Cetasā, cetena, cetehi, cetebhīti mananayena ñeyyo.
anya-e0803n:1306_2: Yaso kulaputto, yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ, yasena kulaputtenāti ekavacanavasena purisanayena
anya-e0803n:1306_3: yojetabbā, ekavacanaputhuvacanavasena vā. Evaṃ kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā
