anya-e0803n:1306_4: paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena paviṭṭhāni cāti iminā nayena sabbapadāni paññācakkhunā
anya-e0803n:1306_5: upaparikkhitvā viseso veditabbo. Avisesaññuno hi evamādivibhāgaṃ ajānantā yaṃ vā
anya-e0803n:1306_6: taṃ vā byañjanaṃ ropentā yathādhippetaṃ atthaṃ virādhenti, tasmā yo ettha amhehi
anya-e0803n:1306_7: pakāsito vibhāgo, so saddhāsampannehi kulaputtehi sakkaccamuggahetabbo. Katamāni
anya-e0803n:1306_8: kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni
anya-e0803n:1306_9: ca? Mano vaco tejosaddādayo ceva ayyasaddo ca, tatra manasaddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālā heṭṭhā vibhāvitā.
anya-e0803n:1307_0: Ayyasaddassa pana nāmikapadamālāyaṃ “ayyo, ayyā. Ayyaṃ, ayye”ti purisanayena vatvā
anya-e0803n:1307_1: ālapanaṭṭhāne “bho ayya, bho ayyo”ti dve ekavacanāni, “bhavanto ayyā, bhavanto ayyo”ti
anya-e0803n:1307_2: dve bahuvacanāni ca vattabbāni. Ettha ayyo iti saddo paccattavacanabhāve ekavacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1307_3: ālapanavacanabhāve ekavacanañceva bahuvacanañca. Tatrime payogā “ayyo kira sāgato
anya-e0803n:1307_4: ambatitthikena nāgena saṅgāmesi, pivatu bhante ayyo sāgato kāpotikaṃ pasanna”nti
anya-e0803n:1307_5: evamādīni ayyosaddassa paccattekavacanappayogāni, “atha kho sā itthī taṃ purisaṃ
anya-e0803n:1307_6: etadavoca ‘nāyyo so bhikkhu maṃ nippāṭesi, apica ahameva tena bhikkhunā gacchāmi,
anya-e0803n:1307_7: akārako so bhikkhu, gaccha khamāpehī’ti” evamādīni ayyosaddassa ālapanekavacanappayogāni,
anya-e0803n:1307_8: “etha’yyo rājavasatiṃ, nisīditvā suṇātha me. Etha mayaṃ ayyo samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu
anya-e0803n:1307_9: pabbajissāmā”ti evamādīni ayyosaddassa ālapanabahuvacanappayogāni. Bhavati catra –
anya-e0803n:1308: Ayyo iti ayaṃ saddo, paccattekavaco bhave;
anya-e0803n:1310: Evaṃ kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca honti ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca.
anya-e0803n:1311: Katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhāni? Gosaddoyeva. Gosaddassa hi ayaṃ nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n:1312_0: Go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ, gāvo, gavo. Gāvena, gavena, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa,
anya-e0803n:1312_1: gavassa, gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gāvā, gāvasmā, gāvamhā, gavā, gavasmā, gavamhā, gohi,
anya-e0803n:1312_2: gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gāve, gāvasmiṃ, gāvamhi, gave, gavasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:1312_3: gavamhi, gāvesu, gavesu, gosu. Bho go, bhavanto gāvo, gavo. Ayaṃ purisanaye sabbathā
anya-e0803n:1313_0: Nanu ca bho gosaddo attanā sambhūtagoṇasaddamālāvasena purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭho
anya-e0803n:1313_1: ceva ekadesena na paviṭṭho cāti? Saccaṃ. Goṇasaddo gosaddavasena sambhūtopi “vatticchānupubbikā
anya-e0803n:1313_2: saddapaṭipattī”ti vacanato gosaddato visuṃ amhehi gahetvā purisanaye pakkhitto. Tassa
anya-e0803n:1313_3: hi visuṃ gahaṇe yutti dissati syādīsu ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato, tasmā gosaddato sambhūtampi
anya-e0803n:1313_4: goṇasaddaṃ anapekkhitvā suddhaṃ gosaddameva gahetvā purisanaye sabbathā gosaddassa appaviṭṭhatā vuttā.
anya-e0803n:1314_0: Nanu ca bho paccattavacanabhūto goiti saddo purisoti saddena sadisattā purisanaye
anya-e0803n:1314_1: ekadesena paviṭṭhoti? Tanna, gosaddo hi niccamokāranto, na purisasaddādayo viya paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0803n:1314_2: akārantabhāve ṭhatvā pacchā paṭiladdhokārantaṭṭho. Teneva hi paccattavacanaṭṭhānepi
anya-e0803n:1314_3: ālapanavacanaṭṭhānepi goicceva tiṭṭhati. Yadi paccattavacanattaṃ paṭicca gosaddassa
anya-e0803n:1314_4: purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhatā icchitabbā, “kānici okārantapadānī”ti evaṃ vuttā
anya-e0803n:1314_5: okārantakathā kamatthaṃ dīpeyya, nipphalāva sā kathā siyā, tasmā amhehi yathāvutto
anya-e0803n:1314_6: nayoyeva āyasmantehi manasi kātabbo. Evaṃ gosaddassa purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n:1315_0: Kecettha evaṃ puccheyyuṃ “gosaddassa tāva ‘go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ’ iccādinā
anya-e0803n:1315_1: nayena purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā amhehi ñātā, jaraggava puṅgavādisaddā pana
anya-e0803n:1315_2: kutra naye paviṭṭhā”ti? Tesaṃ evaṃ byākātabbaṃ “jaraggava puṅgavādisaddā sabbathāpi
anya-e0803n:1315_3: purisanaye paviṭṭhā”ti. Tathā hi tesaṃ gosaddato ayaṃ viseso, jaranto ca so go cāti
anya-e0803n:1315_4: jaraggavo. Ettha nakāralopo takārassa ca gakārattaṃ bhavati samāsapadattā, samāse
anya-e0803n:1315_5: ca simhi pare gosaddassokārassa avādeso labbhati, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ “visāṇena jaraggavo”ti
anya-e0803n:1315_6: ekavacanarūpaṃ dissati. Tathā hi aññattha anupapadattā gavoiti bahuvacanapadaṃyeva
anya-e0803n:1315_7: dissati. Idha pana sopapadattā samāsapadabhāvamāgamma “jaraggavo”ti ekavacanapadaṃyeva
anya-e0803n:1315_8: dissati. Tathā hi jaraggavoti ettha jarantā ca te gavo cāti evaṃ bahuvacanavasena
anya-e0803n:1315_9: nibbacanīyatā na labbhati lokasaṅketavasena ekasmiṃ atthe nirūḷhattāti. “Jaraggavo,
anya-e0803n:1315_10: jaraggavā. Jaraggavaṃ, jaraggave. Jaraggavenā”ti purisanayena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1316_0: Tatra puṅgavoti gunnaṃ yūthapati nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho. Yo pāḷiyaṃ “muhuttajātova
anya-e0803n:1316_1: yathā gavaṃpati, samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara”nti ca “gavañce taramānānaṃ, ujuṃ
anya-e0803n:1316_2: gacchati puṅgavo”ti ca āgato. Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu keci “pumā ca so go cāti puṅgavo”ti
anya-e0803n:1316_3: vacanatthaṃ bhaṇanti. Mayaṃ pana padhāne nirūḷho ayaṃ saddoti vacanatthaṃ na bhaṇāma.
anya-e0803n:1316_4: Na hi puṅkokilotiādisaddānaṃ kokilādīnaṃ pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā viya imassa
anya-e0803n:1316_5: pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā sambhavati, atha kho padhānabhāvappakāsane ca samatthatā
anya-e0803n:1316_6: sambhavati. Tena “sakyapuṅgavo”tiādīsu nisabhasaṅkhāto puṅgavo viyāti puṅgavo, sakyānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1316_7: sakyesu vā puṅgavo sakyapuṅgavotiādinā samāsapadattho gahetabbo. Atha vā uttarapadatte
anya-e0803n:1316_9: attho gahetabbo. Iti sabbathāpi purisanaye pavattanato jaraggava puṅgavādisaddānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1316_10: gosaddassa padamālato visadisapadamālatā vavatthapetabbā. Gosaddassa pana purisanaye
anya-e0803n:1317_0: Āpasadde ācariyānaṃ liṅgavacanavasena matibhedo vijjati, tasmā taṃmatena tassa purisanaye
anya-e0803n:1317_1: sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā bhavati. “Aṅguttarāpesū”ti pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “mahiyā pana
anya-e0803n:1317_2: nadiyā uttarena āpo”ti vuttaṃ, ṭīkāyaṃ pana taṃ ulliṅgitvā “mahiyā nadiyā āpo tassa
anya-e0803n:1317_3: janapadassa uttarena honti, tāsaṃ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpo”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0803n:1317_4: āpasaddassa ekantena itthiliṅgatā bahuvacanatā ca ācariyehi icchitā, tesaṃ mate āpoiti
anya-e0803n:1317_6: kīdisāni siyuṃ. Tathā hi “purise, purisehi purisebhi purisesū”ti rūpavato pulliṅgassa
anya-e0803n:1317_7: viya okārantitthiliṅgassa ekāraehi kārādiyuttāni rūpāni katthacipi na dissanti. Ato
anya-e0803n:1320_0: Iccāpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanantatā veyyākaraṇānaṃ mataṃ nissāya anumatāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:1320_1: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana āpo iti saddassa napuṃsakaliṅgekavacanavasena vutto payogo diṭṭho
anya-e0803n:1320_2: “omattaṃ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṃ jāta”nti. Jātakapāḷiyaṃ tu tassekavacanantatā
anya-e0803n:1320_3: diṭṭhā. Tathā hi “suciṃ sugandhaṃ salilaṃ, āpo tatthābhisandatī”ti. Imasmiṃ padese
anya-e0803n:1320_4: āpo iti saddo ekavacanaṭṭhāne ṭhito diṭṭho. Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “āpoti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ
anya-e0803n:1320_5: salilaṃ suci sugandhaṃ hutvā tattha abhisandatīti salilaṃsaddavasena ekavacanappayogo
anya-e0803n:1320_6: kato, na nāmasaddavasena. Āpasaddo hi ekantenitthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacananto ca. Tathā
anya-e0803n:1320_7: hi ‘āpo tatthābhisandantī’ti bahuvacanavasena tappayogo vattabbopi chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:1320_8: vacanavipallāsavasena niddiṭṭho”ti. Tanna, “āpo tatthābhisandare”ti vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā
anya-e0803n:1320_9: “tāni ajja padissare”ti bahuvacanappayogā viya. Yasmā evaṃ na vuttaṃ, yasmā ca pana
anya-e0803n:1320_10: pāḷiyaṃ “āpo labbhati, tejo labbhati, vāyo labbhatī”ti ekavacanappayogo dissati,
anya-e0803n:1321_0: Athāpi ce vadeyyuṃ – nanu pāḷiyaṃyeva tassa bahuvacanantatā paccakkhato diṭṭhā “āpo
anya-e0803n:1321_1: ca devā pathavī ca, tejo vāyo tadāgamu”nti? Tampi na. Ettha hi “devā”ti saddaṃ apekkhitvā
anya-e0803n:1321_2: “āgamu”nti bahuvacanappayogo kato, na “āpo”ti saddaṃ. Yadi “āpo”ti saddaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0803n:1321_3: bahuvacanappayogo kato siyā, “pathavī”ti “tejo”ti “vāyo”ti ca saddampi sandhāya bahuvacanappayogo
anya-e0803n:1321_4: kato siyā. Evaṃ sante pathavī tejo vāyosaddāpi bahuvacanakabhāvamāpajjeyyuṃ, na pana
anya-e0803n:1321_5: āpajjanti. Na hete bahuvacanakā, atha kho ekavacanakā eva. Rūḷhīvasena te pavattā
anya-e0803n:1321_6: pakatiāpādīsu atthesu appavattanato. Tathā hi āpokasiṇādīsu parikammaṃ katvā nibbattā
anya-e0803n:1321_7: devā ārammaṇavasena “āpo”tiādināmaṃ labhantīti. Evaṃ vuttāpi te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “nanu
anya-e0803n:1321_8: ca bho ‘aṅguttarāpesū’ti bahuvacanapāḷi dissatī”ti? Te vattabbā – asampathamavatiṇṇā
anya-e0803n:1321_9: tumhe, na hi tumhe saddappavattiṃ jānātha, “aṅguttarāpesū”ti bahuvacanaṃ pana “kurūsu
anya-e0803n:1321_10: aṅgesu aṅgānaṃ magadhāna”ntiādīni bahuvacanāni viya rūḷhīvasena ekassāpi janapadassa
anya-e0803n:1321_11: vuttaṃ, na āpasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sandhāya. “Aṅguttarāpesū”ti ettha hi āpasaṅkhāto attho
anya-e0803n:1321_12: upasajjanībhūto, pulliṅgabahuvacanena pana vutto janapadasaṅkhāto atthoyeva padhāno
anya-e0803n:1321_13: “āgatasamaṇo saṅghārāmo”ti ettha samaṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ upasajjanakaṃ katvā pavattassa
anya-e0803n:1321_14: āgatasamaṇasaddassa saṅghārāmasaṅkhāto attho viya, tasmā āpasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0803n:1321_15: yo aṅguttarāpo nāma janapado, tasmiṃ aṅguttarāpesu janapadeti attho veditabbo. Tathā
anya-e0803n:1321_16: hi “aṅguttarāpesu viharati āpaṇaṃ nāma aṅgānaṃ nigamo”ti pāḷi dissati. Tattha uttarena
anya-e0803n:1321_17: mahāmahiyā nadiyā āpo yesaṃ te uttarāpā, aṅgā ca te uttarāpā cāti aṅguttarāpā, tesu
anya-e0803n:1321_18: aṅguttarāpesu. Evaṃ ekasmiṃ janapadeyeva bahuvacanaṃ na āpasaṅkhāte atthe, tena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1321_19: vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ aṅguttarāpesu janapade”ti. Evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n:1322_0: Tathāpi ye evaṃ vadanti “āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanakocā”ti. Te pucchitabbā
anya-e0803n:1322_1: “kiṃ paṭicca tumhe āyasmanto ‘āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā’ti vadathā”ti?
anya-e0803n:1322_2: Te evaṃ puṭṭhā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ – “aṅgāyeva so janapado, mahiyā pana nadiyā uttarena
anya-e0803n:1322_3: āpo, tāsaṃ avidūrattā uttarāpoti vuccatī”ti ca “mahiyā pana nadiyā āpo tassa janapadassa
anya-e0803n:1322_4: uttarena honti, tāsaṃ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpoti vuccatī”ti ca evaṃ pubbācariyehi
anya-e0803n:1322_5: abhisaṅkhato saddaracanāviseso dissati, tasmā itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā”ti
anya-e0803n:1322_6: vadāmāti. Saccaṃ dissati, so pana saddasatthe veyyākaraṇānaṃ mataṃ gahetvā abhisaṅkhato,
anya-e0803n:1322_7: saddasatthañca nāma na sabbathā buddhavacanassopakārakaṃ, ekadesena pana hoti, tasmā
anya-e0803n:1323_0: Yadi ca āpasaddo itthiliṅgabahuvacanako, kathaṃ āpoti padaṃ sijjhatīti? Āpasaddato
anya-e0803n:1323_1: paṭhamāyovacanaṃ katvā tassokārādesañca katvā āpoti padaṃ sijjhati “gāvo”ti padamivāti.
anya-e0803n:1323_2: Visamamidaṃ nidassanaṃ, “gāvo”ti padañhi niccokārantena gosaddena sambhūtaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0803n:1323_3: hi yomhi pare gosaddantassāvādesaṃ katvā tato yonamokārādesaṃ katvā “gāvo”ti nipphajjati,
anya-e0803n:1323_4: āpasadde pana dve ādesā na santi. Buddhavacanañhi patvā āpasaddo akārantatāpakatiko
anya-e0803n:1324_0: Evaṃ vuttāpi te “idameva saccaṃ, nāñña”nti cetasi sannidhāya ādhānaggāhiduppaṭinissaggibhāve,
anya-e0803n:1324_1: “na vacanapaccanīkasātena suvijānaṃ subhāsita”nti evaṃ vuttapaccanīkasātabhāve ca
anya-e0803n:1324_2: ṭhatvā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “yatheva gāvosaddo, tatheva āposaddo kiṃ itthiliṅgo na bhavissati
anya-e0803n:1324_3: bahuvacanako cā”ti? Tato tesaṃ imāni suttapadāni dassetabbāni. Seyyathidaṃ? “Āpaṃ
anya-e0803n:1324_4: āpato sañjānāti, āpaṃ āpato saññatvā āpaṃ maññati, āpasmiṃ maññati, āpaṃ meti maññati,
anya-e0803n:1324_5: āpaṃ abhinandatī”ti evaṃ suttapadāni dassetvā “āpanti idaṃ kataravacana”nti pucchitabbā.
anya-e0803n:1324_6: Addhā te āpasaddassa bahuvacanantabhāvameva icchamānā vakkhanti “dutiyābahuvacana”nti.
anya-e0803n:1324_7: Te vattabbā “nanu yovacanaṃ na suyyatī”ti? Te vadeyyuṃ “yovacanaṃ kataamādesattā
anya-e0803n:1324_8: na suyyatī”ti. Yaṃ yaṃ bhonto icchanti, taṃ taṃ mukhārūḷhaṃ vadanti.
anya-e0803n:1325_0: “Āpato”ti idaṃ pana kiṃ bhonto vadantīti? “Āpato”ti idampi “bahuvacanakaṃ topaccayanta”nti
anya-e0803n:1325_1: vadāma topaccayassa ekatthe ca bavhatthe ca pavattanato. Iti tumhe bahuvacanakattaṃyeva
anya-e0803n:1325_2: icchamānā “āposaddo ca yovacananto”ti bhaṇatha, “āpato”ti idampi “bahuvacanakaṃ topaccayanta”nti
anya-e0803n:1325_3: bhaṇatha, “āpasmiṃ maññatī”ti ettha pana “āpasmi”ntidaṃ kataravacanantaṃ katarādesena
anya-e0803n:1325_4: sambhūtanti? Addhā te evaṃ puṭṭhā niruttarā bhavissanti. Tathā yesaṃ evaṃ hoti “āpasaddo
anya-e0803n:1325_5: itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā”ti, te pucchitabbā “yaṃ ācariyehi veyyākaraṇamataṃ
anya-e0803n:1325_6: gahetvā ‘yā āpo’ti ca ‘tāsa’nti ca vuttaṃ, tattha ‘kiṃ tāsa’nti vacane ‘āpāna’nti
anya-e0803n:1325_7: padaṃ ānetvā attho vattabbo, udāhu āpassā”ti? “Āpāna’nti padamānetvā attho vattabbo”ti
anya-e0803n:1325_8: ce, evañca sati “yā āpā”ti vattabbaṃ “yā kaññā tiṭṭhantī”ti padamiva. Atha “āpā”ti
anya-e0803n:1325_9: padaṃ nāma natthi, “āpo”ti padaṃyeva bahuvacanakanti ce, evaṃ sati “tāsa”nti etthāpi
anya-e0803n:1325_10: “āpassā”ti padaṃ ānetvā attho veditabbo. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā “āpo”ti paccattekavacanassa
anya-e0803n:1325_11: tumhākaṃ matena bahuvacanatte sati “āpassā”ti padampi bahuvacananti katvā tāsaṃsaddena
anya-e0803n:1325_12: yojetvā vattuṃ yuttitoti. Evaṃ sati “āpāna”nti padassa abhāveneva bhavitabbaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0803n:1325_13: pana “puriso, purisā. Purisaṃ, purise”ti ca, “go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvu”nti ca ekavacanabahuvacanāni
anya-e0803n:1325_14: bhavanti, evaṃ “āpo, āpā. Āpaṃ, āpe”ti ekavacanabahuvacanehi bhavitabbaṃ. Evañca
anya-e0803n:1326_0: Ye evaṃ vadanti, tesaṃ vacanaṃ sadosaṃ duppariharaṇīyaṃ mūlapariyāyasutte “āpaṃ maññati
anya-e0803n:1326_1: āpasmi”nti ekavacanapāḷīnaṃ dassanato, visuddhimaggādīsu ca “vissandanabhāvena taṃ
anya-e0803n:1326_2: taṃ ṭhānaṃ āpoti appotīti āpo”tiādikassa ekavacanavasena vuttanibbacanassa dassanato.
anya-e0803n:1326_3: Yathā pana pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgepi pariyāpanno gosaddo “tā gāvo tato tato daṇḍena ākoṭeyyā”ti
anya-e0803n:1326_4: ca “annadā baladā cetā”ti ca ādinā bavhatthadīpakehi itthiliṅgabhūtehi sabbanāmikapadehi
anya-e0803n:1326_5: ca asabbanāmikapadehi ca samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vutto dissati, na tathā pāḷiyaṃ bavhatthadīpakehi
anya-e0803n:1326_6: itthiliṅgabhūtehi sabbanāmikapadehi vā asabbanāmikapadehi vā samānādhikaraṇabhāvena
anya-e0803n:1326_7: vutto āpasaddo dissati. Yadi hi āpasaddo itthiliṅgo siyā, kaññasaddato āpaccayo viya
anya-e0803n:1326_8: āpasaddato āpaccayo vā siyā, nadasaddato viya ca īpaccayo vā siyā, ubhayampi natthi,
anya-e0803n:1326_9: ubhayābhāvato itthiliṅge vuttaṃ sabbampi vidhānaṃ tattha na labbhati, tena ñāyati
anya-e0803n:1326_10: “āpasaddo anitthiliṅgo”ti. Nanu ca bho gosaddatopi āpaccayo natthi, tadabhāvato itthiliṅge
anya-e0803n:1326_11: vuttavidhānaṃ na labbhati, evaṃ sante kasmā soyeva itthiliṅgo hoti, na panāyaṃ āpasaddoti?
anya-e0803n:1327_0: Ettha vuccate – gosaddo na niyogā itthiliṅgo, atha kho pulliṅgova. Itthiliṅgabhāve
anya-e0803n:1327_1: pana tamhā āpaccaye ahontepi īpaccayo vikappena hoti, aññampi itthiliṅge vuttavidhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1327_2: labbhati. So hi niccamokārantatāpakatiyaṃ ṭhatvā “go, gāvī”tiādinā attano itthiliṅgarūpānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1327_3: nibbattikāraṇabhūto, tena so itthiliṅgo bhavati. Āpasadde pana īpaccayādi na labbhati.
anya-e0803n:1327_4: Tena so itthiliṅgoti na vattabbo. Yathā vā gosaddassa avisadākāravohārataṃ paṭicca
anya-e0803n:1327_5: itthiliṅgabhāvo upapajjati, na tathā āpasaddassa. Āpasaddassa hi anākularūpakkamattā
anya-e0803n:1327_6: avisadākāravohāratā na dissati, yāya eso itthiliṅgo siyā. Evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n:1328_0: Tathā yesaṃ evaṃ hoti “āpasaddo sabbadā itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā”ti, te vattabbā
anya-e0803n:1328_1: – yathā itthiliṅgabhūtassa kaññāsaddassa paṭhamaṃ kaññaiti rassavasena ṭhapitassa
anya-e0803n:1328_2: āpaccayato paraṃ smiṃvacanaṃ sarūpato na tiṭṭhati, yaṃbhāvena ca yābhāvena ca tiṭṭhati
anya-e0803n:1328_3: “kaññāyaṃ, kaññāyā”ti, na tathā “itthiliṅga”nti tumhehi gahitassa āposaddassa paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0803n:1328_4: āpaiti rassavasena ṭhapitassa paraṃ smiṃvacanaṃ yaṃbhāvena ca yābhāvena ca tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0803n:1328_5: atha kho sarūpatoyeva tiṭṭhati “āpasmiṃ maññatī”ti. Yadi pana āpasaddo itthiliṅgo
anya-e0803n:1328_6: siyā, smiṃvacanaṃ sarūpato na tiṭṭheyya. Yasmā ca smiṃvacanaṃ sarūpato tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0803n:1328_7: tasmā āpasaddo na itthiliṅgo. Na hi caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassasaṅgahesu anekakoṭisatasahassesu
anya-e0803n:1328_8: pāḷippadesesu ekasmimpi pāḷippadese paṭhamaṃ akārantabhāvena ṭhapetabbānaṃ itthiliṅgasaddānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1328_9: parato ṭhitaṃ smiṃvacanaṃ sarūpato tiṭṭhatīti. Evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n:1329_0: Keci panettha evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “āpasaddo napuṃsakaliṅgo, tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ ‘omattaṃ
anya-e0803n:1329_1: pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṃ jāta’nti napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvena taṃsamānādhikaraṇapadāni
anya-e0803n:1329_2: niddiṭṭhānī”ti? Tanna, manogaṇe pavattehi tama vaca sirasaddādīhi viya āpasaddenapi
anya-e0803n:1329_4: saddaracanāsu “saddhammatejavihataṃ vilayaṃ khaṇena, veneyyasattahadayesu tamo payātī”ti
anya-e0803n:1329_6: “dukkhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ vipaccanīkasāte puggaleti dubbaco”ti ettha “vaco”ti padena
anya-e0803n:1329_7: samānādhikaraṇaṃ “dukkha”nti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ, “avanataṃ siro yassa so avanatasiro”ti
anya-e0803n:1329_9: yesaṃ paññāmaye akkhimhi te apparajakkhā”ti ettha “rajo”ti padena samānādhikaraṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:1329_10: “appa”nti napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ dissati. Na te ācariyā tehi samānādhikaraṇapadehi tamavacasirasaddādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1329_11: napuṃsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṃ tathāvidhaṃ saddaracanaṃ kubbiṃsu, atha kho “sobhanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1329_12: mano tassāti sumano”ti ettha viya manogaṇe pavattapulliṅgānaṃ payoge napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvenapi
anya-e0803n:1329_13: samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci hontīti dassanatthaṃ kubbiṃsu. Yathā ca “vihata”ntiādikā
anya-e0803n:1329_14: saddaracanā tamavacasirasaddādīnaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṃ na katā, tathā
anya-e0803n:1329_15: “omatta”nti ca “adhimattapathavīgatikaṃ jāta”nti ca saddaracanāpi āpasaddassa napuṃsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:1329_16: na katā. Yasmā pana manogaṇe pavattehi manasaddādīhi ekadesena samānagatikattā āpasaddenapi
anya-e0803n:1329_17: napuṃsakaliṅgassa samānādhikaraṇatā yujjati, tasmā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ “omattaṃ pana āpo
anya-e0803n:1329_18: adhimattapathavīgatikaṃ jāta”nti napuṃsakaliṅgassa āpasaddena samānādhikaraṇatā katā.
anya-e0803n:1329_19: Tathāpi āpasaddo manasaddādīhi ekadesena samānagatiko samāsapadatte majjhokārassa
anya-e0803n:1329_21: napuṃsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṃ vuttanti na gahetabbaṃ, liṅgavipariyayavasena pana
anya-e0803n:1329_22: katthaci evampi saddagati hotīti ñāpanatthaṃ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. “Omatto”ti ca “adhimattapathavīgatiko
anya-e0803n:1329_23: jāto”ti ca liṅgaṃ parivattetabbaṃ. Yadi hi āpasaddo napuṃsakaliṅgo siyā, sanikārāni’ssa
anya-e0803n:1329_24: paccattopayogarūpāni buddhavacanādīsu vijjeyyuṃ, na tādisāni santi. Kiñci bhiyyo
anya-e0803n:1329_25: – okārantaṃ nāma napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ katthacipi natthi, niggahītantaikāranta ukārantavasena
anya-e0803n:1329_26: hi tividhāniyeva napuṃsakaliṅgāni. Tena āpasaddassa napuṃsakaliṅgatā nupapajjatīti.
anya-e0803n:1329_27: Evaṃ vuttā te niruttarā bhavissanti. Iccokārantavasena gahitassa āpasaddassa itthiliṅgatā
anya-e0803n:1329_28: ca napuṃsakaliṅgatā ca ekantato natthi, niggahītantavasena pana gahitassa katthaci
anya-e0803n:1329_29: napuṃsakaliṅgatā siyā “bhante nāgasena samuddo samuddoti vuccati, kena kāraṇena āpaṃ
anya-e0803n:1329_30: udakaṃ samuddoti vuccatī”ti payogadassanato. Ettha paneke vadeyyuṃ “yadi bho okārantavasena
anya-e0803n:1329_31: gahitassa āpasaddassa itthinapuṃsakaliṅgavasena dviliṅgatā natthi, okāranto āpasaddo
anya-e0803n:1330_0: Yadi ca bho āpasaddo pulliṅgo. Yathā āpasaddassa pulliṅgatā paññāyeyya, nijjhānakkhamatā
anya-e0803n:1330_1: ca bhaveyya, tathā suttaṃ āharathāti. “Āharissāmisuttaṃ, na no suttāharaṇe bhāro
anya-e0803n:1330_2: atthī”ti evañca pana vatvā tesaṃ imāni suttapadāni dassetabbāni. Seyyathidaṃ? “Āpo
anya-e0803n:1330_3: upalabbhatīti? Āmantā. Āpassa kattā kāretā upalabbhatīti? Na hevaṃ vattabbe. Atīto
anya-e0803n:1330_4: āpo atthīti? Āmantā. Tena āpena āpakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti? Na hevaṃ vattabbe. Āpaṃ maññati
anya-e0803n:1331_0: Ettha ca “upalabbhatī”tiādinā āpasaddassa ekavacanatā siddhā, tāya siddhāya bahuvacanatāpi
anya-e0803n:1331_1: siddhāyeva. Ekavacanatāyeva hi saddasatthe paṭisiddhā, na bahuvacanatā, tena “āpenā”ti
anya-e0803n:1331_2: iminā pana āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvavigamo siddho itthiliṅge enādesābhāvato. “Āpassa,
anya-e0803n:1331_3: āpasmi”nti imināpi itthiliṅgabhāvavigamoyeva itthiliṅge sarūpato nā smā smiṃ vacanānamabhāvā.
anya-e0803n:1332_0: Apica buddhavacanādīsu “cittāni, rūpānī”tiādīni viya sanikārānaṃ rūpānaṃ adassanato
anya-e0803n:1332_1: okārantabhāvena gahitassa napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvavigamo atīva pākaṭo. Aparampettha vattabbaṃ
anya-e0803n:1332_2: – “atīto āpo atthīti? Āmantā”ti ettha “atīto”ti iminā āpasaddassa visadākāravohāratāsūcakena
anya-e0803n:1332_3: okārantapadena tassa avisadākāravohāratāya ca ubhayamuttākāravohāratāya ca abhāvo
anya-e0803n:1332_4: siddho. Tassa ca avisadākāravohāratāya abhāve siddhe itthiliṅgabhāvo dūrataro. Ubhayamuttākāravohāratāya
anya-e0803n:1332_5: ca abhāve siddhe napuṃsakaliṅgabhāvopi dūrataroyeva. Iti na katthacipi okārantabhāvena
anya-e0803n:1332_6: gahito āpasaddo itthiliṅgo vā napuṃsakaliṅgo vā bhavati. Milindapañhe pana niggahītantavasena
anya-e0803n:1332_7: āgato napuṃsakaliṅgoti veditabbo, na cettha vattabbaṃ “atīto”ti “tenā”ti ca imāni
anya-e0803n:1332_9: āpasaddassa “kaññāya cittānī”tiādīnaṃ viya itthinapuṃsakaliṅgarūpānaṃ abhāvato. Apica
anya-e0803n:1332_10: vohārakusalā tathāgatā tathāgatasāvakā ca, tehiyeva uttamapurisehi vohārakusalehi
anya-e0803n:1332_11: “atīto āpo”tiādinā vuttattāpi “atīto”ti “tenā”ti ca imāni liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttānīti
anya-e0803n:1332_12: na cintetabbāni, tasmā taṃsamānādhikaraṇo okārantabhāvena gahito āpasaddo ekavacananto
anya-e0803n:1332_13: pulliṅgo ceva yathāpayogaṃ ekavacanabahuvacanako cāti veditabbo “āpo, āpā. Āpaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1332_14: āpe”tiādinā yojetabbattā. Evaṃ vuttāni suttapadāni savinicchayāni sutvā addhā te
anya-e0803n:1333_0: Ettha koci vadeyya – pāḷiyaṃ pulliṅganayo ekavacananayo ca kiṃ aṭṭhakathāṭīkācariyehi
anya-e0803n:1333_1: na diṭṭho, ye āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanattaṃ vaṇṇesunti? No na diṭṭho, diṭṭhoyeva
anya-e0803n:1333_2: so nayo tehi. Yasmā pana te na kevalaṃ sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacaneyeva visāradā,
anya-e0803n:1333_3: atha kho sakalepi saddasatthe visāradā, tasmā saddasatthe attano paṇḍiccaṃ pakāsetuṃ,
anya-e0803n:1333_4: “saddasatthe ca īdiso nayo vutto”ti viññāpetuñca saddasatthanayaṃ gahetvā āpasaddassa
anya-e0803n:1333_5: itthiliṅgabahuvacanakattaṃ vaṇṇesunti natthi tesaṃ doso. Tathā hi mūlapariyāyasuttantaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1333_7: catubbidho āpo, tesū”tiādi, tasmā natthi tesaṃ doso. Pūjārahā hi te āyasmanto, namoyeva
anya-e0803n:1333_8: tesaṃ karoma, na tesaṃ vacanaṃ codanābhājanaṃ. Ye pana ujuvipaccanīkavādā daḷhameva
anya-e0803n:1333_9: āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanattaṃ mamāyanti, tesaṃyeva vacanaṃ codanābhājanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1333_10: Yasmā pana mayaṃ pāḷinayānusārena antadvayavato āpasaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgattañca
anya-e0803n:1333_11: vidadhāma, tasmā yo koci idaṃ vādaṃ madditvā aññaṃ vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ sakkhissatīti
anya-e0803n:1333_12: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, idañca pana ṭhānaṃ mahāgahanaṃ duppaṭivijjhanaṭṭhena, paramasukhumañca
anya-e0803n:1333_13: katañāṇasambhārehi paramasukhumañāṇehi paṇḍitehi vedanīyattā. Sabbamidañhi vacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1333_14: tesu tesu ṭhānesu atthabyañjanapariggahaṇe sotūnaṃ paramakosallajananatthañceva sāsane
anya-e0803n:1333_15: ādaraṃ akatvā saddasatthamatena kālaṃ vītināmentānaṃ sāthalikānaṃ pamādavihāranisedhanatthañca
anya-e0803n:1333_17: nītiyaṃ saddhāsampannehi kulaputtehi yogo karaṇīyo bhagavato sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1334_0: Yasmā pana pāḷito aṭṭhakathā balavatī nāma natthi, tasmā pāḷinayānurūpeneva āpasaddassa
anya-e0803n:1334_1: nāmikapadamālaṃ yojessāma sotūnamasammohatthaṃ, kimettha saddasatthanayo karissati.
anya-e0803n:1334_2: Atrāyaṃ udānapāḷi “kiṃ kayirā udapānena, āpā ce sabbadā siyu”nti.
anya-e0803n:1335: Āpo, āpā. Āpaṃ, āpe. Āpena, āpehi, āpebhi. Āpassa, āpānaṃ. Āpā, āpasmā, āpamhā, āpehi, āpebhi. Āpassa, āpānaṃ. Āpe, āpasmiṃ, āpamhi, āpesu. Bho āpa, bhavanto āpā.
anya-e0803n:1336: Sabbanāmādīhipi yojessāma – yo āpo, ye āpā. Yaṃ āpaṃ, ye āpe. Yena āpena, sesaṃ neyyaṃ, so āpo, te āpā. Atīto āpo, atītā āpā. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0803n:1338: Na sabbathāva gosaddo, purisena samo mato.
anya-e0803n:1340: Sarādī ekadesena, sabbathā vā samā matā.
anya-e0803n:1341: Ye panettha saddā “manogaṇo”ti vuttā, kathaṃ tesaṃ manogaṇabhāvo sallakkhetabboti? Vuccate tesaṃ manogaṇabhāvasallakkhaṇakāraṇaṃ –
anya-e0803n:1352_0: Atra tassatthassa sādhakāni payogāni sāsanato ca lokato ca yathārahamāharitvā dassessāma
anya-e0803n:1352_1: – manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā. Na mayhaṃ manaso piyo. Sādhukaṃ manasi
anya-e0803n:1352_2: karotha. Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā. Manoramaṃ, manodhātu, manomayena kāyena, iddhiyā
anya-e0803n:1352_3: upasaṅkami. Yo ve “dassa”nti vatvāna, adāne kurute mano. Vacasā paricitā. Vacaso vacasi.
anya-e0803n:1356: Esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi, sutvāna munino vaco.
anya-e0803n:1357_0: Sakhā ca mitto ca mamāsi sīvika, susikkhito sādhu karohi me vaco. Ekūnatiṃso vayasā
anya-e0803n:1357_1: subhadda. Vayaso, vayasi, vayovuddho, vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahanti. Jalantamiva tejasā.
anya-e0803n:1357_2: Tejaso, tejasi, tejodhātukusalo. Tejokasiṇaṃ. Tapasā uttamo, tapaso, tapasi, tapodhano,
anya-e0803n:1357_3: tapojigucchā. Kasmā bhavaṃ vijanamaraññanissito, tapo idha krubbasi brahmapattiyā.
anya-e0803n:1357_4: Cetasā aññāsi, evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi, etamatthaṃ cetasi sannidhāya, cetoparivitakkamaññāya.
anya-e0803n:1357_5: Cetopariyañāṇaṃ, ceto paricchindati, so parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca
anya-e0803n:1357_6: jānāti. Tamasā, tamaso, tamasi, tamonudo, tamoharo. Navāhametaṃ yasasā dadāmi. Yasaso,
anya-e0803n:1357_7: yasasi, yaso bhogasamappito. Yasoladdhākho panasmākaṃ bhogā. Yasodharā devī, yaso
anya-e0803n:1357_8: laddhā na majjeyya. Ayasāva malaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ. Ayaso, ayasi, ayopākārapariyantaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1357_9: ayasā paṭikujjitaṃ. Seyyo ayoguḷo bhutto, ayopatto, ayomayaṃ, ayo kantatīti ayokanto.
anya-e0803n:1357_10: Ghatena vā bhuñjassu payasā vā, sādhu khalu payaso pānaṃ yaññadattena, payasi ojā,
anya-e0803n:1357_11: payodharā, payonidhi. Sahassanetto sirasā paṭiggahi. Siraso, sirasi añjaliṃ katvā,
anya-e0803n:1357_12: vanditabbaṃ isiddhajaṃ. Siroruhā, siro chindati. Yo kāme parivajjeti, sappasseva
anya-e0803n:1357_13: padāsiro. Siro te vajjhayitvāna. Sarasā, saraso, tīṇi uppalajātāni, tasmiṃ sarasi
anya-e0803n:1357_14: brāhmaṇa. Saroruhaṃ. Yaṃ etā upasevanti, chandasāvā dhanenavā. Sāvittī chandaso mukhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1357_15: Chandasi, chandoviciti, chandobhaṅgo, urasā panudahissāmi, uraso, urasi jāyati, urasilomo,
anya-e0803n:1357_16: uromajjhe vijjhi. Rahasā, rahaso, rahasi, rahogato nisīditvā, evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadā.
anya-e0803n:1357_17: Ahasā, ahasi. Jāyanti tattha pārohā, ahorattānamaccayeti imāni payogāni. Ettha ca
anya-e0803n:1357_18: “manena, manassa, mane, manasmiṃ, manamhī”tiādīni ca “manaāyatanaṃ tamaparāyano ayapatto
anya-e0803n:1357_19: chandahānī”tiādīni ca “na manaṃ aññāsi. Yasaṃ laddhāna dummedho. “Siraṃ chindatī”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:1357_20: ca rūpāni manogaṇabhāvappakāsakāni na hontīti na dassitāni, na alabbhamānavasena,
anya-e0803n:1357_21: tasmātra imā ādito paṭṭhāya manogaṇabhāvavibhāvinī gāthāyo bhavanti –
anya-e0803n:1370: “Vaco sutvā, siro chindi, ayo kantati” iccapi;
anya-e0803n:1375: Sā so syantāni rūpāni, sandissanti manogaṇe;
anya-e0803n:1377: Idaṃ manogaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Evaṃ manogaṇalakkhaṇaṃ anākulaṃ niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ samuddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1387_0: Seyyathidaṃ? “Bilaṃ padaṃ mukha”miccādayo. Tesaṃ rūpāni bhavanti – bilasā, bilaso,
anya-e0803n:1387_1: bilasi, bilagato, bilaṃ pāvisi. Padasāva agamāsi, tīṇi padavārāni, mākāsi mukhasā
anya-e0803n:1387_2: pāpaṃ, mukhagataṃ bhojanaṃ chaḍḍāpeti. Saccena danto damasā upeto. Rasavaraṃ rasamayaṃ
anya-e0803n:1390: Nā sa smiṃvisaye sāso-syantā pana na hontihi.
anya-e0803n:1395_0: Seyyathidaṃ? “Āpo vāyo sarado”iccevamādayo. Tesaṃ rūpāni bhavanti – āpodhātu, vāyodhātu,
anya-e0803n:1395_1: āpokasiṇaṃ, vāyokasiṇaṃ, āpomayaṃ, vāyomayaṃ, jīva tvaṃ saradosataṃ, saradakālo.
anya-e0803n:1395_2: Āpena, āpassa, āpe, āpasmiṃ, āpamhi. Vāyena, vāyassa, vāye, vāyasmiṃ, vāyamhi. Saradena,
anya-e0803n:1395_3: saradassa, sarade, saradasmiṃ, saradamhi. Āpaṃ āpato sañjānāti. Vāyaṃ vāyato sañjānāti.
anya-e0803n:1396: Keci panettha vadeyyuṃ “nanu sāsane vāyasaddo viya vāyusaddopi manogaṇādīsu icchitabbo”ti? Ettha vuccate –
anya-e0803n:1403: Yathā hi āyusaddassa, rūpaṃ dissati sāgamaṃ;
anya-e0803n:1405: Na tathā vāyusaddassa, rūpaṃ dissati sāgamaṃ;
anya-e0803n:1407: Tathā hi “vāyati iti, vāyo” iti garū vaduṃ;
anya-e0803n:1409: Yattha pathavī ca āpo ca, tejo vāyo na gādhati;
anya-e0803n:1411: Idampi manogaṇādikalakkhaṇaṃ. Ettha manogaṇādikā dvidhā bhijjanti bila padādito āpādito ca. Evaṃ manogaṇādikalakkhaṇaṃ anākulaṃ niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ samuddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1413: Ye ca nāvisaye sontā, ye ca smāvisaye siyuṃ;
anya-e0803n:1415_0: Ke te? Atthabyañjanakkharasaddādayo ceva dīghorasaddā ca. Etesu hi atthasaddādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1415_1: nāvacanaṭṭhāne “atthaso byañjanaso akkharaso suttaso upāyaso sabbaso ṭhānaso”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:1415_2: sontāni rūpāni bhavanti. Dīghorasaddānaṃ pana smāvacanaṭṭhāne “dīghaso oraso”ti sontāni
anya-e0803n:1417: Sabbathā vinimuttā ye, sā so syantādibhāvato;
anya-e0803n:1419: Ke te? “Puriso kaññā citta”miccādayo. Idampi amanogaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. Evaṃ amanogaṇalakkhaṇaṃ anākulaṃ niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ samuddiṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1420_0: Evaṃ dassitesu manogaṇalakkhaṇādīsu koci vadeyya “yadidaṃ tumhehi vuttaṃ ‘ye samāsādibhāvamhi,
anya-e0803n:1420_1: majjhokārāva honti tū’tiādinā manogaṇādikalakkhaṇaṃ, tena “parosataṃ gomayaṃ godhano”iccādīsu
anya-e0803n:1420_2: goparasaddādayopi manogaṇādikabhāvaṃ āpajjantīti? Nāpajjanti. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā –
anya-e0803n:1425: Tasmā nāpajjanti. Iti sabbathāpi amanogaṇalakkhaṇaṃ nissesato dassitaṃ. Iccevaṃ manogaṇavibhāvanāyaṃ manogaṇo manogaṇādiko amanogaṇo cāti tidhā bhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:1426_0: Tattha manogaṇe pariyāpannasaddānaṃ samāsaṃ patvā “abyaggamanaso naro, thiracetasaṃ
anya-e0803n:1426_1: kulaṃ, saddheyyavacasā upāsikātiādinā liṅgattayavasena aññathāpi rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:1426_2: Ettha pana keci evaṃ vadanti “yadā manasaddo sakatthe avattitvā ‘abyaggo mano yassa
anya-e0803n:1426_3: soyaṃ abyaggamanaso, alīno mano yassa soyaṃ alīnamanaso’ti evaṃ aññatthe vattati,
anya-e0803n:1426_4: tadā purisanayeneva nāmikapadamālā labbhati, na manogaṇanayenā”ti. Taṃ na gahetabbaṃ
anya-e0803n:1426_5: ubhinnampi yathārahaṃ labbhanato. Tathā hi visuddhimagge puggalāpekkhanavasena “khantisoraccamettādi-guṇabhūsitacetaso.
anya-e0803n:1426_6: Ajjhesanaṃ gahetvānā”ti ettha manogaṇanayo dissati. Taṭṭīkāyampi “ajjhesito dāṭhānāga-ttherena
anya-e0803n:1426_7: thiracetasā”ti manogaṇanayo dissati, tasmā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Evaṃ vadantā
anya-e0803n:1426_8: ca te abyaggamanasaddādīnaṃ abyaggamanasaiccādinā sakārantapakatibhāvena ṭhapetabbabhāvaṃ
anya-e0803n:1426_9: vibbhantamativasena cintetvā sabbāsu vibhattīsu, dvīsu ca vacanesu purisanayena yojetabbataṃ
anya-e0803n:1426_11: nasiyuṃ, aññāniyeva anabhimatāni rūpāni siyuṃ. Yasmā siyuṃ, tasmā evaṃ aggahetvā
anya-e0803n:1427_0: Yattha hi samāsavasena manasaddo cetasaddādayo ca sakatthe avattitvā aññatthe vattanti,
anya-e0803n:1427_1: tattha sakārāgamānaṃ padānaṃ nāmikapadamālā purisanayena ca manogaṇe mananayena ca
anya-e0803n:1427_2: yathārahaṃ labbhati. Nissakārāgamānaṃ pana purisanayeneva labbhati. Yattha pana samāsavisayeyeva
anya-e0803n:1427_3: manādisaddā sakatthe vattanti, tattha nissakārāgamānaṃ nāmikapadamālā purisanayena
anya-e0803n:1428_0: Idāni imassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ, saddagatīsu ca viññūnaṃ kosalluppādanatthaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1428_1: padānaṃ padamālā tidhā katvā dassayissāma – “byāsatto mano yassa soyaṃ byāsattamanaso
anya-e0803n:1429_0: Byāsattamanaso naro, byāsattamanasā narā. Byāsattamanasaṃ naraṃ, byāsattamanase nare.
anya-e0803n:1429_1: Byāsattamanasā, byāsattamanena narena, byāsattamanehi, byāsattamanebhi narehi. Byāsattamanaso,
anya-e0803n:1429_2: byāsattamanassa narassa, byāsattamanānaṃ narānaṃ. Byāsattamanā, byāsattamanasmā,
anya-e0803n:1429_3: byāsattamanamhā narā, byāsattamanehi, byāsattamanebhi narehi. Byāsattamanaso, byāsattamanassa
anya-e0803n:1429_4: narassa, byāsattamanānaṃ narānaṃ. Byāsattamanasi, byāsattamane, byāsattamanasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:1429_5: byāsattamanamhi nare, byāsattamanesu naresu. Bho byāsattamanasa nara, bhavanto byāsattamanasā
anya-e0803n:1430_0: Evaṃ sakārāgamassa labbhamānālabbhamānatā vavatthapetabbā. Ettha hi paṭhamādutiyāvibhattīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1430_1: ekavacanabahuvacanaṭṭhāne ca tatiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsattamīnaṃ ekavacanaṭṭhāne ca yathārahaṃ
anya-e0803n:1430_2: sāgamo bhavati ādesasaravibhattisaraparattā. Ayañca nayo sukhumo sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0803n:1431_0: Aparo nayo – “byāsatto mano yassa soyaṃ byāsattamano”ti evampi puggalāpekkhakassa
anya-e0803n:1431_1: imassa padassa “byāsattamano naro, byāsattamanā narā. Byāsattamanaṃ nara”ntiādinā
anya-e0803n:1431_2: purisanayeneva nāmikapadamālā bhavati. Ettha pana sabbathāpi sāgamo natthi. Aparopi
anya-e0803n:1431_3: nayo – “byāsatto ca so mano cāti byāsattamano”ti evaṃ cittāpekkhakassapi imassa padassa
anya-e0803n:1431_5: manogaṇe mananayena nāmikapadamālā bhavati, ettha pana tatiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsattamīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1431_6: ekavacanaṭṭhāneyeva sāgamo bhavati ādesasaraparattā. Yathā ca ettha, evaṃ “alīnamanaso
anya-e0803n:1432_0: Napuṃsakaliṅge pana vattabbe “byāsattamanasaṃ kulaṃ, byāsattamanāni kulāni. Byāsattamanasaṃ
anya-e0803n:1432_1: kulaṃ, byāsattamanāni kulāni. Byāsattamanasā kulenā”tiādinā nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1432_3: sāgamo bhavati ādesasaravibhattisaraparattā, ayampi nayo sukhumo sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0803n:1433_0: Itthiliṅge pana vattabbe “byāsattamanasā itthī”ti evaṃ paṭhamekavacanaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e0803n:1433_1: sāgamaṃ vatvā tato “byāsattamanā, byāsattamanāyo itthiyo. Byāsattamanaṃ itthi”nti
anya-e0803n:1433_2: kaññānayena yojetabbā. “Evaṃ saddheyyavacasā upāsikā, saddheyyavacāyo upāsikāyo.
anya-e0803n:1433_4: pana cittakaññānayena yojetabbā. Ettha pana sabbathāpi sāgamo natthi.
anya-e0803n:1434_0: Sotūnaṃ ñāṇappabhedajananatthaṃ aparāpi nāmikapadamālāyo dassayissāma sahanibbacanena
anya-e0803n:1434_1: – mano eva mānasaṃ, samussāhitaṃ mānasaṃ yassa soyaṃ samussāhitamānaso. “Samussāhitamānaso,
anya-e0803n:1434_3: purisanayena yojetabbā. Sundarā medhā assa atthīti sumedhaso. “Sumedhaso, sumedhasā.
anya-e0803n:1434_4: Sumedhasaṃ, sumedhase. Sumedhasenā”ti purisanayena, evaṃ “bhūrimedhaso”tiādīnampi. Tatrime payogā –
anya-e0803n:1436: Kiṃ nu tamhā vippavasi, muhuttamapi piṅgiya;
anya-e0803n:1440_0: Itthiliṅge vattabbe “samussāhitamānasā sumedhasā”ti rūpāni, napuṃsake vattabbe “samussāhitamānasaṃ
anya-e0803n:1440_1: sumedhasa”nti rūpāni, kaññā cittanayena etesaṃ padamālā yojetabbā. Okārantapulliṅgaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n:1440_2: itthiliṅgādivinicchayo nayappakāsanatthaṃ kato. Visesato hi okārantakathāyeva idhādhippetā.
anya-e0803n:1440_3: Apica loke nīti nāma nānappakārehi kathitā eva sobhati, ayañca sāsane nīti, tasmā
anya-e0803n:1443: Viseso tesu kesañci, pāḷiyaṃ yo padissati;
anya-e0803n:1449_0: Tatra kānici suttapadāni dassessāma – natthi attakāre, natthi parakāre, natthi purisakāre,
anya-e0803n:1449_1: pariyantakate saṃsāre, jīve sattame, na hevaṃ vattabbe, bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā
anya-e0803n:1449_2: saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissantīti. Imāni ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:1450_0: Ye pana “vanappagumbeti paccattavacanassa bhummavacananiddeso”ti vadanti, te vattabbā
anya-e0803n:1450_2: odanaṃ pacatī’ti ettha viya ādhārasutisambhavato ‘gimhāna māse paṭhamasmiṃ gimhe’ti
anya-e0803n:1450_3: idaṃ kataratthaṃ jotetī”ti? Te vadeyyuṃ “na mayaṃ bho ‘vanappagumbeti idaṃ bhummavacana’nti
anya-e0803n:1450_4: vadāma, atha kho ‘paccattavacanassa bhummavacananiddeso’ti vadāmā”ti. Evampi dosoyeva
anya-e0803n:1450_5: tumhākaṃ, nanu “saṅghe gotami dehī”ti etthāpi sampadānavacanassa bhummavacananiddesoti
anya-e0803n:1450_6: vuttepi saṅghassa dānakriyāya ādhārabhāvato “saṅghe”ti vacanaṃ suṇantānaṃ ādhārasuti
anya-e0803n:1450_7: ca ādhāraparikappo ca hotiyeva. Na hi sakkā evaṃ pavattaṃ cittaṃ nivāretuṃ, tasmā
anya-e0803n:1450_8: ettha evaṃ pana viseso gahetabbo “paccattavacanassapi katthaci bhummavacanassa viya
anya-e0803n:1450_9: rūpaṃ hotī”ti. Evañhi gahite na koci virodho. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu niruttippabhedakusalo
anya-e0803n:1450_10: lokānukampako bhagavā paccattavacanavasena niddisitabbe sati evaṃ aniddisitvā lokassa
anya-e0803n:1450_11: sammohamuppādayanto viya kathaṃ bhummavacananiddesaṃ karissati, tasmā saddasāmaññalesamattaṃ
anya-e0803n:1450_12: gahetvā “bhummavacananiddeso”ti na vattabbaṃ. Yadi saddasāmaññaṃ gahetvā bhummavacananiddesaṃ
anya-e0803n:1451_0: Apica tatheva “attakāre”ti paccattavacanassa bhummavacananiddese sati ādhārasutisambhavato
anya-e0803n:1451_1: “attakārasmiṃ kiñci vatthu natthī”ti anadhippeto attho siyā, na pana “attakāro natthī”ti
anya-e0803n:1451_3: avattabbattā dosoyeva siyā, atthisaddādīnaṃ viya pana natthisaddassapi paṭhamāya
anya-e0803n:1451_4: yogato “attakāre”ti idaṃ paccattavacanamevāti viññāyati. “Bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā
anya-e0803n:1451_6: vā “upayogavacananiddeso”ti vā gahaṇe sati “bālā ca paṇḍitā cā”ti ettakampi vattuṃ
anya-e0803n:1451_7: ajānanadoso siyā, “karissantī”ti padayogato pana “bāle cā”tiādi paccattavacanamevāti
anya-e0803n:1451_8: viññāyati. Yathā pana niggahītāgamavasenuccārite “cakkhuṃ udapādī”ti pade paccattavacanassa
anya-e0803n:1451_9: “cakkhuṃ me dehi yācito”ti ettha upayogavacanena sutivasena samānattepi paccattavacanatthoyeva
anya-e0803n:1451_10: sotāre paṭibhāti “udapādī”tiākhyātena kathitattā, na pana vibhattivipallāsatthabhūto
anya-e0803n:1451_12: vuttakāle ko “cakkhuṃ udapādī”ti padaṃ parivattitvā atthamācikkhati, tathā “bāle
anya-e0803n:1451_14: sutivasena samānattepi paccattavacanatthoyeva sotāre paṭibhāti, na itaravacanattho
anya-e0803n:1451_15: yathāpayogaṃ atthassa gahetabbattā. Iti “vanappagumbe, bāle, paṇḍite”tiādīnaṃ suddhapaccattavacanattaññeva
anya-e0803n:1457_0: Imassa kāmanītajātakassa saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “kekake cāti paccatte upayogavacanaṃ, tena
anya-e0803n:1457_1: kekakassa raṭṭhaṃ dassetī”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ vadanto ca so “purise passati, purise patiṭṭhita”nti,
anya-e0803n:1457_2: “passāmi loke sadhane manusse”ti ca ādīsu yebhuyyena “purise, loke, sadhane, manusse”tiādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1457_4: pana apākaṭattā yebhuyyappavattiṃ sandhāya “idampi tādisamevā”ti maññamāno vadati
anya-e0803n:1457_5: maññe. Ācariyā hi katthaci attano ruciyāpi visuṃ visuṃ kathenti. Ayaṃ pana amhākaṃ
anya-e0803n:1457_6: ruci – “kekake”ti idaṃ paccattavacanameva “pañcālā, kuruyo”ti sahajātapadāni viya,
anya-e0803n:1457_7: raṭṭhavācakattā pana “kuruyo”ti padamiva bahuvacanavasena vuttaṃ. Na hi bhagavā “khattiyo,
anya-e0803n:1457_8: brāhmaṇo, vesso”tiādīsu viya samānavibhattīhi niddisitabbesu sahajātapadesu pacchimaṃ
anya-e0803n:1457_9: upayogavacanavasena niddiseyya, yutti ca na dissati “pañcālā”ti, “kuruyo”ti paccattavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1457_10: vatvā “kekake”ti upayogavacanassa vacane, tasmā “kekake”ti idaṃ paccattavacanameva.
anya-e0803n:1457_11: Tathā hi sandhivisodhanavidhāyako ācariyo tādisānaṃ padānaṃ paccattavacanattaññeva
anya-e0803n:1457_12: vibhāvento sāmaṃ kate pakaraṇe “vanappagumbo vanappagumbe, sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ jīvo, sukhe
anya-e0803n:1457_13: dukkhe jīve”ti āha, ṭīkāyampi ca tesaṃ paccattavacanabhāvameva vibhāvento “vanappagumbo,
anya-e0803n:1457_14: sukhaṃ, dukkhaṃ, jīvo”ti sādhanīyaṃ rūpaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā niggahītalopavasena akārokārānañca
anya-e0803n:1457_15: ekārādesavasena “vanappagumbe, sukhe, dukkhe, jīve”ti rūpanipphattimāha. Sā pāḷinayānu
anya-e0803n:1457_16: kūlā. Kaccāyanācariyenapi pāḷinayaṃ nissāya “dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe”ti paccattabahuvacanapadaṃ
anya-e0803n:1457_17: vuttaṃ. Tenāha vuttiyaṃ “dve padāni tulyādhikaraṇānī”ti. “Dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe”ti
anya-e0803n:1457_18: ca idaṃ “aṭṭha nāgāvāsasatānī”ti vattabbe “aṭṭha nāgāvāsasate”ti padamiva vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1458_0: Keci pana tesaṃ bhummekavacanattaṃ icchanti. Tattha yadi “vanappagumbe”ti paccatte
anya-e0803n:1458_1: bhummavacanaṃ, “kekake”ti ca paccatte upayogavacanaṃ, “esese eke ekaṭṭhe”ti ettha
anya-e0803n:1458_2: “esese”ti imānipi paccatte bhummavacanāni vā siyuṃ, upayogavacanāni vā. Yathetāni
anya-e0803n:1458_3: evaṃvidhāni na honti, suddhapaccattavacanāniyeva honti, tathā “vanappagumbe, kekake”tiādīnipi
anya-e0803n:1458_4: tathāvidhāni na honti, suddhapaccattavacanāniyeva honti. Iccevaṃ sabbathāpi “vanappagumbe,
anya-e0803n:1458_5: bāle, paṇḍite, kekake”ti, “viratte kosiyāyane, aṭṭha nāgāvāsasate, ke purise, esese”ti
anya-e0803n:1458_8: bhavatīti avassamidaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Evaṃ “vanappagumbe, bāle, paṇḍite”tiādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1458_9: suddhapaccattavacanatā atīva sukhumā dubbiññeyyā, saddhena kulaputtena ācariye payirupāsitvā
anya-e0803n:1458_10: tadupadesaṃ sakkaccaṃ gahetvā jānitabbā. Buddhavacanasmiñhi saddato ca atthato ca
anya-e0803n:1458_11: adhippāyato ca akkharacintakānaṃ ñāṇacakkhusammuyhanaṭṭhānabhūtā pāḷinayā vividhā dissanti.
anya-e0803n:1459_0: Tattha saddato tāva idaṃ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṃ – “virattā kosiyāyanī”ti vattabbe “viratte
anya-e0803n:1459_1: kosiyāyane”ti itthiliṅgapaccattavacanaṃ dissati, “ko puriso”ti vattabbe “ke purise”ti
anya-e0803n:1459_2: sabbanāmikapaccattavacanaṃ dissati, “kinnāmo te upajjhāyo”ti vattabbe “konāmo te
anya-e0803n:1459_3: upajjhāyo”ti samāsapadaṃ pulliṅgavisayaṃ dissati. Kiṃ nāmaṃ etassāti konāmoti hi
anya-e0803n:1459_4: samāso. Tena “konāmā itthī, konāmaṃ kula”nti ayampi nayo gahetabbo. “Kva te balaṃ
anya-e0803n:1459_5: mahārājā”ti vattabbe “ko te balaṃ mahārājā”ti ettha kvasaddena īsakaṃ samānasutiko
anya-e0803n:1459_6: sattamiyanto kosaddo dissati, kva kosaddā hi aññamaññamīsakasamānasutikā. Tathā “idha
anya-e0803n:1459_7: hemantagimhesu, idha hemantagimhisu, na tenatthaṃ abandhi so, na tenatthaṃ abandhisū”ti
anya-e0803n:1460_0: Atthato pana idaṃ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṃ – “yaṃ na kañcanadvepiñcha, andhena tamasā gata”nti
anya-e0803n:1460_1: ettha nakāro “kata”nti iminā sambandhitabbo. Na katanti kataṃ viyāti attho. Ettha
anya-e0803n:1460_2: hi nakāro upamāne vattati, na paṭisedhe.
anya-e0803n:1466_0: Adhippāyato idaṃ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṃ – “taṇhaṃ asmimānaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo dvādasāyatananissitaṃ
anya-e0803n:1466_1: nandirāgañca hantvā brāhmaṇo anīgho yātī”ti vattabbepi tathā avatvā tamevatthaṃ gahetvā aññena pariyāyena
anya-e0803n:1467: “Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā, rājāno dve ca khattiye;
anya-e0803n:1468: Raṭṭhaṃ sānucaraṃ hantvā, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo”ti
anya-e0803n:1470: “Vanaṃ chindatha mā rukkhaṃ, vanato jāyate bhayaṃ;
anya-e0803n:1471: Chetvā vanañca vanathaṃ, nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo”ti
anya-e0803n:1472: Evamādīnipi aññāni yojetabbāni. Evaṃ buddhavacane saddato ca atthato ca adhippāyato ca akkharacintakānaṃ ñāṇacakkhusammuyhanaṭṭhānabhūtā pāḷinayā vividhā dissanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0803n:1474: Yebhuyyena hi lokanītividhurā pāṭhe nayā vijjare;
anya-e0803n:1475: Paṇḍiccampi pahāya bāhiragataṃ ettheva tasmā budho,
anya-e0803n:1477_0: Evaṃ pāḷinayānaṃ dubbiññeyyattā “vanappagumbe, bāle ca, paṇḍite cā”tiādīnaṃ suddhapaccattavacanattaññeva
anya-e0803n:1477_1: sārato paccetabbaṃ, na sutisāmaññena bhummopayogavacanattaṃ bhummopayogavacanehi
anya-e0803n:1477_2: tesaṃ samānasutikattepi paccattajotakattā. Samānasutikāpi hi saddā atthappakaraṇaliṅgasaddantarābhisambandhādivasena
anya-e0803n:1477_3: atthavisesajotakā bhavanti. Taṃ yathā? “Sīho gāyatī”ti vutte “evaṃnāmako puriso”ti
anya-e0803n:1477_4: attho viññāyati. “Sīho naṅguṭṭhaṃ cāletī”ti vutte pana “migarājā”ti viññāyati. Evaṃ
anya-e0803n:1477_5: atthavasena samānasutikānaṃ atthavisesajotanaṃ bhavati. Saṅgāme ṭhatvā “sindhavamānehī”ti
anya-e0803n:1477_6: vutte “asso”ti viññāyati. Rogisālāyaṃ pana “sindhavamānehī”ti vutte “lavaṇa”nti viññāyati.
anya-e0803n:1477_7: Evaṃ pakaraṇavasena samānasutikānaṃ atthavisesajotanaṃ bhavati. “Issā”ti vutte “evaṃnāmikā
anya-e0803n:1477_8: dhammajātī”ti viññāyati. “Isso”ti vutte pana “acchamigo”ti viññāyati. Evaṃ liṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:1477_9: ekadesasamānasutikānaṃ atthavisesajotanaṃ bhavati. Ettha pana kiñcāpi “devadattaṃ
anya-e0803n:1477_10: pakkosa ghaṭadhārakaṃ daṇḍadhāraka”ntiādīsupi ghaṭadaṇḍādīni liṅgaṃ, tathāpi samānasutikādhikārattā
anya-e0803n:1478_0: “Issā uppajjatī”ti ca “issā purisamanubandhiṃsū”ti ca vutte pana sabbathā samānasutikānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1478_2: migarājā sāyanhasamayaṃ āsayā nikkhamatī”ti vutte “migādhipo kesarasīho”ti viññāyati.
anya-e0803n:1478_3: “Sīho samaṇuddeso, sīho senāpatī”ti ca vutte pana “sīho nāma sāmaṇero, sīho nāma
anya-e0803n:1478_4: senāpatī”ti viññāyati. Evampi saddantarābhisambandhavasena samānasutikānaṃ atthavisesajotanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1478_5: bhavati. “Addasaṃsu kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū vihāraṃ paṭisaṅkharonte”ti
anya-e0803n:1478_7: bhavati. Tathā “siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavocā”ti
anya-e0803n:1478_9: bhavati, tasmā “vanappagumbe yatha phussitagge”tiādīni bhummopayogavacanehi sadisattepisaddantarābhisambandhavasena
anya-e0803n:1478_10: suddhapaccattavacanānīti gahetabbāni. Paccattekavacanabahuvacanānaṃ eva hi ekārādesavasena
anya-e0803n:1478_11: evaṃvidhāni rūpāni bhavanti bhummopayogavacanāni viyāti. Nanu ca bho evaṃvidhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1478_12: rūpānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ dissanato ‘ekārantampi pulliṅgaṃ atthī’ti vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1478_13: okārantabhāvogadharūpavisesattā tesaṃ rūpānaṃ. Ādesavasena hi siddhattā visuṃ ekārantapulliṅgaṃ
anya-e0803n:1478_14: nāma natthi, tasmā pulliṅgānaṃ yathāvuttasattavidhatāyeva gahetabbāti.
anya-e0803n:1479_0: Keci pana vadeyyuṃ “yāyaṃ purisasaddanayaṃ gahetvā ‘bhūto, bhūtā. Bhūta’ntiādinā
anya-e0803n:1479_1: sabbesamokārantapadānaṃ nāmikapadamālā vibhattā, tattha catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni
anya-e0803n:1479_2: rūpāni kimatthaṃ na vuttānī”ti? Visesadassanatthaṃ. Tādisāni hi catutthekavacanarūpāni
anya-e0803n:1479_4: vibhattivipariṇāme, tadatthe cā”ti saṅkhepato imesu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu, pabhedato
anya-e0803n:1479_5: pana sattasu ṭhānesu dissanti. Dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede pana yattha katthaci
anya-e0803n:1479_6: sampadānavisaye na dissanti, iti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ na vuttānīti. Nanu dānakriyāyoge
anya-e0803n:1479_8: saddanītippakaraṇe “purisāya, bhūtāyā”tiādīni vattabbāni, evaṃ sante kasmā “dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede
anya-e0803n:1479_9: pana yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye na dissantī”ti vuttanti? Apāḷinayattā. “Abhirūpāya
anya-e0803n:1479_10: kaññā deyyā”ti ayañhi saddasatthato āgato nayo, na buddhavacanato. Buddhavacanañhi
anya-e0803n:1479_11: patvā “abhirūpassa kaññā deyyā”ti padarūpaṃ bhavissatīti. Nanu ca bho namoyogādīsupi
anya-e0803n:1479_12: catutthekavacanassa āyādeso dissatīti. Sāsanāvacarāpi hi nipuṇā paṇḍitā “namo buddhāyā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:1486_0: “Naro naraṃ yācati kiñci vatthuṃ, narena dūto pahito narāyā”ti ca gāthāracanampi
anya-e0803n:1486_1: kubbantīti? Saccaṃ, sāsanāvacarāpi nipuṇā paṇḍitā “namo buddhāyā”tiādīnivatvā ratanattayaṃ
anya-e0803n:1486_2: vandanti, gāthāracanampi kubbanti, evaṃ santepi te saddasatthe kataparicayavasena
anya-e0803n:1486_3: saddasatthato nayaṃ gahetvā tathārūpā gāthāpi cuṇṇiyapadānipi abhisaṅkharonti, “namo
anya-e0803n:1486_4: buddhāyā”tiādīni vatvā ratanattayaṃ vandanti. Ye pana saddasatthe akataparicayā antamaso
anya-e0803n:1486_5: bāladārakā, tepi aññesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā kataparicayavasena “namo buddhāyā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:1486_6: vatvā ratanattayaṃ vandanti, “namo buddhassā”ti vadantā pana appakatarā. Katthaci
anya-e0803n:1486_7: hi padese kumārake akkharasamayaṃ uggaṇhāpentā garū akkharānamādimhi “namo buddhāyā”ti
anya-e0803n:1486_8: sikkhāpenti, na pana “namo buddhassā”ti, evaṃ santepi pāḷinaye porāṇaṭṭhakathānaye
anya-e0803n:1486_9: ca upaparikkhiyamāne ṭhapetvā gatyatthakammādiṭṭhānacatukkaṃ, pabhedato sattaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1486_10: vā dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye catutthekavacanassa
anya-e0803n:1486_11: āyādesasahitāni rūpāni na dissanti, tasmā kehici abhisaṅkhatāni “namo buddhāya, buddhāya
anya-e0803n:1486_12: dānaṃ dentī”ti padāni pāḷiṃ patvā “namo buddhassa, buddhassa dānaṃ dentī”ti aññarūpāni
anya-e0803n:1486_13: bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana pāḷinayaaṭṭhakathānayānurūpena āyādesassa payogaracanā
anya-e0803n:1486_14: – “buddhāya saraṇaṃ gacchati, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchatī”ti vā, “buddhāya nagaraṃ nenti,
anya-e0803n:1486_15: buddhaṃ nagaraṃ nentī”ti vā, “buddhāya sakkato dhammo, buddhena sakkato dhammo”ti
anya-e0803n:1486_16: vā, “buddhāya jīvitaṃ pariccajati, buddhassa atthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajatī”ti vā, “buddhāya
anya-e0803n:1486_17: apenti aññatitthiyā, buddhasmā apenti aññatitthiyā”ti vā, “buddhāya dhammatā, buddhassa
anya-e0803n:1486_18: dhammatā”ti vā, “buddhāya pasanno, buddhe pasanno”ti vā iti pabhedato imaṃ sattaṭhānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1486_19: vivajjetvā aññattha āyādeso na dissati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n:1489_0: Ettha mahānamakkārapāṭho nāma “namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti
anya-e0803n:1489_1: pāṭho. Atrāpi āyādeso na dissati. Vammikasuttepi “namo karohi nāgassā”ti evaṃ āyādeso
anya-e0803n:1489_2: na dissati. Ambaṭṭhasuttepi “sotthi bhadante hotu rañño, sotthi janapadassa”. Evaṃ āyādeso na dissati.
anya-e0803n:1494: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ buddhagatā satī”ti
anya-e0803n:1495_0: Imissā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sammādiṭṭhikassa putto guḷaṃ khipamāno buddhānussatiṃ
anya-e0803n:1495_1: āvajjetvā ‘namo buddhassā’ti vatvā guḷaṃ khipatī”ti āyādesavajjito saddaracanāviseso
anya-e0803n:1495_3: khipitvāpi kāsetvāpi ‘namo buddhassā’ti tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa namakkāraṃ karosī”ti
anya-e0803n:1495_4: āyādesavajjito saddaracanāviseso dissati. Tathā tattha tattha “buddhappamukhassa
anya-e0803n:1495_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ deti. Tassa purisassa bhattaṃ na ruccati. Samaṇassa rocate
anya-e0803n:1495_6: saccaṃ, buddhassa chattaṃ dhāreti, buddhassa silāghate”tiādinā āyādesavivajjito saddaracanāviseso
anya-e0803n:1495_7: dissati. Evaṃ dānarocanādīsu bahūsu sampadānavisayesu catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitaṃ rūpaṃ na dissati.
anya-e0803n:1496_0: Gatyatthakammādīsu pana catūsu ṭhānesu dissati. Tathā hi “mūlāya paṭikasseyya, appo
anya-e0803n:1496_1: saggāya gacchatī”ti cettha gatyatthakammani dissati. Ettha hi “mūlaṃ paṭikasseyya,
anya-e0803n:1496_2: appo saggaṃ gacchatī”ti ca attho. “Paṭikasseyyā”ti cettha kasa gatiyanti dhātussa
anya-e0803n:1496_3: patiupasaggena visesitattā “ākaḍḍheyyā”ti attho bhavati. “Ayaṃ puriso mama atthakāmo,
anya-e0803n:1496_4: yo maṃ gahetvāna dakāya netī”ti ettha nayanatthakammani dissati. Ettha hi maṃ udakaṃ
anya-e0803n:1496_5: neti, attano vasanakasobbhaṃ pāpetīti attho. “Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā”ti
anya-e0803n:1496_6: ettha vibhattivipariṇāme dissati. Mama vacanato viramathāti hi nissakkavacanavasena
anya-e0803n:1496_7: attho. “Mahāgaṇāya bhattā me”ti etthāpi vibhattivipariṇāme dissati. Mama mahato haṃsagaṇassa
anya-e0803n:1496_8: bhattāti hi sāmivacanavasena attho. Mama haṃsarājāti cettha adhippāyo. “Asakkatā
anya-e0803n:1496_9: casma dhanañcayāyā”ti etthāpi vibhattivipariṇāme dissati. Mayaṃ dhanañcayassa rañño
anya-e0803n:1496_10: asakkatā ca bhavāmāti hi kattutthe sāmivacanaṃ. Tathā hi “dhanañcayassā”ti vā “dhanañcayenā”ti
anya-e0803n:1496_11: vā vattabbe evaṃ avatvā “dhanañcayāyā”ti sampadānavacanaṃ dānakriyādikassa sampadānavisayassa
anya-e0803n:1496_12: abhāvato vibhattivipariṇāmeyeva yujjati, tasmā dhanañcayarājena mayaṃ asakkatā ca
anya-e0803n:1496_13: bhavāmāti attho gahetabbo. Aññampi vibhattivipariṇāmaṭṭhānaṃ maggitabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1497_0: “Virāgāya upasamāya nirodhāyā”tiādīni pana anekasahassāni āyādesasahitāni saddarūpāni
anya-e0803n:1497_1: tadatthe pavattanti. Aṭṭhakathācariyāpi hi dhammavinayasaddatthaṃ vaṇṇentā “dhammānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1497_2: vinayāya. Anavajjadhammatthañhesa vinayo, na bhavabhogādiattha”nti tadatthavaseneva
anya-e0803n:1497_3: āyādesasahitaṃ saddarūpaṃ payuñjiṃsu, evaṃ catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni
anya-e0803n:1497_4: gatyatthakammani nayanatthakammani vibhattivipariṇāme tadatthe cāti imesu catūsuyeva
anya-e0803n:1497_5: ṭhānesu dissanti, na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye. Tathā
anya-e0803n:1497_6: hi niruttipiṭake “atthāyāti sampadānavacana”nti āyādesasahitaṃ saddarūpaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1497_7: purisasaddādivasena pana tādisāni rūpāni na vuttāni tādisānaṃ saddarūpānaṃ yattha
anya-e0803n:1497_8: katthaci appavattanato. Kaccāyanappakaraṇepi hi “āya catutthekavacanassa tū”ti lakkhaṇassa
anya-e0803n:1497_9: vuttiyaṃ “atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna”nti vuttaṃ. “Purisāyā”ti vā “samaṇāyā”ti
anya-e0803n:1498_0: Ettha siyā – nanu bho tasseva vuttiyaṃ “catutthīti kimatthaṃ purisassa mukhaṃ. Ekavacanassāti
anya-e0803n:1498_1: kimatthaṃ purisānaṃ dadāti. Vāti kimatthaṃ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā”ti
anya-e0803n:1498_2: vuttattā “purisāya samaṇāya brāhmaṇāyā”tiādīni padarūpāni nayato dassitāni, kevalaṃ
anya-e0803n:1498_3: pana mukhasaddayogato bahuvacanabhāvato vikappanato ca “purisāyā”tiādīni na sijjhanti,
anya-e0803n:1498_4: mukhasaddayogādivirahite pana ṭhāne avassaṃ sijjhantīti? Ettha vuccate – “catutthīti
anya-e0803n:1498_5: kimatthaṃ purisassa mukha”nti vadanto “sace āyādeso bhaveyya, catutthiyā eva bhavati,
anya-e0803n:1498_6: na chaṭṭhiyā”ti dassento “mukha”nti padaṃ dassesi, na ca tena “mukhasaddaṭṭhāne detītiādike
anya-e0803n:1498_7: sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade ṭhite āyādeso hotī”ti dasseti. “Ekavacanassāti kimatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:1498_8: purisānaṃ dadātī”ti vadantopi “ekavacanasseva āyādeso hoti, na bahuvacanassā”ti dasseti.
anya-e0803n:1498_9: “Dadātī”ti idaṃ padaṃ “purisāna”nti padassa sampadānavacanattaṃ ñāpetuṃ avoca, na
anya-e0803n:1498_10: ca “detītiādike sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade sati catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hotī”ti
anya-e0803n:1498_11: imamatthaṃ viññāpeti. “Vāti kimatthaṃ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā”ti ca
anya-e0803n:1498_12: vadantopi “sampadāneyeva vikappena āyādeso hotī”ti viññāpeti, na dānādikriyaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0803n:1499_0: Yadi pana dānādikriyaṃ paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṃ siyā, vuttikārakena lakkhaṇassa vuttiyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1499_2: vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca vuttaṃ. Kasmāti ce? Buddhavacane porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu ca tādisassa
anya-e0803n:1499_3: payogassa abhāvā. Niruttipiṭake hi pabhinnapaṭisambhido so āyasmā mahākaccāno “purisassa
anya-e0803n:1499_4: dīyate”ti āyādesarahitāniyeva rūpāni dasseti, “atthāyāti sampadānavacana”nti bhaṇantopi
anya-e0803n:1499_5: ca thero dānādikriyāpekkhaṃ akatvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitaṃ rūpameva niddisi.
anya-e0803n:1499_6: Tena so payogo tadatthappayogoti viññāyati. Iti imehi kāraṇehi jānitabbaṃ “dānādikriyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1499_7: paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṃ na kata”nti. Yajjevaṃ “atthāya hitāyā”tiādīniyeva tadatthappayogāni
anya-e0803n:1499_8: “āya catutthekavacanassa tū”ti lakkhaṇassa visayā bhaveyyuṃ, nāññānīti? Tanna, aññānipi
anya-e0803n:1499_9: visayāyeva tassa. Katamāni? “Mūlāya paṭikasseyya, appo saggāya gacchati, dakāya neti,
anya-e0803n:1499_10: viramathāyasmanto mamavacanāya, gaṇāya bhattā”tiādīni. “Saggassa gamanena vā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:1500_0: Nanu ca bho evaṃ sante vuttikārakena mūlodāharaṇesu “atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna”nti
anya-e0803n:1500_1: vatvā “mūlāya paṭikasseyyā”tiādīnipi vattabbāni, kimudāharaṇe pana “vāti kimatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:1500_2: saggassa gamanena vā”ti vattabbanti? Saccaṃ, avacane kāraṇamatthi, taṃ suṇātha –
anya-e0803n:1500_3: “mūlāya paṭikasseyya, appo saggāya gacchatī”ti ettha hi “mūlāya, saggāyā”ti padāni
anya-e0803n:1500_4: suddhasampadānavacanāni na honti gatyatthakammani vattanato, tasmā mūlodāharaṇesu
anya-e0803n:1500_5: na vuttāni. Tathā “dakāya netī”ti ettha “dakāyā”ti padaṃ nayanatthakammani vattanato
anya-e0803n:1500_6: suddhasampadānavacanaṃ na hotīti na vuttaṃ. “Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā”ti ettha
anya-e0803n:1500_7: pana “vacanāyā”ti padaṃ nissakkavacanatthe vattanato, “gaṇāya bhattā”ti ettha “gaṇāyā”ti
anya-e0803n:1500_8: padaṃ sāmivacanatthe vattanato, “asakkatā casma dhanañcayāyā”ti ettha “dhanañcayāyā”ti
anya-e0803n:1500_9: padaṃ kattuvasena sāmiatthe vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṃ na hotīti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1500_11: suddhasampadānavacanaṃ na hotīti “vāti kimatthaṃ saggassa gamanena vā”ti na vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1500_12: Evañhettha vuttanayena buddhavacanaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca patvā catutthekavacanassa
anya-e0803n:1500_13: āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammādīsu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti, na pana dānarocanādibhede
anya-e0803n:1501_0: Nanu ca bho “candanasāraṃ jeṭṭhikāya adāsi suvaṇṇamālaṃ kaniṭṭhāyā”ti dānappayoge
anya-e0803n:1501_2: alaṅkāro, rājakaññāya chattaṃ dhāreti, rājakaññāya namo karohi, rājakaññāya sotthi
anya-e0803n:1501_3: bhavatu, rājakaññāya silāghate”tiādīhipi payogehi bhavitabbaṃ, atha kasmā “buddhavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1501_4: porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca patvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammādīsu
anya-e0803n:1501_5: catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti, na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye”ti
anya-e0803n:1501_6: vadathāti? Uppathamavatiṇṇo bhavaṃ, na hi bhavaṃ amhākaṃ vacanatthaṃ jānāti. Ayañhettha
anya-e0803n:1501_8: samasamāni honti, appāni asamāni, tasmā tāni ṭhapetvā pulliṅganapuṃsakaliṅgesu purisādi
anya-e0803n:1501_10: rūpāni buddhavacanādīsu dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye na dissanti.
anya-e0803n:1501_11: Teneva hi “mūlāya, saggāya, dakāya, vacanāya, gaṇāyā”tiādīni gatyatthakammādīsu tīsu
anya-e0803n:1501_12: “abhiññāya, sambodhāya, nibbānāyā”ti evamādīni pana anekasatāni tiliṅgapadāni tadattheyevāti
anya-e0803n:1501_13: imesu catūsu ṭhānesu dissanti. “Deti, rocati, dhāretī”tiādīsu pana suddhasampadānavisayesu
anya-e0803n:1524: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1531_0: Atha pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā ākārantapulliṅgānaṃ pakatirūpesu abhibhavitu
anya-e0803n:1531_1: iccetassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma – satthā, satthā, satthāro. Satthāraṃ,
anya-e0803n:1531_2: satthāro. Satthārā, satthārehi, satthārebhi. Satthu, satthussa, satthuno, satthānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1531_3: satthārānaṃ. Satthārā, satthārehi, satthārebhi. Satthu, satthussa, satthuno, satthānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1531_4: satthārānaṃ. Satthari, satthāresu. Bho sattha, bho satthā, bhavanto satthāro.
anya-e0803n:1532_0: Ayaṃ yamakamahātherena katāya cūḷaniruttiyā āgato nayo. Ettha ca niruttipiṭake ca
anya-e0803n:1532_1: kaccāyane ca “satthunā”ti padaṃ anāgatampi gahetabbameva “dhammarājena satthunā”ti
anya-e0803n:1532_2: dassanato. “Satthārā, satthunā, satthārehi, satthārebhī”ti kamo ca veditabbo. Ettha
anya-e0803n:1532_3: ca asatipi atthavisese byañjanavisesavasena, byañjanavisesābhāvepi atthanānatthatāvasena
anya-e0803n:1532_5: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Niruttipiṭakādīsu pana “satthā”ti paṭhamābahuvacanaṃ na āgataṃ.
anya-e0803n:1532_6: Kiñcāpi na āgataṃ, tathāpi “avitakkitā maccumupabbajantī”ti pāḷiyaṃ “avitakkitā”ti
anya-e0803n:1532_8: Tathā vattā, dhātā, gantādīnampi taggatikattā. Tathā niruttipiṭake “satthāre”ti dutiyābahuvacanañca
anya-e0803n:1532_10: pana na āgatāni. Tattha “mātāpitaro poseti. Bhātaro atikkamatī”ti dassanato “satthāre”ti
anya-e0803n:1532_11: dutiyābahuvacanarūpaṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati. Kaccāyanādīsu “bho sattha, bho satthā”
anya-e0803n:1532_12: iti rassadīghavasena ālapanekavacanadvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Niruttipiṭake “bho sattha” itirassavasena
anya-e0803n:1532_13: ālapanekavacanaṃ vatvā “bhavanto satthāro”ti ārādesavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1532_14: Cūḷaniruttiyaṃ “bho sattha” iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ vatvā “bho satthā” iti
anya-e0803n:1532_15: dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṃ lapitaṃ. Sabbametaṃ āgame upaparikkhitvā yathā na
anya-e0803n:1533_0: Idāni satthusaddassa yaṃ rūpantaraṃ amhehi diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ dassessāma – tathā hi “imesaṃ
anya-e0803n:1533_1: mahānāma tiṇṇaṃ satthūnaṃ ekā niṭṭhā udāhu puthu niṭṭhā”ti pāḷiyaṃ “satthūna”nti
anya-e0803n:1533_2: padaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, tasmā ayampi kamo veditabbo “satthu, satthussa, satthuno, satthānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1533_3: satthārānaṃ, satthūna”nti. Abhibhavitā, abhibhavitā, abhibhavitāro. Abhibhavitāraṃ,
anya-e0803n:1533_4: abhibhavitāro. Abhibhavitārā, abhibhavitunā, abhibhavitārehi, abhibhavitārebhi. Abhibhavitu,
anya-e0803n:1533_6: Abhibhavitārā, abhibhavitārehi, abhibhavitārebhi. Abhibhavitu, abhibhavitussa, abhibhavituno,
anya-e0803n:1533_7: abhibhavitānaṃ, abhibhavitārānaṃ. Abhibhavitari, abhibhavitāresu. Bho abhibhavita,
anya-e0803n:1533_8: bho abhibhavitā, bhavanto abhibhavitāro. Yathā panettha abhibhavitu iccetassa pakatirūpassa
anya-e0803n:1533_9: nāmikapadamālā satthunayena yojitā, evaṃ paribhavituādīnañca aññesañca taṃsadisānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1533_10: nāmikapadamālā satthunayena yojetabbā. Etthaññāni taṃsadisāni nāma “vattā, dhātā”iccādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1543: Bodhetādī caññe saddā, ñeyyā hetusmiṃ atthasmiṃ.
anya-e0803n:1544: Kattā khattā nettā bhattā, pitā bhātātime pana;
anya-e0803n:1545: Kiñci bhijjanti suttasmiṃ, taṃ pabhedaṃ kathessahaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1547: Saheva niccaṃ vattanti, neva vattanti keci tu.
anya-e0803n:1548_0: Tatra kattusaddādayo rūpantaravasena satthusaddato kiñci bhijjanti. Tathā hi “uṭṭhehi
anya-e0803n:1548_1: katte taramāno, gantvā vessantaraṃvadā”ti ettha “katte”ti idaṃ ālapanekavacanarūpaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1548_2: evañhi “bho kattā”ti rūpato rūpantaraṃ nāma. “Tena hi bho khatte yena campeyyakā
anya-e0803n:1548_4: “bho khattā”ti rūpato rūpantaraṃ nāma. “Nette ujuṃ gate satī”ti ettha “nette”ti idaṃ
anya-e0803n:1548_5: sattamiyā ekavacanarūpaṃ, etampi “nettarī”ti rūpato rūpantaraṃ. “Ārādhayati rājānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1548_6: pūjaṃ labhati bhattusū”ti ettha “bhattūsū”ti idaṃ sattamiyā bahuvacanarūpaṃ. “Bhattāresū”ti
anya-e0803n:1548_7: rūpato rūpantaraṃ, atra “bhattūsū”ti dassanato, “mātāpitūsu paṇḍitā”ti ettha “pitūsū”ti
anya-e0803n:1548_8: dassanato ca “vattūsu dhātūsu gantūsu netūsu dātūsu kattūsū”ti evamādinayopi gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:1548_9: Ayaṃ nayo satthusaddepi icchitabbo viya amhe paṭibhāti.
anya-e0803n:1549_0: Pitā, pitā, pitaro. Pitaraṃ, pitaro. Pitarā, pitunā, petyā, pitarehi, pitarebhi,
anya-e0803n:1549_1: pitūhi, pitūbhi. Pitu, pitussa, pituno, pitānaṃ, pitarānaṃ, pitūnaṃ. Pitarā, petyā,
anya-e0803n:1549_2: pitarehi, pitarebhi, pitūhi, pitūbhi. Pitu, pitussa, pituno, pitānaṃ, pitarānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1549_3: pitūnaṃ. Pitari, pitaresu, pitūsu. Bho pita, bho pitā, bhavanto pitaro. Ettha pana
anya-e0803n:1549_4: “petyā, pitūna”nti imaṃ nayadvayaṃ vajjetvā bhātusaddassa ca padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1549_5: Tattha “matyā ca petyā ca kataṃ susādhu, anuññātosi mātāpitūhi, mātāpitūnaṃ accayenā”ti
anya-e0803n:1549_6: ca dassanato pitusaddassa “petyā, pitūhi, pitūbhi. Pitūna”nti rūpabhedo ca, “pitaro”
anya-e0803n:1549_7: iccādīsu rassattañca satthusaddato viseso. Tattha ca “petyā”ti idaṃ “jantuyo, hetuyo,
anya-e0803n:1549_8: hetuyā, adhipatiyā”ti padāni viya acinteyyaṃ pulliṅgarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1550_0: Codanā sodhanā cātra bhavati – satthā pitā iccevamādīni nipphannattamupādāya ākārantānīti
anya-e0803n:1550_1: ca, paṭhamaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ pakatirūpamupādāya ukārantānīti ca tumhe bhaṇatha, “hetu
anya-e0803n:1550_2: satthāradassanaṃ. Amātāpitarasaṃvaḍḍho. Kattāraniddeso”tiādīsu pana satthāra iccādīni
anya-e0803n:1550_3: kathaṃ tumhe bhaṇathāti? Etānipi mayaṃ pakatirūpamupādāya ukārantānīti bhaṇāmāti.
anya-e0803n:1550_4: Nanu ca bho etāni akārantānīti? Na, ukārantāniyeva tāni. Nanu ca bho yo aṃ nādīni
anya-e0803n:1550_5: parabhūtāni vacanāni na dissanti yehi ukārantasaddānamantassa ārādeso siyā, tasmā
anya-e0803n:1550_6: akārantānīti? Na, īdise ṭhāne parabhūtānaṃ yo aṃ nādīnaṃ vacanānamanokāsattā. Tathā
anya-e0803n:1550_7: hi samāsavisayo eso. Samāsavisayasmiñhi acinteyyānipi rūpāni dissantīti. Evaṃ santepi
anya-e0803n:1550_8: bho “gāmato nikkhamatī”ti payogassa viya asamāsavisaye “satthārato satthāraṃ gacchatī”ti
anya-e0803n:1550_10: cintetabbānīti? Na cintetabbāni “satthārato satthāraṃ gacchatī”ti etthāpi ukārantattā.
anya-e0803n:1550_11: Ettha hi asamāsattepi topaccayaṃ paṭicca satthusaddassa ukāro ārādesaṃ labhati. Yāni
anya-e0803n:1550_12: pana tumhe ukārassa ārādesanimittāni yo aṃnādīni vacanāni icchatha, tāni īdise ṭhāne
anya-e0803n:1550_13: viññūnaṃ pamāṇaṃ na honti. Kāni pana hontīti ce? Asamāsavisaye topaccayo ca samāsavisaye
anya-e0803n:1550_14: parapadāni ca parapadābhāve syādivibhattiyo cāti imāneva īdise ṭhāne ekantena pamāṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:1550_15: honti. Tathā hi dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yāvadeva anatthāya, ñattaṃ bālassa jāyatī”ti
anya-e0803n:1550_16: imissā pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ “ayaṃ nimmātāpitaroti imasmiṃ pahaṭe daṇḍo natthī”ti
anya-e0803n:1550_17: ettha nimmātāpitaroti imassa samāsavisayattā simhi pare ukāro ārādesaṃ labhati, tato
anya-e0803n:1550_18: sissa okārādeso, iccetaṃ padaṃ pakatirūpavasena ukārantaṃ bhavati. Nipphannattamupādāya
anya-e0803n:1550_19: “puriso, urago”ti padāni viya okārantañca bhavati. Ayaṃ panettha samāsaviggaho “mātā
anya-e0803n:1550_20: ca pitā ca mātāpitaro, natthi mātāpitaro etassāti nimmātāpitaro”ti. Pakatirūpavasena
anya-e0803n:1550_21: hi “nimmātāpitu” iti ṭhite sivacanasmiṃ pare ukārassa ārādeso hoti. Katthaci pana
anya-e0803n:1550_22: dhammapadaṭṭhakathāpotthake “ayaṃ nimmātāpitiko”ti pāṭho dissati, eso pana “ayaṃ
anya-e0803n:1550_23: nimmātāpitaro”ti padassa ayuttataṃ maññamānehi ṭhapitoti maññāma, na so ayutto aṭṭhakathāpāṭho.
anya-e0803n:1550_24: So hi umaṅgajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ekapitaroti simhi ārādesapayogena sameti. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n:1555_0: Imissā pāḷiyā atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇentehi pāḷinayaññūhi garūhi “niyakoti ajjhattiko ekapitaro
anya-e0803n:1555_1: ekamātuyā jāto”ti simhi ārādesapayogaracanā katā. Na kevalañca simhi ārādese pulliṅgappayogoyevamhehi
anya-e0803n:1555_2: diṭṭho, atha kho itthiliṅgappayogopi sāsane diṭṭho. Tathā hi vinayapiṭake cūḷavagge
anya-e0803n:1555_3: “assamaṇī hoti asakyadhītarā”ti padaṃ dissati. Ayaṃ panettha samāsaviggaho “sakyakule
anya-e0803n:1555_4: uppannattā sakyassa bhagavato dhītā sakyadhītarā, na sakyadhītarā asakyadhītarā”ti.
anya-e0803n:1555_5: Idhāpi simhi pare ukārassa ārādeso kato, itthiliṅgabhāvassa icchitattā āpaccayo,
anya-e0803n:1555_6: tato silopo ca daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ samāsapadatte satthu pitu kattusaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1555_7: vuttarūpato koci koci rūpaviseso dissati. Aññesampi rūpaviseso nayaññunā maggitabbo
anya-e0803n:1555_8: suttantesu. Ko hi nāma samattho nissesato buddhavacanasāgare saṃkiṇṇāni vicitrāni
anya-e0803n:1555_9: paṇḍitajanānaṃ hadayavimhāpanakarāni padarūparatanāni samuddharitvā dassetuṃ, tasmā
anya-e0803n:1557: Yogaṃ karoti ce satthu, pāḷiyaṃ so na kaṅkhati.
anya-e0803n:1558_0: Ye panidha amhehi “satthā, abhibhavitā, vattā, kattā”dayo saddā pakāsitā, tesu keci
anya-e0803n:1558_1: upayogavacanena saddhiṃ niccaṃ vattanti “pucchitā, okkamitā”iccādayo. Tathā hi “abhijānāsi
anya-e0803n:1558_2: no tvaṃ mahārāja imaṃ pañhaṃ aññe samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchitā. Niddaṃ okkamitā”tiādipayogā
anya-e0803n:1558_3: bahū dissanti. Keci sāmivacanena saddhiṃ niccaṃ vattanti “abhibhavitā, vattā”iccādayo.
anya-e0803n:1558_4: Tathā hi “paccāmittānaṃ abhibhavitā, tassa bhavanti vattāro. Amatassa dātā. Parissayānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1558_5: sahitā. Anuppannassa maggassa, uppādetā naruttamo”tiādipayogā bahū dissanti. Keci
anya-e0803n:1558_6: pana upayogavacanenapi saddhiṃ neva vattanti niyogā paññattiyaṃ pavattanato. Taṃ
anya-e0803n:1558_7: yathā? “Satthā, pitā, bhātā, nattā”iccādayo. Ettha pana “upayogavacanena saddhiṃ
anya-e0803n:1558_8: niccaṃ vattantī”tiādivacanaṃ kammabhūtaṃ atthaṃ sandhāya katanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1559_0: Evaṃ ukārantatāpakatikānaṃ ākārantapadānaṃ pavattiṃ viditvā saddesu atthesu ca kosallamicchantehi
anya-e0803n:1559_1: puna liṅgaantavasena “satthā, sattho, sattha”nti tikaṃ katvā padānamattho ca pakatirūpassa
anya-e0803n:1559_2: nāmikapadamālā ca padānaṃ sadisāsadisatā ca vavatthapetabbā. Tatra hi “satthā”ti
anya-e0803n:1559_3: idaṃ paṭhamaṃ ukārantatāpakatiyaṃ ṭhatvā pacchā ākārantabhūtaṃ pulliṅgaṃ, “sattho”ti
anya-e0803n:1559_4: idaṃ paṭhamaṃ akārantatāpakatiyaṃ ṭhatvā pacchā okārantabhūtaṃ pulliṅgaṃ, “sattha”ntidaṃ
anya-e0803n:1559_5: pana paṭhamaṃ akārantatāpakatiyaṃ ṭhatvā pacchā niggahītantabhūtaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1559_6: Tatra satthāti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ sāsati anusāsatīti satthā, ko so? Bhagavā. Satthoti
anya-e0803n:1559_7: saha atthenāti sattho, bhaṇḍamūlaṃ gahetvā vāṇijjāya desantaraṃ gato janasamūho.
anya-e0803n:1559_8: Satthanti sāsati ācikkhati atthe etenāti satthaṃ, byākaraṇādigantho, atha vā sasati
anya-e0803n:1559_9: hiṃsati satte etenāti satthaṃ, asiādi. “Satthā, satthā, satthāro. Satthāraṃ, satthāro”ti
anya-e0803n:1559_10: pure viya padamālā. “Sattho, satthā. Satthaṃ, satthe”ti purisanayena padamālā. “Satthaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1559_11: satthāni, satthā. Satthaṃ, satthāni, satthe”ti napuṃsake vattamāna cittanayena padamālā
anya-e0803n:1559_12: yojetabbā. Evaṃ tidhā bhinnāsu nāmikapadamālāsu padānaṃ sadisāsadisatā vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1560: Satthā tiṭṭhati sabbaññū, satthā yanti dhanatthikā;
anya-e0803n:1561: Satthā apeti puriso, bhonto satthā dadātha saṃ.
anya-e0803n:1563: Satthaṃ yaṃ tikhiṇaṃ tena, sattho katvāna kappiyaṃ;
anya-e0803n:1564: Phalaṃ satthussa pādāsi, satthā taṃ paribhuñjati.
anya-e0803n:1565_0: Evaṃ asutisāmaññavasena asadisatā bhavati, tathā liṅgaantavasena. “Cetā ceto”ti ca
anya-e0803n:1565_1: “tātā tāto”ti ca dukaṃ katvā padānamattho ca pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālā ca padānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1566_0: Tatra hi “cetā”ti paṭhamaṃ ukārantatāpakatiyaṃ ṭhatvā pacchā ākārantabhūtaṃ pulliṅgaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1566_1: tathā “tātā”ti padampi. “Ceto”ti idaṃ pana paṭhamaṃ akārantatāpakatiyaṃ ṭhatvā pacchā
anya-e0803n:1566_2: okārantabhūtaṃ pulliṅgaṃ, tathā “tāto”ti padampi. Tatra cetāti cinoti rāsiṃ karotīti
anya-e0803n:1566_3: cetā, pākāracinanako puggalo, iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakīti attho. Cetoti cittaṃ, evaṃnāmako
anya-e0803n:1566_4: vā luddo. Ettha ca cittaṃ “cetayati cintetī”ti atthavasena ceto, luddo pana paṇṇattivasena.
anya-e0803n:1566_5: Tātāti tāyatīti tātā. “Aghassa tātā hitassa vidhātā”tissa payogo. “Tāto”ti etthāpi
anya-e0803n:1566_6: tāyatīti tāto, puttānaṃ pitūsu, pitarānaṃ puttesu, aññesañca aññesu piyapuggalesu
anya-e0803n:1566_7: vattabbavohāro eso. “So nūna kapaṇo tāto, ciraṃ ruccati assame. Kicchenādhigatā bhogā,
anya-e0803n:1566_8: te tāto vidhamaṃ dhamaṃ. Ehi tātā”tiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo. “Cetā, cetā, cetāro.
anya-e0803n:1566_9: Cetāraṃ, cetāro”ti satthunayena padamālā. “Ceto, cetā. Cetaṃ, cete. Cetasā, cetenā”ti
anya-e0803n:1566_10: manogaṇanayena ñeyyā. Ayaṃ cittavācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā. “Ceto, cetā.
anya-e0803n:1566_11: Cetaṃ, cete. Cetenā”ti purisanayena ñeyyā. Ayaṃ paṇṇattivācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:1566_12: “Tātā, tātā, tātāro. Tātāra”nti satthunayena ñeyyā. “Tāto, tātā, tāta”nti purisanayena
anya-e0803n:1566_13: ñeyyā. Evamimāsupi nāmikapadamālāsu padānaṃ sadisāsadisatā vavatthapetabbā, tathā
anya-e0803n:1566_14: liṅgaantavasena “ñātā, ñāto, ñātaṃ, ñātā”ti catukkaṃ katvā padānamattho ca pakatirūpassa
anya-e0803n:1566_15: nāmikapadamālā ca padānaṃ sadisāsadisatā ca vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1567_0: Tatra hi “ñātā”ti idaṃ paṭhamaṃ ukārantatāpakatiyaṃ ṭhatvā pacchā ākārantabhūtaṃ
anya-e0803n:1567_1: pulliṅgaṃ. “Ñāto ñāta”nti imāni yathākkamaṃ paṭhamaṃ akārantatāpakatiyaṃ ṭhatvā pacchokārantaniggahītantabhūtāni
anya-e0803n:1567_2: vāccaliṅgesu punnapuṃsakaliṅgāni. Tathā hi “ñāto attho sukhāvaho. Ñātametaṃ kuraṅgassā”ti
anya-e0803n:1567_3: nesaṃ payogā dissanti. “Ñātā”ti idaṃ pana paṭhamaṃ ākārantatāpakatiyaṃ ṭhatvā pacchāpi
anya-e0803n:1567_4: ākārantabhūtaṃ vāccaliṅgesu itthiliṅgaṃ. Tathā hi “esā itthimayā ñātā”ti payogo.
anya-e0803n:1567_5: Tatra pulliṅgapakkhe “jānātīti ñātā”ti kattukārakavattamānakālavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:1567_6: Itthiliṅgādipakkhe “ñāyitthāti ñātā ñāto ñāta”nti kammakārakātītakālavasena attho
anya-e0803n:1567_7: gahetabbo. Esa nayo aññatthāpi yathāsambhavaṃ daṭṭhabbo. “Ñātā, ñātā, ñātāro. Ñātāra”nti
anya-e0803n:1567_8: satthunayena ñeyyā. “Ñāto, ñātā. Ñāta”nti purisanayena ñeyyā. “Ñātaṃ, ñātāni, ñātā.
anya-e0803n:1567_9: Ñātaṃ, ñātāni, ñāte”ti vakkhamānacittanayena ñeyyā. “Ñātā, ñātā, ñātāyo. Ñātaṃ, ñātā,
anya-e0803n:1567_10: ñātāyo”ti vakkhamānakaññānayena ñeyyā. Evamimāsupi nāmikapadamālāsu padānaṃ sadisāsadisatā
anya-e0803n:1567_11: vavatthapetabbā. Aññesupi ṭhānesu yathārahaṃ iminā nayena sadisāsadisatā upaparikkhitabbā.
anya-e0803n:1567_12: Vattā dhātā gantādīnampi “vadatīti vattā, dhāretīti dhātā, gacchatīti gantā”tiādinā
anya-e0803n:1568_0: Yaṃ panettha amhehi pakiṇṇakavacanaṃ kathitaṃ, taṃ “aṭṭhāne idaṃ kathita”nti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1568_1: Yasmā ayaṃ saddanīti nāma saddānamatthānañca yuttāyuttipakāsanatthaṃ katārambhattā
anya-e0803n:1568_2: nānappakārena sabbaṃ māgadhavohāraṃ saṅkhobhetvā kathitāyeva sobhati, na itarathā,
anya-e0803n:1568_3: tasmā nānappabhedena vattumicchāya sambhavato “aṭṭhāne idaṃ kathita”nti na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1568_4: Nānāupāyehi viññūnaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ katārambhattā ca pana punaruttidosopettha na cintetabbo,
anya-e0803n:1568_5: aññadatthu saddhāsampannehi kulaputtehi ayaṃ saddanīti piṭakattayopakārāya sakkaccaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbā.
anya-e0803n:1569: Iti abhibhavitāpadasadisāni vattā, dhātā, gantādīni padāni dassitāni. Idāni ataṃsadisāni dassessāma. Seyyathidaṃ –
anya-e0803n:1570: Guṇavā gaṇavā ceva, balavā yasavā tathā;
anya-e0803n:1571: Dhanavā sutavā vidvā, dhutavā katavāpi ca.
anya-e0803n:1572: Hitavā bhagavā ceva, dhitavā thāmavā tathā;
anya-e0803n:1576: Saññāvā rasmivā ceva, massuvā ca yasassivā;
anya-e0803n:1580: Mutimā matimā ceva, jutimā hirimāpi ca.
anya-e0803n:1581: Thutimā ratimā ceva, yatimā balimā tathā;
anya-e0803n:1582: Kasimā sucimā dhīmā, rucimā cakkhumāpi ca.
anya-e0803n:1589_0: Guṇavā, guṇavā, guṇavanto. Guṇavantaṃ, guṇavante. Guṇavatā, guṇavantena, guṇavantehi,
anya-e0803n:1589_1: guṇavantebhi. Guṇavato, guṇavantassa, guṇavataṃ, guṇavantānaṃ. Guṇavatā, guṇavantā,
anya-e0803n:1589_2: guṇavantasmā, guṇavantamhā, guṇavantehi, guṇavantebhi. Guṇavato, guṇavantassa, guṇavataṃ,
anya-e0803n:1589_3: guṇavantānaṃ. Guṇavati, guṇavante, guṇavantasmiṃ, guṇavantamhi, guṇavantesu. Bho
anya-e0803n:1590: Ettha pana “etha tumhe āvuso sīlavāhothā”ti ca,
anya-e0803n:1592: Cakkhumā andhikā honti, mātugāmavasaṃ gatā”ti ca
anya-e0803n:1593_1: bahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ. “Guṇavā satimā”tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Cūḷaniruttiyampi hi “guṇavā”ti
anya-e0803n:1593_3: cūḷaniruttiyaṃ pana niruttipiṭake ca “bho guṇava”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1593_4: āgataṃ. Mayaṃ pana “taggha bhagavā bojjhaṅgā. Kathaṃ nu bhagavā tuyhaṃ sāvako sāsane
anya-e0803n:1593_6: vantupaccayaṭṭhāne “bho guṇavā”iccādi dīghavasena vacanaṃ yuttataraṃ viya maññāma,
anya-e0803n:1593_7: mantupaccayaṭṭhāne pana imantupaccayaṭṭhāne ca “sabbaverabhayātīta, pāde vandāmi
anya-e0803n:1593_9: rassabhāvadassanato “bho satima, bho gatima”iccādi rassavasena vacanaṃ yuttataraṃ
anya-e0803n:1593_10: viya maññāma, atha vā mahāparinibbānasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “āyasmā tissa” itidīghavasena
anya-e0803n:1593_12: ṭhapetvā vantupaccayaṭṭhānepi mantupaccayanayo netabbo, mantupaccayaṭṭhānepi vantupaccayanayo
anya-e0803n:1593_13: netabbo. Tathā hi kaccāyanādīsu “bho guṇavaṃ, bho guṇava, bho guṇavā”iti niggahītarassadīghavasena
anya-e0803n:1593_14: tīṇi ālapanekavacanāni vuttāni, iminā “bho satimaṃ, bho satima, bho satimā”ti evamādinayopi
anya-e0803n:1593_15: dassito. Paṭhamābahuvacanaṭṭhāne pana “guṇavanto, guṇavantā, guṇavantī”ti tīṇi padāni
anya-e0803n:1593_16: vuttāni, imināpi “satimanto, satimantā, satimantī”ti evamādinayopi dassito. Tesu
anya-e0803n:1593_17: “bho guṇavaṃ bho satimaṃ, guṇavantā, guṇavantī”ti imāni padāni evaṃgatikāni ca aññāni
anya-e0803n:1593_18: padāni pāḷiyaṃ appasiddhāni yathā “āyasmantā”ti padaṃ pasiddhaṃ, tasmā yaṃ cūḷaniruttiyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1593_19: vuttaṃ, yañca niruttipiṭake, yañca kaccāyanādīsu, taṃ sabbaṃ pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāhi
anya-e0803n:1593_20: ca saddhiṃ yathā na virujjhati, gaṅgodakena yamunodakaṃ viya aññadatthu saṃsandati
anya-e0803n:1594: Apicettha ayampi viseso gahetabbo. Taṃ yathā? “Tuyhaṃ dhītā mahāvīra, paññavanta jutindharā”ti pāḷiyaṃ “paññavanta”iti ālapanekavacanassa dassanato.
anya-e0803n:1599_0: Imissā jātakapāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paññavanta”iti ālapanekavacanassa dassanato ca
anya-e0803n:1599_1: “bho guṇavanta, bho guṇavantā, bho satimanta, bho satimantā”tiādīnipi ālapanekavacanāni
anya-e0803n:1599_2: avassamicchitabbāni. Tathā hi tissaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “yasassi paññavanta” iccālapanavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1599_3: aṭṭhakathācariyā icchanti. Nanti hi padapūraṇe nipātamattaṃ. Paññavantanti pana chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:1599_4: anusārāgamaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pāvacane vantupaccayādisahitānaṃ saddānaṃ “bhagavā,
anya-e0803n:1599_5: āyasmā, paññavanta, cakkhuma, pāpima”itidassitanayena ālapanappavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:1599_6: Ettha ca “gaṅgābhāgīrathī nāma, himavantā pabhāvitā”ti ca “kuto āgatattha bhanteti,
anya-e0803n:1599_7: himavantā mahārājā”ti ca dassanato “guṇavantā”ti pañcamiyā ekavacanaṃ kathitaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0803n:1599_8: guṇavantu saddassa nāmikapadamālā yojitā, evaṃ dhanavantubalavantādīnaṃ satimantu
anya-e0803n:1600_0: Idāni vidvādipadānaṃ guṇavāpadena samānagatikattampi sotūnaṃ payogesu sammohāpagamatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:1600_1: ekadesato nibbacanādīhi saddhiṃ vidvantuiccādipakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālā vuccate
anya-e0803n:1600_2: – ñāṇasaṅkhāto vedo assa atthīti vidvā, paṇḍito. Ettha ca vidvāsaddassa atthibhāve
anya-e0803n:1600_3: “iti vidvā samaṃ care”tiādi āhaccapāṭho nidassanaṃ. Atrāyaṃ padamālā – vidvā, vidvā,
anya-e0803n:1600_4: vidvanto. Vidvantaṃ, vidvante. Vidvatā, vidvantena. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Vedanāvā,
anya-e0803n:1600_5: vedanāvā, vedanāvanto. Vedanāvantaṃ, vedanāvante. Vedanāvatā, vedanāvantena. Sesaṃ
anya-e0803n:1600_6: sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Evaṃ “saññāvācetanāvā saddhāvā paññavā sabbāvā”iccādīsupi. Ettha ca
anya-e0803n:1600_7: “vedanāvantaṃ vā attānaṃ sabbāvantaṃ loka”ntiādīni nidassanapadāni. Tattha sabbāvantanti
anya-e0803n:1600_8: sabbasattavantaṃ, sabbasattayuttanti attho. Majjhedīghañhi idaṃ padaṃ. Yebhuyyena
anya-e0803n:1600_10: janā assa atthīti yasassivā, atha vā yasassī ca yasassivā cāti yasassivā. Ekadesasarūpekasesoyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1603_0: Idaṃ nidassanaṃ. “Yasassivā, yasassivā, yasassivanto. Yasassivantaṃ” iccādi netabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1603_1: Atthe dassanasīlaṃ atthadassi, kiṃ taṃ? Ñāṇaṃ. Atthadassi assa atthīti atthadassimā, ettha ca –
anya-e0803n:1606_1: Atthadassimantaṃ” iccādi netabbaṃ. Pāpaṃ assa atthīti pāpimā, akusalarāsisamannāgato
anya-e0803n:1606_2: māro. Puttā assa atthīti puttimā, bahuputto. “Socati puttehi puttimā”ti ettha hi
anya-e0803n:1606_3: bahuputto “puttimā”ti vuccati. Cando assa atthīti candimā. Candoti cettha candavimānamadhippetaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1606_4: candavimānavāsī pana devaputto “candimā”ti. Tathā hi “cando uggato, pamāṇato cando
anya-e0803n:1606_5: āyāmavitthārato ubbedhato ca ekūnapaññāsayojano, parikkhepato tīhi yojanehi ūnadiyaḍḍhasatayojano”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:1606_6: candavimānaṃ “cando”ti vuttaṃ. “Tathāgataṃ arahantaṃ, candimā saraṇaṃ gato”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:1606_7: pana candadevaputto “candimā”ti. Aparo nayo – cando assa atthīti candimā. Candoti
anya-e0803n:1606_8: cettha candadevaputto adhippeto, tannivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pana candavimānaṃ “candimā”ti.
anya-e0803n:1606_9: Tathā hi “rāhu candaṃ pamuñcassu, cando maṇimayavimāne vasatī”tiādīsu candadevaputto “cando”ti vutto.
