anya-e0803n:1609_0: Ādīsu pana tannivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ candavimānaṃ “candimā”ti vuttaṃ. Iti “cando”ti ca
anya-e0803n:1609_1: “candimā”ti ca candadevaputtassapi candavimānassapi nāmanti veditabbaṃ. Tatra “pāpimā
anya-e0803n:1609_2: puttimā candimā”ti imāni pāpasaddādito “tadassatthi” iccetasmiṃ atthe pavattassa
anya-e0803n:1610_0: Nanu ca bho mantupaccayavaseneva sādhetabbānīti? Na, katthacipi akārantato mantuno
anya-e0803n:1610_1: abhāvā. Nanu ca bho evaṃ santepi pāpa putta candato paṭhamaṃ ikārāgamaṃ katvā tato
anya-e0803n:1610_2: mantupaccayaṃ katvā sakkā sādhetunti? Sakkā rūpamattasijjhanato, nayo pana sobhano
anya-e0803n:1610_3: na hoti. Tathā hi pāpa puttādito akārantato ikārāgamaṃ katvā mantupaccaye vidhiyamāne
anya-e0803n:1610_4: aññehi guṇayasādīhi akārantehi ikārāgamaṃ katvā mantupaccayassa kātabbatāpasaṅgo
anya-e0803n:1610_5: siyā. Na hi anekesu pāḷisatasahassesu katthacipi akārantato guṇa yasādito ikārāgamena
anya-e0803n:1610_6: saddhiṃ mantupaccayo dissati, aṭṭhānattā pana pāpa puttādito akārantato ikārāgamaṃ
anya-e0803n:1611_0: Evaṃ santepi bho kasmā kaccāyanappakaraṇe mantupaccayova vutto, na imantupaccayoti?
anya-e0803n:1611_1: Dvayampi vuttameva. Kathaṃ ñāyatīti ce? Yasmā tattha “tapādito sī, daṇḍādito ika
anya-e0803n:1611_2: ī, madhvādito ro, guṇādito vantū”ti imāni cattāri suttāni sannihitatodantasaddabhāvena
anya-e0803n:1611_3: vatvā majjhe “satyādīhi mantū”ti aññathā suttaṃ vatvā tato sannihitatodantavasena
anya-e0803n:1611_4: “saddhādito ṇā”ti suttaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā tattha “satyādīhimantū”ti visadisaṃ katvā
anya-e0803n:1611_5: vuttassa suttassa vasena imantu paccayo ca vuttoti viññāyati. Pakati hesācariyānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1611_6: yena kenaci ākārena attano adhippāyaviññāpanaṃ. Ettha ca dutiyo attho sarasandhivasena
anya-e0803n:1611_7: gahetabbo. Tathā hissa “satyādīhi mantū”ti paṭhamo attho, “satyādīhi imantū”ti dutiyo
anya-e0803n:1611_8: attho. Iti “seto dhāvatī”ti payoge viya “satyādīhi mantū”ti sutte bhinnasattisamavetavasena
anya-e0803n:1611_9: atthadvayapaṭipatti bhavati, tasmā paramasukhumasugambhīratthavatā anena suttena
anya-e0803n:1611_10: katthaci sati gati setu goiccādito mantupaccayo icchito. Katthaci sati pāpa puttaiccādito
anya-e0803n:1612_0: Yasmā pana satisaddo mantuvasena gatidhīsethugo iccādīhi, imantuvasena pāpaputtādīhi
anya-e0803n:1612_1: ca samānagatikattā tesaṃ pakārabhāvena gahito, tasmā evaṃ suttattho bhavati “satyādīhi
anya-e0803n:1612_2: mantu satippakārehi saddehi mantupaccayo hoti imantupaccayo ca yathārahaṃ ‘tadassatthi’
anya-e0803n:1612_3: iccetasmiṃ atthe”ti. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – yathā “satimā”ti ettha satīti ikārantato
anya-e0803n:1612_4: mantupaccayo hoti, tathā “gatimā, dhīmā, setumā, gomā”tiādīsu ikāranta īkāranta ukārantaniccokārantato
anya-e0803n:1612_5: mantupaccayo hoti. Yathā ca “satimā”ti ettha “satī”ti ikārantato imantupaccayo hoti,
anya-e0803n:1612_6: tathā “gatimā, pāpimā, puttimā”tiādīsu ikāranta akārantato imantupaccayo hoti. Evaṃ
anya-e0803n:1612_7: satippakārehi saddehi yathāsambhavaṃ mantu imantupaccayā hontīti.
anya-e0803n:1613_0: Yajjevaṃ paccayadvayavidhāyakaṃ “daṇḍādito ika ī”ti suttaṃ viya “satyādito imantu
anya-e0803n:1613_1: mantū”ti vattabbaṃ, kasmā nāvocāti? Tathā avacane kāraṇamatthi. Yadi hi “daṇḍādito
anya-e0803n:1613_2: ika ī”ti suttaṃ viya “satyādito imantu mantū”ti suttaṃ vuttaṃ siyā, ekakkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0803n:1613_3: imantu mantūnaṃ vacanena daṇḍasaddato sambhūtaṃ “daṇḍiko daṇḍī”ti rūpadvayamiva satigatiāditopi
anya-e0803n:1613_4: visadisarūpadvayamicchitabbaṃ siyā, tañca natthi, tasmā “satyādito imantu mantū”ti
anya-e0803n:1613_5: na vuttaṃ. Apica tathā vutte bavhakkharatāya ganthagarutā siyā. Yasmā ca suttena
anya-e0803n:1613_6: nāma appakkharena asandiddhena sāravantena gūḷhaninnayena sabbatomukhena anavajjena
anya-e0803n:1613_7: bhavitabbaṃ. Kaccāyane ca yebhuyyena tādisāni gambhīratthāni suvisadañāṇavisayabhūtāni
anya-e0803n:1613_8: suttāni dissanti “upājhadhikissaravacane, sarā sare lopa”ntiādīni, idampi tesamaññataraṃ,
anya-e0803n:1613_9: tasmā “satyādito imantu mantū”ti na vuttaṃ. Evaṃ suttopadese akatepi imantunopi gahaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:1614_0: Aparo nayo – “tapādito sī”tiādīsu todantasaddassa bahuvacanantatā na suṭṭhu pākaṭā
anya-e0803n:1614_1: topaccayassa ekatthabavhatthesu vattanato, “satyādīhi mantū”ti ettha pana hisaddassa
anya-e0803n:1614_2: bahuvacanatthatā atīva pākaṭā, tasmā bahuvacanaggahaṇena imantu paccayo hotītipi
anya-e0803n:1614_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nanu ca bho vināpi imantupaccayena pāpamassatthīti pāpī, pāpī eva pāpimāti
anya-e0803n:1614_4: sakatthe māpaccaye kateyeva “pāpimā puttimā”tiādīni sijjhanti “chaṭṭhamo so parābhavo”ti
anya-e0803n:1614_5: ettha mapaccayena “chaṭṭhamo”ti padaṃ viyāti? Atinayaññū bhavaṃ, atinayaññū nāmāti
anya-e0803n:1614_6: bhavaṃ vattabbo, na pana bhavaṃ saddagatiṃ jānāti, saddagatiyo ca nāma bahuvidhā.
anya-e0803n:1614_7: Tathā hi chaṭṭhoyeva chaṭṭhamo, “suttameva suttanto”tiādīsu purisanayena yojetabbā
anya-e0803n:1614_8: saddagati, “devoyeva devatā”tiādīsu kaññānayena yojetabbā saddagati, “diṭṭhi eva
anya-e0803n:1614_9: diṭṭhigata”ntiādīsu cittanayena yojetabbā saddagati. Evaṃvidhāsu saddagatīsu “pāpī
anya-e0803n:1614_10: eva pāpimā”tiādikaṃ kataraṃ saddagatiṃ vadesi? “Satthā rājā brahmā sakhā attā sā
anya-e0803n:1614_11: pumā”tiādīsu ca kataraṃ saddagatiṃ vadesi? Katarasaddantogadhaṃ katarāya ca nāmikapadamālāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1614_12: yojetabbaṃ maññasīti? So evaṃ puṭṭho addhā uttari kiñci adisvā tuṇhī bhavissati,
anya-e0803n:1614_13: tasmā tādiso nayo na gahetabbo. Tādisasmiñhi naye “pāpimatā pāpimato”tiādīni rūpāni
anya-e0803n:1614_14: na sijjhanti, imantupaccayanayena pana sijjhanti, tasmā ayameva nayo pasatthataro
anya-e0803n:1614_15: āyasmantehi sammā citte ṭhapetabbo. Atridaṃ nidassanaṃ –
anya-e0803n:1620: Pāpimā, pāpimā, pāpimanto. Pāpimantaṃ. Sesaṃ neyyaṃ, esa nayo “khandhimā, puttimā”tiādīsupi.
anya-e0803n:1621_0: Idāni yathāpāvacanaṃ kiñcideva himavantu satimantādīnaṃ visesaṃ brūma. Himavantova
anya-e0803n:1621_1: pabbato. Satimaṃ bhikkhuṃ. Bandhumaṃ rājānaṃ. Candimaṃ devaputtaṃ. Satimassa bhikkhuno.
anya-e0803n:1621_2: Bandhumassa rañño. Iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjati. Iccādi viseso
anya-e0803n:1621_4: vattabbavacananti ayampi viseso veditabbo. Tathā hi “dvinnaṃ ārocentena ‘āyasmantā
anya-e0803n:1621_5: dhārentū’ti, tiṇṇaṃ ārocentena ‘āyasmanto dhārentū’ti vattabba”nti vuttaṃ. “Tiṇṇa”nti
anya-e0803n:1621_6: cettha kathāsīsamattaṃ, tena catunnampi pañcannampi atirekasatānampīti dassitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0803n:1621_7: Bahavohi upādāya “uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādikā pāḷiyo ṭhapitā.
anya-e0803n:1621_8: Tattha “āyasmantā”tidaṃ vinayavohāravasena dveyeva sandhāya vuttattā na sabbasādhāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1621_9: Vinayavohārañhi vajjetvā aññasmiṃ vohāre na pavattati. “Āyasmanto”tidaṃ pana sabbattha
anya-e0803n:1622_0: Tatra “himavanto”ti idaṃ yebhuyyenekavacanaṃ bhavati, katthaci bahuvacanampi, tenāha
anya-e0803n:1622_1: niruttipiṭake thero “himavā tiṭṭhati, himavanto tiṭṭhantī”ti. “Himavantova pabbato”ti
anya-e0803n:1622_2: ayaṃ ekavacananayo yathārutapāḷivasena gahetabbo. Yathārutapāḷi ca nāma –
anya-e0803n:1624: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā.
anya-e0803n:1627: Gatimanto satimanto, dhitimanto ca so isi;
anya-e0803n:1629_0: Iccādi. Ettha “puññavanto”tiādīni anekesu ṭhānesu bahuvacanabhāvena punappunaṃ vadantānipi
anya-e0803n:1629_1: katthaci ekavacanāni honti, ekavacanabhāvo ca nesaṃ gāthāvisaye dissati, tasmā tāni
anya-e0803n:1630: Evaṃ himavantusatimantusaddādīnaṃ visesaṃ ñatvā puna liṅgantavasena dviliṅgakapadānamattho ca pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālā ca padānaṃ sadisāsadisatā ca vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1631_0: Tatra hi “sirimā”ti padaṃ sutisāmaññavasena liṅgadvaye vattanato dvidhā bhijjati.
anya-e0803n:1631_1: “Sirimā puriso”ti hi atthe ākārantaṃ pulliṅgaṃ, “sirimā nāma devī”ti atthe ākārantaṃ
anya-e0803n:1631_2: itthiliṅgaṃ, ubhayampetaṃ ukārantatāpakatikā. Atha vā pana pacchimaṃ ākārantatāpakatikaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1631_3: sirī yassa atthi so sirimāti pulliṅgavasena nibbacanaṃ, sirī yassā atthi sā sirimāti
anya-e0803n:1631_4: itthiliṅgavasena nibbacanaṃ. Atrimāni kiñcāpi sutivasena nibbacanatthavasena ca aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0803n:1631_6: Esa nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo. Sirimā, sirimā, sirimanto. Sirimantaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1631_7: sirimante. Sirimatā, sirimantena. Guṇavantusaddasseva nāmikapadamālā. Sirimā, sirimā,
anya-e0803n:1631_8: sirimāyo. Sirimaṃ, sirimā, sirimāyo. Sirimāya. Vakkhamānakaññānayena ñeyyā. Evaṃ
anya-e0803n:1631_9: dvidhā bhinnānaṃ samānasutikasaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālāsu padānaṃ sadisāsadisatā vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1631_11: padānaṃ imehi padehi kācipi samānatā na labbhati. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0803n:1634: Iti abhibhavitā padena visadisāni guṇavāsatimādīni padāni dassitāni saddhiṃ nāmikapadamālāhi. Idāni aparānipi tabbisadisāni padāni dassessāma saddhiṃ nāmikapadamālāhi. Seyyathidaṃ?
anya-e0803n:1635: Rājā brahmā sakhā attā, ātumā sā pumā rahā;
anya-e0803n:1637: Vattahā ca tathā vutta-sirā ceva yuvāpi ca;
anya-e0803n:1639: Ettha “sā”ti padameva ākārantatāpakatikamākārantaṃ, sesāni pana akārantatāpakatikāni ākārantāni.
anya-e0803n:1640_0: Rājā, rājā, rājāno. Rājānaṃ, rājaṃ, rājāno. Raññā, rājinā, rājūhi, rājūbhi. Rañño,
anya-e0803n:1640_1: rājino, raññaṃ, rājūnaṃ, rājānaṃ. Raññā, rājūhi, rājūbhi. Rañño, rājino, raññaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1640_2: rājūnaṃ, rājānaṃ. Raññe, rājini, rājūsu. Bho rāja, bhavanto rājāno, bhavanto rājā
anya-e0803n:1641_0: Niruttipiṭakādīsu “rājā”ti bahuvacanaṃ na āgataṃ, cūḷaniruttiyaṃ pana āgataṃ. Kiñcāpi
anya-e0803n:1641_1: niruttipiṭakādīsu na āgataṃ, tathāpi “netādisā sakhā honti, labbhā me jīvato sakhā”ti
anya-e0803n:1641_3: icchitabbameva. Tathā “brahmā, attā”iccādīnipi bahuvacanāni taggatikattā vinā kenaci rūpavisesena.
anya-e0803n:1642_0: Ettha ca “gahapatiko nāma ṭhapetvā rājaṃ rājabhogaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ avaseso gahapatiko
anya-e0803n:1642_1: nāmā”ti dassanato rājanti vuttaṃ, idaṃ pana niruttipiṭake na āgataṃ. “Sabbadattena
anya-e0803n:1642_2: rājinā”ti dassanato “rājinā”ti vuttaṃ. “Ārādhayati rājānaṃ, pūjaṃ labhati bhattusū”ti
anya-e0803n:1642_4: “rājena, rājehi, rājebhi. Rājesū”ti padāni vuttāni. Cūḷaniruttiniruttipiṭakesu tāni
anya-e0803n:1642_5: nāgatāni, anāgatabhāvoyeva tesaṃ yuttataro pāḷiyaṃ adassanato, tasmā etthetāni amhehi
anya-e0803n:1642_6: na vuttāni. Pāḷinaye hi upaparikkhiyamāne īdisāni padāni samāseyeva passāma, na panāññatra,
anya-e0803n:1642_7: atrime payogā – “āvutthaṃ dhammarājenā”ti ca, “sivirājena pesito”ti ca, “pajāpatissa
anya-e0803n:1642_8: devarājassa dhajagga”nti ca, “nikkhamante mahārāje, sivīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhane”ti ca,
anya-e0803n:1642_9: evaṃ pāḷinaye upaparikkhiyamāne “rājenā”tiādīni samāseyeva passāma, na kevalaṃ pāḷinaye
anya-e0803n:1642_10: porāṇaṭṭhakathānayepi upaparikkhiyamāne samāseyeva passāma, na panāññatra, evaṃ santepi
anya-e0803n:1642_11: suṭṭhu upaparikkhitabbamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Ko hi nāma sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane
anya-e0803n:1642_12: sabbaso nayaṃ sallakkhetuṃ samattho aññatra pabhinnapaṭisambhidehi khīṇāsavehi.
anya-e0803n:1643_0: Ettha ca samāsantagatarāja-saddassa nāmikapadamālāyo dvidhā vuccante okārantākārantavasena.
anya-e0803n:1643_1: Tatrokārantā “mahārājo yuvarājo sivirājo dhammarājo”iccevamādayo bhavanti. Ākārantā
anya-e0803n:1643_2: pana “mahārājā yuvarājā sivirājā dhammarājā”iccevamādayo. Ettha kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0803n:1643_3: ca “mahārājo”tiādīni na santi, tathāpi “sabbamitto sabbasakho, sabbabhūtānukampako”ti
anya-e0803n:1643_5: samāsesu “dhammarājena, dhammarājassā”tiādīni dissanti. Etāni okārantarūpāni eva,
anya-e0803n:1643_6: nākārantarūpāni. Mahārājo, mahārājā. Mahārājaṃ, mahārāje. Mahārājena, mahārājehi,
anya-e0803n:1643_7: mahārājebhi. Mahārājassa, mahārājānaṃ. Mahārājā, mahārājasmā, mahārājamhā, mahārājehi,
anya-e0803n:1643_8: mahārājebhi. Mahārājassa, mahārājānaṃ. Mahārāje, mahārājasmiṃ, mahārājamhi, mahārājesu.
anya-e0803n:1643_9: Bho mahārāja, bhavanto mahārājā. Kaccāyanacūḷaniruttinayehi pana “bho mahārājā”iti
anya-e0803n:1643_10: ekavacanabahuvacanānipi daṭṭhabbāni. Yathā “mahārājo”ti okārantapadassa vasena, evaṃ
anya-e0803n:1643_11: “sivirājo dhammarājo devarājo”tiādīnampi okārantapadānaṃ vasena pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1645_0: Mahārājā, mahārājā, mahārājāno. Mahārājānaṃ, mahārājaṃ, mahārājāno. Mahāraññā, mahārājinā,
anya-e0803n:1645_1: mahārājūhi, mahārājūbhi. Mahārañño, mahārājino, mahāraññaṃ, mahārājūnaṃ. Mahāraññā,
anya-e0803n:1645_2: mahārājūhi, mahārājūbhi. Mahārañño, mahārājino, mahāraññaṃ, mahārājūnaṃ. Mahāraññe,
anya-e0803n:1645_3: mahārājini, mahārājūsu. Bho mahārāja, bhavanto mahārājāno.
anya-e0803n:1646_0: Idhāpi pakaraṇadvayanayena “bho mahārājā” iti ekavacanabahuvacanānipi daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0803n:1646_1: Yathā ca “mahārājā”ti ākārantapadassa vasena, evaṃ “sivirājā, dhammarājā, devarājā”tiādīnampi
anya-e0803n:1647: Idha aparāpi atthassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ kriyāpadehi saddhiṃ yojetvā ākārantokārantānaṃ missakavasena nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n:1648_0: Mahārājā, mahārājo tiṭṭhati, mahārājāno, mahārājā tiṭṭhanti. Mahārājānaṃ, mahārājaṃ
anya-e0803n:1648_1: passati, mahārājāno, mahārāje passati. Mahāraññā, mahārājinā, mahārājena kataṃ, mahārājūhi,
anya-e0803n:1648_2: mahārājūbhi, mahārājehi, mahārājebhi kataṃ. Mahārañño, mahārājino, mahārājassa dīyate,
anya-e0803n:1648_3: mahāraññā, mahārājā, mahārājasmā, mahārājamhā nissaṭaṃ, mahārājūhi, mahārājūbhi,
anya-e0803n:1648_4: mahārājehi, mahārājebhi nissaṭaṃ. Mahārañño, mahārājino, mahārājassa pariggaho, mahāraññaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1648_5: mahārājūnaṃ, mahārājānaṃ pariggaho. Mahāraññe, mahārājini, mahārāje, mahārājasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:1648_6: mahārājamhi patiṭṭhitaṃ, mahārājūsu, mahārājesu patiṭṭhitaṃ. Bho mahārāja tvaṃ tiṭṭha,
anya-e0803n:1648_7: bhonto mahārājāno, mahārājā tumhe tiṭṭhathāti. Evaṃ “yuvarājā, yuvarājo”tiādīsupi.
anya-e0803n:1649_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ “kasmā pakaraṇakattunā imasmiṃ ṭhāne mahanto vāyāmo ca mahanto
anya-e0803n:1649_1: ca parakkamo kato, nanvetesupi padesu kānici buddhavacane vijjanti, kānici na vijjantīti?
anya-e0803n:1649_2: Viññūhi te evaṃ vattabbā “pakaraṇakattārenettha so ca mahanto vāyāmo so ca mahanto
anya-e0803n:1649_3: parakkamo sāṭṭhakathe navaṅge satthusāsane saddesu ca atthesu ca sotārānaṃ suṭṭhu
anya-e0803n:1649_4: kosalluppādanena sāsanassopakāratthaṃ kato, yāni cetāni tena padāni dassitāni, etesu
anya-e0803n:1649_5: kānici buddhavacane vijjanti, kānici na vijjanti. Ettha yāni buddhavacane vijjanti,
anya-e0803n:1649_6: tāni vijjamānavasena gahitāni. Yāni na vijjanti, tāni porāṇaṭṭhakathādīsu vijjamānavasena
anya-e0803n:1649_7: pāḷinayavasena ca gahitānī”ti. Atrāyaṃ saṅkhepato adhippāyavibhāvanā –
anya-e0803n:1652_0: Idaṃ ākārantassa mahārājasaddassa nidassanaṃ. Yasmā “sabbasakho”ti pāḷi vijjati,
anya-e0803n:1652_1: tasmā tena nayena “mahārājo”tipi okāranto diṭṭho nāma hoti purisanayena yojetabbo
anya-e0803n:1652_2: ca. Teneva ca “tamabravi mahārājā. Nikkhamante mahārāje”tiādīni dissanti.
anya-e0803n:1653_0: Evaṃ mahārājasaddassa okārantatte siddhe “mahārājā, mahārājasmā, mahārājamhā”ti pañcamiyā
anya-e0803n:1653_1: ekavacanañca “mahārāje, mahārājasmiṃ, mahārājamhī”ti sattamiyā ekavacanañca siddhāni
anya-e0803n:1653_2: eva honti pāḷiyaṃ avijjamānānampi nayavasena gahetabbattā. “Rājena, rājassā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:1653_3: pana nayavasena gahetabbāni na honti. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā “rājā brahmā sakhā attā”iccevamādīni
anya-e0803n:1653_4: “puriso urago”tiādīni viya aññamaññaṃ sabbathā sadisāni na honti. Tathā hi nesaṃ
anya-e0803n:1653_5: “raññā brahmunā sakhinā attanā attena sānā pumunā”tiādīni visadisānipi rūpāni bhavanti,
anya-e0803n:1653_6: tasmā tāni na sakkā nayavasena jānituṃ. Evaṃ dujjānattā pana pāḷiyaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0803n:1653_7: ca yathārutapadāneva gahetabbāni. Mahārājasaddādīnaṃ pana okārantabhāve siddheyeva
anya-e0803n:1653_8: “purisanayogadhā ime saddā”ti nayaggahaṇaṃ dissati, tasmā amhehi nayavasena “mahārājā,
anya-e0803n:1655: Yassa te kaḍḍhamānassa, hatthā daṇḍona muccatī”ti
anya-e0803n:1656_0: Ettha “hatthā”ti, “attadaṇḍā bhayaṃ jāta”nti ettha pana “daṇḍā”ti ca okārantassa
anya-e0803n:1656_1: pañcamiyekavacanassa dassanato “uragā, paṭaṅgā, vihagā”tiādīnipi okārantāni pañcamiyekavacanāni
anya-e0803n:1656_2: gahetabbāni honti. Yathā ca “dāṭhini mātimaññavho, siṅgālo mama pāṇado”ti ettha “maññavho”ti,
anya-e0803n:1656_3: “suddhā suddhehi saṃvāsaṃ, kappayavho patissatā”ti ettha pana “kappayavho”ti ca kriyāpadassa
anya-e0803n:1656_4: dassanato “gacchavho, bhuñjavho, sayavho”tiādīnipi gahetabbāni honti. Gaṇhanti ca
anya-e0803n:1656_5: tādisāni padarūpāni sāsane sukusalā kusalā, tasmā amhehipi nayaggāhavasena “mahārājā,
anya-e0803n:1656_6: mahārājasmā”tiādīni vuttāni. Nayaggāhavasena pana gahaṇe asati kathaṃ nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:1656_7: paripuṇṇā bhavissanti, satiyeva tasmiṃ paripuṇṇā bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:1657_0: Tathā hi buddhavacane anekasatasahassāni nāmikapadāni kriyāpadāni ca pāṭiekkaṃ pāṭiekkaṃ
anya-e0803n:1657_1: ekavacanabahuvacanakāhi sattahi aṭṭhahi vā nāmavibhattīhi channavutiyā ca ākhyātikavacanehi
anya-e0803n:1657_2: yojitāni na santi, nayavasena pana santiyeva, iti nayavasena “mahārājā, mahārājasmā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:1657_3: amhehi ṭhapitāni. “Mahārājā tiṭṭhanti, mahārājā tumhe tiṭṭhathā”ti imāni pana “atha
anya-e0803n:1657_4: kho cattāro mahārājā mahatiyā ca yakkhasenāya mahatiyā ca kumbhaṇḍasenāyā”ti dassanato,
anya-e0803n:1660_0: Dassanato ca vuttāni. “Mahārāja”ntiādīnipi pāḷiñca pāḷinayañca disvā eva vuttāni.
anya-e0803n:1660_1: Asamāse “rājaṃ, rājenā”tiādīni na passāma, tasmā suṭṭhu vicāretabbamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1660_2: Idañhi duddasaṃ vīrajātinā jānitabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Sace panāyasmanto buddhavacane vā porāṇikāsu
anya-e0803n:1660_3: vā aṭṭhakathāsu asamāse “rājaṃ, rājenā”tiādīni passeyyātha, tadā sādhukaṃ manasi
anya-e0803n:1660_4: karotha. Ko hi nāma sabbappakārena buddhavacane vohārappabhedaṃ jānituṃ samattho
anya-e0803n:1664_0: Brahmā, brahmā, brahmāno. Brahmānaṃ, brahmaṃ, brahmāno. Brahmunā, brahmehi, brahmebhi,
anya-e0803n:1664_1: brahmūhi, brahmūbhi. Brahmassa, brahmuno, brahmānaṃ, brahmūnaṃ. Brahmunā, brahmehi,
anya-e0803n:1664_2: brahmebhi, brahmūhi, brahmūbhi. Brahmassa, brahmuno, brahmānaṃ, brahmūnaṃ. Brahmani,
anya-e0803n:1664_3: brahmesu, bho brahma, bho brahme, bhavanto brahmāno.
anya-e0803n:1665_0: Yamakamahātheraruciyā “bho brahmā”iti bahuvacanaṃ vā. Ettha pana “paṇḍitapurisehi
anya-e0803n:1665_1: devehi brahmūhī”ti ṭīkāvacanassa dassanato, “brahmūnaṃ vacīghoso hotī”ti ca “brahmūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1665_2: vimānādīsu chandarāgo kāmāsavo na hotī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāvacanassa dassanato, “vihiṃsasaññī
anya-e0803n:1665_3: paguṇaṃ na bhāsiṃ, dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme”ti āhaccabhāsitassa ca dassanato
anya-e0803n:1665_4: “brahmūhi, brahmūbhi, brahmūnaṃ, brahme”ti padāni vuttāni, etāni cūḷaniruttiniruttipiṭakakaccāyanesu na āgatāni.
anya-e0803n:1666_0: Sakhā, sakhā, sakhino, sakhāno, sakhāyo. Sakhaṃ, sakhāraṃ, sakhānaṃ, sakhino, sakhāno,
anya-e0803n:1666_1: sakhāyo. Sakhinā, sakhārehi, sakhārebhi, sakhehi, sakhebhi. Sakhissa, sakhino, sakhīnaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1666_2: sakhārānaṃ, sakhānaṃ. Sakhārasmā, sakhinā, sakhārehi, sakhārebhi, sakhehi, sakhebhi.
anya-e0803n:1666_3: Sakhissa, sakhino, sakhīnaṃ, sakhārānaṃ, sakhānaṃ. Sakhe, sakhesu, sakhāresu. Bho
anya-e0803n:1666_4: sakha, bho sakhā, bho sakhi, bho sakhī, bho sakhe, bhavanto sakhino, sakhāno, sakhāyo.
anya-e0803n:1667_0: Yamakamahātheramatena “bho sakhā”iti bahuvacanaṃ vā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana suvaṇṇakakkaṭajātake
anya-e0803n:1667_1: “hare sakhā kissa nu maṃ jahāsī”ti dīghavasena vutto sakhāsaddo ālapanekavacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1667_2: tasmā yamakamahātheranayo na yujjatīti ce? No na yujjati. Yasmā “netādisā sakhā honti,
anya-e0803n:1667_3: labbhā me jīvato sakhā”ti manojajātake sakhāsaddo ekavacanampi hoti bahuvacanampi.
anya-e0803n:1667_4: Tathā hi tattha paṭhamapāde bahuvacanaṃ, dutiyapāde panekavacanaṃ, tasmā yamakamahātherena
anya-e0803n:1667_5: paccattālapanabahuvacanaṭṭhāne sakhāsaddo vutto. Ettha ca “sabbamitto sabbasakho,
anya-e0803n:1667_6: sabbabhūtānukampako”ti pāṭhānulomena samāse labbhamānassa sakhasaddassa nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:1667_7: bhavati “sabbasakho, sabbasakhā, sabbasakhaṃ, sabbasakhe”tiādinā purisanayena. Tatrāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1667_8: samāsaviggaho – sabbesaṃ janānaṃ sakhā, sabbe vā janā sakhino etassāti sabbasakho, yathā sabbaverīti.
anya-e0803n:1668_0: Attā, attā, attāno. Attānaṃ, attaṃ, attāno. Attanā, attena, attanehi, attanebhi.
anya-e0803n:1668_1: Attano, attānaṃ. Attanā, attanehi, attanebhi. Attano, attānaṃ. Attani, attanesu.
anya-e0803n:1668_2: Bho atta, bhavanto attā, bhonto attāno.
anya-e0803n:1669: Ettha pana attaṃ niraṅkatvāna piyāni sevati.
anya-e0803n:1672_0: Pāḷīsu “atta”nti dassanato “atta”nti idha vuttaṃ, “attena vā attaniyena vā”ti pāḷidassanato
anya-e0803n:1672_2: etaṃ kaccāyane niruttipiṭake ca na dissati. Katthaci pana “attesū”ti āgataṃ. Sabbānetāni
anya-e0803n:1673: “Ātumā, ātumā, ātumāno. Ātumānaṃ, ātumaṃ, ātumāno. Ātumena, ātumehi, ātumebhī”tiādinā purisanayena vatvā “bho ātuma, bhavanto ātumā, ātumāno”ti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1674: Tatra attasaddassa samāse “bhāvitatto, bhāvitattā. Bhāvitattaṃ, bhāvitatte. Bhāvitattena, bhāvitattehi, bhāvitattebhī”ti purisanayeneva nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1675: Sā, sā, sāno. Sānaṃ, sāne. Sānā, sānehi, sānebhi. Sāssa, sānaṃ. Sānā, sānehi, sānebhi. Sāssa, sānaṃ. Sāne, sānesu. Bho sā, bhavanto sāno. Sā vuccati sunakho.
anya-e0803n:1676_0: Ettha ca “na yattha sā upaṭṭhito hoti. Sāva vārenti sūkara”nti nidassanapadāni. Keci
anya-e0803n:1676_1: pana sāsaddassa dutiyātatiyādīsu “saṃ, se. Senā”tiādīni rūpāni vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1676_2: Na hi tāni “saṃ, se. Senā”tiādīni rūpāni buddhavacane ceva aṭṭhakathādīsu ca niruttipiṭake
anya-e0803n:1676_3: ca dissanti. Evaṃ pana niruttipiṭake vuttaṃ “sā tiṭṭhati, sāno tiṭṭhanti. Sānaṃ passati,
anya-e0803n:1676_4: sāne passati. Sānā kataṃ, sānehi kataṃ, sānebhi kataṃ. Sāssa dīyate, sānaṃ dīyate.
anya-e0803n:1676_5: Sānā nissaṭaṃ, sānehi nissaṭaṃ, sānebhi nissaṭaṃ. Sāssa pariggaho, sānaṃ pariggaho.
anya-e0803n:1676_6: Sāne patiṭṭhitaṃ, sānesu patiṭṭhitaṃ. Bho sā, bhavanto sāno”ti, tasmā niruttipiṭake
anya-e0803n:1677_0: Atridaṃ vattabbaṃ – yathā “sehi dārehi asantuṭṭho”tiādīsu pulliṅge vattamānassa “sako”iti
anya-e0803n:1677_1: atthavācakassa sasaddassa “attano ayanti so”ti etasmiṃ atthe “so, sā. Saṃ, se. Sena,
anya-e0803n:1677_2: sehi, sebhi. Sassa, sānaṃ. Sā, sasmā, samhā, sehi, sebhi. Sassa, sānaṃ. Se, sasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:1677_3: samhi, sesū”ti purisanayena rūpāni bhavanti, na tathā sunakhavācakassa sāsaddassa
anya-e0803n:1677_4: rūpāni bhavanti. Yathā vā “hiṃsanti attasambhūtā, tacasāraṃva saṃ phalaṃ. Sāni kammāni
anya-e0803n:1677_5: tappenti, kosalaṃ sena’santuṭṭhaṃ, jīvaggāhaṃ agāhayī”tiādīsu napuṃsakaliṅge vattamānassa
anya-e0803n:1677_6: sakamiccatthavācakassa sasaddassa “saṃ, sāni, sā. Saṃ, sāni, se. Sena, sehi, sebhi.
anya-e0803n:1677_7: Sassa, sānaṃ. Sā, sasmā, samhā, sehi, sebhi. Sassa, sānaṃ. Se, sasmiṃ, samhi, sesū”ti
anya-e0803n:1677_8: cittanayena rūpāni bhavanti, na tathā sunakhavācakassa sāsaddassa rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:1677_9: Evaṃ sante kasmā tehi ācariyehi dutiyātatiyāṭhāne “saṃ, se. Senā”ti vuttaṃ, kasmā
anya-e0803n:1677_10: ca pañcamīṭhāne “sā, sasmā, samhā”ti vuttaṃ, sattamīṭhāne ca “se, sasmiṃ, samhī”ti
anya-e0803n:1677_11: ca vuttaṃ? Sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ, takkagāhamattena gahitaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Sunakhavācako
anya-e0803n:1677_12: hi sāsaddo ākārantatāpakatiko, na purisa cittasaddādayo viya akārantatāpakatiko.
anya-e0803n:1677_13: Yāya imassa īdisāni rūpāni siyuṃ, sā ca pakati natthi. Na ceso “rājā, brahmā, sakhā,
anya-e0803n:1677_14: attā” iccevamādayo viya paṭhamaṃ akārantabhāve ṭhatvā pacchā paṭiladdhaākārantatā,
anya-e0803n:1677_15: atha kho niccamokārantatāpakatiko gosaddo viya niccamākārantatāpakatiko. Niccamākārantatāpakatikassa
anya-e0803n:1677_16: ca evarūpāni rūpāni na bhavanti, tasmā niruttipiṭake pabhinnapaṭisambhidena āyasmatā
anya-e0803n:1677_17: mahākaccāyanena na vuttāni. Sacepi maññeyyuṃ “attaṃ, attenā’ti ca dassanato ‘saṃ,
anya-e0803n:1677_18: senā’ti imāni pana gahetabbānī”ti. Na gahetabbāni “rājā, brahmā, sakhā, attā, sā,
anya-e0803n:1677_19: pumā”iccevamādīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ padamālāvasena visadisattā nayavasena gahetabbākārassa
anya-e0803n:1677_20: asambhavato. Īdise hi ṭhāne nayaggāhavasena gahaṇaṃ nāma sadosaṃyeva siyā, tasmā
anya-e0803n:1678_0: Aparampi atra vattabbaṃ – yathā hi “sāhi nārīhi te yantī”ti vutte “attano nārī”ti,
anya-e0803n:1678_1: “sā nārī”ti evaṃ atthavato itthiliṅgassa kaññāsaddena sadisassa sāsaddassa “sā, sā,
anya-e0803n:1678_2: sāyo. Saṃ, sā, sāyo. Sāya, sāhi, sābhi. Sāya, sānaṃ. Sāya, sāhi, sābhi. Sāya, sānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1678_3: Sāya, sāyaṃ, sāsū”ti kaññānayena rūpāni bhavanti, na tathā imassa sunakhavācakassa
anya-e0803n:1678_4: sāsaddassa rūpāni bhavanti. Evaṃ sante kasmā te ācariyā tatiyābahuvacanaṭṭhāne ca
anya-e0803n:1678_5: “sāhi, sābhī”ti rūpāni icchanti, kasmā ca sattamībahuvacanaṭṭhāne “sāsū”ti? Idampi
anya-e0803n:1678_6: akāraṇaṃ ākārantapulliṅgattā. Kasmā ca pana catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanaṭṭhāne pubbakkharassa
anya-e0803n:1678_7: rassavasena “sassa”iti rūpaṃ icchanti? Idampi akāraṇaṃ sunakhavācakassa sāsaddassa
anya-e0803n:1678_8: ākārantatāpakatikattā. Ākārantatāpakatikassa ca sāsaddassa yathā akārantatāpakatikassa
anya-e0803n:1678_10: abhāvato. Teneva āyasmā kaccāno niruttipiṭake sunakhavācakassa sāsaddassa rūpaṃ dassento
anya-e0803n:1678_12: ca pana te ācariyā catutthekavacanaṭṭhāne “sāya”iti rūpaṃ icchanti? Idampi akāraṇaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1678_13: ṭhapetvā hi ākārantitthiliṅge ghasaññato ākārato paresaṃ nādīnaṃ āyādesañca akārantato
anya-e0803n:1678_14: punnapuṃsakaliṅgato parassa catutthekavacanassa āyādesañca ākārantapulliṅge aghato
anya-e0803n:1678_15: ākārantato parassa catutthekavacanassa katthacipi āyādeso na dissati. Niruttipiṭake
anya-e0803n:1678_16: ca tādisaṃ rūpaṃ na vuttaṃ, avacanaṃyeva yuttataraṃ buddhavacane aṭṭhakathādīsu ca
anya-e0803n:1678_17: anāgamanato. Yā panamhehi niruttipiṭakaṃ nissāya buddhavacanañca sunakhavācakassa
anya-e0803n:1678_18: sāsaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuttā, sāyeva sārato paccetabbā. Etthāpi nānāatthesu vattamānānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1678_19: liṅgattayapariyāpannānaṃ sā so saṃiccetesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālāsu
anya-e0803n:1679_0: Ettha siyā – yo tumhehi sāsaddo “taṃsaddatthe ca sunakhe ca sakamiccatthe ca vattatī”ti
anya-e0803n:1679_1: icchito, kathaṃ taṃ “sā”ti vutteyeva “imassa atthassa vācako”ti jānantīti? Na jānanti,
anya-e0803n:1679_2: payogavasena pana jānanti lokiyajanā ceva paṇḍitā ca. Payogavasena hi “sā maddī nāgamāruhi,
anya-e0803n:1679_3: nātibaddhaṃva kuñjara”ntiādīsu sāsaddassa taṃsaddatthatā viññāyati, evaṃ sāsaddo
anya-e0803n:1679_4: taṃsaddatthe ca vattati. “Na yattha sā upaṭṭhito hoti. Bhagavato sājātimpi sutvā
anya-e0803n:1679_5: sattā amatarasabhāgino bhavantī”tiādīsu sāsaddassa sunakhavācakatā viññāyati.
anya-e0803n:1684_0: Ettha pana sāsaddassa rassabhāvakaraṇena “sapāko”ti pāḷi ṭhitāti atthaṃ aggahetvā
anya-e0803n:1684_1: “sānaṃ sunakhānaṃ idaṃ maṃsanti sa”miti atthaṃ gahetvā “saṃ pacatīti sapāko”ti vuttanti
anya-e0803n:1684_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sapākoti sapākacaṇḍālo” icceva vuttaṃ. Tampi etadevatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:1684_3: dīpeti. Evaṃ sāsaddo sunakhe ca vattati. “Sā dārā jantūnaṃ piyā”ti vutte pana “sakā
anya-e0803n:1684_4: dārā sattānaṃ piyā”ti atthadīpanavasena sāsaddassa sakavācakatā paññāyati. Evaṃ sāsaddo
anya-e0803n:1684_5: sakamiccatthe ca vattati. Iti sāsaddaṃ payogavasena īdisatthassa vācakoti jānanti. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0803n:1689: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ “na yattha sā upaṭṭhito hotī”ti ekavacanappayogadassanato ca,

anya-e0803n:1692: Bahuvacanappayogadassanato ca, niruttipiṭake “sāno”iccādidassanato ca “sā, sā, sāno. Sānaṃ, sāne. Sānā”tiādinā sunakhavācakassa sāsaddassa nāmikapadamālā kathitā.
anya-e0803n:1694_0: Pumā, pumā, pumāno. Pumānaṃ, pumāne. Pumānā, pumunā, pumena, pumānehi, pumānebhi.

anya-e0803n:1694_2: Pumāne, pumānesu. Bho puma, bhavanto pumā, pumāno. “Bho pumā”iti bahuvacane nayopi ñeyyo.
anya-e0803n:1696: “Thiyo tassa pajāyanti, na pumā jāyare kule;
anya-e0803n:1697: Yo jānaṃ pucchito pañhaṃ, aññathā naṃ viyākare”ti
anya-e0803n:1698_0: Ayaṃ pāḷi pumasaddassa bahuvacanabhāvasādhikā, kaccāyane “he pumaṃ”iti sānusāraṃ
anya-e0803n:1698_1: ālapanekavacanaṃ dissati. Tadanekesu pāḷippadesesu ca aṭṭhakathāsu ca sānusārānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1698_2: ālapanavacanānaṃ adassanato idha na vadāmi. Upaparikkhitvā yuttaṃ ce, gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1698_3: “Yasassi naṃ paññavantaṃ visayhā”ti ettha pana chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ āgamavasenevānusāro
anya-e0803n:1698_4: hoti, na sabhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayamākārantavasena nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:1704: Meghesu gajjamānesu, gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti tā tadā”ti ca
anya-e0803n:1706_0: Pumo, pumā. Pumaṃ, pume. Pumena, pumehi, pumebhi. Pumassa, pumānaṃ. Pumā, pumasmā,

anya-e0803n:1712_0: Daḷhadhammā, daḷhadhammā, daḷhadhammāno. Daḷhadhammānaṃ, daḷhadhammāne. Daḷhadhamminā,
anya-e0803n:1712_1: daḷhadhammehi, daḷhadhammebhi. Daḷhadhammassa, daḷhadhammānaṃ. Daḷhadhamminā, daḷhadhammehi,
anya-e0803n:1712_2: daḷhadhammebhi. Daḷhadhammassa, daḷhadhammānaṃ. Daḷhadhamme daḷhadhammesu. Bho daḷhadhamma,
anya-e0803n:1712_3: bhavanto daḷhadhammāno, bhavanto daḷhadhammā. “Bho daḷhadhammāno, bho daḷhadhammā”iti
anya-e0803n:1712_4: puthuvacanampi ñeyyaṃ, evaṃ paccakkhadhammasaddassa nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1713_0: Ettha ca “seyyathāpi bhikkhave cattāro dhanuggahā daḷhadhammā”ti idaṃ nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1713_1: Imissaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “daḷhadhammā” iti bahuvacanavasena āgatattā daḷhadhammasaddo
anya-e0803n:1713_2: ākārantotipi okārantotipi appasiddho tadantānaṃ bahuvacanabhāve tulyarūpattā. Tathāpi
anya-e0803n:1713_3: amhehi padamālā ākārantavaseneva yojitā. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu daḷhadhammasaddo ākārantotipi
anya-e0803n:1713_4: okārantotipi vattuṃ yujjateva aparibyattarūpattā. Aññasmiṃ pana pāḷippadese atīva
anya-e0803n:1713_5: paribyatto hutvā okāranta daḷhadhammasaddo dvidhā dissati guṇasaddapaṇṇattivācakasaddavasena.
anya-e0803n:1713_6: Tattha “issatte casmi kusalo, daḷhadhammoti vissuto”ti ettha daḷhadhammasaddo okāranto
anya-e0803n:1713_7: guṇasaddo. “Bārāṇasiyaṃ daḷhadhammo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresī”ti ettha pana paṇṇattivācakasaddo.
anya-e0803n:1713_8: Evaṃ okāranto daḷhadhammasaddo dvidhā diṭṭho. Tassa pana “daḷhadhammo, daḷhadhammā.
anya-e0803n:1713_9: Daḷhadhammaṃ, daḷhadhamme”ti purisanayena nāmikapadamālā ñeyyā, ākārantokārantānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1714_0: Daḷhadhammā, daḷhadhammo, daḷhadhammāno, daḷhadhammā. Daḷhadhammānaṃ, daḷhadhammaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1714_1: daḷhadhammāne, daḷhadhamme. Daḷhadhamminā, daḷhadhammena, daḷhadhammehi, daḷhadhammebhi.
anya-e0803n:1714_2: Daḷhadhammassa, daḷhadhammānaṃ. Daḷadhamminā, daḷhadhammā, daḷhadhammasmā, daḷhadhammamhā,
anya-e0803n:1714_3: daḷhadhammehi, daḷhadhammebhi. Daḷhadhammassa, daḷhadhammānaṃ. Daḷhadhamme, daḷhadhammasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:1714_4: daḷhadhammamhi, daḷhadhammesu. Bho daḷhadhamma, bhavanto daḷhadhammāno, bhavanto
anya-e0803n:1714_5: daḷhadhammāti. Evaṃ paccakkhadhammā, paccakkhadhammoti missakapadamālā ca yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1716_0: Vivaṭacchadā, vivaṭacchadā, vivaṭacchadāno. Vivaṭacchadānaṃ, vivaṭacchadāne. Vivaṭacchadena,
anya-e0803n:1716_3: vivaṭacchadesu. Bho vivaṭacchada, bhavanto vivaṭacchadā, bhavanto vivaṭacchadāno.

anya-e0803n:1717_1: loke vivaṭacchadā”ti pāḷidassanato ākārantavasena kathitā. “Loke vivaṭacchado”tipi
anya-e0803n:1717_2: pāḷidassanato pana okārantavasenapi kathetabbā “vivaṭacchado, vivaṭacchadā, vivaṭacchadaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1718: Idāni vattahasaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccate – vattahāti sakko.
anya-e0803n:1719_0: Vattahā, vattahāno. Vattahānaṃ, vattahāne. Vattahānā, vattahānehi, vattahānebhi.

anya-e0803n:1721_0: Vuttasirā, vuttasirā, vuttasirāno. Vuttasirānaṃ, vuttasirāne. Vuttasirānā, vuttasirānehi,

anya-e0803n:1823_7: Imasmiṃ atthe “santo, asanto”timāni bahuvacanakāniyeva bhavanti, na katthacipi ekavacanakāni.
anya-e0803n:1823_8: Kasmā? Paṇṇattivācakattā. Aññatra pana “santo, danto”tiādīsu ekavacanāniyeva ṭhapetvā
anya-e0803n:1824: Idāni paṇṇattivācakānaṃ tesaṃ kānici payogāni kathayāma –
anya-e0803n:1825_0: Sameti asatā asaṃ. Yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ. Na sā sabhā yattha
anya-e0803n:1825_1: na santi santo. Asanto nirayaṃ yanti, santo saggaparāyaṇā. Asante nopaseveyya, sante
anya-e0803n:1825_2: seveyya paṇḍito. Sabbhireva samāsetha. Sataṃ dhammo iccevamādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:1826_0: Yo panamhehi padamālāyaṃ “sabbhī”ti ayaṃ saddo tatiyāpañcamībahuvacanavasena yojito,
anya-e0803n:1826_1: so ca kho santaiti akārantapakativasena, aññattha pana “sabbhī”ti ikārantapakativasena
anya-e0803n:1826_2: yojetabbo. Tathā hi sabbhīti sappuriso nibbānañca, sundarādhivacanaṃ vā etaṃ sabbhīti.
anya-e0803n:1826_3: Sabbo cāyamattho sāṭṭhakathāya “bahumpetaṃ asabbhi jātavedā”ti imāya pāḷiyā “santo
anya-e0803n:1826_4: have sabbhi pavedayantī”ti imāya ca dīpetabbo.
anya-e0803n:1829_0: Atrāyaṃ yojanā – bho sabbhi tiṭṭha, sabbhi tiṭṭhati, sabbhi saha gacchati, sabbhi
anya-e0803n:1829_1: apehi, asabbhirūpo puriso. Yasmā panāyaṃ sāsanānukūlā, tasmā imissā tadanukūlattaṃ
anya-e0803n:1829_2: dassetuṃ idha sāsanato payoge dassessāma atakkāvacare vicitte sugatapāḷinaye sotūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:1829_3: visāradamatipaṭilābhatthaṃ. Taṃ yathā? Bahumpetaṃ asabbhi jātaveda, yaṃ taṃ vāladhinā’bhipūjayāma.
anya-e0803n:1829_4: Sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṃ. Yaṃ sālavanasmiṃ senako, pāpakammamakari asabbhirūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1829_5: Ābādhoyaṃ asabbhirūpo. Asammodako thaddho asabbhirūpo”ti. Tattha ālapanavacane diṭṭheyeva
anya-e0803n:1829_6: paccattavacanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatampi diṭṭhameva hoti. Tathā karaṇavacane diṭṭheyeva
anya-e0803n:1829_7: nissakkavacanampi diṭṭhameva hoti. Samāse saddarūpe diṭṭheyeva byāse saddarūpaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ
anya-e0803n:1829_8: diṭṭhameva hoti ṭhapetvā “hetusatthāradassana”ntiādīni. Tattha ca nibbānavācako ce,
anya-e0803n:1829_9: sabbhisaddo itthiliṅgo santivisuddhi nibbutisaddā viya, so ca yamakamahātheramate
anya-e0803n:1829_10: rattinayena yojetabbo. Sabbesamikārantitthiliṅgānaṃ sādhāraṇo hi so nayo. Sundaratthavācako
anya-e0803n:1829_11: ce, aggi ratti aṭṭhinayehi yojetabbo vāccaliṅgattā. “Sabbhidhammabhūtaṃ nibbāna”nti
anya-e0803n:1829_12: ettha hi sundaradhammabhūtaṃ nibbānanti attho. Evaṃ pāḷinayavasena ālapanādīsu pañcasu
anya-e0803n:1829_13: ṭhānesu sabbhisaddassa pavattiṃ ñatvā puna aṭṭhakathānayavasenapi tappavatti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:1829_14: Kathaṃ? Yasmā sagāthāvaggassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “santo ‘sabbhīhi saddhiṃ sataṃ dhammo
anya-e0803n:1829_15: na jaraṃ upetī’ti pavedayantī”ti imasmiṃ padese “sabbhīhī”ti hivacanavasena saddaracanāviseso
anya-e0803n:1829_16: aṭṭhakathācariyehi dassito, tasmā sabbhisaddo sabbesupi vibhattivacanesu yojetabbo. Atridaṃ vadāma –
anya-e0803n:1831: Yato tato sabbhisaddaṃ, dhīro sabbattha yojaye.
anya-e0803n:1833: Yasmā tasmā sabbhisaddaṃ, viññū sabbadhi yojaye.
anya-e0803n:1834_0: “Ovadeyyānusāseyya, asabbhā ca nivāraye”ti ettha pana “asabbhā”tipadaṃ vicitravuttīsu
anya-e0803n:1834_1: taddhitapaccayesu ṇyapaccayavasena nipphattimupāgatanti veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Yebhuyyena
anya-e0803n:1834_2: asabbhīsu bhavaṃ asabbhaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Akusalaṃ, tato asabbhā akusaladhammā nivāraye
anya-e0803n:1834_3: ca, kusaladhamme patiṭṭhapeyyāti attho. “Amhe asabbhāhi vācāhi vikkosamānā tibbāhi
anya-e0803n:1834_4: sattīhi hanissantī”ti ettha tu asabbhīnaṃ etāti asabbhā, na vā sabbhīnaṃ etātipi
anya-e0803n:1834_5: asabbhāti nibbacanaṃ, ṇyapaccayavasena ca padasiddhi veditabbā. Yā ca panettha amhehi
anya-e0803n:1834_6: santasaddassa “saṃ, santo. Saṃ, santaṃ, sante”tiādinā padamālā dassitā, tattha “sameti
anya-e0803n:1834_7: asatā asa”nti pāḷiyaṃ “asa”nti pade diṭṭheyeva “sa”nti padaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anāgatampi diṭṭhameva
anya-e0803n:1834_8: hoti yugaḷabhāvena vijjamānatārahattā. Evaṃ diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1834_9: Atha vā “asa”nti ettha na saṃ asanti samāsaviggahavasenādhigantabbattā “sa”miti padaṃ
anya-e0803n:1834_10: diṭṭhameva hoti. Evamaññatrāpi nayo. Tatra santi sappuriso. Asanti asappuriso. Itthiliṅgevattabbe
anya-e0803n:1834_11: “asatī, asā”ti rūpāni bhavanti. “Asatī, asatī, asatiyo, asā. Asatiṃ, asatī, asatiyo.
anya-e0803n:1834_12: Asāya, asatiyā, asatīhi, asatībhi. Asatiyā, asatīna”nti vakkhamāna itthinayena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:1835_0: Ettha pana “asā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati. Mā ca vasaṃ asatīnaṃ nigacche”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:1835_1: dassetabbāni. Asāti cettha asatīti ca samānatthā, asantajātikāti hi tesaṃ attho.
anya-e0803n:1835_2: Yasmā pana jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “asāti asatiyo lāmikā, atha vā sātaṃ vuccati sukhaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1835_3: taṃ tāsu natthi, attani paṭibaddhacittānaṃ asātameva dentītipi asā, dukkhā, dukkhavatthubhūtāti
anya-e0803n:1835_4: attho”ti atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ, tasmā sātaṃ natthi etissanti asāti atthe “asā”ti padassa
anya-e0803n:1835_5: yathā ritto assādo etthāti rittassantipadassa luttuttarakkharassa “rittassaṃ, rittassāni.
anya-e0803n:1835_6: Rittassa”nti cittanayena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā, tathā “asā, asā, asāyo. Asaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1836: Ettha ca yo amhehi “santo”iti saddo dassito. So katthaci ekavacanabahuvacanabhāvena saṃvijjamānasaddassatthampi vadati, tassa vasena ayaṃ nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n:1837_0: Santo, santo, santā. Santaṃ, sante. Satā, santena, santehi, santebhi. Sato, santassa,
anya-e0803n:1837_1: sataṃ, santānaṃ. Satā, santā, santasmā, santamhā, santehi, santebhi. Sato, santassa,
anya-e0803n:1837_2: sataṃ, santānaṃ. Sati, sante, santasmiṃ, santamhi, santesu. Bho santa, bhavanto santo, bhavanto santā.
anya-e0803n:1838_0: Ettha pana “ayaṃ kho bhikkhave aṭṭhamo bhaddo assājānīyo santo saṃvijjamāno lokasmiṃ.
anya-e0803n:1838_1: Cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Asatā tucchā musā abhūtena
anya-e0803n:1838_2: abbhācikkhanti. Bhave kho sati jāti hoti”iccevamādīni payogāni bhavanti. “Saṅkhāresu
anya-e0803n:1838_3: kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotī”tiādīsu pana satisaddo vacanavipallāsavasena ṭhitoti gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:1839_0: Tatra ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā ṭhitesu santosaddesu bahuvacanasantosaddaṃ
anya-e0803n:1839_1: ṭhapetvā sesā samānasaddassatthampi vadanti, tasmā “santoti samāno, santāti samānā”tiādinā
anya-e0803n:1839_2: attho kathetabbo. Samānoti imassa ca “honto”ti attho “pahu samāno vipulatthacintī,
anya-e0803n:1839_3: kiṃ kāraṇā me na karosi dukkha”ntiādīsu viya. Payogāni pana –
anya-e0803n:1841: Pahu santo na bharati, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1843: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti
anya-e0803n:1845_0: Apica santosaddo yasmā “kilanto”ti ca “upasanto”ti ca “niruddho”ti ca atthaṃ vadati,
anya-e0803n:1845_1: tasmā tesaṃ vasena santasaddassa “santo, santā. Santaṃ, sante. Santenā”ti purisanayena
anya-e0803n:1845_2: nāmikapadamālā veditabbā. Ettha ca “santo tasito. Dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ. Santo
anya-e0803n:1845_3: danto niyato brahmacārī. Santo niruddho atthaṅgato abbhatthaṅgato”tiādīni payogāni.
anya-e0803n:1845_4: Napuṃsakaliṅge vattabbe “santaṃ, santānī”ti cittanayena nāmikapadamālā. Sā ca “saṃvijjamānaṃ
anya-e0803n:1845_5: samānaṃ kilantaṃ upasantaṃ niruddha”miti atthadīpakāpadavatīti veditabbā. Atha vā
anya-e0803n:1845_6: “upādāne kho sati bhavo hotī”tiādīsu napuṃsakappayogadassanato santasaddassa saṃvijjamānasaddatthavācakatte
anya-e0803n:1845_7: tatiyāpañcamīcatutthīchaṭṭhīsattamīṭhāne “satā, sato, sataṃ, satī”ti padāni adhikāni
anya-e0803n:1845_8: vattabbāni, sesāni cittanayena ñeyyāni. Itthiliṅge pana vattabbe “santā, santā, santāyo.
anya-e0803n:1845_9: Santaṃ, santā, santāyo. Santāyā”ti kaññānayena ca, santī, santī, santiyo. Santiṃ,
anya-e0803n:1845_10: santī, santiyo. Santiyā”ti itthinayena ca nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Etāsu paṭhamā
anya-e0803n:1845_11: “saṃvijjamānā kilantā upasantā niruddhā”ti atthadīpakāpadavatī, ettha payogā suviññeyyāva.
anya-e0803n:1845_12: Dutiyā pana “saṃvijjamānā samānā”ti atthadīpakāpadavatī. Tathā hi “santī āpatti āvikātabbā”ti
anya-e0803n:1850_0: Ettha pana samānā “santī”ti vuccati. Aparāpi itthiliṅge vattabbe padamālā veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:1850_1: Santīsaddassa hi saṃvijjamānasaddatthavācakatte “jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī”tiādinā
anya-e0803n:1850_2: itthiliṅgappayogadassanato sattamīṭhāne “sati, satiyā, satiyaṃ, santiyā, santiyaṃ,
anya-e0803n:1850_3: santīsū”ti rūpāni vattabbāni. Sesāni itthinayena ñeyyāni. Ayaṃ tatiyā, ettha ca “asantiyā
anya-e0803n:1850_4: āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabba”nti pāḷi “santiyā”iccādīnaṃ atthibhāve nidassanaṃ. Aparo
anya-e0803n:1850_5: nayo – satīsaddassa “samānā”ti imasmiṃ atthe “yā tvaṃ vasasi jiṇṇassa, evaṃ dahariyā
anya-e0803n:1850_6: satī”ti ca “ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu, evaṃ dahariyaṃ sati”nti ca pāḷidassanato “satī,
anya-e0803n:1850_7: satī, satiyo. Satiṃ, satī, satiyo. Satiyā”tiādīnipi rūpāni yojetabbāni, saṃyoge nakāralopavasena vā.
anya-e0803n:1851_0: Idāni “santo, santā”ti padadvayassa payoganicchayaṃ kathayāma payogesu sotūnaṃ asammūḷhabhāvāya.
anya-e0803n:1851_1: Tathā hi “sappurisā”ti vā “paṇḍitā”ti vā bahuvacanavasena atthaṃ vattukāmena “santo
anya-e0803n:1851_4: bahuvacanavasena atthaṃ vattukāmena “santo sappurisā”ti, “santo saṃvijjamānā”ti ca
anya-e0803n:1851_5: evaṃ vuttabahuvacanasadisaṃ “santo”ti vā “santā”ti vā bahuvacanaṃ vattabbaṃ, “kilanto”ti
anya-e0803n:1851_6: vā “samāno”ti vā “upasanto”ti vā “niruddho”ti vā ekavacanavasena atthaṃ vattukāmena
anya-e0803n:1851_7: “santo sappurisā”ti evaṃ vuttabahuvacanasadisaṃ “santo”ti ekavacanaṃ vattabbaṃ. Teyevatthe
anya-e0803n:1851_8: bahuvacanavasena vattukāmena pana “santā sūnehi pādehi, ko ne hatthe gahessatī”ti
anya-e0803n:1851_9: ettha viya “santā”ti bahuvacanaṃ vattabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā. Idañhi
anya-e0803n:1851_10: mandabuddhīnaṃ sammohaṭṭhānaṃ. Ayampi panettha saṅgaho veditabbo –
anya-e0803n:1855_0: Mahaṃ, mahā, mahanto, mahantā. Mahantaṃ, mahante. Mahatā, mahantena, mahantehi, mahantebhi.
anya-e0803n:1855_1: Mahato, mahantassa, mahantānaṃ, mahataṃ. Mahatā, mahantā, mahantasmā, mahantamhā,
anya-e0803n:1855_2: mahantehi, mahantebhi. Mahato, mahantassa, mahantānaṃ, mahataṃ. Mahati, mahante,
anya-e0803n:1855_3: mahantasmiṃ, mahantamhi, mahantesu. Bho maha, bho mahā, bhavanto mahantoti ayamamhākaṃ ruci.
anya-e0803n:1856_0: Ettha “mahanto, mahantā. Mahantaṃ, mahante. Mahantenā”ti purisanayopi labbhati, tasmā
anya-e0803n:1856_1: “bho mahanta, bhavanto mahantā”ti ālapanapadāni yojetabbāni. Napuṃsakaliṅge vattabbe
anya-e0803n:1856_2: “mahantaṃ, mahantānī”ti cittanayopi labbhati. Itthiliṅge vattabbe “mahatī, mahatī,
anya-e0803n:1856_3: mahatiyo. Mahatiṃ, mahatī, mahatiyo. Mahatiyā, mahatīhi mahatībhī”ti itthinayopi
anya-e0803n:1856_5: mahantā, mahantāyo. Mahanta”nti kaññānayopi labbhati, “mahantā nidhikumbhiyo”tiādīnettha
anya-e0803n:1856_6: nidassanapadāni. Kaccāyane pana “mahantī”iti padaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ “guṇavantī, kulavantī”iccādīni
anya-e0803n:1857_0: Nanu bho yasmā sāsanepi “gacchantī, carantī”tiādīni ca “iddhimantī”ti ca padaṃ dissati,
anya-e0803n:1857_1: tasmā “mahantī, guṇavantī”tiādīnipi bhavitabbanti? Na bhavitabbaṃ tathārūpassa nayassa
anya-e0803n:1857_2: vasena aggahetabbattā, “mahatī, guṇavatī”iccādinayasseva dassanato ca. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0803n:1857_3: aṭṭhakathāsu ca “seyyathāpi nāma mahatī naṅgalasīsā, itthī siyā rūpavatī, sā ca sīlavatī
anya-e0803n:1857_4: siyā. Satimatī cakkhumatī. Iddhimatī pattimatī”ti ca “mahatiṃ senaṃ disvā mahosadhasenā
anya-e0803n:1857_5: mandā, ayaṃ ativiya mahatī senā dissatī”ti ca ādīni payogāni dissanti, na “mahantī, rūpavantī”iccādīni.
anya-e0803n:1858_0: Keci pana “mahāiti saddo byāse na labbhati, samāseyeva labbhati ‘mahāpuriso’ti ettha
anya-e0803n:1858_1: viyā”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. “Mahā te upāsaka pariccāgo. Mahā vatāyaṃ bhante
anya-e0803n:1858_2: bhūmicālo. Ghoso ca vipulo mahā. Bārāṇasirajjaṃ nāma mahā. Senā sādissate mahā”ti
anya-e0803n:1858_3: payogadassanato. Evaṃ byāsepi labbhatīti veditabbaṃ, tasmā “mahaṃ, mahā, mahanto,
anya-e0803n:1858_4: mahantā. Bho mahanta, bhavanto mahantā”ti pulliṅge, “mahantaṃ, mahā, mahantāni. Bho
anya-e0803n:1858_5: mahanta, bhavanto mahantānī”ti napuṃsakaliṅge, “mahantā, mahā, mahantā, mahantāyo.
anya-e0803n:1858_6: Bhoti mahante, bhotiyo mahantā, mahantāyo”ti itthiliṅge sabbaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:1858_7: Samāse pana “mahāsatto mahāupāsako mahāupāsikā mahabbalo mahāvanaṃ mahaggataṃ mahapphalaṃ
anya-e0803n:1858_8: mahabbhaya”ntiādīni rūpāni bhavanti, taddhite “mahattano mahattaṃ mahantattaṃ mahantatā”ti
anya-e0803n:1858_9: rūpāni bhavanti. Gacchantasaddassa pana “gacchanto gacchantā”ti rūpāni vatvā sesāni
anya-e0803n:1858_10: mahantasadde vuttanayena vitthāretvā nāmikapadamālā veditabbā. Tathā “gacchanto,
anya-e0803n:1858_11: gacchantā”ti purisanayo ca “gacchantaṃ, gacchantānī”ti cittanayo ca “gacchantī, gacchantī,
anya-e0803n:1858_12: gacchantiyo”ti itthinayo ca gahetabbo. Evaṃ liṅgattayavasena “caraṃ caranto carantaṃ
anya-e0803n:1858_13: carantī, dadaṃ dadanto dadantaṃ dadantī”tiādīnaṃ anekapadasahassānaṃ nāmikapadamālā vitthāretabbā.
anya-e0803n:1859_1: ālapanekavacanattañca icchanti, te samamhehi payogo sāsane na diṭṭho nayavasenāgahetabbattā.
anya-e0803n:1859_2: Tasmā tāni ettha na vadāma. Ayaṃ pana viseso diṭṭho. Seyyathidaṃ?
anya-e0803n:1866: Adhammaṃ sārathi kayirā, mañce tvaṃ nikkhanaṃ vane”;
anya-e0803n:1872_0: Idāni samagatikattepi “jānaṃ, passa”ntiādīnaṃ liṅgavibhattivacanantaravasena yo viseso
anya-e0803n:1872_1: dissati, taṃ vadāma. Tathā hi “sā jānaṃyeva āha na jānāmīti, passaṃyeva āha na passāmī”ti
anya-e0803n:1872_2: evamādīsu jānaṃ passaṃ saddānaṃ “jānantī passantī”ti liṅgantaravasena parivattanaṃ
anya-e0803n:1872_3: bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā “gacchaṃ”iti saddassapi yathāpayogaṃ “gacchantī”ti itthiyā
anya-e0803n:1872_4: kathanattho labbhati tehi samānagatikattā, na “gacchanto”ti saddassa “gacchantī”ti
anya-e0803n:1872_5: itthiyā kathanattho labbhati tehi asamānagatikattāti kāraṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. “Api
anya-e0803n:1872_6: nu tumhe āyasmanto ekantasukhaṃ lokaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ viharathā”ti ettha “jānantā passantā”ti
anya-e0803n:1872_7: vacanantaravasena parivattanaṃ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā pana “gacchaṃ”iti saddassapi
anya-e0803n:1872_8: yathāpayogaṃ “gacchantā”ti bahuvacanattho labbhati tehi samānagatikattā, na “gacchante”ti
anya-e0803n:1872_9: saddassa “gacchantā”ti bahuvacanattho labbhati tehi asamānagatikattāti kāraṇaṃ dassitaṃ
anya-e0803n:1872_10: hoti. Esa nayo uttaratrāpi. “Bharanti mātāpitaro, pubbe katamanussara”nti ettha anussaraṃsaddassa
anya-e0803n:1872_12: buddhāna sāsana”nti ettha saraṃsaddassa sarantenāti vibhattantaravasena parivattanaṃ

anya-e0803n:2027_1: dhītuyā, dhītarānaṃ, dhītānaṃ, dhītūnaṃ. Dhītarā, dhītuyā, dhītūhi, dhītūbhi. Dhītu,
anya-e0803n:2027_2: dhītuyā, dhītarānaṃ, dhītānaṃ, dhītūnaṃ. Dhītari, dhītuyā, dhītuyaṃ, dhītūsu. Bhoti
anya-e0803n:2027_3: dhītu, bhoti dhītā, bhotiyo dhītā, dhītaro. Ettha pana.
anya-e0803n:2030_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “dhīta”nti dassanato upayogavacanaṭṭhāne “dhīta”nti vuttaṃ, tasmā idaṃ sārato
anya-e0803n:2030_1: gahetabbaṃ, tathā pāḷiyaṃ “assamaṇī hoti asakyadhītarā”ti samāsapadassa dassanato
anya-e0803n:2030_3: gahetabbameva, niruttipiṭake pana “mātā dhītā”ti padadvayaṃ saddhānaye pakkhitta,
anya-e0803n:2030_4: tamamhehi “saddhāyā”ti padassa viya “mātāyā”tiādīnaṃ pāḷiādīsu byāse adassanato visuṃ
anya-e0803n:2030_5: gahitaṃ samāseyeva hi īdisiṃ saddagatiṃ passāma “rājamātāya rājadhītāya seṭṭhidhītāyā”ti.
anya-e0803n:2030_6: Evaṃ kaññānayopi ekadesena labbhati, tathā “acchariyaṃ nandamāte, abbhutaṃ nandamāte”ti
anya-e0803n:2030_7: pāḷiyaṃ “nandamāte”ti dassanato “bhoti rājamāte, bhoti rājadhīte”ti evamādinayopi
anya-e0803n:2030_8: labbhati, tatra nandamāteti nandassa mātā nandamātā, bhoti nandamāte, evaṃ samāseyeva
anya-e0803n:2030_9: īdisī saddagati hoti, tasmā samāsapadatte “mātu dhītu duhitu”iccetesaṃ pakatirūpānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2030_10: dve koṭṭhāsā gahetabbā paṭhamaṃ dassitarūpakoṭṭhāso ca kaññānayo rūpakoṭṭhāso cāti.
anya-e0803n:2030_11: Nattādīni padāni na kevalaṃ pulliṅgāniyeva honti, atha kho itthiliṅgānipi. Tathā
anya-e0803n:2030_12: hi “visākhāya nattā kālaṅkatā hoti. Catasso mūsikā gādhaṃ kattā, no vasitā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:2031_0: Nattā, nattā, nattāro. Nattaṃ, nattāraṃ, nattāro. Nattārā, nattuyā, nattūhi, nattūbhi.
anya-e0803n:2031_1: Nattu, nattuyā, nattārānaṃ nattānaṃ, nattūnaṃ. Nattārā, nattuyā, nattūhi, nattūbhi.
anya-e0803n:2031_2: Nattu, nattuyā, nattārānaṃ, nattānaṃ, nattūnaṃ. Nattari, nattuyā, nattuyaṃ, nattūsu.
anya-e0803n:2031_3: Bhoti natta, bhoti nattā, bhotiyo nattā, nattāro.
anya-e0803n:2032: Evaṃ “kattā vasitā bhāsitā” iccādīsupi samāsapadatte pana “rājamātāya nandamāte”tiādīni viya “rājanattāya, rājanatte”tiādīni rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2036: Idāni bhūmipadādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā –
anya-e0803n:2037_0: Ratti, rattī, rattiyo. Rattiṃ, rattī, rattiyo. Rattiyā, rattīhi, rattībhi. Rattiyā,
anya-e0803n:2037_1: rattīnaṃ. Rattiyā, rattīhi, rattībhi. Rattiyā, rattīnaṃ. Rattiyā, rattiyaṃ, rattīsu.
anya-e0803n:2038_0: “Bhūmi, bhūmī, bhūmiyo. Bhūmiṃ, bhūmī, bhūmiyo”ti sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. Evaṃ “bhūti satti
anya-e0803n:2038_1: patti vutti mutti kitti khanti titti siddhi iddhi vuddhi suddhi buddhi bodhi pīti
anya-e0803n:2038_2: nandi mati asani vasani sati gati vuḍḍhi yuvati aṅguli bondi diṭṭhi tuṭṭhi nābhi”
anya-e0803n:2038_3: iccādīnampi nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Apica “ratyo amoghā gacchanti. Divā ca ratto
anya-e0803n:2038_4: ca haranti ye baliṃ. Na bhūmyā caturaṅgulo. Seti bhūmyā anutthunaṃ. Bhūmyā so patitaṃ
anya-e0803n:2038_5: pāsaṃ. Gīvāya paṭimuñcati. Imā ca nabhyo satarājicittitā. Sateratā vijjurivappabhāsare”ti
anya-e0803n:2038_6: evamādīnaṃ payogānaṃ dassanato ratti bhūmi nābhisaddādīnaṃ ayampi nāmikapadamālāviseso veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:2039_0: Ratti, rattī, rattiyo, ratyo. Rattiṃ, rattī, rattiyo, ratyo. Rattiyā, ratyā, rattīhi,
anya-e0803n:2039_1: rattībhi. Rattiyā, ratyā, rattīnaṃ. Rattiyā, ratyā, rattīhi, rattībhi. Rattiyā, ratyā,
anya-e0803n:2039_2: rattīnaṃ. Rattiyā, ratyā, rattiyaṃ ratyaṃ, ratto, rattīsu. Bhoti ratti, bhotiyo rattī, rattiyo, ratyo.
anya-e0803n:2040: Ettha “ratto”ti rūpanayaṃ vajjetvā “bhūmi, bhūmī, bhūmiyo, bhūmyo”ti sabbaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2041_0: Nābhi, nābhī, nābhiyo, nabhyo. Nābhiṃ, nābhī, nābhiyo, nabhyo. Nābhiyā, nabhyā, nābhīhi,
anya-e0803n:2041_1: nābhībhi. Nābhiyā, nabhyā, nābhīnaṃ. Nābhiyā, nabhyā, nābhīhi, nābhībhi. Nābhiyā,
anya-e0803n:2041_2: nabhyā, nābhīnaṃ. Nābhiyā, nabhyā, nābhiyaṃ, nabhyaṃ, nābhīsu. Bhoti nābhi, bhotiyo
anya-e0803n:2042_0: Bodhi, bodhī, bodhiyo, bojjho. Bodhiṃ, bodhiyaṃ, bojjhaṃ, bodhī, bodhiyo, bojjho.
anya-e0803n:2042_1: Bodhiyā, bojjhā, bodhīhi, bodhībhi. Bodhiyā, bojjhā, bodhīnaṃ. Bodhiyā, bojjhā, bodhīhi,
anya-e0803n:2042_2: bodhībhi. Bodhiyā, bojjhā, bodhīnaṃ. Bodhiyā, bojjhā, bodhiyaṃ, bojjhaṃ, bodhīsu.
anya-e0803n:2042_3: Bhoti bodhi, bhotiyo bodhī, bodhiyo, bojjho.
anya-e0803n:2043: Ettha pana “bujjhassu jina bodhiyaṃ. Aññatra bojjhā tapasā”ti vicitrapāḷinayadassanato vicitranayā nāmikapadamālā vuttā. Sabbopi cāyaṃ nayo aññatthāpi yathārahaṃ yojetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2047: Idāni bhūrīsaddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā –
anya-e0803n:2048_0: Itthī, itthī, itthiyo. Itthiṃ, itthī, itthiyo. Itthiyā, itthīhi, itthībhi. Itthiyā,
anya-e0803n:2048_1: itthīnaṃ. Itthiyā, itthīhi, itthībhi. Itthiyā, itthīnaṃ. Itthiyā, itthiyaṃ, itthīsu.
anya-e0803n:2049_0: “Bhūrī, bhūrī, bhūriyo. Bhūriṃ, bhūrī, bhūri yo”ti itthiyā samaṃ. Evaṃ bhūtī bhotī
anya-e0803n:2049_1: vibhāvinī iccādīnaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ aññesañca īkārantasaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2051: Vāpī pokkharaṇī devī, nāgī yakkhinī rājinī.
anya-e0803n:2060_0: Tathā hi “pokkharañño sumāpitā. Tā ca sattasatā bhariyā, dāsyo sattasatāni ca. Dārake
anya-e0803n:2060_1: ca ahaṃ nessaṃ, brāhmaṇyā paricārake. Najjo sandanti. Najjā nerañjarāya tīre. Lakkhyā bhava nivesanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2064_0: Evamādīnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ dassanato pokkharaṇī iccādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālāyo savisesā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2064_1: Kathaṃ? ‘Pokkharaṇī, pokkharaṇī, pokkharaṇiyo, pokkharañño. Pokkharaṇi”ntiādinā vatvā
anya-e0803n:2064_3: vattabbāni. Bhummavacanaṭṭhāne pana “pokkharaṇiyā, pokkharaññā, pokkharaṇiyaṃ, pokkharañña”nti
anya-e0803n:2064_4: ca ekavacanāni vattabbāni. Sabbattha ca padāni paripuṇṇāni kātabbāni. Tathā “dāsī,
anya-e0803n:2064_5: dāsī, dāsiyo, dāsyo. Dāsiṃ, dāsiyaṃ, dāsī, dāsiyo, dāsyo”ti vatvā karaṇavacanaṭṭhānādīsu
anya-e0803n:2064_6: “dāsiyā, dāsyā”ti ekavacanāni vattabbāni. Bhummavacanaṭṭhāne pana “dāsiyā, dāsyā,
anya-e0803n:2064_7: dāsiyaṃ, dāsya”nti ca ekavacanāni vattabbāni. Sabbattha padāni paripuṇṇāni kātabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2064_8: Ettha pana “yaṭṭhiyā paṭikoṭeti, ghare jātaṃva dāsiyaṃ. Phusissāmi vimuttiya”nti
anya-e0803n:2064_9: payogānaṃ dassanato aṃvacanassa yamādesavasena “dāsiya”nti vuttaṃ. Tesu ca “ghare
anya-e0803n:2064_10: jātaṃva dāsiya”nti ettha aṃvacanassa yamādesato aññopi saddanayo labbhati. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:2064_11: Yathā daharī eva “dahariyā”ti vuccati, evaṃ dāsī eva “dāsiyā”ti.
anya-e0803n:2065_0: Ettha pana “passāmi vohaṃ dahariṃ, kumāriṃ cārudassana”nti ca “ye taṃ jiṇṇassa pādaṃsu,
anya-e0803n:2065_1: evaṃ dahariyaṃ sati”nti ca pāḷi nidassanaṃ, upayogavacanicchāya “dāsiya”nti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2065_2: imasmiṃ panādhippāye “dāsiyā, dāsiyā, dāsiyāyo. Dāsiyaṃ, dāsiyā, dāsiyāyo. Dāsiyāyā”ti
anya-e0803n:2065_3: kaññānayeneva nāmikapadamālā bhavati “kumāriyā”ti saddasseva. Tathā hi “kumāriye
anya-e0803n:2065_4: upaseniye”ti pāḷi dissati. Tathā “pupphavatiyā, pupphavatiyaṃ, pupphavatiyāya, pupphavatiyāyaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2065_5: bhoti pupphavatiye”ti kaññānayanissitena ekavacananayena nāmikapadamālā bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2066_0: Ettha pana “atīte ayaṃ bārāṇasī pupphavatiyā nāma ahosi. Rājāsi luddakammo, ekarājā
anya-e0803n:2066_1: pupphavatiyāyaṃ. Uyyassu pubbena pupphavatiyāyā”ti pāḷi ca aṭṭhakathāpāṭho ca nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2066_2: Aparo nayo – “dāsiyā dahariyā kumāriyā”tiādīsu kakārassa yakārādesopi daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n:2066_3: Brāhmaṇīsaddassa tu “brāhmaṇī, brāhmaṇī, brāhmaṇiyo, brāhmaṇyo. Brāhmaṇi”ntiādīni
anya-e0803n:2066_4: vatvā karaṇavacanaṭṭhānādīsu “brāhmaṇiyā, brāhmaṇyā”ti ekavacanāni vattabbāni, sabbattha
anya-e0803n:2066_5: ca padāni paripuṇṇāni kātabbāni. Nadīsaddassa “nadī, nadī, nadiyo, najjo. Nadi”ntiādinā
anya-e0803n:2066_6: vatvā “nadiyā, najjā”ti ca “nadiyaṃ, najja”nti ca vattabbaṃ, sabbattha ca padāni
anya-e0803n:2066_7: paripuṇṇāni kātabbāni. Itthiliṅgesu hi paccattabahuvacane diṭṭheyeva upayogabahuvacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:2066_8: anāgatampi diṭṭhameva hoti, tathā upayogabahuvacane diṭṭheyeva paccattabahuvacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:2066_10: diṭṭheyeva aññataraṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. Tathā hi “dāsā ca dāsyo anujīvino cā”ti ettha
anya-e0803n:2066_11: “dāsyo”ti paccattabahuvacane diṭṭheyeva aparampi “dāsyo”ti upayogabahuvacanaṃ taṃsadisattā diṭṭhameva hoti.
anya-e0803n:2067: “Sakko ca me varaṃ dajjā, so ca labbhetha me varo;
anya-e0803n:2070_1: diṭṭhāniyeva honti. “Brāhmaṇyā paricārake”ti ettha “brāhmaṇyā”ti sāmivacane diṭṭheyeva
anya-e0803n:2070_3: anutthuna”nti ettha “pathabyā cārupubbaṅgī”ti ettha ca “bhūmyā, pathabyā”ti sattamiyā
anya-e0803n:2070_5: honti. “Bārāṇasyaṃ mahārājā”ti ettha “bārāṇasya”nti bhummavacane diṭṭheyeva taṃsadisāni
anya-e0803n:2070_6: aññānipi “brāhmaṇyaṃ ekādasyaṃ pañcamya”ntiādīni bhummavacanāni diṭṭhāniyeva honti.
anya-e0803n:2071: Gaṇhanti ca tādisāni rūpāni pubbācariyāsabhāpi gāthābhisaṅkharaṇavasena. Sāsanepi pana etādisāni rūpāni yebhuyyena gāthāsu sandissanti.
anya-e0803n:2072: Kusāvatī. Kusāvatiṃ. Kusāvatiyā, kusāvatyā. Kusāvatiyaṃ, kusāvatyaṃ. Bhoti kusāvati.
anya-e0803n:2073: Bārāṇasī. Bārāṇasiṃ. Bārāṇasiyā, bārāṇasyā. Bārāṇasiyaṃ, bārāṇasyaṃ, bārāṇassaṃ iccapi, bhoti bārāṇasi.
anya-e0803n:2074: Naḷinī. Naḷiniṃ. Naḷiniyā, naḷiññā. Naḷiniyaṃ, naḷiññaṃ. Bhoti naḷini. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2075_0: Gāthāvisayaṃ pana patvā “kusāvatimhi, bārāṇasimhi, naḷinimhī”tiādinā saddarūpānipiyojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2075_1: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “kusāvatimhi”ādīni mhiyantāni itthiliṅgarūpāni gāthāsuyeva paññāyanti,
anya-e0803n:2075_2: na cuṇṇiyapadaracanāyaṃ. Akkharasamaye pana tādisāni rūpāni anivāritāni “nadimhā
anya-e0803n:2075_4: itthiliṅgarūpaṃ dissati, taṃ akkharavipallāsavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n:2075_6: niyamo sugatasāsane gāthāyaṃ cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhāne ca “kaññā ratti itthī yāgu vadhū”ti
anya-e0803n:2075_7: evaṃ pañcantehi itthiliṅgehi saddhiṃ nā sa smā smiṃ mhā mhiiccete saddā sarūpato
anya-e0803n:2075_8: parattaṃ na yanti. Mhisaddo pana gāthāyaṃ ivaṇṇantehi itthiliṅgehi saddhiṃ parattaṃ
anya-e0803n:2080: Yathā balākayonimhi, na vijjati pumo sadā;
anya-e0803n:2082_0: Evaṃ kusāvatī iccādīni aññathā bhavanti, nagaranāmattā panekavacanānipi, na janapadanāmāni
anya-e0803n:2082_1: viya bahuvacanāni. “Kāsī, kāsiyo. Kāsīhi, kāsībhi. Kāsīnaṃ. Kāsīsu. Bhotiyo kāsiyo.
anya-e0803n:2082_2: Evaṃ avantī avantiyo”tiādināpi nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Aññānipi padāni gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2082_3: Evaṃ kāsīiccādīni janapadanāmattā rūḷhīvasena bahuvacanāneva bhavanti atthassa ekattepi.
anya-e0803n:2083_0: Candavatī, candavatiṃ, candavatiyā, candavatiyaṃ, bhoti candavati, evaṃ ekavacanavasena
anya-e0803n:2083_1: vā, candavatiyo, candavatiyo, candavatīhi, candavatībhi, candavatīnaṃ, candavatīsu,
anya-e0803n:2083_2: bhotiyo candavatiyo, evaṃ bahuvacanavasena vā nāmikapadamālā veditabbā, aññānipi
anya-e0803n:2083_3: padāni yojetabbāni. “Candavatī”iccādīni hi ekissā bahūnañcitthīnaṃ paṇṇattibhāvato
anya-e0803n:2083_4: payogānurūpena ekavacanavasena vā bahuvacanavasena vā yojetabbāni bhavanti. Esa nayo aññatrāpi.
anya-e0803n:2086: Idāni bhūdhātumayānaṃ ukārantitthiliṅgānaṃ appasiddhattā aññena ukārantitthiliṅgena nāmikapadamālaṃ pūressāma –
anya-e0803n:2087_0: Yāgu, yāgū, yāguyo. Yāguṃ, yāgū, yāguyo. Yāguyā, yāgūhi, yāgūbhi. Yāguyā, yāgūnaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2087_1: Yāguyā, yāgūhi, yāgūbhi. Yāguyā, yāgūnaṃ. Yāguyā, yāguyaṃ, yāgūsu. Bhoti yāgu, bhotiyo yāgū, yāguyo.
anya-e0803n:2088_0: Evaṃ “dhātu dhenu kāsu daddu kaṇḍu kacchu rajju”iccādīni. Tatra dhātusaddo rasarudhiramaṃsamedanhāruaṭṭhiaṭṭhimiñjasukkasaṅkhātadhātuvācako
anya-e0803n:2088_1: pulliṅgo, sabhāvavācako pana sugatādīnaṃ sārīrikavācako lokadhātuvācako ca cakkhādivācako
anya-e0803n:2088_2: ca itthiliṅgo, bhū hū karapacādisaddavācako itthiliṅgoceva pulliṅgo ca. Atra panitthiliṅgo adhippeto.
anya-e0803n:2091: Idāni bhūsaddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā –
anya-e0803n:2092_0: Jambū, jambū, jambuyo. Jambuṃ, jambū, jambuyo. Jambuyā, jambūhi, jambūbhi. Jambuyā,
anya-e0803n:2092_1: jambūnaṃ. Jambuyā, jambūhi, jambūbhi. Jambuyā, jambūnaṃ. Jambuyā, jambuyaṃ, jambūsu.
anya-e0803n:2092_2: Bhoti jambu, bhotiyo jambū, jambuyo. Yamakamahātheramataṃ.
anya-e0803n:2093_0: Ettha jambūsaddassa itthiliṅgattaṃ “ambā sālā ca jambuyo”tiādinā pasiddhaṃ. “Ime
anya-e0803n:2093_1: te jambukā rukkhā”ti ettha pana rukkhasaddaṃ apekkhitvā “jambukā”ti pulliṅganiddeso
anya-e0803n:2093_2: katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi jambūti kathetabbāti jambukā. Ke re ge saddeti dhātu.
anya-e0803n:2093_3: Atha vā itthiliṅgavasena jambū eva jambukā, jambukā ca tā rukkhā cāti jambukārukkhā,
anya-e0803n:2093_4: yathā laṅkādīpo, pulliṅgapakkhe vā samāsavasena “jambukarukkhā”ti vattabbe gāthāvisayattā
anya-e0803n:2093_5: chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ dīghaṃ katvā “jambukārukkhā”ti vuttaṃ “saraṇāgamane kañcī”ti ettha viya.
anya-e0803n:2094: Bhū, bhū, bhuyo. Bhuṃ, bhū, bhuyo. Bhuyā, bhūhi, bhūbhi. Bhuyā, bhūnaṃ. Bhuyā, bhūhi, bhūbhi. Bhuyā, bhūnaṃ. Bhuyā, bhuyaṃ, bhūsu. Bhoti bhu, bhotiyo bhū, bhuyo.
anya-e0803n:2095: Evaṃ “abhū, abhū, abhuyo. Abhuṃ, abhū, abhuyo. Abhuyā”tiādinā yojetabbā. Atra “abhuṃ me kathaṃ nu bhaṇasi, pāpakaṃ vata bhāsasī”ti nidassanapadaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2096: “Vadhū ca sarabhū ceva, sarabū sutanū camū;
anya-e0803n:2098_0: Idaṃ pana sukhumaṃ ṭhānaṃ suṭṭhu manasi kātabbaṃ. “Vadaññū, vadaññū, vadaññuyo. Vadaññuṃ,
anya-e0803n:2098_1: vadaññū, vadaññuyo. Vadaññuyā”ti jambūsamaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ “maggaññū dhammaññū kataññū”iccādīsupi.
anya-e0803n:2100: “Sohaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
anya-e0803n:2102_0: Evamādippayogadassanato vadaññūsaddādīnaṃ pulliṅgabhāvo pasiddho, evaṃ sante kasmā
anya-e0803n:2102_1: idha itthiliṅganayo dassitoti? Vadaññūiccādīnaṃ ekantapulliṅgabhāvābhāvato dviliṅgāni
anya-e0803n:2104: Saṅghe dānāni dassāmi, appamattā punappuna”nti ca,
anya-e0803n:2105: “Kodhanā akataññū cā”ti ca itthiliṅgapayogikā bahū pāḷiyo dissanti, tasmā evaṃ nīti amhehi ṭhapitā.
anya-e0803n:2108: Okārantapadaṃ bhūdhātumayaṃ itthiliṅgamappasiddhaṃ, aññaṃ panokārantaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ pasiddhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2111_0: Tathā hi keci “go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvu”ntiādinā nayena vuttāni pulliṅgassa gosaddassa
anya-e0803n:2111_1: rūpāni viya itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa rūpāni icchanti, tesaṃ mate majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2111_2: vaṇṇavisesābhāvo viya rūpavisesābhāvato gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvapaṭipādanaṃ anijjhānakkhamaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2111_3: Kasmāti ce? Yasmā mātugāmasaddassa “mātugāmo, mātugāmā. Mātugāma”ntiādinā nayena
anya-e0803n:2111_4: dve padamālā katvā ekā pulliṅgassa padamālā, ekā itthiliṅgapadamālāti vuttavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:2111_5: viya idaṃ vacanaṃ amhe paṭibhāti, tasmā anijjhānakkhamaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2112_0: Apica itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa rūpesu pulliṅgassa gosaddassa rūpehi samesu santesu
anya-e0803n:2112_1: kathaṃ gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvo siyā? Rūpamālāvisesābhāvato. Yathā hi ratti aggi
anya-e0803n:2112_3: rūpamālāviseso dissati. Yathā pana dvinnaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ pumitthiliṅgapariyāpannānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2112_4: rūpamālāviseso dissati, na tathā tehācariyehi abhimatassa itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa
anya-e0803n:2112_5: rūpamālāviseso dissati. Yathā pana dvinnaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ pumitthiliṅgapariyāpannānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2112_6: rūpamālāviseso bhavati, yathā dvinnaṃ gosaddānaṃ pumitthiliṅgapariyāpannānaṃ rūpamālāvisesena
anya-e0803n:2112_7: bhavitabbaṃ, yathā ca dvinnaṃ āyusaddānaṃ punnapuṃsakaliṅgapariyāpannānaṃ rūpamālāviseso
anya-e0803n:2112_8: dissati, tathā dvinnaṃ gosaddānaṃ pumitthiliṅgapariyāpannānaṃ rūpamālāvisesena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2112_9: Avisesatte sati kathaṃ tesaṃ pumitthiliṅgavavatthānaṃ siyā, kathañca visadāvisadākāravohāratā
anya-e0803n:2112_10: siyā. Idaṃ ṭhānaṃ atīva saṇhasukhumaṃ paramagambhīraṃ mahāgahanaṃ na sakkā sabbasattānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2112_11: mūlabhāsābhūtāya sabbaññujineritāya māgadhikāya sabhāvaniruttiyā nayaṃ sammā ajānantena
anya-e0803n:2112_12: akatañāṇasambhārena kenaci ajjhogāhetuṃ vā vijaṭetuṃ vā, amhākaṃ pana mate dvinnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2112_13: gosaddānaṃ rūpamālāviseso ceva dissati, pumitthiliṅgavavatthānañca dissati, visadāvisadākāravohāratā
anya-e0803n:2112_14: ca dissati, napuṃsakaliṅgassa tadubhayamuttākāravohāratā ca dissatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2113_0: Idāni imassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne imaṃ nītiṃ ṭhapessāma. Evañhi sati
anya-e0803n:2113_1: pariyattisāsane paṭipannakā nikkaṅkhabhāvena na kilamissanti. Ettha tāva atthaggahaṇe
anya-e0803n:2113_2: viññūnaṃ kosalluppādanatthaṃ tisso nāmikapadamālāyo kathessāma – seyyathidaṃ?
anya-e0803n:2114_0: Gāvī, gāvī, gāviyo. Gāviṃ, gāvī, gāviyo. Gāviyā, gāvīhi, gāvībhi. Gāviyā, gāvīnaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2114_1: Gāviyā, gāvīhi, gāvībhi. Gāviyā, gāvīnaṃ. Gāviyā, gāviyaṃ, gāvīsu. Bhoti gāvi, bhotiyo gāvī, gāviyo.
anya-e0803n:2115: Ayaṃ gosaddato vihitassa īpaccayassa vasena nipphannassa itthivācakassa īkārantitthiliṅgassa gāvīsaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:2116_0: Go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṃ, gāvaṃ, gavaṃ, gāvo, gavo. Gāvena, gavena, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa,
anya-e0803n:2116_1: gavassa, gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gāvā, gāvasmā, gāvamhā, gavā, gavasmā, gavamhā, gohi,
anya-e0803n:2116_2: gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gāve, gāvasmiṃ, gāvamhi, gave, gavasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:2116_3: gavamhi, gāvesu, gavesu, gosu. Bho go, bhavanto gāvo, gavo.
anya-e0803n:2118_0: Go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī, gavo. Gāvaṃ, gavaṃ, gāviṃ, gāvo, gāvī gavo. Gohi, gobhi. Gavaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2118_1: gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gohi, gobhi. Gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ. Gosu. Bhoti go, bhotiyo gāvo, gāvī,
anya-e0803n:2119_0: Ettha pana “gāvu”nti padaṃ ekantapumavācakattā na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, ekantapumavācakattañcassa
anya-e0803n:2119_1: āhaccapāḷiyā ñāyati “idha pana bhikkhave vassūpagataṃ bhikkhuṃ itthī nimantesi ‘ehi
anya-e0803n:2119_2: bhante, hiraññaṃ vā te demi, suvaṇṇaṃ vā te demi, khettaṃ vā te demi, vatthuṃ vā
anya-e0803n:2119_3: te demi, gāvuṃ vā te demi, gāviṃ vā te demi. Dāsaṃ vā te demi, dāsiṃ vā te demi,
anya-e0803n:2119_4: dhītaraṃ vā te demi bhariyatthāya, ahaṃ vā te bhariyā homi, aññaṃ vā te bhariyaṃ
anya-e0803n:2120_0: Ettha hi “gāvu”nti vacanena pumā vutto, “gāvi”nti vacanena itthī, yaṃ pana imissaṃ
anya-e0803n:2120_1: okārantitthiliṅgapadamālāyaṃ “gāvī”ti padaṃ catukkhattuṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ “kaññā”ti padaṃ
anya-e0803n:2120_2: viya itthiliṅgassa avisadākāravohāratāviññāpane samatthaṃ hoti. Na hi itaresu liṅgesu
anya-e0803n:2120_3: samānasutikabhāvena catukkhattuṃ āgatapadaṃ ekampi atthi, “gāvī gāvi”nti ca imesaṃ
anya-e0803n:2120_4: saddānaṃ katthaci ṭhāne itthipumesu sāmaññavasena pavattiṃ upari kathayissāma. Yā
anya-e0803n:2120_5: panamhehi okārantitthiliṅgassa “go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī, gavo. Gāvaṃ, gavaṃ, gāvi”ntiādinā
anya-e0803n:2120_6: nayena padamālā katā, tattha gosaddato siyonaṃ īkārādeso aṃvacanassa ca iṃkārādeso
anya-e0803n:2120_7: bhavati, tena okārantitthiliṅgassa “gāvī gāvī gāvi”nti rūpāni dassitāni. Tathā hi
anya-e0803n:2120_9: gosaddato yonamīkārādeso vutto. Yathā pana gosaddato yonamīkārādeso bhavati, tathā
anya-e0803n:2120_10: sissīkārādeso aṃvacanassa ca iṃkārādeso bhavati. Atrimā nayaggāhaparidīpaniyo gāthā –
anya-e0803n:2128_0: Tathā hi samantapāsādikādīsu aṭṭhakathāsu “cheko hi gopālako sakkharāyo ucchaṅgena
anya-e0803n:2128_1: gahetvā rajjudaṇḍahattho pātova vajaṃ gantvā gāvo piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā palighathambhamatthake
anya-e0803n:2128_2: nisinno dvāraṃ pattaṃ pattaṃ gāviṃ ‘eko dve’ti sakkharaṃ khipitvā gaṇetī”ti imasmiṃ
anya-e0803n:2128_4: gosaddassa avisadākāravohāratā vihitā. “Gāvo”ti hi iminā sāmaññato itthipumabhūtā
anya-e0803n:2128_5: goṇā gahitā, tathā “gāvi”nti imināpi itthibhūto pumabhūto ca goṇo. Evaṃ “gāvo”ti
anya-e0803n:2128_6: ca “gāvi”nti ca ime saddā saddasatthavidūhi aṭṭhakathācariyehi niruttinayakusalatāya
anya-e0803n:2128_7: samānaliṅgavasena ekasmiṃyeva pakaraṇe ekasmiṃyeva vākye piṇḍīkatā. Yadi hi itthiliṅge
anya-e0803n:2128_9: gāvi”miccetāni rūpāni na labbheyyuṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gāvo”ti vatvā “gāva”nticceva
anya-e0803n:2128_10: vattabbaṃ siyā, “gāvi”nti pana na vattabbaṃ. Yathā ca pana aṭṭhakathācariyehi “gāvo”ti
anya-e0803n:2128_11: itthipumavasena sabbesaṃ gunnaṃ saṅgāhakavacanaṃ vatvā teyeva gāvo sandhāya puna
anya-e0803n:2128_12: “dvāraṃ pattaṃ pattaṃ gāvi”nti saddaracanaṃ kubbiṃsu, tasmā “gāvi”nti idampi sabbasaṅgāhakavacanamevāti
anya-e0803n:2128_13: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asabbasaṅgāhakavacanaṃ idaṃ gāvīsaddena itthiyāyeva gahetabbattāti ce?
anya-e0803n:2128_14: Na, pakaraṇavasena atthantarassa viditattā. Na hi sabbavajesu “itthiyoyeva vasanti,
anya-e0803n:2128_15: na pumāno”ti ca, “pumānoyeva vasanti, na itthiyo”ti ca sakkā vattuṃ. Apica “gāvimpi
anya-e0803n:2128_16: disvā palāyanti ‘bhikkhū’ti maññamānā”ti pāḷi dissati, etthāpi “gāvi”nti vacanena
anya-e0803n:2128_17: itthibhūto pumabhūto ca sabbo go gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itarathā “itthibhūtoyeva go
anya-e0803n:2128_18: bhikkhūti maññitabbo”ti āpajjati. Iti pāḷinayena itthiliṅge vattamānamhā itthipumavācakasmā
anya-e0803n:2129_0: Vajirabuddhācariyenapi gosaddato īpaccaye kātabbepi akatvā yonamīkārādeso kato. Tassādhippāyo
anya-e0803n:2129_1: evaṃ siyā gosaddato īpaccaye kate sati īpaccayavasena “gāvī”ti nipphannasaddo yattha
anya-e0803n:2129_2: katthaci visaye “migī morī kukkuṭī”iccādayo viya itthivācakoyeva siyā, na katthacipi
anya-e0803n:2129_3: itthipumavācako, tasmā sāsanānukūlappayogavasena yonamīkārādeso kātabboti. Iti vajirabuddhācariyamate
anya-e0803n:2130_0: Kiñca bhiyyo – yasmā aṭṭhakathācariyehi “gāvo piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā”tiādinā nayena
anya-e0803n:2130_1: racitāya “dvāraṃ pattaṃ pattaṃ gāviṃ ‘eko dve’ti sakkharaṃ khipitvā gaṇetī”ti vacanapariyosānāya
anya-e0803n:2130_2: saddaracanāyaṃ “eko gāvī, dve gāvī”ti atthayojanānayo vattabbo hoti, “gāvi”nti upayogavacanañca
anya-e0803n:2130_3: dissati. Iti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ mate gosaddato siyonamīkārādeso aṃvacanassa iṃkārādeso
anya-e0803n:2130_4: hotīti ñāyati. Tasmāyevamhehi yā sā okārantatāpakatikassa itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa
anya-e0803n:2130_5: “go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī, gavo, gāvaṃ, gāvi”ntiādinā nayena padamālā ṭhapitā, sā pāḷinayānukūlā
anya-e0803n:2130_6: aṭṭhakathānayānukūlā kaccāyanācariyamataṃ gahetvā padanipphattijanakassa garuno ca
anya-e0803n:2130_7: matānukūlā, “gāvī”ti padassa catukkhattuṃ āgatattā pana okārantitthiliṅgassa gosaddassa
anya-e0803n:2130_8: avisadākāravohārattañca sādheti. Iccesā pāḷinayādīsu ñāṇena sammā upaparikkhiyamānesu
anya-e0803n:2130_9: atīva yujjati, natthettha appamattakopi doso. Ettha pana paccattopayogālapanānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2130_11: “gāviyā”ti padañca karaṇanissakkānaṃ bahuvacanaṭṭhāne “gāvīhi gāvībhī”ti padāni ca
anya-e0803n:2130_13: gāviyaṃ, gāvīsū”ti padāni cāti imāni vitthārato soḷasa padāni ekantena īpaccayavasena
anya-e0803n:2130_14: siddhattā ekantitthivācakattā ca na vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2131_0: Ayaṃ panettha nicchayo vuccate sotūnaṃ nikkaṅkhabhāvāya – itthiliṅgapadesu hi “gāvī
anya-e0803n:2131_1: gāvi”nti imāni īpaccayavasena vā īkāriṃkārādesavasena vā sijjhanti. Etesu pacchimanayo
anya-e0803n:2131_2: idhādhippeto, pubbanayo aññattha. Tathā “gāvī gāvi”nti imāni īpaccayavasenapi siddhattā
anya-e0803n:2131_3: yebhuyyena itthivācakāni bhavanti īkāriṃkārādesavasenapi siddhattā. Katthaci ekakkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0803n:2131_4: sabbasaṅgāhakavasena itthipumavācakāni bhavanti. Etesupi pacchimoyeva nayo idhādhippeto,
anya-e0803n:2131_5: pubbanayo aññattha. “Gāviyo. Gāviyā, gāvīhi, gāvībhi. Gāvīnaṃ. Gāviyaṃ, gāvīsū”ti
anya-e0803n:2131_6: etāni pana īpaccayavaseneva siddhattā sabbathāpi itthīnaṃyeva vācakāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2131_7: Itthibhūtesveva godabbesu lokasaṅketavasena visesato pavattattā ekantato itthidabbesu
anya-e0803n:2131_8: pavattāni “migī morī kukkuṭī”iccādīni padāni viya. Kiñcāpi pana “nadī mahī”iccādīnipi
anya-e0803n:2131_9: itthiliṅgāni īpaccayavaseneva siddhāni, tathāpi tāni aviññāṇakattā tadatthānaṃ itthidabbesu
anya-e0803n:2131_10: vattantīti vattuṃ na yujjati. Itthipumanapuṃsakabhāvarahitā hi tadatthā. Yasmā pana
anya-e0803n:2131_11: itthiliṅge gosadde enayogo esukāro ca na labbhati, tasmā “gāvena gavena gāvesu gavesū”ti
anya-e0803n:2131_12: padāni na vuttāni. Yasmā ca itthiliṅgena gosaddena saddhiṃ sasmāsmiṃvacanāni sarūpato
anya-e0803n:2131_13: parattaṃ na yanti, tasmā “gāvassa gavassa gāvasmā gavasmā gāvasmiṃ gavasmi”nti padāni
anya-e0803n:2131_14: na vuttāni. Yasmā ca tattha smāvacanassa ādesabhūto ākāro ca mhākāro ca na labbhati,
anya-e0803n:2131_15: tasmā “gāvā gavā gāvamhā gavamhā”ti padāni na vuttāni. Yasmā ca smiṃvacanassa ādesabhūto
anya-e0803n:2131_16: ekāro ca mhikāro ca na labbhati, tasmā “gāve gave gāvamhi gavamhī”ti padāni na vuttāni.
anya-e0803n:2131_17: Apica “yāya tāyā”tiādīhi samānādhikaraṇapadehi yojetuṃ ayuttattāpi “gāvena gavenā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:2131_18: itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne na vuttāni. Tathā hi “yāya tāya”iccādīhi saddhiṃ “gāvena gavenā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:2132_0: Keci panettha vadeyyuṃ – yā tumhehi okārantatāpakatikassa itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa
anya-e0803n:2132_1: “go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī, gavo”tiādinā nayena padamālā ṭhapitā, sā “mātugāmo itthī mātugāmā
anya-e0803n:2132_2: itthiyo”ti vuttasadisā ca hotīti? Tanna. Mātugāmaitthīsaddā hi nānāliṅgā pumitthiliṅgabhāvena,
anya-e0803n:2132_3: nānādhātukā ca gamu isudhātuvasena, imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne go gāvīsaddā ekaliṅgā itthi
anya-e0803n:2132_4: liṅgabhāvena, ekadhātukā ca gamudhātuvasenāti. Yajjevaṃ goṇasaddassa gosaddassādesavasena
anya-e0803n:2132_5: kaccāyanena vuttattā tadādesattaṃ ekadhātukattañcāgamma tenāpi saddhiṃ missetvā padamālā
anya-e0803n:2132_6: vattabbāti? Na, goṇasaddassa accantapulliṅgattā akārantatāpakatikattā ca. Tathā hi
anya-e0803n:2132_7: so visuṃ pulliṅgaṭṭhāne uddiṭṭho. Ayaṃ pana “go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī, gavo”tiādikā padamālā
anya-e0803n:2132_8: okārīkārantapadāni missetvā katāti na sallakkhetabbā, atha kho vikappena gosaddato
anya-e0803n:2132_9: paresaṃ si yo aṃvacanānaṃ īkāriṃkārādesavasena vuttapadavantattā okārantitthiliṅgapadamālā
anya-e0803n:2133_0: Idāni gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvasādhakāni suttapadāni lokikappayogāni ca kathayāma
anya-e0803n:2133_1: – “seyyathāpi bhikkhave vassānaṃ pacchime māse saradasamaye kiṭṭhasambādhe gopālako
anya-e0803n:2133_2: gāvo rakkheyya, tā gāvo tato tato daṇḍena ākoṭeyya.
anya-e0803n:2134: Annadā baladā cetā, vaṇṇadā sukhadā ca tā;
anya-e0803n:2135: Etamatthaṃ vasaṃ ñatvā, nāssu gāvo haniṃsu te.
anya-e0803n:2136_0: Sabbā gāvo samāharati. Gamissanti bhante gāvo vacchagiddhiniyo”ti imāni suttapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2136_1: “Gosu duyhamānāsu gato”tiādīni pana lokikappayogāni. Iti gosaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvopi
anya-e0803n:2137_0: Tatra “go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī, gavo”tiādīni kiñcāpi itthiliṅgabhāvena vuttāni, tathāpi
anya-e0803n:2137_1: yathāpayogaṃ “pajā devatā”tipadāni viya itthipurisavācakāneva bhavanti, tasmā itthiliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:2137_2: “sā go”ti vā “tā gāvo”ti vā vutte itthipumabhūtā sabbepi goṇā gahitāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:2137_3: Na hi īdise ṭhāne ekantato liṅgaṃ padhānaṃ, atthoyeva padhāno. “Vajegāvo duhantī”ti
anya-e0803n:2137_4: vutte kiñcāpi “gāvo”ti ayaṃ saddo pumepi vattati, tathāpi duhanakriyāya pume asambhavato
anya-e0803n:2137_5: atthavasena itthiyo ñāyante. “Gāvī duhantī”ti vutte pana liṅgavasena atthavasena
anya-e0803n:2137_6: ca vacanato ko saṃsayamāpajjissati viññū. “Tā gāvo carantī”ti vutte itthiliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:2137_7: vacanato kadāci kassaci saṃsayo siyā “nanu itthiyo”ti, pulliṅgavasena pana “te gāvo
anya-e0803n:2137_8: carantī”ti vutte saṃsayo natthi, itthiyo ca pumāno ca ñāyante pulliṅgabahuvacanena
anya-e0803n:2137_9: katthaci itthipumassa gahitattā. “Athettha sīhā byagghā cā”tiādīsu viya “gāvī caratī”ti
anya-e0803n:2137_10: ca “gāviṃ passatī”ti ca vutte itthī viññāyate gāvīsaddena itthiyā gahetabbattā. Lokikappayogesu
anya-e0803n:2137_11: hi sāsanikappayogesu ca gāvīsaddena itthī gayhati. Ekaccaṃ pana sāsanikappayogaṃ
anya-e0803n:2137_13: bhikkhave dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā gāviṃ vadhitvā catumahāpathe bilaso
anya-e0803n:2137_14: vibhajitvā nisinno assā”ti pāḷi dissati. Aṭṭhakathāsu ca “gāvo”ti itthipumasādhāraṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:2137_15: saddaracanaṃ katvā puna tadeva itthipumaṃ sandhāya “dvāraṃ pattaṃ pattaṃ gāvi”nti
anya-e0803n:2138_0: Ettha hi gojātiyaṃ ṭhitā itthīpi pumāpi “gāvī”ti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Visesato pana
anya-e0803n:2138_1: “gāvī”ti idaṃ itthiyā adhivacanaṃ. Tathā hi tattha tattha pāḷippadesādīsu “acirapakkantassa
anya-e0803n:2138_2: bhagavato bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesī”ti, “gāvuṃ
anya-e0803n:2138_3: vā te demi, gāviṃ vā te demī”ti ca “tiṇasīho kapotavaṇṇagāvīsadiso”ti ca payogadassanato
anya-e0803n:2138_4: itthī kathiyatīti vattabbaṃ. Gosaddena pana “goduhanaṃ. Gadduhanaṃ. Gokhīraṃ godhano
anya-e0803n:2138_5: gorūpāni cā”ti dassanato itthīpi pumāpi kathiyatīti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2139: Idāni okārantassa itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa padamālāyaṃ pāḷinayādinissito atthayuttinayo vuccate viññūnaṃ kosallajananatthaṃ –
anya-e0803n:2140_0: Sā go gacchati, sā gāvī gacchati, tā gāvo, gāvī, gavo gacchanti. Taṃ gāvaṃ, gāviṃ,
anya-e0803n:2140_1: gavaṃ passati, tā gāvo, gāvī, gavo passati. Tāhi gohi, gobhi kataṃ. Tāsaṃ gavaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2140_2: gunnaṃ, gonaṃ deti. Tāhi gohi, gobhi apeti. Tāsaṃ gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ siṅgāni. Tāsu
anya-e0803n:2140_3: gosu patiṭṭhitaṃ. Bhoti go tvaṃ tiṭṭha, bhotiyo gāvo gāvī, gavā tumhe tiṭṭhatha.
anya-e0803n:2142_0: Sā go nadiṃ tarantī gacchati, sā gāvī nadiṃ tarantī gacchati, tā gāvo, gāvī, gavo
anya-e0803n:2142_1: nadiṃ tarantīyo gacchanti. Taṃ gāvaṃ, gāviṃ, gavaṃ nadiṃ tarantiṃ passati, tā gāvo,
anya-e0803n:2142_2: gāvī, gavo nadiṃ tarantiyo passati. Tāhi gohi, gobhi nadiṃ tarantīhi kataṃ. Tāsaṃ
anya-e0803n:2142_3: gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ nadiṃ tarantīnaṃ deti. Tāhi gohi, gobhi nadiṃ tarantīhi apeti.
anya-e0803n:2142_4: Tāsaṃ gavaṃ, gunnaṃ, gonaṃ nadiṃ tarantīnaṃ santakaṃ. Tāsu gosu nadiṃ tarantīsu patiṭṭhitanti.
anya-e0803n:2143_0: Tatra yā sā “go, gāvī, gāvo, gāvī, gavo”tiādinā okārantassitthiliṅgassa gosaddassa
anya-e0803n:2143_1: padamālā ṭhapitā, sā “go, gāvo gavo”tiādinā vuttassa okārantapulliṅgassa gosaddassa
anya-e0803n:2143_2: padamālāto savisesā paccattopayogālapanaṭṭhāne catunnaṃ kaññāsaddānaṃ viya gāvīsaddānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2143_3: vuttattā. Yasmā panāyaṃ viseso, tasmā imassa okārantitthiliṅgassa gosaddassa aññesamitthiliṅgānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2143_4: viya avisadākāravohāratā sallakkhetabbā, na pulliṅgānaṃ viya visadākāravohāratā,
anya-e0803n:2143_5: nāpi napuṃsakaliṅgānaṃ viya ubhayamuttākāravohāratā sallakkhetabbā. Ettha nicchayakaraṇī gāthā vuccati –
anya-e0803n:2146: Tathā hi pumitthiliṅgavasena dvinnaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ viseso dissati. Taṃ yathā?
anya-e0803n:2147_0: Dhātu, dhātū, dhātavo. Dhātuṃ, dhātū, dhātavo. Dhātunā, dhātūhi, dhātūbhi. Dhātussa,
anya-e0803n:2147_1: dhātūnaṃ. Dhātusmā, dhātumhā, dhātūhi, dhātūbhi. Dhātussa, dhātūnaṃ. Dhātusmiṃ, dhātumhi,
anya-e0803n:2148_0: Dhātu, dhātū, dhātuyo. Dhātuṃ, dhātū, dhātuyo. Dhātuyā, dhātūhi, dhātūbhi. Dhātuyā,
anya-e0803n:2148_1: dhātūnaṃ. Dhātuyā, dhātūhi, dhātūbhi. Dhātuyā, dhātūnaṃ. Dhātuyā, dhātuyaṃ, dhātūsu.
anya-e0803n:2149_0: Yathā ca dvinnaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ viseso paññāyati, tathā dvinnampi gosaddānaṃ viseso
anya-e0803n:2149_1: paññāyateva. Yathā ca punnapuṃsakaliṅgānaṃ dvinnaṃ āyusaddānaṃ “āyu, āyū, āyavo”tiādinā,
anya-e0803n:2149_2: “āyu, āyū, āyūnī”tiādinā ca viseso paññāyati, yathā dvinnampi gosaddānaṃ viseso paññāyateva.
anya-e0803n:2149_3: Tathā hi visadākāravohāro pulliṅgaṃ, avisadākāravohāro itthiliṅgaṃ, ubhayamuttākāravohāro napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2150_0: Idāni imamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā saṅkhepato kathayāma – purisoti visadākāravohāro,
anya-e0803n:2150_1: kaññāti avisadākāravohāro, rūpanti ubhayamuttākāravohāro. Puriso tiṭṭhati, kaññā
anya-e0803n:2150_2: tiṭṭhati, kaññā tiṭṭhanti, kaññā passati, bhotiyo kaññā tiṭṭhatha, etthekapadamasamaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2150_3: cattāri samāni. Purisā tiṭṭhanti, purisā nissaṭaṃ, bhavanto purisā gacchatha. Kaññāyo
anya-e0803n:2150_4: tiṭṭhanti, kaññāyo passati, bhotiyo kaññāyo gacchatha, tīṇi tīṇi samāni. Purisaṃ
anya-e0803n:2150_5: passati, kaññaṃ passati, dve asamāni. Purise passati, purise patiṭṭhitaṃ, dve samāni.
anya-e0803n:2150_6: Tena purisena kataṃ, tāya kaññāya kataṃ, tāya kaññāya deti, tāya kaññāya apeti, tāya
anya-e0803n:2150_7: kaññāya santakaṃ, tāya kaññāya patiṭṭhitaṃ, ekamasamaṃ, pañca samāni. Evaṃ pulliṅgassa
anya-e0803n:2150_8: visadākāravohāratā dissati, itthiliṅgassa avisadākāravohāratā dissati. Napuṃsakaliṅgassa
anya-e0803n:2150_9: pana “rūpaṃ, rūpāni, rūpā. Rūpaṃ, rūpāni, rūpe. Bho rūpa, bhavanto rūpāni, rūpā”ti
anya-e0803n:2150_10: evaṃ tīsu paccattopayogālapanaṭṭhānesu sanikārāya visesāya rūpamālāya vasena ubhayamuttākāravohāratā
anya-e0803n:2150_11: dissati, pumitthiliṅgānaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu sanikārāni rūpāni sabbadā na santi, iti visadākāravohāro
anya-e0803n:2150_12: pulliṅgaṃ, avisadākāravohāro itthiliṅgaṃ, ubhayamuttākāravohāro napuṃsakaliṅganti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2151_0: Ayaṃ nayo “saddhā sati hirī, yā itthī saddhā pasannā, te manussā saddhā pasannā,
anya-e0803n:2151_1: pahūtaṃ saddhaṃ paṭiyattaṃ, saddhaṃ kula”ntiādīsu samānasutikasaddesupi padamālāvasena
anya-e0803n:2151_2: labbhateva. Yā ca pana itthiliṅgassa avisadākāravohāratā vuttā, sā ekaccesupi saṅkhyāsaddesu
anya-e0803n:2151_3: labbhati. Tathā hi vīsatiādayo navutipariyantā saddā ekavacanantā itthiliṅgāti vuttā,
anya-e0803n:2151_5: padapariyantānaṃ, evaṃ vīsatiādīnaṃ kaññāsaddasseva avisadākāravohāratā labbhatīti
anya-e0803n:2151_6: avagantabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ ticatusaddesu kathanti? Ticatusaddā pana yasmā “tayo tisso
anya-e0803n:2151_7: tīṇi, cattāro caturo catasso cattārī”ti attano attano rūpāni abhidheyyaliṅgānugabhattā
anya-e0803n:2151_9: saddehi yogaṃ gacchanti, tasmā paccekaliṅgavasena visadāvisadobhayarahitākāravohārāti vattumarahanti.
