anya-e0803n:2152_0: Sabbanāmesupi ayaṃ tividho ākāro labbhati rūpavisesayogato. Kathaṃ? Punnapuṃsakavisaye
anya-e0803n:2152_1: “tassa kassa” iccādīni sabbāni sabbanāmikarūpāni catutthīchaṭṭhiyantāni bhavanti,
anya-e0803n:2152_3: bhavanti, tasmā sabbanāmattepi itthiliṅgassa avisadākāravohāratā ekantato sampaṭicchitabbā.
anya-e0803n:2152_4: Ettha pana sulabhāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni anāharitvā sudullabhabhāvena tatiyāpañcamīsattamīrūpāni
anya-e0803n:2152_5: sāsanato āharitvā dassessāma bhagavato pāvacane nikkaṅkhabhāvena sotūnaṃ paramasaṇhasukhumañāṇādhigamatthaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2152_6: Taṃ yathā? “Āyasmā udāyī yena sā kumārikā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā tassā kumārikāya
anya-e0803n:2152_7: saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammanīye nisajjaṃ kappesī”ti. Ettha
anya-e0803n:2152_8: “tassā”ti tatiyāya rūpaṃ, “tassā”ti tatiyāya rūpe diṭṭheyeva “sabbassā katarissā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:2152_9: tatiyārūpāni pāḷiyaṃ anāgatānipidiṭṭhāniyeva nāma tesaṃ aññamaññasamānagatikattā,
anya-e0803n:2152_10: diṭṭhena ca adiṭṭhassapi yuttassa gahetabbattā. “Kassāhaṃ kena hāyāmī”ti ettha “kassā”ti
anya-e0803n:2152_11: pañcamiyā rūpaṃ, “kassā”ti pañcamiyā rūpe diṭṭheyeva “sabbassā katarissā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:2152_12: pañcamiyā rūpāni pāḷiyaṃ anāgatānipi diṭṭhāniyeva nāma. “Aññataro bhikkhu vesāliyaṃ
anya-e0803n:2152_13: mahāvane makkaṭiṃ āmisena upalāpetvā tassā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati. Aññataro
anya-e0803n:2152_14: bhikkhu aññatarissā itthiyā paṭibaddhacitto hotī”ti ca ettha “tassā aññatarissā”ti
anya-e0803n:2152_15: ca sattamiyā rūpaṃ, tasmiṃ diṭṭheyeva “sabbassā katarissā”tiādīni sattamiyā rūpāni
anya-e0803n:2153_0: Nanu ca bho “tassā kumārikāya saddhi”nti ettha “tassā”ti idaṃ vibhattivipallāsena
anya-e0803n:2153_1: vuttaṃ, “tāyā”ti hissa attho, tathā “kassāhaṃ kena hāyāmī”ti idampi vibhattivipallāsena
anya-e0803n:2153_2: vuttaṃ. “Kāyā”ti hissa attho. “Aññatarissā itthiyā paṭibaddhacitto”ti etthāpi “aññatarissā”ti
anya-e0803n:2153_3: idaṃ vibhattivipallāsena vuttaṃ. “Aññatarissa”nti hissa atthoti? Tanna, īdisesu cuṇṇiyapadavisayesu
anya-e0803n:2153_4: vibhattivipallāsassa anicchitabbattā. Nanu ca bho cuṇṇiyapadavisayepi “saṅghe gotami
anya-e0803n:2153_5: dehī”tiādīsu “saṅghassā”ti vibhattivipallāsatthaṃ vadanti garūti? Saccaṃ, tathāpi
anya-e0803n:2153_6: tādisesu ṭhānesu dve adhippāyā bhavanti ādhārapaṭiggāhakabhāvena bhummasampadānānamicchitabbattā.
anya-e0803n:2153_7: Tathā hi “saṅghassa dethā”ti vattukāmassa sato “saṅghe dethā”ti vacanaṃ na virujjhati,
anya-e0803n:2153_8: yujjatiyeva. Tathā “saṅghe dethā”ti vattukāmassapi sato “saṅghassa dethā”ti vacanampi
anya-e0803n:2153_9: na virujjhati, yujjatiyeva, yathā pana alābu lābusaddesu visuṃ visuṃ vijjamānesupi
anya-e0803n:2153_10: “lābūni sīdanti silā plavantī”ti ettha chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ akāralopo hotīti akkharalopo
anya-e0803n:2153_11: buddhiyā kariyati. Tathā “saṅghe gotami dehī”tiādīsupi buddhiyā vibhattivipallāsassa
anya-e0803n:2153_12: parikappanaṃ katvā “saṅghassā”ti vipallāsatthamicchanti ācariyā. Tasmā “saṅghe gotami
anya-e0803n:2153_13: dehi. Vessantare varaṃ datvā”tiādīsu vibhattivipallāso yutto “tassā kumārikāyā”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:2153_14: pana na yutto, vibhattivipallāso ca nāma yebhuyyena “neva dānaṃ viramissa”ntiādīsu gāthāsu icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n:2154_0: Tathāpi vadeyya yā sā tumhehi “tassā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti pāḷi ābhatā,
anya-e0803n:2154_1: na sā sattamīpayogā. “Tassā”ti hi idaṃ chaṭṭhiyantapadaṃ “tassāmakkaṭiyāaṅgajāte
anya-e0803n:2154_2: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti atthasambhavatoti? Tanna, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tassāti bhummavacana”nti
anya-e0803n:2154_3: vuttattā. Kiñca bhiyyo – aṭṭhakathāyaṃyeva “tassā ca sikkhāya sikkhaṃ paripūrento
anya-e0803n:2154_4: sikkhati, tasmiñca sikkhāpade avītikkamanto sikkhatī”ti imasmiṃ padese “tassā”ti
anya-e0803n:2154_5: bhummavacanaṃ niddeso katoti. Nanu ca bho tatthāpi “tassā”ti idaṃ vibhattivipallāsavasena
anya-e0803n:2154_6: bhummatthe sāmivacananti? “Ativiya tvaṃ vibhattivipallāsanaye kusalosi, vibhattivipallāsiko
anya-e0803n:2154_7: nāmā”ti bhavaṃ vattabbo. Yo tvaṃ dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi vuttapāḷimpi ullaṅghasi,
anya-e0803n:2154_8: aṭṭhakathāvacanampi ullaṅghasi, aparampi te niddesapāḷiṃ āharissāma. Sace tvaṃ paṇḍitajātiko,
anya-e0803n:2154_9: saññattiṃ gamissasi. Sace apaṇḍitajātiko, attano gāhaṃ amuñcantoyeva saññattiṃ na
anya-e0803n:2154_10: gamissati, sāsane cittiṃ katvā suṇohīti. “Tasmā hi sikkhetha idheva jantū”ti imissā
anya-e0803n:2154_11: pāḷiyā atthaṃ niddisantena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena satthukappena aggasāvakena dhammasenāpatinā
anya-e0803n:2154_12: āyasmatā sāriputtena “idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyā imissā khantiyā imissā ruciyā imasmiṃ
anya-e0803n:2154_13: ādāye imasmiṃ dhamme”ti evaṃ “imissā”ti padaṃ bhummavacanavasena vuttaṃ. Tañhi “idhā”ti
anya-e0803n:2154_14: padassa atthavācakattā sattamiyā rūpanti viññāyati. Iti “imissā”ti sattamiyā rūpe
anya-e0803n:2154_15: diṭṭheyeva “sabbassā katarissā”tiādīni sattamiyā rūpāni pāḷiyaṃ anāgatānipi diṭṭhāniyeva nāma.
anya-e0803n:2155_0: Aparampi te sabbalokānukampakena sabbaññunā āhaccabhāsitaṃ pāḷiṃ āharissāma, cittiṃ
anya-e0803n:2155_1: katvā suṇohi, “aṭṭhānametaṃ bhikkhave anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ
anya-e0803n:2155_2: dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā uppajjeyyu”nti ettha “ekissā”ti idaṃ sattamiyā rūpaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2155_3: Evaṃ “ekissā”ti sattamiyā rūpe diṭṭheyeva “sabbassā katarissā”tiādīni sattamiyā rūpāni
anya-e0803n:2155_4: pāḷiyaṃ anāgatānipi diṭṭhāniyeva nāma. Na hi sabbathāpi vohārā sarūpato pāḷiādīsu
anya-e0803n:2155_5: dissanti, ekacce dissanti, ekacce na dissantiyeva. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0803n:2160_0: Atra panāyaṃ pāḷinayavibhāvanā aṭṭhakathānayavibhāvanā ca – tassā kaññāya saddhiṃ
anya-e0803n:2160_1: gacchati, tassā kaññāya kataṃ, tassā kaññāya deti, tassā kaññāya apeti, tassā kaññāya
anya-e0803n:2160_2: ayaṃ kaññā hīnā, tassā kaññāya ayaṃ kaññā adhikā, tassā kaññāya santakaṃ, tassā kaññāya
anya-e0803n:2160_3: patiṭṭhitanti. Dullabhāyaṃ nīti sādhukaṃ cittiṃ katvā pariyāpuṇitabbā sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2160_4: Evaṃ sabbathāpi pāḷiaṭṭhakathānayānusārena itthiliṅgassa avisadākāravohāratā ñātabbā.
anya-e0803n:2161_0: Evaṃ pana ñatvā viññujātinā “dvinnaṃ gosaddānaṃ rūpamālāvisesena liṅganānattaṃ hotī”ti
anya-e0803n:2161_1: niṭṭhametthāvagantabbaṃ. Gosaddo hi “puriso mātugāmo orodho āpo satthā”tiādayo viya
anya-e0803n:2161_2: na niyogā visadākāravohāro, nāpi “kaññā ratti itthī”tiādayo viya niyogā avisadākāravohāro.
anya-e0803n:2161_3: Tathā hi ayaṃ pulliṅgabhāve dhātusaddo viya visadākāravohāro, itthiliṅgabhāve avisadākāravohāro.
anya-e0803n:2161_4: Iti imassa atthassa sotūnaṃ ñāpanena paramasaṇhasukhumañāṇappaṭilābhattaṃ “go, gāvī
anya-e0803n:2161_5: gāvo. Gāviṃ, gavo”tiādinā okārantassa itthiliṅgassa gosaddassa āveṇikā nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:2161_6: vuttā. Ettha pana “gāvi”nti ekakkhattumāgataṃ, “go gohī”tiādīni dvikkhattuṃ, “gāvo
anya-e0803n:2161_7: gāvī gāva”nti tikkhattuṃ, “gāviyā”ti pañcakkhattuṃ, evamettha pañcakkhattuṃ āgatapadānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2161_8: vasena avisadākāro dissatīti idaṃ itthiliṅganti gahetabbaṃ. Imañhi nayaṃ muñcitvā
anya-e0803n:2161_9: natthi añño nayo yena gosaddo itthiliṅgo siyā. Tasmā idameva amhākaṃ mataṃ sārato
anya-e0803n:2161_10: paccetabbaṃ. Pumitthiliṅgasaṅkhātānaṃ dvinnaṃ gosaddānaṃ rūpamālāya nibbisesataṃ
anya-e0803n:2161_11: vadantānaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ mataṃ pulliṅge vattamānena gosaddeni’tthiliṅge vattamānassa
anya-e0803n:2161_12: gosaddassa rūpamālāya sadisatte sati mātugāmasaddassa nāmikapadamālāyo samaṃ yojetvā
anya-e0803n:2161_13: pumitthiliṅgabhāvaparikappanaṃ viya hotīti na sārato paccetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2162_0: Ettha pana kiñci liṅgasaṃsandanaṃ kathayāma – heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhassa okārantapulliṅgassa
anya-e0803n:2162_2: gohī”tiādīni dvikkhattuṃ, “gāvo gavo gava”nti imāni pana “satthā rājā”tiādīni viya
anya-e0803n:2162_3: tikkhattuṃ, catukkhattuṃ vā panettha pañcakkhattuṃ vā āgatapadāni na santi. Tadabhāvato
anya-e0803n:2162_4: visadākāro dissati. Purisasaddassa nāmikapadamālāyampi “puriso purisa”ntiādīni ekakkhattumāgatāni,
anya-e0803n:2162_5: “purise”tiādīni dvikkhattuṃ, “purisā”ti tikkhattuṃ. Evaṃ visadākāro dissati. Ākārantitthiliṅgassa
anya-e0803n:2162_7: tikkhattuṃ, “kaññā”ti idaṃ catukkhattuṃ, “kaññāyā”ti idaṃ pana pañcakkhattuṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0803n:2162_10: Iminā nayena sabbāsupi pumitthiliṅgapadamālāsu visadākāro ca avisadākāro ca veditabbo.
anya-e0803n:2162_12: dvikkhattuṃ, “cittānī”ti idaṃ tikkhattuṃ āgataṃ. Aṭṭhi āyusaddādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0803n:2162_13: Ettha ubhayamuttākāro dissati. Kiñcāpettha catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ vā āgatapadānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2162_14: abhāvato visadākāro upalabbhamāno viya dissati, tathāpi yasmā “cittaṃ aṭṭhi āyū”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:2162_15: napuṃsakāni “gacchaṃ aggi bhikkhū”tiādīnaṃ pulliṅgānaṃ nayena appavattanato visadākārañca,
anya-e0803n:2162_16: “ratti yāgū”tiādīnaṃ itthiliṅgānaṃ nayena appavattanato avisadākārañca ubhayamanupagamma
anya-e0803n:2162_17: visesato “cittaṃ, cittāni, cittā. Cittaṃ, cittāni, citte”tiādinā sanikārāya rūpamālāya
anya-e0803n:2162_18: rūpavantāni bhavanti, tasmā tesamākāro ubhayamuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n:2163_0: Tividhopāyaṃ ākāro sakkaṭabhāsāsu na labbhati. Tenesa sabbesupi byākaraṇasatthesu
anya-e0803n:2163_1: na vutto. Sabbasattānaṃ pana mūlabhāsābhūtāya jineritāya māgadhikāya sabhāvaniruttiyā
anya-e0803n:2163_2: labbhati. Tathā hi ayaṃ niruttimañjūsāyaṃ vutto –
anya-e0803n:2164: Kiṃ panetaṃ liṅgaṃ nāma? Keci tāva vadanti –
anya-e0803n:2165: “Thanakesavatī itthī, massuvā puriso siyā. Ubhinnamantaraṃ etaṃ, itaro’bhayamuttako’ti
anya-e0803n:2166: Vuttattā visiṭṭhā thanakesādayo liṅga”nti, etaṃ na sabbattha, gaṅgāsālārukkhādīnaṃ thanādinā sambandhābhāvato.
anya-e0803n:2167_0: Apare vadanti – “na liṅgaṃ nāma paramatthato kiñci atthi, lokasaṅketarūḷho pana vohāro
anya-e0803n:2167_1: liṅgaṃ nāmā”ti. Idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbaliṅgikopi saddo hoti taṭaṃ taṭī taṭoti.
anya-e0803n:2167_2: Yadi ca paramatthato liṅgaṃ nāma siyā, kathaṃ aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ tesaṃ ekattha
anya-e0803n:2167_3: samāveso bhavati, tasmā yassa kassaci atthassa avisadākāravohāro itthiliṅgaṃ, visadākāravohāro
anya-e0803n:2168_1: na ekekapadavasena. Tathā hi “kaññā puriso citta”nti ca, “kaññāyo purisā cittānī”ti
anya-e0803n:2168_2: ca evamādikassa ekekapadassa avisadākāravohārāditā na dissati. Yasmā pana pabandhavasena
anya-e0803n:2168_3: visadākāravohārādibhāve siddheyeva samudāyāvayavattā ekekapadassapi avisadākāravohārāditā sijjhateva.
anya-e0803n:2169_0: Keci pana nāmikapadamālāsaṅkhātaṃ pabandhaṃ aparāmasitvā ekekapadavaseneva avisadākāravohārādikaṃ
anya-e0803n:2169_1: icchanti, te vattabbā “yadi ekekapadasseva avisadākāravohārāditā siyā, evaṃ sante
anya-e0803n:2169_2: ‘kaññā purisā satthā guṇavā rājā’tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ ākārasutivasena, ‘puriso satthāro
anya-e0803n:2169_3: kaññāyo’tiādīnaṃ pana okārasutivasena, ‘cittaṃ purisaṃ kañña’ntiādīnaṃ anusārasutivasena
anya-e0803n:2169_4: aññamaññaṃ samānasutisambhavā kathaṃ avisadākāravohārāditā siyā”ti? Kiñcāpi te evaṃ
anya-e0803n:2169_5: vadeyyuṃ “siyā eva, nānattaṃ pana tesaṃ duppaṭivedha”nti. Te vattabbā “mā tumhe evamavacuttha,
anya-e0803n:2169_6: dujjānatarampi nibbānaṃ kathanasamatthaṃ puggalaṃ nissāya jānanti, tasmā suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā
anya-e0803n:2169_7: vadethā”ti. Evañca pana vatvā tato uttari te pañhaṃ pucchitabbā “bodhisaddo āyusaddo
anya-e0803n:2169_8: ca kataraliṅgo”ti. Te jānantā evaṃ vakkhanti “bodhisaddo itthiliṅgo ceva pulliṅgo
anya-e0803n:2169_9: ca, āyusaddo ca pana napuṃsakaliṅgo ca pulliṅgo cāti dviliṅgā ete saddā”ti. Te vattabbā
anya-e0803n:2169_10: “yadi bodhisaddo ca āyusaddo ca dviliṅgā ete saddā, evaṃ sante dvinnaṃ bodhisaddānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2169_11: ekapadabhāvena vavatthitānaṃ accantasamānasutikānaṃ kathaṃ avisadākāravohāratā ca
anya-e0803n:2169_12: visadākāravohāratā ca siyā, kathañca pana dvinnaṃ āyusaddānaṃ ekapadabhāvena vavatthitānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2169_13: accantasamānasutikānaṃ ubhayamuttākāravohāratā ca visadākāravohāratā ca siyā”ti?
anya-e0803n:2169_14: Evaṃ vuttā te addhā kiñci uttari apassantā niruttarā bhavissanti. Saddasatthavidū
anya-e0803n:2174_0: Tesaṃ kira ayamadhippāyo – “eso puriso, eso mātugāmo, eso rājā, esā itthī, esā latā,
anya-e0803n:2174_1: etaṃ napuṃsakaṃ, etaṃ citta”nti evaṃ purisādīsu yesu atthesu lokassa “eso esā eta”nti
anya-e0803n:2174_2: ca pasiddhi hoti, tesu atthesu tāni nāmāni “pumitthinapuṃsakaliṅgānī”ti vuccanti,
anya-e0803n:2174_3: taṃdvārena aññānipīti. Evaṃ vadantehi tehi “iminā nāma ākārena ‘eso esā eta’nti nāmāni
anya-e0803n:2174_4: aññāni ca pulliṅgādināmaṃ labhantī”ti ayaṃ viseso na dassito, saddhammanayaññūhi
anya-e0803n:2174_5: pana neruttikehi dassito “yassa kassaci atthassa avisadākāravohāro itthiliṅga”ntiādinā.
anya-e0803n:2175_0: Keci pana “avisadākārānaṃ atthānaṃ vācako vohāro itthiliṅga”ntiādīni vadanti, taṃ
anya-e0803n:2175_1: na gahetabbaṃ. Yadi hi avisadākārānaṃ atthānaṃ vācako vohāro itthiliṅgaṃ, evaṃ sante
anya-e0803n:2175_2: mātugāmakalattakantakaṇṭakagumbādayopi vohārā itthiliṅgāni siyuṃ avisadākārattā tadatthānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2175_3: Yadi pana visadākārānaṃ atthānaṃ vācako vohāro pulliṅgaṃ, evaṃ sante “devatā saddhā
anya-e0803n:2175_4: ñāṇa”miccādayopi vohārā pulliṅgāni siyuṃ visadākārattā tadatthānaṃ. Atha vā yadi
anya-e0803n:2175_5: avisadākārānaṃ atthānaṃ vācako vohāro itthiliṅgaṃ, visadākārānaṃ panatthānaṃ vācako
anya-e0803n:2175_6: vohāro pulliṅgaṃ, evaṃ sante ekassevatthassa ekakkhaṇe dvīhi liṅgehi na vattabbatā siyā –
anya-e0803n:2177: Karomi te taṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mamā”ti.
anya-e0803n:2178_0: Yadi ca ubhayamuttākārānaṃ atthānaṃ vācako vohāro napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ, evaṃ sante ubhayamuttākārānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2178_1: atthānaṃ tiṇarukkhādīsu “idaṃ nāmā”ti niyamābhāvato liṅgavacanaṃ viruddhaṃ siyā.
anya-e0803n:2178_2: Apica “paññāratanaṃ. Sāriputtamoggallānaṃ sāvakayuga”nti ca ādinā napuṃsakaliṅgavacanena
anya-e0803n:2178_3: tadatthānampi ubhayamuttākāratā vuttā siyā. Apica ekampi tīraṃ “taṭaṃ taṭī taṭo”ti
anya-e0803n:2178_4: tīhi liṅgehi na vattabbaṃ siyā. Ekampi ca ñāṇaṃ “paññāṇaṃ paññā pajānanā amoho”tiādinā
anya-e0803n:2178_5: tīhi liṅgehi na vattabbaṃ siyā, tasmā taṃ nayaṃ aggahetvā yathāvuttoyeva nayo gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2179_0: Lokasmiñhi itthīnaṃ heṭṭhimakāyo visado hoti, uparimakāyo avisado, uramaṃsaṃ avisadaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2179_1: gamanādīnipi avisadāni. Itthiyo hi gacchamānā avisadaṃ gacchanti, tiṭṭhamānā nipajjamānā
anya-e0803n:2179_2: nisīdamānā khādamānā bhuñjamānā avisadaṃ bhuñjanti. Purisampi hi avisadaṃ disvā “mātugāmo
anya-e0803n:2179_3: viya gacchati tiṭṭhati nipajjati nisīdati khādati bhuñjatī”ti vadanti. Iti yathā
anya-e0803n:2179_4: itthiyo yebhuyyena avisadākārā, tathā yassa kassaci saviññāṇakassa vā aviññāṇakassa
anya-e0803n:2179_5: vā atthassa ye vohārā yebhuyyena avisadākārā, teyeva itthiliṅgāni nāma bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2179_6: Taṃ yathā? “Kaññā devatā dhītalikā dubbā saddhā ratti itthī yāgu vadhū” iccevamādīni.
anya-e0803n:2179_7: Purisānaṃ pana heṭṭhimakāyo avisado hoti, uparimakāyo visado, uramaṃsaṃ visadaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2179_8: gamanādīnipi visadāni honti. Purisā hi gacchamānā visadaṃ gacchanti, tiṭṭhamānā nipajjamānā
anya-e0803n:2179_9: nisīdamānā khādamānā bhuñjamānā visadaṃ bhuñjanti. Itthimpi hi gamanādīni visadāni
anya-e0803n:2179_10: kurumānaṃ disvā “puriso viya gacchatī”tiādīni vadanti. Iti yathā purisā yebhuyyena
anya-e0803n:2179_11: visadākārā, tathā yassa kassaci saviññāṇakassa vā aviññāṇakassa vā atthassa ye vohārā
anya-e0803n:2179_12: yebhuyyena visadākārā, teyeva pulliṅgāni nāma bhavanti. Taṃ yathā? “Puriso mātugāmo
anya-e0803n:2179_13: orodho āpo rukkho moho satthā” iccevamādīni. Yathā ca pana napuṃsakā ubhayamuttākārā,
anya-e0803n:2179_14: tathā yassa kassaci saviññāṇakassa vā aviññāṇakassa vā atthassa ye vohārā ubhayamuttākārā,
anya-e0803n:2179_15: teyeva napuṃsakaliṅgāni nāma bhavanti. Taṃ yathā? “Cittaṃ rūpaṃ itthāgāraṃ kalattaṃ
anya-e0803n:2179_16: nāṭakaṃ ratanaṃ ñāṇaṃ aṭṭhi āyu”iccevamādīni. Iccevaṃ nāmikānaṃ sabbesampi vohārānaṃ –
anya-e0803n:2182_0: Idaṃ ṭhānaṃ dubbinivijjhaṃ mahāvanagahanaṃ niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā dassitaṃ sādhukaṃ
anya-e0803n:2182_1: manasi kātabbaṃ. Iti sabbesaṃ nāmikapadānaṃ pabandhanissitena avisadākāravohārādibhāvena
anya-e0803n:2182_2: itthiliṅgādibhāvassa sambhavato dvinnampi gosaddānaṃ pabandhanissitena avisadākāravohārādibhāvena
anya-e0803n:2185_0: Evaṃ sabbathāpi ākāranta ivaṇṇanta uvaṇṇantokārantavasena chabbidhāni itthiliṅgāni
anya-e0803n:2185_1: niravasesato gahitāni bhavanti. Etesu pana kesañci ākārantānaṃ īkārantānañca katthaci
anya-e0803n:2185_2: paccattekavacanassa ekārādesavasena yo pabhedo dissati, so idāni vuccati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n:2188_0: Imasmiṃ rādhajātake “virattā”ti ākārantavasena vattabbe paccattavacanassa ekārādesavasena
anya-e0803n:2188_3: mātā no kosiyāyanī brāhmaṇī virattā amhākaṃ pitari nippemā jātā”ti atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇesi.
anya-e0803n:2188_4: Nanu ca bho pāḷiyaṃ “viratte”ti, “kosiyāyane”ti ca paccattavacanassa dassanato “ekārantampi
anya-e0803n:2188_5: itthiliṅgaṃ atthī”ti vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṃ ākārīkārantogadharūpavisesattā tesaṃ
anya-e0803n:2188_6: rūpānaṃ. Ādesavasena hi siddhattā visuṃ ekārantaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā
anya-e0803n:2195: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2200: Atha pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā niggahītantanapuṃsakaliṅgānaṃ “bhūtaṃ”iccādikassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma –
anya-e0803n:2201_0: Cittaṃ, cittāni. Cittaṃ, cittāni. Cittena, cittehi, cittebhi. Cittassa, cittānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2201_1: Cittā, cittasmā, cittamhā, cittehi, cittebhi. Cittassa, cittānaṃ. Citte, cittasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:2201_2: cittamhi, cittesu. Bho citta, bho cittā, bhavanto cittāni. Yamakamahātheramataṃ.
anya-e0803n:2202_1: tathāpi tattha tattha aññesampi tādisānaṃ niggahītantanapuṃsakarūpānaṃ dassanato
anya-e0803n:2202_3: cittāni, cittā. Cittaṃ, cittāni, citte”ti kamo veditabbo. Niggahītantānañhi napuṃsakaliṅgānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2202_4: katthaci okārantapulliṅgānaṃ viya paccattopayogabahuvacanāni bhavanti. Tāni ca pulliṅgena
anya-e0803n:2202_5: vā saliṅgena vā aliṅgena vā saddhiṃ samānādhikaraṇāni hutvā kevalāni vā pāvacane
anya-e0803n:2202_6: sañcaranti. Atra “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā. Cattāro sammappadhānā. Sabbe mālā upentimaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2202_7: Yassa ete dhanā atthi. Cattāro mahābhūtā. Tīṇindriyā. Dve indriyā. Dasindriyā. Dve
anya-e0803n:2202_8: mahābhūte nissāya dve mahābhūtā, pañca viññāṇā, caturo aṅge adhiṭṭhāya, semi vammikamatthake,
anya-e0803n:2202_9: rūpā saddā rasā gandhā. Rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca
anya-e0803n:2202_10: uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti evamādayo anekasatā pāḷippadesā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n:2203_0: Ettha pana “satipaṭṭhānā”tiādīni padāni liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttānīti na gahetabbāni
anya-e0803n:2203_2: adassanato. “Cattāro”tiādīniyeva pana padāni liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttānīti gahetabbāni
anya-e0803n:2203_3: niyogā niggahītantehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi satipaṭṭhānasaddādīhi saddhiṃ tesaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvassa dassanatoti.
anya-e0803n:2204_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṃ – nanu “satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādippayogadassanato
anya-e0803n:2204_1: satipaṭṭhānasaddādīnaṃ okārantapulliṅgabhāvo labbhati. Evaṃ sante kasmā tumhehi “satipaṭṭhānasaddādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2204_3: kasmā ca ekantato satipaṭṭhānasaddādīnaṃ niggahītantanapuṃsakaliṅgatā anumatā, nanu
anya-e0803n:2204_4: “satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādidassanato “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādīsupi
anya-e0803n:2204_5: “satipaṭṭhānasaddādayo liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttā”ti vattabbāti? Na vattabbā, kasmāti
anya-e0803n:2204_6: ce? “Satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādīsupi satipaṭṭhānacittasaddādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2204_7: liṅgavipallāsavasena anicchitabbato. Tattha hi pulliṅgena dhammasaddena yojetuṃ dhammissaro
anya-e0803n:2204_8: bhagavā dhammāpekkhaṃ katvā “satipaṭṭhāno, citto, cittā”ti ca abhāsi. Kevalā hi satipaṭṭhāna
anya-e0803n:2204_9: cittasaddādayo okārantapulliṅgabhāvena katthacipi yojitā na santi, niggahītantanapuṃsakabhāvena pana yojitā santi.
anya-e0803n:2205_0: Tathā hi “citto gahapatī”ti etthāpi pulliṅgagahapatisaddaṃ apekkhitvā viññāṇe pavattaṃ
anya-e0803n:2205_1: cittanāmaṃ paṇṇattivasena puggale āropetvā puggalavācakaṃ katvā “citto”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2205_2: Yadi pana viññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ cittamadhippetaṃ siyā, “citta”micceva vucceyya. Tasmā
anya-e0803n:2205_3: “citto gahapati, cittā itthī”tiādīsu liṅgavipallāso na icchitabbo sāpekkhattā cittasaddādīnaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2205_4: Yathā ca ettha, evaṃ “satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādīsupi liṅgavipallāso
anya-e0803n:2205_5: na icchitabbo. “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādīsu pana satipaṭṭhānasaddādīnaṃ apekkhitabbāni
anya-e0803n:2205_6: padāni na santi, yehi te pulliṅgāni siyuṃ, tasmā “cattāro”tiādīniyeva padāni parivattetvā
anya-e0803n:2205_8: padehi yojetabbāni. Īdisesu ṭhānesu keci aṭṭhakathācariyā nikāralopaṃ icchanti “yā
anya-e0803n:2205_9: pubbe bodhisattānaṃ, pallaṅkavaramābhuje, nimittāni padissantī”ti ettha viya. Adassanañhi
anya-e0803n:2205_10: lopo, tasmā “cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni, cattāri sammappadhānāni, sabbāni mālānī’tiādikā yojanā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n:2206_0: Keci pana “sabbe mālā upenti ma”nti ettha mālāsaddaṃ itthiliṅganti maññitvā pulliṅgabhūtaṃ
anya-e0803n:2206_1: sabbesaddaṃ itthiliṅgavasena parivattetvā “sabbā mālā”ti atthaṃ kathenti. Taṃ kiñcāpi
anya-e0803n:2206_2: yuttataraṃ viya dissati, tathāpi na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi so bhagavā liṅgaṃ naññāsi,
anya-e0803n:2206_3: na ca “sabbā mālā upenti ma”nti dve padāni itthiliṅgāni katvā vattuṃ na sakkhi. Yo
anya-e0803n:2206_4: evaṃ visadisaliṅgāni padāni uccāresi. Jānantoyeva pana bhagavā vattuṃ sakkontoyeva
anya-e0803n:2206_5: ca “sabbe mālā upenti ma”nti visadisaliṅgāni padāni uccāresi, tasmā pulliṅgabhūtaṃ
anya-e0803n:2206_7: padaṃ viya luttanikārena napuṃsakaliṅgena mālāsaddena yojetvā “sabbāni mālānī”ti
anya-e0803n:2206_8: attho gahetabbo katthaci “yassa ete dhanā atthī”ti ettha viya. Ettha hi yassa etāni
anya-e0803n:2206_9: dhanānīti attho. Idampettha sallakkhitabbaṃ. Mālāsaddo dviliṅgo itthinapuṃsakavasena.
anya-e0803n:2206_10: Tiṭṭhatu tassitthiliṅgattaṃ suviññeyyattā, napuṃsakatte pana tīṇi mālāni. “Mālehi
anya-e0803n:2206_11: ca gandhehi ca bhagavato sarīraṃ pūjentī”tiādayo napuṃsakappayogānipi bahū sandissantīti.
anya-e0803n:2207_0: Yadi pana bho mālasaddo itthinapuṃsakavasena dviliṅgo, “sabbe mālā upenti ma”nti
anya-e0803n:2207_1: ettha mālāsaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvaparikappane ko doso atthīti? Attheva itthiliṅgasaddassa
anya-e0803n:2207_3: pana pulliṅgabhūtena sabbanāmikapadena saddhiṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvassa upalabbhanato.
anya-e0803n:2207_4: Teneva ca “ete dhanā”tiādayo payogā pāvacane bahudhā diṭṭhā. Etthāpi pana vadeyyuṃ
anya-e0803n:2207_6: Na, napuṃsakāniyevetāni. Yadi hi “dhanā”tiādīni pulliṅgāni siyuṃ, katthaci paccattekavacanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n:2207_8: abhāvato pana “dhanā indriyā viññāṇā”tiādayo saddā napuṃsakaliṅgāniyeva honti. Ayaṃ
anya-e0803n:2207_9: nayo paccattabahuvacanaṭṭhāneyeva labbhati. Napuṃsakaliṅgāni hi visadākārāni pulliṅgarūpāni
anya-e0803n:2207_10: viya hutvā pulliṅgehipi saddhiṃ caranti, napuṃsakā viya purisavesadhārino purisehīti
anya-e0803n:2208_0: Athāpi te pubbe vuttavacanaṃ puna parivattetvā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “citto gahapati, cittā
anya-e0803n:2208_1: itthī”tiādīsu cittaṃ etassa atthīti citto, cittaṃ etissā atthīti cittā yathā “saddho,
anya-e0803n:2208_2: saddhā”ti evaṃ assatthīti atthavasena gahetabbato liṅgavipallāso nicchitabbo, “satipaṭṭhāno
anya-e0803n:2208_3: dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādīni pana evarūpassa atthassa aggahetabbato
anya-e0803n:2208_4: “satipaṭṭhānaṃ dhammo, cittaṃ dhammo, cittāni dhammā”ti vattabbe liṅgavipallāsena
anya-e0803n:2208_5: “satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādi vuttanti liṅgavipallāso icchitabbo”ti?
anya-e0803n:2208_6: Tanna, “citto gahapatī”tiādīsu pana “satipaṭṭhāno dhammo”tiādīsu ca cittasatipaṭṭhānasaddādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2208_7: gahapati dhammādīnaṃ apekkhanavasena niccaṃ pulliṅgabhāvassa icchitattā.
anya-e0803n:2209_0: Tathā hi ekantanapuṃsakaliṅgopi puññasaddo abhisaṅkhārāpekkhanavasena “puñño abhisaṅkhāro”ti
anya-e0803n:2209_1: pulliṅgo jāto, tathā ekantanapuṃsakaliṅgāpi paduma maṅgalasaddādayo aññassatthassāpekkhanavasena
anya-e0803n:2209_2: “padumo bhagavā, padumā devī, maṅgalo bhagavā, maṅgalā itthī”ti ca pumitthiliṅgā
anya-e0803n:2209_3: jātā. Ekantapulliṅgāpi hatthivisesavācakā kālāvaka gaṅgeyyasaddādayo kulāpekkhanavasena
anya-e0803n:2209_4: “kālāvakañca gaṅgeyya”ntiādinā napuṃsakaliṅgā jātā. Tadapekkhanavasena hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:2209_5: “kālāvako ca gaṅgeyyo”tiādi pulliṅganiddeso dissati. Evaṃ taṃtadatthānamapekkhanavasena
anya-e0803n:2209_6: taṃtaṃpakatiliṅgaṃ nāsetvā aparaṃ liṅgaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā niddeso dissati, na ca tāni
anya-e0803n:2209_7: sabbānipi liṅgāni taddhitavasena aññaliṅgāni jātāni, atha kho gahapatidhammādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2209_8: apekkhanavaseneva aññaliṅgāni jātāni, tasmā “petāni bhoti puttāni, khādamānā tuvaṃ
anya-e0803n:2209_9: pure. Siviputtāni cavhaya. Evaṃ dhammāni sutvāna, vippasīdanti paṇḍitā”tiādīsuyeva
anya-e0803n:2209_10: liṅgavipallāso icchitabbo anaññāpekkhakattā vuttadhammasaddādīnaṃ, na pana “citto
anya-e0803n:2209_11: gahapati, cittā itthī, satipaṭṭhāno dhammo, citto dhammo, cittā dhammā”tiādīsu cittasaddādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2209_12: vipallāso icchitabbo gahapati dhammādīnaṃ apekkhakattā tesanti niṭṭhametthāvagantabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2209_13: idañca ekaccānaṃ sammohaṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā saddhammaṭṭhitiyā ayaṃ nīti saddhāsampannehi
anya-e0803n:2210_0: Badaratitthavihāravāsī ācariyadhammapālo pana “aparimāṇā padā aparimāṇā akkharā aparimāṇā
anya-e0803n:2210_1: byañjanāti pāḷippadese ‘padā akkharā byañjanā’ti liṅgavipallāso katoti daṭṭhabba”nti
anya-e0803n:2210_2: āha. Etthāpi mayaṃ “padā”ti idaṃ “indriyā rūpā”tiādīni viya napuṃsakaliṅgamevāti
anya-e0803n:2210_3: vadāma okārantavasena paṭhamekavacanantabhāvābhāvato, itaradvayaṃ pana napuṃsakaliṅgantipi
anya-e0803n:2210_5: Tathā hi “puttāni latāni pabbatāni dhammānī”tiādīnaṃyeva liṅgavipallāsāni icchitabbāni
anya-e0803n:2210_7: paṭhamekavacanantatādassanato. “Jarādhammaṃ mā jīrī”ti idaṃ pana aññapadatthavasena
anya-e0803n:2211_0: Bhūtaṃ, bhūtāni, bhūtā. Bhūtaṃ, bhūtāni, bhūte. Bhūtena, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa,
anya-e0803n:2211_1: bhūtānaṃ. Bhūtā, bhūtasmā, bhūtamhā, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṃ. Bhūte,
anya-e0803n:2211_2: bhūtasmiṃ, bhūtamhi, bhūtesu. Bho bhūta, bhavanto bhūtāni, bhavanto bhūtā. Evaṃ cittanayena
anya-e0803n:2212: Iminā nayena “mahābhūtaṃ bhavittaṃ bhūnaṃ bhavana”miccādīnaṃ bhūdhātumayānaṃ niggahītantapadānaṃ aññesañca “vatta”miccādīnaṃ niggahītantapadānaṃ nāmikapadamālā veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:2213: Vattaṃ rūpaṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ, dukkhaṃ pupphaṃ jhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2214: Dānaṃ sīlaṃ puññaṃ pāpaṃ, vajjaṃ saccaṃ yānaṃ chattaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2215: Sakaṭaṃ kanakaṃ tagaraṃ nagaraṃ, taraṇaṃ caraṇaṃ dharaṇaṃ maraṇaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2216: Nayanaṃ vadanaṃ karaṇaṃ lavanaṃ, vasanaṃ pavanaṃ bhavanaṃ gaganaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2217: Amataṃ puḷinaṃ mālaṃ, āsanaṃ savanaṃ mukhaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2218: Padumaṃ uppalaṃ vassaṃ, locanaṃ sādhanaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2219: Tāṇaṃ mūlaṃ dhanaṃ kūlaṃ, maṅgalaṃ naḷinaṃ phalaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2220: Hiraññaṃ ambujaṃ dhaññaṃ, jālaṃ liṅgaṃ padaṃ jalaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2221: Aṅgaṃ paṇṇaṃ susānaṃ saṃ, āvudhaṃ hadayaṃ vanaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2222: Sopānaṃ cīvaraṃ pāṇaṃ, alātaṃ indriyaṃ kulaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2223: Lohaṃ kaṇaṃ balaṃ pīṭhaṃ, aṇḍaṃ ārammaṇaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0803n:2225: Imāni cittasaddena sabbathāpi sadisāni, imāni pana visadisāni. Seyyathidaṃ –
anya-e0803n:2229: Camme, cammasmiṃ, cammamhi, cammani, vesme, vesmasmiṃ, vesmamhi, vesmani, ghamme, ghammasmiṃ, ghammamhi, ghammani. Evaṃ aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2230_0: Kammaṃ, kammāni, kammā. Kammaṃ, kammāni, kamme. Kammena, kammunā, kammanā, kammehi,
anya-e0803n:2230_1: kammebhi. Kammassa, kammuno, kammānaṃ. Kammasmā, kammamhā, kammunā, kammehi, kammebhi.
anya-e0803n:2230_2: Kammassa, kammuno, kammānaṃ. Kamme, kammasmiṃ, kammamhi, kammani, kammesu. Bho kamma,
anya-e0803n:2231: Thāmasaddassa pana tatiyekavacanaṭṭhānādīsu “thāmena, thāmunā, thāmassa, thāmuno”ti ca, “thāmā, thāmasmā, thāmamhā, thāmunā”ti ca yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2232: Vantu mantu imantupaccayavataṃ pana niggahītantasaddānaṃ “guṇavaṃ cittaṃ, rucimaṃ pupphaṃ, pāpimaṃ kulaṃ” iccādipayogavasena –
anya-e0803n:2233_0: Guṇavaṃ, guṇavantāni, guṇavantā, guṇavanti. Guṇavantaṃ, guṇavantāni, guṇavante guṇavanti.
anya-e0803n:2233_1: Guṇavatā, guṇavantena, guṇavantehi, guṇavantebhi. Guṇavato, guṇavantassa, guṇavataṃ,
anya-e0803n:2233_2: guṇavantānaṃ. Guṇavatā, guṇavantā, guṇavantasmā, guṇavantamhā, guṇavantehi, guṇavantebhi.
anya-e0803n:2233_3: Guṇavato, guṇavantassa, guṇavataṃ, guṇavantānaṃ. Guṇavati, guṇavante, guṇavantasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:2233_4: guṇavantamhi, guṇavantesu. Bho guṇava, bhavanto guṇavantāni, guṇavanti.
anya-e0803n:2234_1: iccādinā ca yojetabbaṃ. Apicettha “guṇavaṃ balavaṃ yasavaṃ satimaṃ gatimaṃ”iccādinā
anya-e0803n:2236_0: Karontaṃ, karontāni, karontā, karonti. Karontaṃ, karontāni, karonte, karonti. Karotā,
anya-e0803n:2236_1: karontena, karontehi, karontebhi. Karoto, karato, karontassa, karontānaṃ, karotaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2236_2: Karotā, karontā, karontasmā, karontamhā, karontehi, karontebhi. Karoto, karato, karontassa,
anya-e0803n:2236_3: karontānaṃ, karotaṃ. Karoti, karonte, karontasmiṃ, karontamhi, karontesu. Bho karonta,
anya-e0803n:2237: Gacchantasaddassa tu “gacchantaṃ cittaṃ, gacchantaṃ kula”nti payogavasena –
anya-e0803n:2238_0: Gacchantaṃ, gacchantāni, gacchantā. Gacchantaṃ, gacchantāni, gacchante. Gacchatā,
anya-e0803n:2238_1: gacchantena, gacchantehi, gacchantebhi. Gacchato, gacchantassa, gacchantānaṃ, gacchataṃ.
anya-e0803n:2238_2: Gacchatā, gacchantā, gacchantasmā, gacchantamhā, gacchantehi, gacchantebhi. Gacchato,
anya-e0803n:2238_3: gacchantassa, gacchantānaṃ, gacchataṃ. Gacchati, gacchante, gacchantasmiṃ, gacchantamhi,
anya-e0803n:2238_4: gacchantesu. Bho gacchaṃ, bho gacchantā, bhavanto gacchantāni, gacchantāti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2239: Evaṃ “carantaṃ dadantaṃ tiṭṭhantaṃ cintayanta”ntiādīsupi nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2240_0: Mahantasaddassa pana koci bhedo, tathā hi “bārāṇasirajjaṃ nāma mahā”ti evaṃ “mahā”iti
anya-e0803n:2240_1: napuṃsakapayogadassanato “mahantaṃ, mahā, mahantāni, mahantā. Mahantaṃ, mahantāni,
anya-e0803n:2240_2: mahante. Mahatā”ti kamo veditabbo. Sabbānetāni cittasaddena visadisāni.
anya-e0803n:2244: Idāni tassīlatthassa katarassassa atthavibhāvi iccetassa saddassa nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā –
anya-e0803n:2245_0: Aṭṭhi, aṭṭhī, aṭṭhīni. Aṭṭhiṃ, aṭṭhī, aṭṭhīni. Aṭṭhinā, aṭṭhīhi, aṭṭhībhi. Aṭṭhissa,
anya-e0803n:2245_1: aṭṭhino, aṭṭhīnaṃ. Aṭṭhinā, aṭṭhīhi, aṭṭhībhi. Aṭṭhissa, aṭṭhino, aṭṭhīnaṃ. Aṭṭhismiṃ,
anya-e0803n:2245_2: aṭṭhimhi, aṭṭhīsu. Bho aṭṭhi, bhavanto aṭṭhī, bhavanto aṭṭhīni. Yamakamahātheramataṃ.
anya-e0803n:2246_0: Kiñcāpettha nissakkavacanaṭṭhāne “aṭṭhismā, aṭṭhimhā”ti padāni anāgatāni, tathāpi
anya-e0803n:2246_1: tattha tattha taṃsadisappayogadassanā gahetabbāni. Yathā pana aṭṭhisaddassa, evaṃ
anya-e0803n:2246_2: “satthi dadhi vāri akkhi acchi”iccādīnampi rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2247_0: Atthavibhāvi, atthavibhāvī, atthavibhāvīni. Atthavibhāviṃ, atthavibhāvī, atthavibhāvīni.
anya-e0803n:2247_4: atthavibhāvimhi, atthavibhāvīsu. Bho atthavibhāvi, bhavanto atthavibhāvī, bhavanto atthavibhāvīni.
anya-e0803n:2248_0: Evaṃ “dhammavibhāvi, cittānuparivatti, sukhakāri”iccādīnipi. Tattha aṭṭhi satthiādīni
anya-e0803n:2248_1: padhānaliṅgāni anaññāpekkhakattā, atthavibhāvi dhammavibhāviādīni appadhānaliṅgāni aññāpekkhakattā.
anya-e0803n:2251: Idāni katarassassa gotrabhu iccetassa saddassa nāmikapadamālaṃ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṃ purecaraṃ katvā –
anya-e0803n:2252_0: Āyu, āyū, āyūni. Āyuṃ, āyū, āyūni. Āyunā, āyūhi, āyūbhi. Āyussa, āyuno, āyūnaṃ. Āyunā,
anya-e0803n:2252_1: āyūhi, āyūbhi. Āyussa, āyuno, āyūnaṃ. Āyusmiṃ, āyumhi, āyūsu. Bho āyu, bhavanto āyū,
anya-e0803n:2253_0: Kiñcāpettha nissakkavacanaṭṭhāne “āyusmā, āyumhā”ti padāni anāgatāni, tathāpi tattha
anya-e0803n:2253_1: tattha taṃsadisappayogadassanato gahetabbāni. Ettha ca āyusaddo puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgo
anya-e0803n:2253_2: daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ca tassa dviliṅgatā dissati. “Punarāyu ca
anya-e0803n:2253_3: me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisa. Āyu cassā parikkhīṇo ahosī”tiādīsu hi āyusaddo pulliṅgo,
anya-e0803n:2253_4: tabbasena “āyu, āyū, āyavo”tiādinā bhikkhunayena yathāsambhavaṃ nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2253_5: “Aggaṃ āyu ca vaṇṇo ca. Kittakaṃ panassa āyū”tiādīsu pana napuṃsakaliṅgo, tabbasena
anya-e0803n:2254_0: Gotrabhu, gotrabhū, gotrabhūni. Gotrabhuṃ, gotrabhū, gotrabhūni. Gotrabhunā, gotrabhūhi,
anya-e0803n:2254_1: gotrabhūbhi. Gotrabhussa, gotrabhuno, gotrabhūnaṃ. Gotrabhunā, gotrabhusmā, gotrabhumhā,
anya-e0803n:2254_2: gotrabhūhi, gotrabhūbhi. Gotrabhussa, gotrabhuno, gotrabhūnaṃ. Gotrabhusmiṃ, gotrabhumhi,
anya-e0803n:2254_3: gotrabhūsu. Bho gotrabhu, bhavanto gotrabhū, bhavanto gotrabhūni. Bho gotrabhū, bho
anya-e0803n:2254_4: gotrabhūni, evaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vā. Ayamamhākaṃ mataṃ, evaṃ “cittasahabhu”iccādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2254_5: bhūdhātumayānaṃ ukārantasaddānaṃ aññesampi taṃsadisānaṃ nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2254_6: Puggalavācako pana ūkāranto gotrabhūsaddo pulliṅgapariyāpannattā sabbaññūnaye paviṭṭho.
anya-e0803n:2254_7: Tatraññe saddā nāma “cakkhu vasu dhanu dāru tipu madhu siṅgu hiṅgu cittagu”iccādayo.
anya-e0803n:2258_0: Evaṃ niggahītanta ikāranta ukārantavasena tividhāni napuṃsakaliṅgāni niravasesato
anya-e0803n:2258_1: gahitāneva honti. Tesu kesañci niggahītantānaṃ kvaci paccattekavacanassa bahuvacanassa
anya-e0803n:2258_2: ekārādesavasena bhedo dissati. Seyyathidaṃ? “Sukhe dukkhe. Ekūnapaññāsa ājīvakasate
anya-e0803n:2258_3: ekūnapaññāsa paribbājakasate”iccevamādi. Nanu bho evaṃvidhānaṃ rūpānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ dassanato
anya-e0803n:2258_4: “ekārantampi napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ atthī”ti vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṃ niggahītantogadharūpavisesattā
anya-e0803n:2258_5: tesaṃ rūpānaṃ. Ādesavasena hi siddhattā visuṃ ekārantaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0803n:2263: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2272: Itthī thī ca pabhā bhā ca, girā rā pavanaṃ vanaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2273: Udakañca dakaṃ kañca, vitakko iti cādayo.
anya-e0803n:2274: Bhū bhūmi ceva araññaṃ, araññānīti cādayo;
anya-e0803n:2275: Paññā paññāṇaṃ ñāṇañca, iccādī ca tidhā siyuṃ.
anya-e0803n:2276: Ko vi sā ceva bhā rā ca, thī dhī ku bhū tatheva kaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2277: Khaṃ go mo mā ca saṃ yaṃ taṃ, kimiccādī ca ekikāti.
anya-e0803n:2278: Ayaṃ liṅgattayamissako nāmikapadamālāuddeso. Tatra itthī, itthī, itthiyo. Itthiṃ…pe… bhotiyo itthiyo.
anya-e0803n:2279: Thī thī, thiyo. Thiṃ, thī, thiyo. Thiyā, thīhi, thībhi. Thiyā, thīnaṃ. Thiyā, thīhi, thībhi. Thiyā, thīnaṃ. Thiyā, thiyaṃ, thīsu. Bhoti thi, bhotiyo thī, bhotiyo thiyo. Ettha –
anya-e0803n:2282: Thiyā guyhaṃ na saṃseyya; Thīnaṃ bhāvo durājāno”ti
anya-e0803n:2284: Pabhā, pabhā, pabhāyo. Pabhaṃ…pe… bhotiyo pabhāyo.
anya-e0803n:2285_0: Bhā, bhā, bhāyo. Bhaṃ, bhā, bhāyo. Bhāya, bhāhi, bhābhi. Bhāya, bhānaṃ. Bhāya, bhāhi,
anya-e0803n:2285_1: bhābhi. Bhāya, bhānaṃ. Bhāya, bhāyaṃ, bhāsu. Bhoti bhe, bhotiyo bhā, bhotiyo bhāyo.
anya-e0803n:2286: Girā, girā, girāyo. Giraṃ…pe… bhotiyo girāyo. “Vācā girā byappatho. Ye vohaṃ kittayissāmi, girāhi anupubbaso”ti imāni girāsaddassa itthiliṅgabhāve nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2287: Suvaṇṇavācako rāsaddo pulliṅgo, idha pana saddavācako rāsaddo itthiliṅgo.
anya-e0803n:2288: Rā, rā, rāyo. Raṃ, rā, rāyo. Rāya, rāhi, rābhi. Rāya, rānaṃ. Rāya, rāhi, rābhi. Rāya, rānaṃ. Rāya, rāyaṃ, rāsu. Bhoti re, bhotiyo rā, bhotiyo rāyo.
anya-e0803n:2289_0: Rā vuccati saddo. Aggaññasuttaṭīkāyañhi “rā saddo tiyati chijjati etthāti ratti,
anya-e0803n:2289_1: sattānaṃ saddassa vūpasamakālo”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā rāsaddassa saddavācakatte “rattī”ti padaṃ nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2290: Pavanaṃ, pavanāni, pavanā. Pavanaṃ, pavanāni, pavane.
anya-e0803n:2291: Vanaṃ, vanāni, vanā. Vanaṃ, vanāni, vane. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2292_0: Pavana vanasaddā kadāci samānatthā kadāci bhinnatthā. Te hi araññavācakatte samānatthā
anya-e0803n:2292_1: “te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṃ pāvisiṃ tadā. Saputto pāvisiṃ vana”ntiādīsu. Yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0803n:2293: Udakaṃ, udakāni, udakā. Udakaṃ, udakāni, udake.
anya-e0803n:2294: Dakaṃ, dakāni, dakā. Dakaṃ, dakāni, dake. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2295_0: “Ambapakkaṃ dakaṃ sītaṃ. Thalajā dakajā pupphā”tiādīnettha nidassanapadāni. “Nīlodaṃ
anya-e0803n:2295_1: vanamajjhato. Mahodadhi. Udabindunipātena, udakumbhopi pūratī”ti pāḷippadesesu pana
anya-e0803n:2295_3: “rittassa”nti saddena rittassādattho viya. Pāḷiyañhi kevalo udasaddo na diṭṭhapubbo.
anya-e0803n:2296_0: Kaṃ, kāni, kā. Kaṃ, kāni, ke. Kena, kehi, kebhi. Kassa, kānaṃ. Kā, kasmā, kamhā,
anya-e0803n:2296_1: kehi, kebhi. Kassa, kānaṃ. Ke, kasmiṃ, kamhi, kesu. Bho ka, bhavanto kā, bhavanto
anya-e0803n:2296_2: kāni. Bhosaddena vā bahuvacanaṃ yojetabbaṃ “bho kāni, bho kā”ti.
anya-e0803n:2297_0: Ettha kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ sīsaṃ sukhañca. Atra “kantāro kandaro kevaṭṭā kesā karuṇā
anya-e0803n:2297_1: nāko”tiādīni payogāni veditabbāni. Tatra kantāroti kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena taritabbo
anya-e0803n:2297_2: atikkamitabboti kantāro, nirudakappadeso. Corakantārantiādīsu pana rūḷhiyā duggamanaṭṭhānepi
anya-e0803n:2297_3: kantārasaddo pavattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kandaroti etthāpi kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena dārito
anya-e0803n:2297_4: bhinnoti kandaro. Kevaṭṭātiādīsu pana ke udake vattanato gahaṇatthaṃ pavattanato
anya-e0803n:2297_5: kevaṭṭā. Ke sīse senti uppajjantīti kesā. Kaṃ sukhaṃ rundhatīti karuṇā. Nākoti saggo.
anya-e0803n:2297_6: Kanti hi sukhaṃ, na kaṃ akaṃ, dukkhaṃ, taṃ natthi etthāti nākoti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2297_7: Yathettha itthīsaddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālā yojitā, evaṃ “vitakko vicāro ābhā padīpo”tiādīnampi yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2298_0: Bhū, bhū, bhuyo. Bhuṃ, bhū, bhuyo. Bhuyā, bhūhi, bhūbhi. Bhuyā, bhūnaṃ. Bhuyā, bhūhi,
anya-e0803n:2298_1: bhūbhi. Bhuyā, bhūnaṃ. Bhuyā, bhuyaṃ, bhūsu. Bhoti bhu, bhotiyo bhū, bhotiyo bhuyo.
anya-e0803n:2298_2: Ettha ca “bhūruho bhūpālo bhūbhujo bhūtala”nti nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2301: Araññānī vuccati mahāaraññaṃ, “gahapatānī”ti padamiva inīpaccayavasena sādhetabbaṃ padaṃ itthiliṅgañca. “Araññānī”ti hi aṭṭhakathāpāṭhopi dissati.
anya-e0803n:2302_0: Araññānī, araññānī, araññāniyo. Araññāniṃ, araññānī, araññāniyo. Araññāniyā, araññānīhi,
anya-e0803n:2302_1: araññānībhi. Araññāniyā, araññānīnaṃ. Araññāniyā, araññānīhi, araññānībhi. Araññāniyā,
anya-e0803n:2302_2: araññānīnaṃ. Araññāniyā, araññāniyaṃ, araññānīsu. Bhoti araññāni, bhotiyo araññānī, bhotiyo araññāniyo.
anya-e0803n:2303_0: Yathettha uttarādhikavasena yojitā, evaṃ “sabhā, sabhāya”ntiādīsupi yojetabbā. Sabhāyanti
anya-e0803n:2303_1: sabhā eva, liṅgabyattayavasena pana evaṃ vuttaṃ. “Sabhāye vā dvāramūle vā vatthabba”nti
anya-e0803n:2304: Paññā, paññā, paññāyo. Paññaṃ, paññā, paññāyo. Paññāya.
anya-e0803n:2305: Paññāṇaṃ, paññāṇāni, paññāṇā. Paññāṇaṃ, paññāṇāni, paññāṇe. Paññāṇena.
anya-e0803n:2306: “Tathā hi bhante bhagavato sīlapaññāṇaṃ. Sādhu paññāṇavā naro”tiādīnettha nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2307: Ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇāni, ñāṇā. Ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇāni, ñāṇe. Ñāṇena. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ neyyaṃ. “Aggi aggini gini”iccādīsupi uttarādhikavasena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2308: Ko vī sādīsupi ekakkharesu ko vuccati brahmā vāto ca sarīrañca, tassa tabbācakatte ime payogā. Seyyathidaṃ?
anya-e0803n:2311_0: Kakudharukkho. Karajakāyo” iccevamādayo. Tattha kamoḷialisevitanti vandantānaṃ anekasatānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2311_1: brahmānaṃ moḷibhamarasevitanti kavayo icchanti. Kakudharukkhoti ettha pana ko vuccati
anya-e0803n:2311_2: vāto, tassa yo kujjhati, vātarogāpanayanavasena taṃ nivāreti, tasmā so rukkho kakudhoti
anya-e0803n:2311_3: vuccatībhi ācariyā. Karajakāyoti ettha tu ko vuccati sarīraṃ, tattha pavatto rajo
anya-e0803n:2311_4: karajo. Kiṃ taṃ? Sukkasoṇitaṃ. Tañhi “rāgo rajo, na ca pana reṇu vuccatī”ti evaṃ
anya-e0803n:2311_6: vuccati. Tena sukkasoṇitasaṅkhātena karajena sambhūto kāyo karajakāyoti ācariyā.
anya-e0803n:2311_7: Tathā hi “kāyo mātāpettikasambhavo”ti vutto, mahāassapūrasuttaṭīkāyaṃ pana “kariyati
anya-e0803n:2311_8: gabbhāsaye khipiyatīti karo, sambhavo. Karato jātoti karajo, mātāpettikasambhavoti
anya-e0803n:2311_9: attho. Mātuādīnaṃ saṇṭhāpanavasena karato jātoti apare, ubhayathāpi karajakāyanti
anya-e0803n:2311_10: catusantatirūpamāhā”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panattho idha nādhippeto, purimoyevattho adhippeto kasaddādhikārattā.
anya-e0803n:2312: Ko, kā. Kaṃ, ke. Kena, kehi, kebhi. Kassa, kānaṃ. Kā, kasmā, kamhā, kehi, kebhi. Kassa, kānaṃ. Ke, kasmiṃ, kamhi, kesu. Bho ka, bhavanto kā.
anya-e0803n:2313: Tatra vi vuccati pakkhī. Tathā hi pakkhīnaṃ issaro supaṇṇarājā vindoti kathiyati. Etamatthañhi sandhāya pubbācariyenapi ayaṃ gāthā bhāsitā –
anya-e0803n:2316: Tattha vīnaṃ indoti vindo, pakkhijātiyā jātānaṃ supaṇṇānaṃ rājāti attho.
anya-e0803n:2317: Viṃ, vī, vayo. Viṃ, vī, vayo. Vinā, vīhi, vībhi. Vissa, vino, vīnaṃ. Vinā, vismā, vimhā, vīhi, vībhi. Vissa, vino, vīnaṃ. Vismiṃ, vimhi, vīsu. Bho vi, bhavanto vayo.
anya-e0803n:2318_0: Sā vuccati sunakho, “mātā me atthi, sā mayā posetabbā”tiādīsu pana sāsaddo sabbanāmikapariyāpanno
anya-e0803n:2318_1: parammukhavacano tasaddena sambhūto daṭṭhabbo. Sāsaddassa bhā rā thī bhū kasaddānañca
anya-e0803n:2319: Dhī vuccati paññā. Ettha ca “amacce tāta jānāhi, dhīre atthassa kovide”ti. “Dhīmā, dhīmati, sudhī, sudhinī, dhīyutta”nti ca ādīni nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2320: Dhī, dhī, dhiyo. Dhiṃ, dhī, dhiyo. Dhiyā, dhīhi, dhībhi. Dhiyā, dhīnaṃ. Dhiyā, dhīhi, dhībhi. Dhiyā, dhīnaṃ. Dhiyā, dhiyaṃ, dhīsu. Bhoti dhi, bhotiyo dhī, bhotiyo dhiyo.
anya-e0803n:2321_0: Ku vuccati pathavī. Ettha ca “kudālo. Kumudaṃ. Kuñjaro”ti imāni nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2321_1: Tatra kuṃ pathaviṃ dālayati padāleti bhindati etenāti kudālo. Kuyaṃ pathaviyaṃ modatīti
anya-e0803n:2321_2: kumudaṃ. Kuṃ jaratīti kuñjaro. Tathā hi vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “kuṃ pathaviṃ
anya-e0803n:2322: Ku, kū, kuyo. Kuṃ, kū, kuyo. Kuyā, kūhi, kūbhi. Kuyā, kūnaṃ. Kuyā, kūhi, kūbhi. Kuyā, kūnaṃ. Kuyā, kuyaṃ, kūsu. Bhoti ku, bhotiyo kū, bhotiyo kuyo.
anya-e0803n:2324: Saggaṭṭhānampi khaṃ vuttaṃ, suññattampi ca khaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0803n:2325_0: Tatrindriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ gatinivāsabhāvato “kha”nti vuccati, ākāsaṃ vivittaṭṭhena.
anya-e0803n:2325_1: Saggo katasucaritehi ekantena gantabbatāya “kha”nti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. “Khago yathā
anya-e0803n:2325_2: hi rukkhagge, nilīyantova sākhino. Sākhaṃ ghaṭṭetī”ti ca, “khe nimmito acari aṭṭhasataṃ
anya-e0803n:2326_0: Khaṃ, khāni, khā. Khaṃ, khāni, khe. Khena, khehi, khebhi. Khassa, khānaṃ. Khā, khasmā,
anya-e0803n:2326_1: khamhā, khehi, khebhi. Khassa, khānaṃ. Khe, khasmiṃ, khamhi, khesu. Bho kha, bhavanto
anya-e0803n:2328: Go goṇe cindriye bhūmyaṃ, vacane ceva buddhiyaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2330: Tesu atthesu goṇe thi-pumā ca itare pumā.
anya-e0803n:2331_0: Tathā hi “gosu duyhamānāsu gato. Gopañcamo”tiādīsu gosaddo goṇe vattati. Gocaroti
anya-e0803n:2331_1: etthindriyepi vattati gāvo cakkhādīnindriyāni caranti etthāti gocaro. Tathā hi porāṇā
anya-e0803n:2331_2: kathayiṃsu “gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gocaro viya gocaro, abhiṇhaṃ caritabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2331_3: Gāvovācakkhādīnindriyāni, tehi caritabbaṭṭhānaṃ gocaro”ti. “Gomatiṃ gotamaṃ name”ti
anya-e0803n:2331_4: porāṇakaviracanāyaṃ pana pathaviyaṃ vattati. “Bhūripaññaṃ gotamaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃvandāmī”ti
anya-e0803n:2331_6: khettarakkhaṃ, kasirakkhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Pathavī hi “go”ti vuccati, tappabhedo ca khetta”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2332_0: “Gottavasena gotamo”ti ettha tu vacane buddhiyañca vattati. Tenāhu porāṇā “gaṃ tāyatīti
anya-e0803n:2332_1: gottaṃ. Gotamoti hi pavattamānaṃ gaṃ vacanaṃ buddhiñca tāyati ekaṃsikavisayatāya
anya-e0803n:2332_2: rakkhatīti gottaṃ. Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati, evaṃ
anya-e0803n:2332_3: abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena, tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni tāyati rakkhatīti
anya-e0803n:2332_4: vuccati. Ko pana soti? Aññakulaparamparāsādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ
anya-e0803n:2332_5: taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabba”nti. Tathā hi taṃgottajātā
anya-e0803n:2332_6: suddhodanamahārājādayopi gotamotveva vuccanti. Bhena bhagavā attano pitaraṃ suddhodanamahārājānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2332_7: “atikkantavarā kho gotama tathāgatā”ti avoca. Vessavaṇopi mahārājā bhagavantaṃ “vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2332_8: buddhaṃ vandāma gotama”nti avoca, āyasmāpi vaṅgīso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ “sādhu nibbāpanaṃ
anya-e0803n:2332_9: brūhi, anukampāya gotamā”ti avoca. Evaṃ idaṃ sāmaññarūpaṃ gaṃ tāyatīti gottanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2333_0: Tathā gosaddo ādicce vattati. “Gogottaṃ gotamaṃ name”ti porāṇakaviracanā ettha nidassanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2333_1: ādiccabandhuṃ gotamaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ vandāmīti attho. Ādiccopi hi gotamagotte jāto
anya-e0803n:2333_2: bhagavāpi, evaṃ tena samānagottatāya tattha tattha “ādiccabandhū”tiādinā bhagavato
anya-e0803n:2333_3: thomanā dissati “pucchāmi taṃ ādiccabandhu, vivekaṃ santipadañca mahesī”ti ca, “vande
anya-e0803n:2333_5: ca. “Uṇhagū”ti ettha pana gosaddo rasmiyaṃ vattati. Uṇhā gāvo rasmiyo etassāti uṇhagū,
anya-e0803n:2333_6: sūriyo. Pubbācariyāpi hi chandovicitisatthe imamevatthaṃ byākariṃsu.
anya-e0803n:2334_0: “Gosītacandana”nti ettha pānīye vattati. Gosaddena hi jalaṃ vuccati. Go viya sītaṃ
anya-e0803n:2334_1: candanaṃ, tasmiṃ pana uddhanato uddharitapakkuthitatelamhi pakkhitte taṅkhaṇaññeva
anya-e0803n:2335_0: Ettheke vadanti “kasmā bho ‘gopadatthe vattamāno gosaddo itthiliṅgo ceva pulliṅgo
anya-e0803n:2335_1: cā’ti vadatha, kasmā ca pana ‘indriyapathavīvacanabuddhisūriyarasmipānīyesu vattamāno
anya-e0803n:2335_2: pulliṅgo’ti vadatha, etesu sūriyatthe vattamāno pulliṅgo hotu, nanu indriyavacanapānīyesu
anya-e0803n:2335_3: vattamānena pana gosaddena napuṃsakaliṅgena bhavitabbaṃ, pathavībuddhirasmīsu vattamānena
anya-e0803n:2335_5: napuṃsakitthiliṅgavasena niddesassa dassanato”ti? Tanna, niyamābhāvato. Itthipadatthe
anya-e0803n:2335_6: vattamānassāpi hi sato kassaci saddassa pulliṅgavasena niddeso dissati yathā “orodho”ti.
anya-e0803n:2335_7: Purisapadatthe vattamānassāpi ca sato kassaci itthiliṅgavasena niddeso dissati, yathā
anya-e0803n:2335_8: “atthakāmosi me yakkha, hitakāmāsi devate”ti. Itthipurisapadatthesu pana avattamānānampi
anya-e0803n:2335_9: sataṃ kesañci saddānaṃ ekasmiṃyeva ñāṇādiatthe vattamānānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsakaliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:2335_10: niddeso dissati yathā “paññā amoho ñāṇa”nti, “taṭaṃtaṭītaṭo”ti ca. Tathā hi anitthibhūtopi
anya-e0803n:2335_11: samāno “mātulā”ti itthiliṅgavasena rukkhopi nāmaṃ labhati, tabbasena nagarampi. Tenāha
anya-e0803n:2335_12: cakkavattisuttaṭīkāyaṃ “mātulāti itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmo eko rukkho, tāya āsannappadese
anya-e0803n:2335_13: māpitattā nagarampi ‘mātulā’tveva paññāyittha. Tena vuttaṃ mātulāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare”ti.
anya-e0803n:2337_0: Mo vuccati cando, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “mā vuccati cando”ti ākārantapāṭho dissati,
anya-e0803n:2337_1: okārantapāṭhena tena bhavitabbaṃ sakkaṭabhāsāya ekakkharakosato nayaṃ gahetvā “mo
anya-e0803n:2337_2: sivo candimā cevā”ti okārantavasena vattabbattā. Ettha ca okārantavasena vuttassa
anya-e0803n:2337_3: masaddassa candavācakatte “puṇṇamī, puṇṇamā”ti ca nidassanapadāni. Tattha puṇṇo mo
anya-e0803n:2337_4: etthāti puṇṇamī, evaṃ puṇṇamā, rattāpekkhaṃ itthiliṅgavacanaṃ. Ettha pana “visākhapuṇṇamāya
anya-e0803n:2337_5: rattiyā paṭhamayāmepubbenivāsaṃ anussarī”ti idaṃ nidassanaṃ. Ettha siyā – yadi “puṇṇamā”ti
anya-e0803n:2342_0: Ādīsu kathaṃ “puṇṇamāye”ti padasiddhīti? Yakārassa yekārādesavasena. Dhammissarena
anya-e0803n:2342_1: hi bhagavatā “puṇṇamāyā”ti vattabbe “puṇṇamāye”ti vadatā yakārassa ṭhāne yekāro paṭhito
anya-e0803n:2342_2: itthiliṅgavisaye ttākārassa ṭhāne ttekāro viya, nīkārassa ṭhāne nekāro viya ca. Tathā
anya-e0803n:2342_3: hi yathā “abyayataṃ vilapasi viratte kosiyāyane”ti imasmiṃ rādhajātake “virattā”ti
anya-e0803n:2342_4: vattabbe “viratte”ti vadantena ttākārassa ṭhāne ttekāro paṭhito, “kosiyāyanī”ti ca
anya-e0803n:2342_5: vattabbe “kosiyāyane”ti vadantena nīkārassa ṭhāne nekāro paṭhito. Evaṃ “puṇṇamāyā”ti
anya-e0803n:2342_6: vattabbe “puṇṇamāye”ti vadatā yakārassa ṭhāne yekāro paṭhito. Yathā ca “dakkhitāye
anya-e0803n:2342_8: vadatā yakārassa ṭhāne yekāro paṭhito, evamidhāpi. Yathā pana “sabhāye vā dvāramūle
anya-e0803n:2342_9: vā”ti ettha “sabhāya”nti liṅgabyattayavasena sabhā vuttā, na tathā idha “puṇṇamāya”nti
anya-e0803n:2342_10: liṅgabyattayena puṇṇamā vuttā, atha kho “puṇṇamā”ti ākārantitthiliṅgavasena vuttā.
anya-e0803n:2342_11: Tathā hi “puṇṇamāyo”ti padaṃ yakāraṭṭhāne yekāruccāraṇavasena sambhūtaṃ bhummavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2343_0: Mā vuccati sirī. Tathā hi vidvamukhamaṇḍanaṭīkāyaṃ “mālinī”ti padassatthaṃ vadatā
anya-e0803n:2343_1: “mā vuccati lakkhī, alinī bhamarī”ti vuttaṃ. Lakkhīsaddo ca sirīsaddena samānattho,
anya-e0803n:2343_2: tena “mā vuccati sirī”ti attho amhehi anumato, tathā porāṇehipi “maṃ siriṃ dhāreti
anya-e0803n:2343_3: vidadhāti cāti mandhātā”ti attho pakāsito, tasmā “mālinī mandhātā”ti ca imānettha
anya-e0803n:2343_4: nidassanapadāni. Tatra pulliṅgassa tāva masaddassa ayaṃ nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n:2344: Mo, mā. Maṃ, me. Mena, mehi, mebhi. Massa, mānaṃ. Mā, masmā, mamhā, mehi, mebhi. Massa, mānaṃ. Me, masmiṃ, mamhi, mesu. Bho ma, bhavanto mā.
anya-e0803n:2346: Mā, mā, māyo. Maṃ, mā, māyo. Māya, māhi, mābhi. Māya, mānaṃ. Māya, māhi, mābhi. Māya, mānaṃ. Māya, māyaṃ, māsu. Bhoti me, bhotiyo māyo.
anya-e0803n:2347: Ettha pana sirīvācako māsaddo ca saddavācako rāsaddo cāti ime samānagatikā ekakkharattā niccamākārantapakatikattā itthiliṅgattā ca.
anya-e0803n:2348_0: Tatra saṃ vuccati santacitto puriso. Yaṃ loke “sappuriso”ti ca, “ariyo”ti ca, “paṇḍito”ti
anya-e0803n:2348_1: ca vadanti, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ yadidaṃ “sa”nti. Evaṃ sappurisāriyapaṇḍitavācakassa
anya-e0803n:2348_2: saṃsaddassa paccattavacanavasena atthibhāve “sameti asatā asa”nti idaṃ payoganidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2348_3: Ettha hi “na saṃ asa”nti samāsacintāya sappurisāsappurisapadatthā saṃ asaṃsaddehi
anya-e0803n:2348_4: vuttāti ñāyanti, tasmā “sappurisapadattho paccattavacanena saṃsaddena vutto natthī”ti
anya-e0803n:2348_5: vacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Ye “natthī”ti vadanti, tesaṃ vacanaṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:2348_6: panassa “saṃ, santaṃ, sante”tiādinā heṭṭhā pakāsitā. Napuṃsakaliṅgatte saṃ vuccati
anya-e0803n:2348_8: nidassanapadāni. Tattha manussassa saṃ manussassaṃ. Evaṃ parassa saṃ parassaṃ. Sabbassa
anya-e0803n:2348_9: saṃ sabbassaṃ. Tassa haraṇaṃ parassaharaṇaṃ sabbassaharaṇanti samāso. Tathā saṃ vuccati
anya-e0803n:2348_10: sukhaṃ santi ca. Vuttañhi tabbācakattaṃ porāṇakaviracanāyaṃ –
anya-e0803n:2351_0: Tasmā ayamettha gāthā, “sakalalokasaṅkaro dīpaṅkaro”ti ettha “saṅkaro”ti padañcanidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2351_1: “Saṃ, sāni, sā. Saṃ, sāni, se. Sena”iccādi pubbe pakāsitanayena ñeyyaṃ. Ettha ca
anya-e0803n:2351_2: sotūnaṃ sugatamatavare kosallajananatthaṃ samāsantagatassa saṃsaddassa nāmikapadamālaṃ
anya-e0803n:2352_0: Manussassaṃ, manussassāni, manussassā. Manussassaṃ, manussassāni, manussasse. Manussassena,
anya-e0803n:2352_1: manussassehi, manussassebhi. Manussassassa, manussassānaṃ. Manussassā, manussassasmā,
anya-e0803n:2352_2: manussassamhā, manussassehi, manussassebhi. Manussassassa, manussassānaṃ. Manussasse,
anya-e0803n:2352_3: manussassasmiṃ, manussassamhi, manussassesu. Bho manussassa, bhonto manussassāni,
anya-e0803n:2352_4: manussassā. Esa nayo “parassaṃ sabbassa”ntiādīsupi, sabbānetāni padāni abhidheyyaliṅgānīti gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2355: Iccevaṃ heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhānaṃ ko vi sādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālā saddhiṃ atthantaranidassanapadehi vibhattā. Tatridaṃ liṅgavavatthānaṃ –
anya-e0803n:2356: Ko vi sā honti pulliṅge, bhā rā thī dhī ku bhū thiyaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2357: Kaṃ khaṃ napuṃsake go tu, pume cevitthiliṅgake.
anya-e0803n:2358: Mo pume itthiliṅge mā, saṃ pume ca napuṃsake;
anya-e0803n:2359: Yaṃ taṃ kimiti sabbatra, liṅgesveva pavattare.
anya-e0803n:2361_1: paramasaṇhasukhumatthesu payogesu asammohatthaṃ suvaṇṇatale sīhavijambhanena kesarīsīhassa
anya-e0803n:2361_2: vijambhanamiva tepiṭake buddhavacane ñāṇavijambhanena vijambhanatthañca adhikūnekakkharavasena
anya-e0803n:2362: Sadde bhavanti kusalā na tu keci atthe,
anya-e0803n:2363: Atthe bhavanti kusalā na tu keci sadde.
anya-e0803n:2373_0: Tattha vāccaliṅgānīti appadhānaliṅgāni, guṇanāmasaṅkhātāni vā liṅgāni. Abhidheyyaliṅgānīti
anya-e0803n:2373_1: padhānaliṅgāni, guṇīpadasaṅkhātāni vā liṅgāni. Yasmā pana tesu vāccaliṅgāni nāma
anya-e0803n:2373_2: abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattakāni bhavanti, tasmā sabbāni bhūdhātumayāni ca vāccaliṅgāni
anya-e0803n:2373_3: abhidheyyaliṅgānurūpato yojetabbāni. Tesaṃ bhūdhātumayāni vāccaliṅgāni sarūpato nāmikapadamālāya
anya-e0803n:2373_4: ayojitānipi tattha tattha nayato yojitāni, tasmā na dāni dassessāma. Abhūdhātumayānipi
anya-e0803n:2373_5: kiñcāpi nayato yojitāni, tathāpi sotārānaṃ payogesu kosallajananatthaṃ kathayāma,
anya-e0803n:2373_6: nāmikapadamālañca nesaṃ dassessāma kiñci payogaṃ vadantā.
anya-e0803n:2378: Dīghā jāgarato ratti, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2380_0: Dīgho, dīghā. Dīghaṃ, dīghe. Dīghena, dīghehi, dīghebhi. Dīghassa, dīghānaṃ. Dīghā,
anya-e0803n:2380_1: dīghasmā, dīghamhā, dīghehi, dīghebhi. Dīghassa, dīghānaṃ. Dīghe, dīghasmiṃ, dīghamhi,
anya-e0803n:2380_2: dīghesu. Bho dīgha, bhavanto dīghā. “Dīghāti maṃ pakkoseyyāthā”ti idamettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2381: Dīghā, dīghā, dīghāyo. Dīghaṃ, dīghā, dīghāyo. Dīghāya. Sesaṃ kaññānayena ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2382_0: Dīghaṃ, dīghāni, dīghā. Dīghaṃ, dīghāni, dīghe. Dīghena. Sesaṃ cittanayena ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2382_1: Rassādīni ca evameva vitthāretabbāni. Ayaṃ vāccaliṅgānaṃ nāmikapadamālā, “guṇanāmānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2387: Bodhi sandhīti cādīni, savisesāni honti tu.
anya-e0803n:2393_0: Bhavo ca abhavo ca bhavābhavaṃ. Atha vā bhavo ca abhavo ca bhavābhavāni, ayaṃ viggaho.
anya-e0803n:2393_1: Tatra bhavoti khuddako bhavo. Abhavoti mahanto bhavo. Vuddhatthavācako hettha akāro.
anya-e0803n:2393_2: Ettha ca sugatiduggativasena hīnapaṇītavasena ca khuddakamahantatā veditabbā. Atha
anya-e0803n:2393_3: vā bhavoti vuddhi. Abhavoti avuddhi. Ayaṃ padattho. Ayaṃ pana nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n:2394_0: Bhavābhavaṃ, bhavābhavaṃ, bhavābhavena, bhavābhavassa, bhavābhavā, bhavābhavasmā,
anya-e0803n:2394_1: bhavābhavamhā, bhavābhavassa, bhavābhave, bhavābhavasmiṃ, bhavābhavamhi, bho bhavābhava.
anya-e0803n:2394_2: Iti bhavābhavapadaṃ ekavacanakaṃ bhavati. Dissati ca tassekavacanatā pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca –
anya-e0803n:2396: Imasmiṃ kappe caritaṃ, pavakkhissaṃ suṇohi me”
anya-e0803n:2400: Iti vā evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ bhavābhava padassa ekavacanatā diṭṭhā.
anya-e0803n:2407_0: Bhavābhavāni, bhavābhavā, bhavābhavāni, bhavābhave, bhavābhavehi, bhavābhavebhi,
anya-e0803n:2407_1: bhavābhavānaṃ, bhavābhavehi, bhavābhavebhi, bhavābhavānaṃ, bhavābhavesu, bhavanto
anya-e0803n:2407_2: bhavābhavāni. Iti bhavābhavapadaṃ bahuvacanakampi bhavati. Dissati ca tassa bahuvacanakatā
anya-e0803n:2407_3: pāḷiyaṃ “dhonassa hi natthi kuhiñci loke. Pakappikā diṭṭhi bhavābhavesū”ti. Ubhayampi
anya-e0803n:2407_4: nayaṃ vomissetvā nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Kathaṃ? “Bhavābhavaṃ, bhavābhavāni. Bhavābhavaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2407_5: bhavābhavāni. Bhavābhavena, bhavābhavehi, bhavābhavebhi”iccevamādinā cittanayena yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2414: “Bhavo ca abhavo cā”ti, samāsatthaṃ vade budho;
anya-e0803n:2418_0: Yathā cettha bhavābhavapadassa nāmikapadamālā yojitā, evaṃ “kammākammaṃ phalāphala”ntiādīnampi
anya-e0803n:2418_1: nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Atthopi nesaṃ yathārahaṃ vattabbo. Yebhuyyenetāni ekavacanakāni
anya-e0803n:2418_2: bhavanti. Evaṃ tāva bhavābhavapadādīnaṃ visesavantatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n:2419_0: Laṅkādīpo, laṅkādīpaṃ, laṅkādīpena, laṅkādīpassa, laṅkādīpā, laṅkādīpasmā, laṅkādīpamhā,
anya-e0803n:2419_1: laṅkādīpassa, laṅkādīpe, laṅkādīpasmiṃ, laṅkādīpamhi, bho laṅkādīpa. Ayaṃ samāsatte
anya-e0803n:2420_0: Laṅkā dīpo, laṅkaṃ dīpaṃ, laṅkāya dīpena, laṅkāya dīpassa, laṅkāya dīpā, laṅkāya
anya-e0803n:2420_1: dīpasmā, laṅkāya dīpamhā, laṅkāya dīpassa, laṅkāya dīpe, laṅkāya dīpasmiṃ, laṅkāya
anya-e0803n:2420_2: dīpamhi, bhoti laṅke dīpa. Ayaṃ byāse nāmikapadamālā. Ayaṃ nayo “jambudīpo”ti ettha
anya-e0803n:2420_3: na labbhati kevalena jambūsaddena jambudīpassa akathanato, yathā kevalena laṅkāsaddena
anya-e0803n:2420_4: laṅkādīpo kathiyati. Ayaṃ pana byāse padamālānayo visesato kabbaracanāyaṃ kavīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2420_5: upakārāya saṃvattati sāsanassāpi. Tathā hi byāsavasena porāṇakaviracanā dissati –
anya-e0803n:2425: Sāsanepi byāsavasena “dibbo ratho pāturahu, vedehassa yasassino”tiādikā pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0803n:2426_0: Yathā pana “jambudīpo”ti ettha ayaṃ nayo na labbhati, tathā “nāgadīpo”tiādīsupi kevalena
anya-e0803n:2426_1: jambūsaddena jambudīpassa akathanamiva kevalena nāgasaddādinā nāgadīpādīnaṃ akathanatoti.
anya-e0803n:2426_2: Nanu ca bho “buddhassa jambunadaraṃsino taṃ, dāṭhaṃ mayaṃ jambunarā namāmā”ti porāṇakaviracanāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:2426_4: attho sambhavati, kevalena pana jambūsaddena jambudīpatthaṃ na vadati, kintu “jambudīpanarā”ti
anya-e0803n:2426_5: vattabbe gāthāvisayattā adhikakkharadosaṃ parivajjantena dīpasaddalopaṃ katvā “jambunarā”ti
anya-e0803n:2426_6: vuttaṃ, evaṃ uttarapadalopavasena vutto jambusaddo narasaddaṃ paṭicca samāsabalena
anya-e0803n:2426_7: “jambudīpanarā”ti atthappakāsane samattho hoti, na kevalo byāsakāle, tathā hi “jambū”ti
anya-e0803n:2426_8: vutte jambudīpo na ñāyati, atha kho jamburukkhoyeva ñāyati.
anya-e0803n:2427_0: Kiṃ pana bho “kāko dāso, kākaṃ dāsaṃ, kākena dāsenā”ti ayaṃ nayo labbhati, na labbhatīti?
anya-e0803n:2427_1: Labbhati, kākasaddena kākanāmakassa dāsassa kathanaṃ hoti. Yadi evaṃ “jambudīpo”ti
anya-e0803n:2427_2: etthāpi “jambunāmako dīpo”ti atthaṃ gahetvā “jambū dīpo, jambuṃ dīpaṃ, jambuyā dīpenā”ti
anya-e0803n:2427_3: ayaṃ nayo labbhatīti? Na labbhati jambūsaddassa paṇṇattivasena dīpe appavattanato.
anya-e0803n:2427_4: Jambūsaddo hi rukkheyeva paṇṇattivasena pavattati, na dīpe. Yathā pana cittavohāro
anya-e0803n:2427_5: cittanāmake gahapatimhipi manepi pavattati “citto gahapati. Cittaṃ mano mānasa”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0803n:2427_6: Yathā ca kusavohāro kusanāmake raññepi kusatiṇepi pavattati –
anya-e0803n:2431_0: Ādīsu, tathā kākasaddopi vāyase, evaṃnāmake dāsepi pavattati “kāko ravati, kāko nāma
anya-e0803n:2431_1: dāso saṭṭhiyojanāni gacchatī”tiādīsu. Jambūsaddo pana gahapatimanādīsu citta kusa
anya-e0803n:2431_2: kākasaddā viya paṇṇattivasena dīpasmiṃ na pavattati, tasmā yathāvuttoyeva nayo manasikaraṇīyo.
anya-e0803n:2432_0: Yathā panettha “laṅkādīpo”ti saddassa nāmikapadamālā samāsavasena byāsavasena ca
anya-e0803n:2432_2: citramāso, vessantararājā, setavatthaṃ, dibbaratho”tiādīnampi nāmikapadamālā samāsavasena
anya-e0803n:2432_3: byāsavasena ca yojetabbā. Pubbavidehādisaddehi pubbavidehadīpādīnaṃ kathanañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2432_4: “Dibbaratho”tiādīnaṃ samāsagatapadānaṃ payojane sati byāsavasena visuṃ kattabbatā
anya-e0803n:2432_5: ca veditabbā. Tathā hi byāsavasena “dibbo ratho”tiādinā dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇavasena
anya-e0803n:2432_6: paccekavibhattiyuttabhāve sati gāthāsu vuttipālanasukhuccāraṇaguṇo bhavati. So ca
anya-e0803n:2432_7: sāsanānukūlo hi ayaṃ nayo ṭhapito. Tathā hi pāvacane “dibbo ratho pāturahu, vedehassa
anya-e0803n:2432_8: yasassino”tiādikā pāḷiyo bahū dissanti, evaṃ laṅkādīpādisaddānaṃ visesavantatā bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2435: Dāmā dāmaṃ tathā saddhā, saddhaṃ taṭaṃ taṭī taṭo.
anya-e0803n:2440_0: Etesu hi bodhisaddassa tāva “bodhi rājakumāro”ti ca, “ariyasāvako ‘bodhī’ti vuccati,
anya-e0803n:2440_1: tassa bodhissa aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo”ti ca evaṃ puggalavacanassa “bodhi, bodhī, bodhayo.
anya-e0803n:2440_2: Bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhayo. Bodhinā”ti pulliṅge agginayena nāmikapadamālā bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2441: Rukkhamagganibbānasabbaññutaññāṇavacanassa pana “bodhi, bodhī, bodhiyo. Bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhiyo. Bodhiyā”ti itthiliṅge rattinayena nāmikapadamālā bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2442_0: Keci pana “rukkhavacano bodhisaddo pulliṅgo”ti vadanti, taṃ āgamena viruddhaṃ viya
anya-e0803n:2442_1: dissanato vicāretabbaṃ. Na hi āgame rukkhavacanassa bodhisaddassa pulliṅgabhāvo dissati,
anya-e0803n:2442_2: puggalavacanassa pana dissati. Yadi ca “sālo dhavo khadīro”tiādīnaṃ viya rukkhavacanassa
anya-e0803n:2442_3: bodhisaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ siyā, jambū simbalī pāṭalīsaddādīnaṃ rukkhavācakattā pulliṅgattaṃ
anya-e0803n:2442_4: siyā, na tesaṃ imassa ca rukkhavācakattepi pulliṅgabhāvo upalabbhati. Yadi hi rukkhavacano
anya-e0803n:2442_5: bodhisaddo pulliṅgo, evaṃ sante nibbānavacano sabbaññutaññāṇavacano ca bodhisaddo
anya-e0803n:2442_6: napuṃsakaliṅgo siyā “nibbāna”ntiādinā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena niddiṭṭhassa nibbānādino atthassa kathanato.
anya-e0803n:2443_0: Ye evaṃ vadanti “rukkhavacano bodhisaddo pulliṅgo”ti, te “bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu
anya-e0803n:2443_1: ñāṇaṃ, taṃ ettha bhagavā pattoti rukkhopi bodhicceva vuccatī”ti vuttamatthaṃ cetasi
anya-e0803n:2443_2: sannidhāya “bujjhati etthāti bodhī”ti nibbacanavasena “kiṃ rukkhavacano bodhisaddo
anya-e0803n:2443_3: pulliṅgo na bhavissatī”ti maññamānā vadanti maññe. Nevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, evañca pana
anya-e0803n:2443_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ, “bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ, taṃ ettha bhagavā pattoti rukkhopi
anya-e0803n:2443_5: bodhicceva vuccatī”ti vadantehi garūhi ñāṇavacanaṃ itthi liṅgabhūtaṃ bodhīti ñāṇassa
anya-e0803n:2443_7: āropetvā rukkho “bodhī”ti vutto, tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu nibbacane ādaro na kātabbo.
anya-e0803n:2443_8: Na hi “bujjhati etthāti bodhī”ti nibbacanakaraṇaṃ rukkhavacanassa bodhisaddassa pulliṅgattaṃ
anya-e0803n:2443_9: kātuṃ sakkoti saṅketasiddhattā vohārassa, tasmā rukkhaṃ sayaṃ abodhimpi samānaṃ bodhiyā
anya-e0803n:2443_11: bodhiyā vā kāraṇattā phalavohārena. Etamatthaṃyeva hi sandhāya “bodhi vuccati catūsu
anya-e0803n:2443_12: maggesu ñāṇaṃ, taṃ ettha bhagavā pattoti rukkhopi bodhicceva vuccatī”ti vuttanti
anya-e0803n:2443_13: daṭṭhabbaṃ, evaṃ “bodhī”ti itthiliṅgavasena rukkhanāmaṃ pavattatīti. Tenāha āyasmā
anya-e0803n:2443_15: bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ
anya-e0803n:2443_16: buddho”ti. Apica tattha tattha “bodhiyā sākhā”ti ca, “kenaṭṭhena mahābodhi, kassa
anya-e0803n:2445: Uggantvāna tadā muñci, chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo subhā”ti ca
anya-e0803n:2446: Evamādayo rukkhavācakassa bodhisaddassa itthiliṅgabhāve payogā dissanti.
anya-e0803n:2447_0: Atha vā rukkhavācako bodhisaddo dviliṅgo pumitthiliṅgavasena. Tathā hi samantapāsādikāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:2447_1: vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ mahāveyyākaraṇassa pāḷinayaviduno buddhaghosācariyassa evaṃ saddaracanā
anya-e0803n:2447_2: dissati “sakkhissasi tvaṃ tāta pāṭaliputtaṃ gantvā mahābodhinā saddhiṃ ayyaṃ saṅghamittattheriṃ
anya-e0803n:2447_3: ānetu”nti ca, “sāpi kho mahābodhisamārūḷhā nāvā passato mahārājassa mahāsamuddatalaṃ
anya-e0803n:2447_4: pakkhandā”ti ca tassa rukkhavācakassa bodhisaddassa “bujjhati etthāti bodhī”ti nibbacanavasena
anya-e0803n:2447_5: “bodhi, bodhī, bodhayo. Bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhayo. Bodhinā”tiādinā padamālā veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:2447_6: Rukkhavācakasseva pana tassa ñāṇe pavattitthiliṅgavohārena saṅketasiddhena rūḷhatthadīpakena
anya-e0803n:2447_7: “bodhi, bodhī, bodhiyo. Bodhiṃ, bodhī, bodhiyo. Bodhiyā”tiādinā padamālā veditabbā. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0803n:2453_0: Sandhisaddādīnampi nayānusārena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Sandhisaddo hi sarasandhiādivācako
anya-e0803n:2453_2: vibhajanavācako itthiliṅgo, syādivācako pulliṅgo ceva itthiliṅgo ca “vibhattissa.
anya-e0803n:2454: Āyusaddo pana jīvitindriyavācakoyeva hutvā punnapuṃsakaliṅgo, “punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti “ettakaṃyeva te āyu, cavanakālo bhavissatī”ti ca dassanato.
anya-e0803n:2455: Dhātusaddo sabhāvādivācako itthiliṅgo, karapacādivācako pumitthiliṅgo “cakkhudhātuyā. Karotissa dhātussa. Dhātuyo dhātuyā”ti dassanato.
anya-e0803n:2456_1: devarājassa dhajaggaṃ ullokeyyātha”, “attano pajāpatiyā saddhiṃ mahāpajāpatiyā”ti ca dassanato.
anya-e0803n:2457_0: Dāmā dāmaṃ saddā mālatīdāmādibhedabhinnassa ekassa vatthussa yathākkamaṃ itthinapuṃsakaliṅgā.
anya-e0803n:2457_1: Tathā hi “mālatīdāmā lolāḷiṅgalīlā. Mālatīdāmaṃ. Siṅghitaṃ dāmaṃ bhamarehi. Ratanadāmā.
anya-e0803n:2457_2: Ratanadāma”nti ca dviliṅgabhāve lokikappayogā dissanti sāsanānukūlā.
anya-e0803n:2458_0: Saddhaṃ saddhāsaddā pana bhinnavatthūnaṃ vācakā itthinapuṃsakaliṅgā, saddhāsaddo
anya-e0803n:2458_2: saddahanā. Mayamassubho gotamabrāhmaṇā nāma dānāni dema saddhāni karomā”ti dassanato.
anya-e0803n:2458_3: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne “saddho puriso, saddhā itthī, saddhaṃ kula”nti imāni vāccaliṅgattā
anya-e0803n:2459: Taṭaṃ taṭī taṭotime saddā tīrasaṅkhāte ekasmiṃyevatthe thīpunnapuṃsakaliṅgā.
anya-e0803n:2460_1: punnapuṃsakaliṅgo. Tatrupasecane “sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā”ti napuṃsakaniddeso dissati.
anya-e0803n:2460_3: sādhukaṃ uggahetvā”ti napuṃsakaliṅganiddeso. Āveṇike “asīti anubyañjanānī”ti napuṃsakaniddeso.
anya-e0803n:2460_4: Sarīrāvayave “kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato anubyañjana”nti evaṃ
anya-e0803n:2460_6: ākāro. So eva “sarīrāvayavo”ti vuccatīti. Akkhare “byañjano. Byañjana”nti ca punnapuṃsakaniddeso.
anya-e0803n:2461_1: pana pulliṅgo. Tathā hi kathāvatthumhi “atthatthamhī”ti imissā pāḷiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:2461_2: “atthaṃ vuccati nibbāna”nti napuṃsakaliṅganiddesena atthasaddo vutto. Iti atthasaddo dviliṅgo.
anya-e0803n:2462_0: Akkharasaddo ca “yo pubbo akkharo akkharānī”ti ca dassanato. Apica akkharasaddo nibbānavacano
anya-e0803n:2462_2: kho vāseṭṭha ‘mahāsammato’tveva paṭhamaṃ akkharaṃ nibbatta”nti evamādīsu. “Akkharāya
anya-e0803n:2462_3: deseti, akkharakkharāya āpatti pācittiyassā”ti ettha pana pulliṅgotipi napuṃsakaliṅgotipi
anya-e0803n:2462_4: vattabbo, itthiliṅgoti pana na vattabbo. Ayañhi “asakkatā casma dhanañcayāya. Viramathāyasmanto
anya-e0803n:2462_5: mamavacanāyā”tiādīsu “dhanañcayāya, vacanāyā”ti saddā viya vibhattivipallāsena vutto,
anya-e0803n:2463: Ajjava maddava gāravasaddā pana punnapuṃsakaliṅgā. “Ajjavo ca maddavo ca. Ajjavamaddavaṃ. Gāravo ca nivāto ca. Saha āvajjite thūpe, gāravaṃ hoti me tadā”ti ca ādidassanato.
anya-e0803n:2464_0: Vacovacīsaddā pana ghaṭoghaṭīsaddā viya pumitthiliṅgā, tattha vacīsaddassa “vacī,
anya-e0803n:2464_1: vacī, vaciyo. Vaciṃ, vacī, vaciyo. Vaciyā”ti nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Keci “duccaritapayogaviññattisaddādīsu
anya-e0803n:2464_2: paresu vacasaddassanto īkāro hoti, tena “vacīduccarita”ntiādīni rūpāni dissantī”ti
anya-e0803n:2464_3: vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ vacasaddato visuṃ vacīsaddassa dassanato. Atrimāni pāḷito
anya-e0803n:2464_4: ca aṭṭhakathāto ca nidassanapadāni. “Vacī vacīsaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro vacī, vaciñca
anya-e0803n:2464_5: vacīsaṅkhāre ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva vacī, na ca vacīsaṅkhāro. Gadito vacībhi
anya-e0803n:2464_6: satimābhinande”ti imāni pāḷito nidassanapadāni. “Copanasaṅkhātā vacī eva viññatti
anya-e0803n:2464_7: vacīviññatti, vaciyā bhedo vacībhedo”ti imāni aṭṭhakathāto nidassanapadāni. Iminā
anya-e0803n:2464_8: nayena aññesampi sarūpāsarūpapadānaṃ yathārahaṃ dvitiliṅgatā vavatthapetabbā. Evaṃ
anya-e0803n:2465: Idāni katthaci vāccaliṅgabhūtānaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgānañca taddhibhantaliṅgānañca dhammādivasena nāmikapadamālā vuccate. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n:2469: Padaṃ samaṃ visamañca, jaññā sabbasamampi ca.
anya-e0803n:2470: Kathaṃ? “Micchādiṭṭhi, micchāsaṅkappo, micchāvācā, micchāvāco, micchādiṭṭhiko, micchāsaṅkappī” iccetesaṃ nāmikapadamālā evaṃ veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:2471_1: Micchādiṭṭhiyā”ti evaṃ dhammato, “micchādiṭṭhi, micchādiṭṭhī, micchādiṭṭhino. Micchādiṭṭhiṃ,
anya-e0803n:2471_4: micchāvācāyo. Micchāvācaṃ, micchāvācā micchāvācāyo. Micchāvācāya” evaṃ ekantadhammato,
anya-e0803n:2471_5: “micchāvāco, micchāvācā. Micchāvācaṃ, micchāvāce. Micchāvācena” evaṃ ekantapuggalato,
anya-e0803n:2471_7: micchāsaṅkappino. Micchāsaṅkappi”nti evampi ekantapuggalato nāmikapadamālā bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2471_8: Paccattopayogavacanādivasena pana padaṃ sadisaṃ visadisaṃ sabbathā sadisampi ca bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2472_0: Atrime āhaccabhāsitā payogā – avijjāgatassa bhikkhave aviddasuno micchādiṭṭhi pahoti.
anya-e0803n:2472_1: Micchādiṭṭhissa micchāsaṅkappo pahoti. Micchāsaṅkappassa micchāvācā pahoti. Micchāvācassa
anya-e0803n:2472_2: micchākammanto pahoti. Micchākammantassa micchāājīvo pahoti. Micchāājīvassa micchāvāyāmo
anya-e0803n:2472_3: pahoti. Micchāvāyāmassa micchāsati pahoti. Micchāsatissa micchāsamādhi pahotīti.
anya-e0803n:2472_4: Vijjāgatassa bhikkhave viddasuno sammādiṭṭhi pahoti. Sammādiṭṭhissa sammāsaṅkappo
anya-e0803n:2472_5: pahotīti vitthāro, evaṃ katthaci vāccaliṅgabhūtānaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgānañca taddhitantaliṅgānañca
anya-e0803n:2473_0: Idāni nevābhidheyyaliṅgassa bhavitabbasaddassa ca abhidheyyaliṅgānaṃ sotthi suvatthi
anya-e0803n:2473_1: saddānañca vāccaliṅgābhidheyyaliṅgassa abbhutasaddassa ca vāccaliṅgassa abhūtasaddassacāti
anya-e0803n:2473_2: imesaṃ kiñci visesaṃ kathayāma, nāmikapadamālañca yathārahaṃ yojessāma. Etesu hi
anya-e0803n:2473_3: bhavitabbasaddo ekantabhāvavācako napuṃsakaliṅgo ekavacanantoyeva hoti. Tatiyantapadehi
anya-e0803n:2473_4: evaṃsadda nasaddādīhi ca yojetabbo ca hoti. Nāssa nāmikapadamālā labbhati, atrime
anya-e0803n:2473_5: ca payogā “saddhammagarukena bhavitabbaṃ, no āmisagarukena, iminā corena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2473_6: imehi corehi bhavitabbaṃ, imāya coriyā bhavitabbaṃ, imāhi corīhi bhavitabbaṃ, anena
anya-e0803n:2473_7: cittena bhavitabbaṃ, imehi cittehi bhavitabbaṃ, evaṃ bhavitabbaṃ, aññathā bhavitabba”nti. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0803n:2479: Sotthi bhaddante hotu rañño, sotthiṃ gacchati nhāpito. Sotthināmhi samuṭṭhito. Suvatthi, suvatthiṃ, suvatthinā, ayaṃ dhasātthisaddādīnaṃ viseso.
anya-e0803n:2480_0: Ayaṃ pana “abbhutaṃ abhūta”nti dvinnaṃ viseso. Bhūsaddassa bbhū, saṃyogapare paṭisedhatthavati
anya-e0803n:2480_1: aitinipāte upapade sati ekantena rassattamupayāti. Kvatthe? “Abhūtapubbaṃ bhūta”ntiādīsvatthesu.
anya-e0803n:2480_2: Tathāvidhe asaññogapare rassattaṃ na upayāti. Kvatthe? “Asacca”ntiādīsvatthesu. Tathā
anya-e0803n:2480_4: attho bhavati. “Abhūta”nti padassa pana “asacca”ntipi attho bhavati, “ajāta”ntipi
anya-e0803n:2480_5: attho bhavati. Tatra “acchariyaṃ vata bho abbhutaṃ vata bho. Accheraṃ vata lokasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:2480_6: abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ” iccevamādayo “abhūtapubbaṃ bhūta”nti atthe payogā.
anya-e0803n:2485_0: Iccevamādayo abbhutakaraṇatthe payogā. Evaṃ rassavasena, dīghavasena pana nissaṃyoge
anya-e0803n:2485_1: “abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ. Atathaṃ”iccevamādayo asaccatthe payogā, “abhūtaṃ ajātaṃ asañjāta”nti
anya-e0803n:2492_0: Abbhutaṃ, abbhutāni. Cittanayena, abbhuto, abbhutā. Abbhutaṃ, purisanayena, abbhutā,
anya-e0803n:2492_1: abbhutā, abbhutāyo. Abbhutaṃ. Kaññānayena ñeyyaṃ. Evaṃ bhūtasaddassapi nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:2492_2: tidhā gahetabbā. Atra “abbhuta”miti padaṃ vāccaliṅgampi bhavati abhidheyyaliṅgampi.
anya-e0803n:2492_3: “Abhūta”miti padaṃ pana vāccaliṅgaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgampi vā saccasaddo viya katthaci.
anya-e0803n:2492_4: Itissa yathārahaṃ ayampi sappayogā nāmikapadamālā kathitā.
anya-e0803n:2493_0: Idāni āgamikānaṃ kosallajananatthaṃ padasamodhānavasena nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n:2493_1: buddho bhagavā, buddhā bhagavanto. Buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ, buddhe bhagavante. Buddhena
anya-e0803n:2493_2: bhagavatā, sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Ayaṃ padamālā ekavacanabahuvacanavasena ñeyyā.
anya-e0803n:2494: Devā tāvatiṃsā. Deve tāvatiṃse. Devehi tāvatiṃsehi. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Bahuvacanavasena ñeyyā padamālā.
anya-e0803n:2495_0: So bhagavā jānaṃ passaṃ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, taṃ bhagavantaṃ jānantaṃ passantaṃ
anya-e0803n:2495_1: arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena,
anya-e0803n:2495_2: tassa bhagavato jānato passato arahato sammāsambuddhassa. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Ekavacanavasena ñeyyā padamālā.
anya-e0803n:2496: Rājā suddhodano, rājānaṃ suddhodanaṃ, raññā suddhodanena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2497: Rājā passenadī kosalo, rājānaṃ passenadiṃ kosalaṃ, raññā passenadinā kosalena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2498: Rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro, rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ, raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2499: Rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto, rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajātasattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ, raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2500: Mahāpajāpatī gotamī, mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ, mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyāti pañcakkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ. Mahāpajāpatiyaṃ gotamiyaṃ, bhoti mahāpajāpati gotami.
anya-e0803n:2501: Makkhali gosālo. Makkhaliṃ gosālaṃ. Makkhalinā gosālena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2502_1: sāvakayugena, sāriputtamoggallānassa sāvakayugassa. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Sabbāpetā
anya-e0803n:2502_2: padamālā ekavacanavasena ñeyyā. Sāriputtamoggallānā aggasāvakā, sāriputtamoggallāne
anya-e0803n:2502_3: aggasāvake, sāriputtamoggallānehi aggasāvakehi. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Bahuvacanavasena
anya-e0803n:2503_0: So dāro, sā dārā. Saṃ dāraṃ, se dāre. Sena dārena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Sā nārī,
anya-e0803n:2503_1: sā nāriyo. Saṃ nāriṃ, sā nāriyo. Sāya nāriyā. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Saṃ kammaṃ, sāni
anya-e0803n:2503_2: kammāni. Sena kammena. Saṃ phalaṃ, sāni phalāni. Sena phalena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2504: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, paṭhamena jhānena, paṭhamassa jhānassa. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2505: Catutthī disā, catutthiṃ disaṃ, catutthiyā disāya.
anya-e0803n:2506_0: Dhammī kathā, dhammiṃ kathaṃ, dhammiyā kathāya, dhammiyaṃ kathāyaṃ. Evaṃ anupubbī
anya-e0803n:2506_1: kathā, evarūpī kathā. Iminā nayena aññesupi ṭhānesu padasamodhānavasena liṅgato ca
anya-e0803n:2506_2: antato ca vacanato ca apekkhitabbaṃ. Padato ca nānappakārā nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2507_0: Idāni ekappakārānaṃ saddānaṃ liṅgaantavasena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Yādiso,
anya-e0803n:2507_1: yādisī, yādisaṃ. Tādiso, tādisī, tādisaṃ. Etādiso, etādisī, etādisaṃ. Kīdiso, kīdisī,
anya-e0803n:2507_2: kīdisaṃ. Īdiso, īdisī, īdisaṃ. Ediso, edisī, edisaṃ. Sadiso, sadisī, sadisaṃ. Kadāci
anya-e0803n:2507_3: pana “yādisā tādisā”ti evamādīni itthiliṅgarūpānipi bhavanti. Nāmikapadamālā nesaṃ
anya-e0803n:2508: Idāni samāsataddhitapadabhūtānaṃ amamasaddādīnaṃ nāmikapadamālā vuccate – amamo, amamā, amamaṃ, amame. Amamena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2509: Mayhako, mayhakā. Mayhakaṃ, mayhake. Mayhakena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2510: Āmā, āmā, āmāyo. Āmaṃ, āmā, āmāyo. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2511_0: Tatra amamoti natthi taṇhāmamattaṃ diṭṭhimamattañca etassāti amamo, ko so, arahāyevāti
anya-e0803n:2511_1: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Apica yesataṇhāpi sadiṭṭhīpi “mama ida”nti mamattaṃ na karonti, tepi
anya-e0803n:2511_2: amamāyeva. Ettha ca “manussā tattha jāyanti, amamā apariggahā”ti idaṃ sāsanato nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2511_3: “Amamo nirahaṅkāro”ti idaṃ pana lokato nidassanaṃ. Itthiliṅge vattabbe “amamā, amamā,
anya-e0803n:2511_4: amamāyo”ti padamālā. Napuṃsake vattabbe “amamaṃ, amamānī”ti padamālā. Tatra mayhakoti
anya-e0803n:2511_5: “idampi mayhaṃ idampi mayha”nti vippalapatīti mayhako, eko pakkhiviseso. Vuttañhetaṃ jātake –
anya-e0803n:2514_0: Itthiliṅge vattabbe “mayhakī, mayhakī, mayhakiyo”ti padamālā. Tatra āmāti “āma ahaṃ
anya-e0803n:2514_1: tumhākaṃ dāsī”ti evaṃ dāsibhāvaṃ paṭijānātīti āmā. Gehadāsī. Vuttañhetaṃ jātakesu
anya-e0803n:2514_2: “yattha dāso āmajāto, ṭhito thullāni gacchatī”ti ca, “āmāya dāsāpi bhavanti loke”ti
anya-e0803n:2515_0: Idāni kati katipaya katimīsaddānaṃ viseso vuccate yathārahaṃ nāmikapadamālā ca. Tatra
anya-e0803n:2515_1: katimīsaddassa nāmikapadamālā na labbhati “ajja bhante katimī”ti evaṃ pucchāvasena
anya-e0803n:2515_2: āgatamattato. Kati katipayasaddānaṃ pana labbhateva, sā ca bahuvacanikā. Visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:2515_3: pana katipayasaddo ekavacaniko vutto. Kati purisā tiṭṭhanti, kati purise passati.
anya-e0803n:2515_4: Kati itthiyo, kati kulāni. Kati lokasmiṃ chiddāni yattha cittaṃ na tiṭṭhati. Kati
anya-e0803n:2515_5: kusalā. Kati dhātuyo. Kati āyatanāni. Katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi
anya-e0803n:2515_6: saṅgahitaṃ. Katibhi rajamāneti, katibhi parisujjhati. Katipayā purisā, katipayā itthiyo,
anya-e0803n:2517_0: Katipayā. Katipayehi, katipayebhi. Katipayānaṃ. Katipayesu. Katipayāyo. Katipayāhi,
anya-e0803n:2517_1: katipayābhi. Katipayānaṃ. Katipayāsu. Katipayāni. Katipaye. Katipayehi, katipayebhi.
anya-e0803n:2517_2: Katipayānaṃ. Katipayesūti. Sabbāpetā sattannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ vasena ñeyyā, samāsavidhimhipi
anya-e0803n:2517_3: kati katipayasaddā bahuvacanavaseneva yojetabbā. “Katisaṅgātigo bhikkhu, oghatiṇṇoti
anya-e0803n:2517_4: vuccati. Katipayajanakata”ntiādīsu hi “kati kittakā saṅgā katisaṅgā”tiādinā sabbadā
anya-e0803n:2518_0: Idāni rūḷhīsaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā vuccate – idha rūḷhīsaddā nāma yevāpanakasaddādayo.
anya-e0803n:2518_1: Yevāpanako, yevāpanakā. Yevāpanakaṃ. Yevāpano, yevāpanā. Yevāpanaṃ. Yaṃvāpanakaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2518_2: yaṃvāpanakāni. Sesaṃ sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ. Tatra yevāpanakoti “phasso hoti vedanā
anya-e0803n:2518_3: hotī”tiādinā vuttā phassādayo viya sarūpato avatvā “ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi
anya-e0803n:2518_4: atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā”ti evaṃ “yevāpanā”ti padena vutto yevāpanako,
anya-e0803n:2518_5: evaṃ “yevāpano”ti etthāpi. Tathā “yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpa”nti evaṃ “yaṃvāpanā”ti
anya-e0803n:2518_6: padena vuttaṃ yaṃvāpanakaṃ. Esa nayo yathārahaṃ yassakaṃ yatthakantiādīsupi netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2519_0: Ettha siyā – nanu ca bho panasaddo nipāto, nipātānañca abyayabhāvo siddho tīsu liṅgesu
anya-e0803n:2519_1: sabbavibhattivacanesu ca vayābhāvato, so kasmā “yevāpano”ti okāranto jātoti? Saccaṃ
anya-e0803n:2519_2: panasaddo nipāto, so ca kho “ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye”ti vā, “yaṃ vā panaññampī”ti
anya-e0803n:2519_3: vā, “brāhmaṇā panā”ti vā evamādīsu nipāto, “yevāpanako”ti vā, “yevāpano”ti vā evamādīsu
anya-e0803n:2519_4: nipāto nāma na hoti. Anukaraṇamattañhetaṃ, tasmā īdisesu panasaddasahitā payogā rūḷhīsaddāti
anya-e0803n:2519_5: gahetabbā. Yajjevaṃ kasmā nibbacanamudāhaṭanti? Atthassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2520: Tayodhammajātakaṃ. Tayodhammajātakaṃ. Tayodhammajātakena. Tayodhammajātakassa. Tayodhammajātakā, tayodhammajātakasmā. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2521: Tayosaṅkhārā. Tayosaṅkhāre. Tayosaṅkhārehi, tayosaṅkhārebhi. Tayosaṅkhārānaṃ. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2522: Cattāripurisayugo saṅgho. Cattāripurisayugaṃ saṅghaṃ. Cattāripurisayugena saṅghena. Cattāripurisayugassa saṅghassa. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2523_0: Satokārī, satokārī, satokārino. Satokāriṃ, satokārī, satokārino. Satokārinā, satokārīhi,
anya-e0803n:2523_1: satokārībhi. Satokārissa. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Ettha satokārīti saratīti sato, sato
anya-e0803n:2524: Aparesampi rūḷhīsaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā vuccate saddhimatthavibhāvanāya. Aṅgā. Aṅge. Aṅgehi, aṅgebhi. Aṅgānaṃ. Aṅgehi, aṅgebhi. Aṅgānaṃ. Aṅgesu. Bhonto aṅgā.
anya-e0803n:2525_0: Aṅgā janapado. Aṅge janapadaṃ. Aṅgehi, aṅgebhi janapadena. Aṅgānaṃ janapadassa. Aṅgehi,
anya-e0803n:2525_1: aṅgebhi janapadasmā. Aṅgānaṃ janapadassa. Aṅgesu janapade. Bhonto aṅgā janapada.
anya-e0803n:2526_0: Itthiliṅge kāsī, kāsiyo, kāsī, kāsiyo. Kāsīhi, kāsībhi. Kāsīnaṃ. Kāsīhi, kāsībhi.
anya-e0803n:2526_1: Kāsīnaṃ. Kāsīsu. Bhotiyo kāsiyo. Atrāyamatthavibhāvanā – kāsī, kāsiyo janapado. Kāsī,
anya-e0803n:2526_2: kāsiyo janapadaṃ. Kāsīhi, kāsībhi janapadena. Kāsīnaṃ janapadassa. Kāsīhi, kāsībhi
anya-e0803n:2526_3: janapadasmā. Kāsīnaṃ janapadassa. Kāsīsu janapade. Bhotiyo kāsiyo janapada. Evaṃ
anya-e0803n:2526_4: avantīcetī vajjī iccetesampi padānaṃ yojetabbā. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “kurūsu janapade”ti.
anya-e0803n:2526_5: Evaṃ aṅgādīni atthassa ekattepi janapadanāmattā rūḷhīvasena bahuvacanāneva bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2526_6: Tathā hi tattha tattha “aṅgesu viharati. Magadhesu cārikaṃ caramāno”tiādinā, “aṅgānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2526_7: magadhānaṃ kāsīnaṃ kosalāna”ntiādinā ca bahuvacanapāḷiyo dissanti. Evaṃ rūḷhīsaddānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2527_0: Idāni aparāpi ito savisesatarā saddabhede sammohaviddhaṃsanakārikā paramasukhumañāṇāvahā
anya-e0803n:2527_2: Tā ca kho “sambuddho paṭijānāsi. Kassako paṭijānāsi. Upāsako paṭijānāsi. Sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0803n:2527_3: te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”tiādayo pāḷinaye nissāyeva. Tattha sambuddhopaṭijānāsīti
