anya-e0803n:2527_4: “tvaṃ ‘ahaṃ sammāsambuddho’ti paṭijānāsī”ti itisaddalopavasena attho gahetabbo. Esa
anya-e0803n:2527_5: nayo “kassako paṭijānāsī”tiādīsupi. “Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato”ti ettha pana
anya-e0803n:2527_6: “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti paṭijānantassa tavāti evaṃ itisaddalopayojanāvasena añño
anya-e0803n:2527_7: saddasanniveso teneva añño atthapaṭivedho ca bhavati. “Khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānatoti”ādīsupi
anya-e0803n:2527_8: eseva nayo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānatoti “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho,
anya-e0803n:2527_9: sabbe dhammā mayā abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ paṭijānato tavāti yo attho vutto, sopi yathādassito
anya-e0803n:2527_10: atthoyeva. Evaṃpakāraṃ ñatvā paṇḍitajātiyena kulaputtena amhehi vuccamānā “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho’ti
anya-e0803n:2527_11: tvaṃ paṭijānāsī”ti etasmiṃ atthe sakriyāpadā ayaṃ padamālā vavatthapetabbā –
anya-e0803n:2528_0: Sammāsambuddho tvaṃ paṭijānaṃ tiṭṭhasi. Sammāsambuddhaṃ taṃ paṭijānantaṃ passati.
anya-e0803n:2528_1: Sammāsambuddhena te paṭijānatā dhammo desito. Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato dīyate.
anya-e0803n:2528_2: Sammāsambuddhasmā tayā paṭijānatā apeti. Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato dhammo.
anya-e0803n:2528_3: Sammāsambuddhasmiṃ tayi paṭijānante patiṭṭhitanti. Tathā “khīṇāsavo tvaṃ paṭijānāsī”tiādināpi vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2529_0: Iddhimā bhikkhu ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti. Iddhimanto bhikkhū
anya-e0803n:2529_1: ekopi hutvā bahudhā honti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontīti imasmiṃ panatthe ayampi sakriyāpadā
anya-e0803n:2530_0: Ekopi hutvā bahudhā honto bahudhāpi hutvā eko honto bhikkhu tiṭṭhati, ekopi hutvā
anya-e0803n:2530_1: bahudhā hontā bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontā bhikkhū tiṭṭhanti. Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontaṃ
anya-e0803n:2530_2: bahudhāpi hutvā eko hontaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati, ekopi hutvā bahudhā honte bahudhāpi
anya-e0803n:2530_3: hutvā eko honte bhikkhū passati. Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontena bahudhāpi hutvā eko
anya-e0803n:2530_4: hontena bhikkhunā dhammo desito, ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontehi bahudhāpi hutvā eko
anya-e0803n:2530_5: hontehi bhikkhūhi dhammo desito. Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontassa bahudhāpi hutvā eko
anya-e0803n:2530_6: hontassa bhikkhuno dīyate. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Bho ekopi hutvā bahudhā honta bahudhāpi
anya-e0803n:2530_7: hutvā eko honta bhikkhu tvaṃ dhammaṃ desehi, bhonto ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontā bahudhāpi
anya-e0803n:2530_8: hutvā eko hontā tumhe dhammaṃ desethāti. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne kevaṭṭasuttaṃ sādhakaṃ. “Idha
anya-e0803n:2530_9: kevaṭṭa bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti. Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
anya-e0803n:2530_10: bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti, āvibhāvaṃ…pe… tamenaṃ aññataro saddho pasanno passati taṃ
anya-e0803n:2530_11: bhikkhuṃ anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhontaṃ ekopi hutvā bahudhā hontaṃ bahudhāpi
anya-e0803n:2531_0: Ekoekāya mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappento bhikkhu evaṃ vadati, ekoekāya
anya-e0803n:2531_1: mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappentā bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti. Ekoekāya mātugāmena
anya-e0803n:2531_2: saddhiṃ raho nisajjaṃ kappentaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati, ekoekāya mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho
anya-e0803n:2531_3: nisajjaṃ kappente bhikkhū passati. Sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Ettha pana “na tveva ekoekāya,
anya-e0803n:2531_4: mātugāmena sallape”tiādikaṃ pāḷipadaṃ sādhakaṃ. Ettha hi ekoekāyāti idaṃ abyayapadasadisaṃ
anya-e0803n:2531_5: rūḷhīpadanti gahetabbaṃ, aññamaññanti saddassa viya ca ekapadattūpagamanañcassa veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2531_6: Bhikkhu vinā dutiyena sayaṃ eko hutvā ekāya itthiyā saddhinti imasmiṃ atthe “ekoekāyā”ti
anya-e0803n:2531_7: idaṃ padaṃ na rūḷhīpadanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ santepi na “eko”ti saddo “bhikkhū”ti
anya-e0803n:2531_8: padena samānādhikaraṇo. Yadi samānādhikaraṇo siyā, “nisajjaṃ kappenta”ntiādi na vattabbaṃ
anya-e0803n:2531_9: siyā. “Ekāyā”ti saddopi na ajjhāharitabbena “itthiyā”ti padena samānādhikaraṇo. Yadi
anya-e0803n:2531_10: samānādhikaraṇo siyā, “mātugāmenā”ti na vattabbaṃ siyā visesābhāvato dviruttabhāvāpajjanato
anya-e0803n:2531_11: ca. Kiñca bhiyyo “mātugāmenā”ti vuttattā “ekenā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā, ekantato pana
anya-e0803n:2531_12: “ekoekāyā”ti idaṃ padaṃ pumitthisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ apekkhati, na samānādhikaraṇapadaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2531_13: tasmā “dve jānipatayo aññamaññaṃ sallapentī”tiādīsu “aññamañña”nti padassa viya ca
anya-e0803n:2531_14: “ekoekāyā”ti imassa ekapadattañca nisajjaṃ kappentassa bhikkhuno visesanattañca veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2531_15: Atha vā yassaṃ nisajjakriyāyaṃ bhikkhupi ekova hoti, itthīpi ekāva. Sā kriyā rūḷhīvasena
anya-e0803n:2531_16: “ekoekāyā”ti vuccati, tādisāya ekoekāya nisajjakriyāya bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhintipi
anya-e0803n:2531_17: attho gahetabbo. Iminā nayena aññesampi rūḷhīsaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā yathāpayogaṃ
anya-e0803n:2538: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2542_0: Ettāvatā bhūdhātumayānaṃ pulliṅgānaṃ itthiliṅgānaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgānañca nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:2542_1: yathārahaṃ liṅgantarehi saddantarehi atthantarehi ca saddhiṃ nānappakārato dassitā.
anya-e0803n:2542_2: Sabbanāmāni hi ṭhapetvā nayato aññāni kānici nāmāni aggahitāni nāma natthi.
anya-e0803n:2546: Yāni honti tiliṅgāni, anukūlāni yāni ca;
anya-e0803n:2550: Tesu kānici rūpehi, sesāññehi ca yujjare;
anya-e0803n:2551: Kānici pana saheva, etesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ idaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2552: Etasmā lakkhaṇā muttaṃ, na padaṃ sabbanāmikaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2554_0: Sabbanāmāni nāma – sabba katara katama ubhaya itaraañña aññatara aññatama pubba para
anya-e0803n:2554_1: apara dakkhiṇa uttara adharayata eta ima amukiṃ eka ubha dviti catu tumha amha iccetāni sattavīsa.
anya-e0803n:2555_0: Etesu sabbasaddo sakalattho, so ca sabbasabbādivasena ñeyyo. Katara katamasaddā pucchanatthā.
anya-e0803n:2555_1: Ubhayasaddo dviavayavasamudāyavacano. Itarasaddo vuttapaṭiyogīvacano. Aññasaddo adhigatāparavacano.
anya-e0803n:2555_2: Aññatara aññatamasaddā aniyamatthā. Pubbādayo uttarapariyantā disākālādivavatthāvacanā.
anya-e0803n:2555_3: Tathā hi pubba parā para dakkhiṇuttarasaddā pulliṅgatte yathārahaṃ kāladesādivacanā,
anya-e0803n:2555_4: itthiliṅgatte disādivacanā, napuṃsakaliṅgatte ṭhānādivacanā. Adharasaddopi heṭṭhimatthavācako
anya-e0803n:2555_5: vavatthāvacanoyeva, so ca tiliṅgo “adharo patto. Adharā araṇī, adharaṃ bhājana”miti,
anya-e0803n:2555_6: yaṃsaddo aniyamattho. Taṃsaddo parammukhāvacano. Etasaddo samīpavacano. Imasaddo
anya-e0803n:2555_7: accantasamīpavacano. Amusaddo dūravacano. Kiṃsaddo pucchanattho. Ekasaddo saṅkhādivacano. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0803n:2556_0: Ekasaddo aññatthaseṭṭhaasahāyasaṅkhādīsu dissati. Tathā hesa “sassato attā ca loko
anya-e0803n:2556_1: ca, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti, ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati. “Cetaso
anya-e0803n:2556_2: ekodibhāva”ntiādīsu seṭṭhe. “Eko vūpakaṭṭho”tiādīsu asahāye. “Ekova kho bhikkhave
anya-e0803n:2556_3: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhāyanti.
anya-e0803n:2557_0: Yatthesa saṅkhāvacano, tatthekavacanantova. Ubhasaddo dvisaddapariyāyo. Dviticatusaddā
anya-e0803n:2557_1: saṅkhāvacanā, sabbakālaṃ bahuvacanantāva. Tumhasaddo yena katheti, tasmiṃ vattabbavacanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2559_0: Sabbo, sabbe. Sabbaṃ, sabbe. Sabbena, sabbehi, sabbebhi. Sabbassa, sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2559_1: Sabbasmā, sabbamhā, sabbehi, sabbebhi. Sabbassa, sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ. Sabbasmiṃ,
anya-e0803n:2559_2: sabbamhi, sabbesu. Bho sabba, bhavanto sabbe.
anya-e0803n:2560_0: Tatra “sabbo bhūto, sabbe bhūtā”tiādinā, “sabbo puriso, sabbe purisā”tiādinā ca nayena
anya-e0803n:2560_1: sabbāni pulliṅganāmehi saddhiṃ yojetabbāni. Yāni pana yamakamahātherena punnapuṃsakavisaye
anya-e0803n:2560_2: sabba katara katamādīnaṃ aññānipi rūpāni vuttāni. Taṃ yathā?
anya-e0803n:2565_0: Sabbā, sabbā, sabbāyo. Sabbaṃ, sabbā, sabbāyo. Sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāhi, sabbābhi.
anya-e0803n:2565_1: Sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāsaṃ. Sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāhi, sabbābhi. Sabbāya, sabbassā,
anya-e0803n:2565_2: sabbāsaṃ. Sabbāyaṃ, sabbassā, sabbassaṃ, sabbāsu. Bhoti sabbe, bhotiyo sabbā, sabbāyo.
anya-e0803n:2566_0: Ettha “sabbā bhāvikā, sabbā bhāvikāyo”ti, “sabbā kaññā, sabbā kaññāyo”ti ca ādinā
anya-e0803n:2566_1: itthiliṅgasabbanāmāni sabbehi itthiliṅgehi saddhiṃ yojetabbāni. Ettha ca “sabbassā”ti
anya-e0803n:2566_3: saddhi”nti karaṇappayogādidassanato. Sabbassā kaññāya kataṃ. Sabbassā kaññāya deti.
anya-e0803n:2566_4: Ayaṃ kaññā sabbassā kaññāya hīnā virūpā. Ayaṃ kaññā sabbassā kaññāya uttamā abhirūpā.
anya-e0803n:2566_5: Sabbassā kaññāya apeti, sabbassā kaññāya dhanaṃ. Sabbassā kaññāya patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2567_0: Sabbaṃ, sabbāni. Sabbaṃ, sabbāni. Sabbena, sabbehi, sabbebhi. Sabbassa, sabbesaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2567_1: sabbesānaṃ. Sabbasmā, sabbamhā, sabbehi, sabbebhi. Sabbassa, sabbesaṃ, sabbesānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2567_2: Sabbasmiṃ, sabbamhi, sabbesu. Bho sabba, bhavanto sabbāni. Napuṃsakaliṅgatte nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n:2568_0: Ettha “sabbaṃ bhūtaṃ, sabbāni bhūtāni. Sabbaṃ cittaṃ, sabbāni cittānī”ti ca ādinā
anya-e0803n:2568_1: napuṃsakaliṅgasabbanāmāni sabbehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi saddhiṃ yojetabbāni. Evaṃ sabbasaddassa
anya-e0803n:2569_0: Idānissa parapadena saddhiṃ samāso veditabbo “sabbasādhāraṇo sabbaverī”iti. Tattha
anya-e0803n:2569_1: sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇo sabbasādhāraṇo. Sabbesaṃ verī, sabbe vā verino yassa soyaṃ sabbaverīti
anya-e0803n:2569_2: samāsaviggaho. Yathā pana sabbasaddassa padamālā liṅgattayavasena yojitā, evaṃ katarasaddādīnampi
anya-e0803n:2571_0: Kataro, katare. Kataraṃ…pe… bho katara, bhavanto katare. Katamo, katame. Itaro, itare.
anya-e0803n:2571_1: Añño, aññe. Aññataro, aññatare. Aññatamo, aññatame. Pubbo, pubbe. Paro, pare. Aparo,
anya-e0803n:2571_2: apare. Dakkhiṇo, dakkhiṇe. Uttaro, uttare. Adharo, adhare…pe… bho adhara, bhavanto adhareti.
anya-e0803n:2573_0: Kataraṃ, katarāni. Kataraṃ…pe… bho katara, bhavanto katarāni. Katamaṃ. Ubhayaṃ. Itaraṃ.
anya-e0803n:2573_1: Aññaṃ. Aññataraṃ. Aññatamaṃ. Pubbaṃ. Paraṃ. Aparaṃ. Dakkhiṇaṃ. Uttaraṃ. Adharaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2573_2: adharāni. Adharaṃ…pe… bho adhara, bhavanto adharānīti.
anya-e0803n:2574_0: Idāni punnapuṃsakaliṅgānaṃ parasaddādīnaṃ rūpantaraniddeso vuccati. Kaccāyanasmiñhi
anya-e0803n:2574_1: “purisā”ti viya “parā”ti paṭhamābahuvacanaṃ dissati. Evarūpo nayo aparasabbakatarādīsu
anya-e0803n:2574_2: aññatamapariyosānesu navasu appasiddho, labbhamāno pubbadakkhiṇuttarādharesu catūsu
anya-e0803n:2574_3: labbheyya. Tathā “purise”ti viya pāḷiādīsu “pubbe”ti saccasaṅkhepe “itare”ti, kaccāyane
anya-e0803n:2574_4: ca “pare”ti sattamīekavacanaṃ dissati. Evarūpo nayo sabba aññasaddesu appasiddho,
anya-e0803n:2574_5: labbhamāno katarakatamādīsu sesesu adharapariyosānesu dvādasasu labbheyya. Tathā
anya-e0803n:2574_6: “purisā”ti viya sabbā katarā iccādi pañcamīekavacananayo pāḷiādīsu appasiddho. Evaṃ
anya-e0803n:2574_7: santepi ayaṃ nayo punappunaṃ upaparikkhitvā yutto ce, gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2576_0: Katarā, katarā, katarāyo. Kataraṃ…pe… bhoti katare, bhotiyo katarā, katarāyo. Katamā.
anya-e0803n:2576_1: Ubhayā. Itarā. Aññatarā. Aññatamā. Pubbā. Parā. Aparā. Dakkhiṇā. Uttarā. Adharā,
anya-e0803n:2576_2: adharā, adharāyo. Adharaṃ…pe… bhoti adhare, bhotiyo adharā, adharāyoti.
anya-e0803n:2577_0: Yasmā panetesu itara añña aññatara aññatamānaṃ pāḷiyādīsu “itarissā”tiādidassanato
anya-e0803n:2577_1: koci bhedo vattabbo, tasmā catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ ekavacanaṭṭhāne “itarissā, itarāya,
anya-e0803n:2577_2: aññissā, aññāya. Aññatarissā, aññatarāya, aññatamissā, aññatamāyā”ti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2577_3: Tathā tatiyāpañcamīnamekavacanaṭṭhāne “tassā kumārikāya saddhiṃ. Kassāhaṃ kena hāyāmī”ti
anya-e0803n:2577_5: itarāya, itarāyaṃ, aññissā, aññissaṃ, aññāya, aññāyaṃ, aññatarissā, aññatarissaṃ,

anya-e0803n:2581_0: Katara katamasaddesu katarasaddo appesu ekaṃ vā dve vā tīṇi vā bhiyyo vā appamupādāya
anya-e0803n:2581_1: vattati. Katamasaddo bahūsu ekaṃ vā dve vā tīṇi vā bahuṃ vā upādāya vattati. Katarasaddo
anya-e0803n:2581_2: hi appavisayo, katamasaddo bahuvisayo. Tatrime payogā “katarena maggena gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2581_3: Samuddo kataro ayaṃ. Katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti. Katame dhammā kusalā. Disā
anya-e0803n:2581_4: catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disatā, imāyo, katamaṃ disaṃ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā”.
anya-e0803n:2581_5: Iccevamādayo bhavanti. Ubhayo. Ubhayaṃ. Ubhayo. Ubhayena. Sesaṃ pulliṅge sabbasaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2581_6: Ubhayo janā tiṭṭhanti. Ubhayo jane passati. Yathā ubho puttā. Ubho putteti. “Ubhayo”ti
anya-e0803n:2581_7: hi padaṃ “ubho”ti padamiva bahuvacanantabhāvena pasiddhaṃ, na tvekavacanantabhāvena. Ettha hi –
anya-e0803n:2584_0: “Ubhayo te pitābhātaro”ti tadatthasādhakāni nidassanapadāni veditabbāni. Yadā panāyasmanto
anya-e0803n:2584_1: “ubhayo”ti ekavacanantaṃ passeyyātha, tadā sādhukaṃ manasi karotha. Ko hi samattho
anya-e0803n:2584_2: anantanayapaṭimaṇḍite sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake jinasāsane niravasesato nayaṃ daṭṭhuṃ
anya-e0803n:2588_0: Idāni asabbanāmesu saṅgaho vuccate – tattha aññasaddo tāva yadā bālavācako, tadā
anya-e0803n:2588_1: sabbanāmaṃ nāma na hoti. Asabbanāmattā ca sabbathāpi purisa kaññā cittanayeneva yojetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2588_2: Tathā hi na jānātīti añño, bālo puriso. Na jānātīti aññā, bālā itthī. Na jānātīti
anya-e0803n:2588_3: aññaṃ, bālaṃ kulanti vacanattho. Evaṃ viditvā pulliṅgaṭṭhāne “añño, aññā. Aññaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2588_4: aññe”tiādinā purisanayeneva nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā. Itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne “aññā, aññā,
anya-e0803n:2588_5: aññāyo”tiādinā kaññānayeneva, napuṃsakaliṅgaṭṭhāne “aññaṃ, aññānī”tiādinā cittanayeneva yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2589_0: Imasmiñhi atthavisese bālajane vattukāmena “aññā janā”ti avatvā “aññe janā”ti vutte
anya-e0803n:2589_1: tassa taṃ vacanaṃ adhippetatthaṃ na sādheti aññathā atthassa gahetabbattā. Tathā
anya-e0803n:2589_2: “aññānaṃ janāna”nti avatvā “aññesaṃ janānaṃ, aññesānaṃ janāna”nti vā vutte tassa
anya-e0803n:2589_3: taṃ vacanaṃ adhippetatthaṃ na sādheti. Tathā “aññānaṃ itthīna”nti avatvā “aññāsaṃ
anya-e0803n:2589_4: itthīna”nti vuttepi, “aññānaṃ kulāna”nti avatvā “aññesaṃ kulānaṃ, aññesānaṃ kulāna”nti
anya-e0803n:2589_5: vā vuttepi. Sabbanāmikavasena pana adhigatāparavacanicchāyaṃ “aññe janā”tiādinā vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2589_6: na “aññā janā”tiādinā. Tathā hi “aññā janā”tiādinā vuttavacanaṃ adhippetatthaṃ na
anya-e0803n:2589_7: sādheti aññathā atthassa gahetabbattā. Iti yattha “aññā janā”tiādivacanaṃ upapajjati,
anya-e0803n:2589_8: “aññe janā”tiādivacanaṃ nupapajjati, yattha pana “aññe janā”tiādivacanaṃ upapajjati,
anya-e0803n:2589_9: “aññā janā”tiādivacanaṃ nupapajjati. Yā etasmiṃ atthavisese sallakkhaṇā paññā, ayaṃ
anya-e0803n:2589_10: nītiyā maggo yuttāyuttivicāraṇe hetuttā, lokasmiñhi yuttāyuttivicāraṇā nītīti vuttā.
anya-e0803n:2589_11: Sā ca vinā paññāya na sijjhati. Evaṃ aññasaddo asabbanāmikopi bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2590_0: Pubba dakkhiṇuttara parasaddesu pubbasaddo yattha padhānavācako, yattha ca “semhaṃ
anya-e0803n:2590_1: pubbo”tiādīsu lohitakopajavācako, tattha asabbanāmiko. Paṭhamatthe tiliṅgo, dutiyatthe
anya-e0803n:2590_2: ekaliṅgo. Uttamatthavācako pana uttarasaddo ca parasaddo ca asabbanāmiko tiliṅgoyeva.
anya-e0803n:2590_3: Tathā “dakkhiṇassā vahantima”nti ettha viya susikkhitatthacaturatthavācako dakkhiṇasaddo.
anya-e0803n:2590_4: “Petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dajjā”tiādīsu pana deyyadhammavācako dakkhiṇāsaddo niyogā itthiliṅgo
anya-e0803n:2590_5: asabbanāmikoyeva. Evaṃ añña pubba dakkhiṇuttara parasaddā asabbanāmikāpi santīti
anya-e0803n:2591_0: Idāni katarasaddādīnaṃ parapadena saddhiṃ samāso nīyate “kataragāmavāsī katamagāmavāsī.
anya-e0803n:2591_1: Ubhayagāmavāsino, itaragāmavāsī aññataragāmavāsī, pubbadisā, parajano, dakkhiṇadisā,

anya-e0803n:2591_3: ubhayo gāmā ubhayagāmā”tiādinā yathārahaṃ samāsaviggaho, katarasaddassa pana katamasaddena
anya-e0803n:2591_4: saddhiṃ samāsaṃ icchanti dvidhā ca rūpāni garū “kataro ca katamo ca katarakatame
anya-e0803n:2591_5: katarakatamā vā”ti. Tasmā sabbanāmikanayena suddhanāmikesu purisanayena ca katara
anya-e0803n:2591_7: katarakatamesānaṃ, katarakatamāna”nti tīṇi rūpāni siyuṃ “katarā ca katamā ca katarakatamā”ti
anya-e0803n:2591_8: evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena katasamāse pana sabbanāmikanayena, suddhanāmikesu kaññānayena
anya-e0803n:2591_9: ca yojetabbā. “Katarañca katamañca katarakatamānī”ti evaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgavasena katasamāse
anya-e0803n:2592_0: Ayaṃ panettha visesopi veditabbo – pubbāparādisaddā dvandasamāsādividhiṃ patvā sehi
anya-e0803n:2592_1: rūpehi rūpavanto na honti, taṃ yathā? Pubbāparā, adharuttarā, māsapubbā purisā, diṭṭhapubbā
anya-e0803n:2592_2: purisā, tathāgataṃ diṭṭhapubbā sāvakā, idaṃ pulliṅgatte paṭhamābahuvacanarūpaṃ. Etthekāro
anya-e0803n:2592_3: ādesabhūto na dissati. Pubbāparānaṃ adharuttarānaṃ, māsapubbānaṃ purisānaṃ, idaṃ
anya-e0803n:2592_4: pulliṅgatte catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ bahuvacanarūpaṃ. Ettha saṃ sānamiccete ādesabhūtā
anya-e0803n:2592_5: na dissanti. Tathāgataṃ diṭṭhapubbānaṃ sāvakānaṃ, tathāgataṃ diṭṭhapubbānaṃ sāvikānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2592_6: kulānaṃ vā, idaṃ tiliṅgatte catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ bahuvacanarūpaṃ. Etthāpi saṃ sānamiccete
anya-e0803n:2592_7: ādesabhūtā na dissanti. Māsapubbāyaṃ māsapubbāya, piyapubbāyaṃ piyapubbāya, idamitthiliṅgatte
anya-e0803n:2592_8: sattamīcatutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ ekavacanarūpaṃ. Etthādesabhūtā saṃ sā na dissanti. Māsapubbānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2592_10: Ettha panādesabhūto samicceso na dissati. Aññānipi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbāni, pubbāparādīnaṃ

anya-e0803n:2653_2: “imesaṃ paccayā idappaccayā, idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā, idappaccayānaṃ vā samūho
anya-e0803n:2653_3: idappaccayatā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca idappaccayā eva idappaccayatāti tāsaddena padaṃ
anya-e0803n:2653_4: vaḍḍhitaṃ na kiñci atthantaraṃ yathā devo eva devatāti. Idappaccayānaṃ samūho idappaccayatāti
anya-e0803n:2653_5: samūhatthaṃ tāsaddamāha yathā janānaṃ samūho janatāti. Cūḷaniruttiyaṃ niruttipiṭake
anya-e0803n:2657_0: Asu, amu, amū. Amuṃ, amū. Amunā, amūhi, amūbhi. Amussa, dussa, amūsaṃ, amūsānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2657_1: Amusmā, amumhā, amūhi, amūbhi. Amussa, dussa, amūsaṃ, amūsānaṃ. Amusmiṃ, amumhi,
anya-e0803n:2658: Aduṃ, amūni. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ. Idaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2659_0: Asu, amu, amū, amuyo. Amūṃ, amū, amuyo. Amuyā, amūhi, amūbhi. Amussā, amuyā, amūsaṃ,

anya-e0803n:2660_0: Tatra “dussa me khettapālassa, rattibhattaṃ apābhata”nti payogadassanato “dussā”ti
anya-e0803n:2660_1: padamamhehi ṭhapitaṃ. Kakārāgamavasena aññānipi asabbanāmikarūpāni bhavanti. Tesaṃ
anya-e0803n:2661_0: “Asuko, asukā. Asukaṃ, asuke”tiādinā, “amuko, amukā. Amukaṃ, amuke”tiādinā ca purisanayopi
anya-e0803n:2661_1: labbhati. “Asukā, asukāyo”tiādinā, “amukā, amukāyo”tiādinā ca kaññānayopi labbhati.
anya-e0803n:2661_2: “Asukaṃ, asukānī”tiādinā, “amukaṃ, amukānī”tiādinā ca cittanayopi labbhati. Imānettha
anya-e0803n:2663: Ko, ke. Kaṃ, ke. Kena, kehi, kebhi. Kassa, kissa, kesaṃ. Kasmā, kamhā, kehi, kebhi. Kassa, kissa, kesaṃ. Kasmiṃ, kismiṃ, kamhi, kimhi, kesu. Idaṃ pulliṅgaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2664_0: Rūpavisesopettha veditabbo “ke gandhabbe ca rakkhase nāge, ke kimpurise ca mānuse,
anya-e0803n:2664_1: ke paṇḍite sabbakāmadade, dīghaṃ rattaṃ bhattā me bhavissati, ke ca chave pāthikaputte,
anya-e0803n:2664_2: kā ca tathāgatānaṃ arahantānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ āsādanā”ti pāḷidassanato. Yasmā
anya-e0803n:2664_3: pana ke gandhabbe ca rakkhase nāge itiādīsu pāḷīsu “ke”ti paccattavacanaṃ ekārantampi
anya-e0803n:2664_4: dissati, tasmā “ke”ti rūpabhedo cettha ñeyyo. Tathā “kissassa ekadhammassa, vadhaṃ
anya-e0803n:2664_5: rocesi gotama. Kismiṃ me sivayo kuddhā. Kamhi kāle tayā vīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n:2666: Kvasaddatthe vattatīti, ñeyyā ko iccayaṃ suti.
anya-e0803n:2667: Petaṃ taṃ sāmamaddakkhiṃ, ko nu tvaṃ sāma jīvasi;
anya-e0803n:2669: Etesu dvīsu atthesu, diṭṭho ko iccayaṃ ravo;
anya-e0803n:2671_0: Napuṃsakaliṅge kaṃ, kāni. Kaṃ, kāni. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Atha vā “kiṃ
anya-e0803n:2671_1: cittaṃ. Kiṃ rūpaṃ. Kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ. Kiṃ icchasī”tiādipayogadassanato pana
anya-e0803n:2671_2: “kiṃ, kāni. Kiṃ, kānī”ti vatvā sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo yuttataro,
anya-e0803n:2672: Kā, kā, kāyo. Kaṃ, kā, kāyo. Kāya, kāhi, kābhi. Kāya, kassā, kāsaṃ, kāsānaṃ. Kāya, kassā, kāhi, kābhi. Kāya, kassā, kāsaṃ kāsānaṃ. Kāya, kassā, kāyaṃ, kassaṃ, kāsu.
anya-e0803n:2673_0: Ettha pana kāyoti padassa atthibhāve “kāyo amoghā gacchantī”ti nidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2673_1: Idaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ. Evaṃ kiṃsaddassa nāmikapadamālā bhavati. Etthetassa atthuddhāro
anya-e0803n:2673_2: vuccate – kiṃ saddo “kiṃ rājā yo lokaṃ na rakkhati. Kiṃ nu kho nāma tumhe maṃ vattabbaṃ
anya-e0803n:2673_3: maññathā”tiādīsu garahane āgato. “Yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”ntiādīsu
anya-e0803n:2673_4: aniyame. “Kinte vakkali iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho vakkali dhammaṃ passati,
anya-e0803n:2673_5: so maṃ passatī”tiādīsu nippayojanatāyaṃ. “Kiṃ na kāhāmi te vaco”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane.
anya-e0803n:2673_6: “Kiṃsūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”ntiādīsu pucchāyaṃ, pucchā ca nāma kāraṇapucchādivasena
anya-e0803n:2673_7: anekavidhā, ato kāraṇapucchādivasenapi kiṃsaddassa pavatti vitthārato ñeyyā. Tathā
anya-e0803n:2673_8: hi ayaṃ “kiṃ nu santaramānova, kāsuṃ khaṇasi sārathi. Kiṃ nu jātiṃ na rocesi. Kena
anya-e0803n:2673_9: tetādiso vaṇṇo”tiādīsu kāraṇapucchāyaṃ vattati. “Kiṃ kāsuyā karissatī”tiādīsu kiccapucchāyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2673_10: “Kiṃ sīlaṃ. Ko samādhī”tiādīsu sarūpapucchāyaṃ. “Kiṃ khādasi. Kiṃ pivasī”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:2673_11: vatthupucchāyaṃ. “Khādasi kiṃ pivasi ki”ntiādīsu kriyāpucchāyaṃ vattati. Adiṭṭhajotanāpucchāti
anya-e0803n:2673_12: evamādikā pana pañcavidhā pucchā kiṃsaddassa atthuddhāre anāharitabbattā anāgatāti
anya-e0803n:2676_0: Parapadena saddhiṃ samāsopissa veditabbo “kiṃsamudayo, kiṃvedano, kiṃsaññojano”ti.
anya-e0803n:2676_1: Ettha “ko, ke. Kā, kā, kāyo. Kiṃ, kānī”ti evaṃ liṅgattayavasena vibhattāni kiṃsaddamayāni
anya-e0803n:2676_2: padāni samāsapadatte puna kimiti pakatibhāveneva tiṭṭhanti. Nāmasaddena pana samāse
anya-e0803n:2676_3: tesaṃ dvidhā gati dissati “kinnāmo, konāmo”ti. Sabbāni panetāni itthinapuṃsakaliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n:2681_0: Tathā hi “kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhu. Kiṃkārapaṭissāvinī”tiādīsu kiṃsaddo sarūpamavijahanto
anya-e0803n:2681_1: tiṭṭhati. Tattha hi kiṃcittaṃ yassa so kiṃcitto. “Kiṃ karomi sāmī”ti evaṃ kinti kāro
anya-e0803n:2681_2: karaṇaṃ saddanicchāraṇaṃ kiṃkāro, taṃ paṭissāvetīti kiṃkārapaṭissāvinītiādi nibbacanamicchitabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2681_4: padāvayavabhāvena suto. Tathā hi so katthaci padāvayavabhāvena katthaci nu su nukho
anya-e0803n:2681_5: kāraṇādisaddehi sahacāribhāvena ca suyyati. Atrime payogā – esā te itthī kiṃ hoti.
anya-e0803n:2681_6: Ete manussā tumhākaṃ kiṃ honti. Kimpurisānuciṇṇo. Kiṃ nu bhītova tiṭṭhasi. Kiṃsuchetvā
anya-e0803n:2681_7: sukhaṃ seti. Kiṃ nukho kāraṇaṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇā amma tuvaṃ pamajjasi, kiñhi nāma cajantassa,
anya-e0803n:2682: “Visuṃ padāvayavo vā, hutvā nvādīhi vā pana;
anya-e0803n:2686_0: Idāni sabbanāmikabhāve ṭhitehi ko kaṃsaddehi samānasutikānaṃ aññesaṃ ko kaṃsaddānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2686_1: nāmikapadamālāviseso vattabbo siyā, so heṭṭhā liṅgattayamissakaparicchede vutto.
anya-e0803n:2686_2: Asabbanāmikattā pana purisa cittanayeneva vibhatto. Tathā hi yadā kosaddo brahmavātakāyatthavācako,
anya-e0803n:2686_3: kaṃsaddo pana sirojalasukhatthavācako, tadā tāni padāni asabbanāmikāni, kasmā? Akiṃsaddamayattā
anya-e0803n:2686_5: ca. Ettha pana samānasutivasena atthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ kosaddo kaṃsaddoti ca vuttaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2686_6: ekantato pana sabbanāmikatte kiṃsaddoyeva, suddhanāmatte kasaddoyevāti gahetabbaṃ. Iccevaṃ –
anya-e0803n:2687: Kāye brahmani vāte ca, sīse jalasukhesu ca;
anya-e0803n:2688: Kasaddo vattatī tīsu, pumā tīsu napuṃsako.
anya-e0803n:2692: Kiṃ kiṃpakkena sadisaṃ, kāyo kiṃpabhavo vada;
anya-e0803n:2700_0: Yā pana tā heṭṭhā amhehi liṅgattayavasena kiṃsaddassa sabbanāmikasaññitassa nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:2700_1: vibhattā, etāsu pulliṅganapuṃsakaliṅgaṭṭhāne “kebhi, kissa, kasmā, kamhā, kamhī”ti
anya-e0803n:2700_2: imāni padāni pahāya itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne “kāyo, kābhi, kāsānaṃ, kāyaṃ, kassa”nti imāni
anya-e0803n:2700_3: ca padāni pahāya tato tato sesapadato yathāsambhavaṃ cisaddaṃ canasaddaṃ canaṃsaddañca
anya-e0803n:2701_0: Koci, keci, kecana. Kiñci, kiñcanaṃ, keci, kecana. Kenaci, kehici. Kassaci, kesañci.
anya-e0803n:2701_1: Pañcamiyā ekavacanaṃ ūnaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anāgatattā. Kehici. Kassaci, kesañci. Kasmiñci,
anya-e0803n:2701_2: kismici, kesuci. Pulliṅganapuṃsakaliṅgavasena daṭṭhabbāni. Atra kismicīti anusāralopavasena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2702_0: Itthiliṅgavasena pana kāci itthī, kāci itthiyo. Kāci, kāci. Kiñci, kāci. Kāyaci,
anya-e0803n:2702_1: kāhici. Kāyaci, kassāci, kāsañci. Kāyaci, kāhici. Kāyaci, kassāci, kāsañci. Kāyaci, kāsucīti rūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2703: Ettha “iti bhāsanti kecana, na naṃ hiṃsāmi kiñcana”ntiādayo payogā veditabbā. Iti liṅgattayavasena vuttāni koci kāci kiñcītiādīni appamattakānaṃ saṅgāhakavacanānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2705_0: Yo koci, ye keci. Yaṃ kiñci, ye keci. Yena kenaci, yehi kehici. Yassa kassaci, yesaṃ
anya-e0803n:2705_1: kesañci. Yasmā kasmāci, yehi kehici. Yassa kassaci, yesaṃ kesañci. Yasmiṃ kasmiñci, yesu kesuci.
anya-e0803n:2706: Ettha “yo koci maṃ aṭṭhi katvā suṇeyya. Ye kecime atthi rasā pathabyā, saccaṃ tesaṃ sādhutaraṃ rasāna”ntiādayo payogā veditabbā. Pulliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2707_0: Yaṃ kiñci, yāni kānici. Yaṃ kiñci, yāni kānici. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ. Ettha “yaṃ
anya-e0803n:2707_1: kiñci ratanaṃ atthi, dhataraṭṭhanivesane. Yaṃ kiñci vittaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā. Yāni
anya-e0803n:2708_0: Yā kāci itthī, yā kāci itthiyo. Yaṃ kiñci, yā kāci. Yāya kāyaci, yāhi kāhici. Yāya
anya-e0803n:2708_1: kāyaci, yāsaṃ kāsañci. Yāya kāyaci, yāhi kāhici. Yāya kāyaci, yāsaṃ kāsañci. Yāya
anya-e0803n:2709_0: Ettha “yā kāci vedanā atītānāgatapaccuppannā”tiādayo payogā veditabbā. Itthiliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2709_1: Iti liṅgattayavasena vuttāni yo koci, yā kāci, yaṃ kiñcītiādīni anavasesapariyādānavacanānīti
anya-e0803n:2709_2: veditabbāni. Sabbāni cetāni na nipātapadāni, nipātapatirūpakā saddagatiyoti veditabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2709_3: Yadi nipātapadāni siyuṃ, tīsu liṅgesu sattasu vibhattīsu ekākārena tiṭṭheyyuṃ, na
anya-e0803n:2709_4: ca tiṭṭhanti, tasmā na nipātapadāni, nipātapatirūpakā saddagatiyoyeva.
anya-e0803n:2710_0: Apica ya ta kiṃ etaiccetehi sabbanāmehi liṅgānurūpato ttakattikapaccaye katvā vatticchāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:2710_1: yāni padāni sijjhanti, tāni paricchedavacanāni asabbanāmikāniyeva bhavanti. Tesaṃ
anya-e0803n:2710_2: nāmikapadamālā purisa citta kaññānayena yojetabbā. Taṃ yathā?
anya-e0803n:2711_0: Yattako jano, yattakaṃ cittaṃ, yattikā itthī. Tattako, tattakaṃ, tattikā. Kittako,
anya-e0803n:2711_1: kittakaṃ, kittikā. Ettako, ettakaṃ, ettikāti. Imāni padāni asabbanāmikānipi paccayavasena
anya-e0803n:2713: Ekasaddo hi saṅkhāvacano ca hoti asadisavacano ca asahāyavacano ca ekaccavacano ca missībhūtavacano ca. Yadā saṅkhā’sadisā’sahāyavacano, tadā ekavacanako bhavati.
anya-e0803n:2714_0: Eko, ekaṃ, ekena, ekassa, ekasmā, ekamhā, ekassa, ekasmiṃ, ekamhīti. Evaṃ saṅkhādivacano
anya-e0803n:2714_1: ekasaddo ekavacanako. Tathā hi “eko dve tayo”ti saṅkhāvisaye ekasaddo ekavacanakova.
anya-e0803n:2714_2: “Ekomhi sammāsambuddho. Eko rāja nipajjāmī”ti asadisāsahāyakathanepi ekavacanakova.
anya-e0803n:2715_0: Yadā pana saṅkhatthā ca asahāyā ca bahū vattabbā siyuṃ, tadā ekasaddato kakārāgamaṃ
anya-e0803n:2715_1: katvā ekakā, ekake, ekakehi, ekakebhi. Purisanaye bahuvacanavasena nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:2715_2: yojetabbā. Tathā hi saṅkhatthāpi bahū honti. “Cattāro ekakā siyu”nti hi vuttaṃ. Asahāyāpi
anya-e0803n:2715_3: bahū honti. Tathā hi “ayampi gahapati ekova āgato, ayampi ekova āgato”ti vattabbe
anya-e0803n:2715_4: “ime gahapatayo ekakā āgatā”ti vattabbatā dissati. Ayaṃ nayo sabbanāmikapakkhaṃ na
anya-e0803n:2716_0: Yadā ekaccavacano, tadā “eke, eke, ekehi, ekebhi ekesaṃ, ekehi, ekebhi, ekesaṃ, ekesū”ti
anya-e0803n:2716_1: vattabbaṃ. Ayampi bahuvacanikā sabbanāmikapadamālā. Ettha eketi ekacce. Esa nayo
anya-e0803n:2716_2: sesesupi. Yadā pana missībhūtavacano, tadā “ekā, eke, ekehi, ekebhi, ekāna”nti purisanaye
anya-e0803n:2716_3: bahuvacanavasena vattabbaṃ. “Pañcālo ca videho ca, ubho ekā bhavantu te”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0803n:2716_4: Ayaṃ nayo sabbanāmikapakkhaṃ na bhajati asādhāraṇarūpābhāvato, atthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:2716_5: pana vutto. Tattha ekā bhavantūti ekībhavantu missībhavantu, gaṅgodakena yamunodakaṃ
anya-e0803n:2717: Ācariyā pana evaṃ vibhāgaṃ adassetvā ekasaddassa sabbanāmattameva gahetvā sabbasaddassa viya nāmikapadamālaṃ yojenti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:2718_0: Eko, eke. Ekaṃ, eke. Ekena, ekehi, ekebhi. Ekassa, ekesaṃ, ekesānaṃ. Ekasmā, ekamhā,
anya-e0803n:2718_1: ekehi, ekebhi. Ekassa, ekesaṃ, ekesānaṃ. Ekasmiṃ, ekamhi, ekesūti. Ayaṃ sabbanāmikapadamālāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n:2719_0: Keci “ekasaddo saṅkhyātulyāsahāyaññavacano. Yadā saṅkhyāvacano, tadā sabbatthekavacanantova,
anya-e0803n:2719_1: aññattha bahuvacanantopi, eko ekā ekaṃ iccādi sabbattha sabbasaddasamaṃ. Saṃsāsveva
anya-e0803n:2719_2: viseso”ti liṅgattaye yojanānayaṃ vadanti. Evaṃ vadantā ca te vibhāgaṃ adassetvā vadanti.
anya-e0803n:2719_3: Mayaṃ pana sotūnaṃ payogesu kosalluppādanatthaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetvā vadāma.
anya-e0803n:2720: Apicettha ayaṃ visesopi sallakkhitabbo “eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge’ti pāḷippadese paccattekavacanassa ekasaddassa ekārantaniddesopi dissatī”ti. Pulliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2721: Ekaṃ, ekāni. Ekaṃ, ekāni. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ. Tattha ekānīti ekaccāni. Esa nayo sesabahuvacanesupi, napuṃsakaliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2722_0: Ekā, ekā, ekāyo. Ekaṃ, ekā, ekāyo. Ekāya, ekāhi, ekābhi. Ekāya, ekissā, ekāsaṃ. Ekāya,
anya-e0803n:2722_1: ekāhi, ekābhi. Ekāya, ekissā, ekāsaṃ. Ekāya, ekāyaṃ, ekissaṃ, ekāsu. Ettha bahuvacanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n:2722_2: ekāti ekaccā, ekāhīti ekaccāhi, ekāsanti ekaccānaṃ ekāsūti ekaccāsu. Itthiliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2723: Apica ekasadde vicchāvasena vattabbe liṅgattayarūpāni ekavacanāneva bhavanti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0803n:2724: Ekeko, ekekaṃ, ekekena, ekekassa, ekekasmā, ekekamhā, ekekassa, ekekasmiṃ, ekekamhīti pulliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2725: Ekekaṃ, ekekaṃ. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ, napuṃsakaliṅgarūpāni. Ekekā, ekekaṃ, ekekāya, ekekissā, ekekāya, ekekissā, ekekāyaṃ, ekekissaṃ. Itthiliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2726_0: Sabbānetāni vicchāsabbanāmānīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Bahuvacanāni panettha na santi payogābhāvato.
anya-e0803n:2726_1: Iti imesu vicchāvasena vuttesu liṅgattayarūpesu samāsacintā na uppādetabbā anibbacanīyattā
anya-e0803n:2726_2: vicchāsaddānaṃ. Tathā hi “pabbaṃ pabbaṃ sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle
anya-e0803n:2726_3: pakkhittatilā viya taṭataṭāyantā saṅkhārā bhijjantī”tiādīsu pabbapabbasaddādīnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2726_4: samāsakaraṇavasena nibbacanaṃ pubbācariyehi na dassitaṃ. Yasmā ca vicchāyaṃ vattamānānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2726_5: dvirutti lokato eva siddhā, na lakkhaṇato, tasmā tattha samāsacintā na uppādetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2727_0: Idāni ekacca ekatiya ekacciyasaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālāyo vuccante – pulliṅge tāva ekacco,
anya-e0803n:2727_1: ekacce. Ekaccaṃ, ekacce. Sesaṃ purisasaddasamaṃ. Ettha ekacceti paccattabahuvacanameva
anya-e0803n:2727_2: sabbanāmikarūpasamaṃ asādhāraṇarūpattā. “Idhekacco kulaputto. Idhekacce moghapurisā”ti nidassanapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2728: Ekatiyo, ekatiye. Ekatiyaṃ, ekatiye. Sesaṃ purisasaddasamaṃ. Idhāpi ekatiyeti paccattabahuvacanameva sabbanāmikarūpasamaṃ asādhāraṇarūpattā. Ekatiye manussā.
anya-e0803n:2735: Kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ seyyo, na tvevekacciyo naro.
anya-e0803n:2736: Ekacciyaṃ āhāra”nti nidassanapadāni. Ekacciyo, ekacciyā. Ekacciyaṃ, ekacciyeti sabbathāpi purisanayo. Pulliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2737_0: Ekaccaṃ, ekaccāni. Ekaccaṃ, ekaccāni. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ. Ekatiyaṃ, ekatiyāni.
anya-e0803n:2737_1: Ekatiyaṃ, ekatiyāni. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ. Ekacciyaṃ, ekacciyāni. Ekacciyaṃ, ekacciyāni.
anya-e0803n:2738_0: “Ekaccā, ekaccā, ekaccāyo”ti kaññānayena, tathā “ekatiyā, ekatiyā, ekatiyāyo. Ekatiya”nti
anya-e0803n:2738_1: ca, “ekacciyā, ekacciyā, ekacciyāyo. Ekacciya”nti ca kaññānayena yojetabbaṃ. Itthiliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2740: Ekākī, ekākī, ekākino. Ekākiṃ, ekākī, ekākino. Daṇḍīnayena ñeyyā. Ekākiyo, ekākiyā. Ekākiyaṃ, ekākiye. Ekākiyena. Purisanayena ñeyyaṃ. Pulliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2741: Ekāki kulaṃ, ekākī, ekākīni. Ekākiṃ, ekākī, ekākīni. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ. Ekākiyaṃ, ekākiyāni. Ekākiyaṃ, ekākiyāni. Sesaṃ pulliṅgasadisaṃ. Napuṃsakaliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2742_0: Ekākinī, ekākinī, ekākiniyo. Ekākiniṃ, ekākinī, ekākiniyo. Ekākiniyāti itthīsadisaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2742_1: Ekākiyā, ekākiyā, ekākiyāyo. Ekākiyaṃ, ekākiyā, ekākiyāyo. Ekākiyāyāti kaññāsadisaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2742_2: Itthiliṅgarūpāni. Sabbāni panetāni asabbanāmikarūpāni atthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ vuttānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2743: Idāni dvisaddapariyāyassa sadā bahuvacanantassa sabbanāmikapadassa ubhasaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n:2744_0: “Ubho, ubho, ubhohi, ubhobhi, ubhinnaṃ, ubhohi, ubhobhi, ubhinnaṃ, ubhosū”ti ayaṃ
anya-e0803n:2744_1: pāḷinayānurūpena vuttapadamālā. Atrime payogā – ubho kumārā nikkītā. Ubho itthiyo
anya-e0803n:2744_2: tiṭṭhanti, ubho cittāni tiṭṭhanti, ubho putte adāsi. Ubho kaññāyo passati. Ubho pādāni
anya-e0803n:2744_3: bhinditvā, saññamissāmi vo ahaṃ. Ubhohi hatthehi. Ubhohi bāhāhi, ubhohi cittehi,
anya-e0803n:2744_4: ubhinnaṃ janānaṃ, ubhinnaṃ itthīnaṃ, ubhinnaṃ cittānaṃ, ubhosu purisesu, ubhosu itthīsu,
anya-e0803n:2744_5: ubhosu passesūti, ayamasmākaṃ ruci. Ācariyā pana “ubhehi, ubhebhi, ubhesū”tipi icchanti.
anya-e0803n:2744_6: Kaccāyanepi hi “ubhe tappurisā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbānipi etāni manasi kātabbāniyeva. Ubhasaddassa
anya-e0803n:2745: Idāni saṅkhāvacanānaṃ dviti catusaddānaṃ sadā bahuvacanantānaṃ sabbanāmānaṃ nāmikapadamālāyo vuccante –
anya-e0803n:2746_0: Dve, dve, dvīhi, dvībhi, dvinnaṃ, duvinnaṃ, dvīhi, dvībhi, dvinnaṃ, duvinnaṃ, dvīsu.
anya-e0803n:2746_1: Cūḷaniruttiyaṃ pana “dvinnanna”nti padamālā āgatā. Imāni ahaṃsaddādīni viya itthi
anya-e0803n:2746_2: liṅgādibhāvavinimuttānipi tīsu liṅgesu yujjante “dve purisā, dve itthiyo, dve cittāni”iccevamādinā.
anya-e0803n:2747: “Dve”ti rūpaṃ dvisaddassa, yaṃ samāsamhi taṃ bhave;
anya-e0803n:2751: Tayo, tayo, tīhi, tībhi, tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, tīhi, tībhi, tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, tīsu. Imāni pulliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2752_0: Tisso, tisso, tīhi, tībhi, tissannaṃ, tīhi, tībhi, tissannaṃ, tīsu. Imāni itthiliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2752_2: pana “tiṇṇanna”nti. Tāni sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane punappunaṃ upaparikkhitvā
anya-e0803n:2753_0: Tīṇi, tīṇi, tīhi, tībhi, tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, tīhi, tībhi, tiṇṇaṃ, tiṇṇannaṃ, tīsu.
anya-e0803n:2753_1: Imāni napuṃsakaliṅgarūpāni. Katthaci pana pāḷippadese tīṇisaddassa ṇikāralopopi bhavati
anya-e0803n:2753_2: “dve vāti vā udakaphusitānī”ti. “Tiṇṇannaṃ kho bhikkhave indriyānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā
anya-e0803n:2753_3: piṇḍolabhāradvājena bhikkhunā aññā byākatā”ti idaṃ “tiṇṇanna”nti padassa atthibhāve nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2756: Yasmā tissa samāsamhi, saddhiṃ parapadena ve;
anya-e0803n:2760: Cattāro, caturo, cattāro, caturo, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catunnaṃ, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catunnaṃ, catūsu. Imāni pulliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2761_0: Catasso, catasso, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catassannaṃ, catunnaṃ, catūhi, catūbhi,
anya-e0803n:2761_1: catubbhi, catassannaṃ, catunnaṃ, catūsu. Imāni itthiliṅgarūpāni. Itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne
anya-e0803n:2761_2: “catunna”nti padaṃ cūḷaniruttiyaṃ niruttipiṭake pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ca dassanato
anya-e0803n:2761_3: vuttaṃ. Tathā hi cūḷaniruttiyaṃ itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne “catunna”nti āgataṃ, niruttipiṭake
anya-e0803n:2761_4: “catunnaṃ kaññāna”nti āgataṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana soṇadantasuttādīsu “samaṇo gotamo catunnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2761_5: parisānaṃ piyo manāpo”ti āgataṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu ca pana suttantaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “catūhi
anya-e0803n:2761_6: acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannāgato catunnaṃ parisānaṃ piyo manāpo”ti āgataṃ. Sattilaṅghajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:2761_7: “ācariyo panassa catunnaṃ sattīnaṃ laṅghanaṃ sippaṃ jānātī”ti āgataṃ.
anya-e0803n:2762: Cattāri, cattāri, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catunnaṃ, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catunnaṃ, catūsu. Imāni napuṃsakaliṅgarūpāni.
anya-e0803n:2767: Imāni dveādikāni sabbanāmikāni bahuvacanāniyeva bhavanti, na ekavacanāni. Cūḷaniruttiyaṃ pana tīsu liṅgesu “catassanna”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ anijjhānakkhamaṃ viya dissati.
anya-e0803n:2768: Idāni tumhaamhasaddānaṃ nāmikapadamālā vuccante, tesu yena katheti, tassālapane tumhavacanāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2769_0: Tvaṃ, tuvaṃ, tumhe. Taṃ, tuvaṃ, tvaṃ, tavaṃ, tumhe. Tayā, tvayā, tumhehi, tumhebhi.
anya-e0803n:2769_1: Tuyhaṃ, tava, tumhaṃ, tumhākaṃ. Tayā, tvayā, tumhehi, tumhebhi. Tuyhaṃ, tava, tumhaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2769_2: tumhākaṃ. Tayi, tvayi, tumhesu. Tatra “tvaṃ puriso, tvaṃ itthī, tvaṃ citta”ntiādinā yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2771_0: Ahaṃ, ahakaṃ, mayaṃ, amhe. Maṃ, mamaṃ, amhe. Mayā, amhehi, amhebhi. Mayhaṃ, mama,
anya-e0803n:2771_1: amhaṃ, amhākaṃ, asmākaṃ. Mayā, amhehi, amhebhi. Mayhaṃ, mama, amhaṃ, amhākaṃ, asmākaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2772_0: Ettha pana “kathaṃ amhe karomase”ti pāḷidassanato “tumhe”ti paccattavacanassa viya
anya-e0803n:2772_2: Tassa atthibhāve “ahakañca cittavasānugā bhāsissa”nti esā pāḷi nidassanaṃ. Ettha
anya-e0803n:2772_3: hi ahakanti ahaṃ iccevattho. Tatra “ahaṃ puriso, ahaṃ kaññā, ahaṃ citta”ntiādinā
anya-e0803n:2773_1: vuttaṃ. Kaccāyane “tumhānaṃ amhāna”nti ca paṭhamādutiyābahuvacanaṃ, “tumhaṃ amha”nti
anya-e0803n:2773_3: pana “tumhaṃ amha”nti ca dutiyekavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, “tumhe amhe”ti ca catutthīchaṭṭhībahuvacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:2773_4: vuttaṃ. Etāni upaparikkhitvā sāṭṭhakathesu suttantesu dissanti ce, gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n:2774_0: Tumhaamhasaddānaṃ pana parapadehi saddhiṃ samāse “maṃdīpā”tiādayo payogā tathāgatādimukhato
anya-e0803n:2774_1: sambhavanti. “Ete gāmaṇi maṃdīpā maṃleṇā maṃsaraṇā”ti hi tathāgatamukhato, “tayyogo
anya-e0803n:2774_2: mayyogo”ti niruttaññumukhato, kābyādāse ca “tvaṃmukhaṃ kamaleneva, tulyaṃ nāññena
anya-e0803n:2774_3: kenacī”ti ca “candena tvaṃmukhaṃ tulya”nti ca kavimukhato.
anya-e0803n:2775_0: Tattha hi ahaṃ dīpo etesanti maṃdīpā, ahaṃ leṇaṃ etesanti maṃleṇā, evaṃ maṃsaraṇā.
anya-e0803n:2775_1: Tumhena yogo tayyogo, tumhasaddena yogo iccevattho. Amhena yogo mayyogo, amhasaddena
anya-e0803n:2775_2: yogo iccevattho. Tava mukhaṃ tvaṃmukhaṃ. Bahuvacanavasenapi nibbacanīyaṃ “tumhākaṃ
anya-e0803n:2775_4: kābyādāse ca “tvaṃmukha”nti dassanato tvaṃvaṇṇo, tvaṃsaro, maṃmukhaṃ, maṃvaṇṇo, maṃsaroādīni
anya-e0803n:2775_5: gahetabbāni. Tattha tvaṃ dīpo etesanti tvaṃdīpā, tumhe vā dīpā etesanti tvaṃdīpā,
anya-e0803n:2775_6: tava vaṇṇo tvaṃvaṇṇo. Mama mukhaṃ maṃmukhaṃ, amhākaṃ vā mukhaṃ maṃmukhanti nibbacanāni.
anya-e0803n:2778: Etthāha “kiṃ ettakameva tumhaamhasaddānaṃ rūpaṃ, udāhu aññampi atthī”ti? Atthi “te me” iccādīni. Yadi evaṃ kasmā padamālā visuṃ na vuttāti? Avacane kāraṇamatthi. Atridaṃ kāraṇaṃ –
anya-e0803n:2779: “Te me vo no”ti rūpāni, parāni padato yato;
anya-e0803n:2780: Tato nāmikapantīsu, na tu vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e0803n:2781_0: Ettha ca mayaṃ me vo nosaddānamatthuddhāro vuccate – tesaddassa pana vuttova. Yasmā
anya-e0803n:2781_1: aṭṭhakathācariyā mayaṃsaddaṭṭhānepi mayāsaddo, mayāsaddaṭṭhānepi ca mayaṃsaddo icceva
anya-e0803n:2781_2: vadanti, tasmā mayampi tatheva vadāma. Mayaṃsaddo “anuññātapaṭiññātā, tevijjāmayamasmubho”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:2781_3: asmadatthe āgato. “Mayaṃ nissāya hemāya, jātā mandosisūpagā”ti ettha paññattiyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2781_4: “Manomayā pītibhakkhā sayaṃpabhā”tiādīsu nibbattiatthe. Bāhirena paccayena vinā manasāva
anya-e0803n:2781_5: nibbattāti manomayā. “Yaṃnūnāhaṃ sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭikaṃ kareyya”ntiādīsu vikāratthe.
anya-e0803n:2781_6: “Dānamayaṃ sīlamaya”ntiādīsu padapūraṇamatte. “Pīṭhaṃ te sovaṇṇamayaṃ uḷāra”nti ettha
anya-e0803n:2781_7: vikāratthe padapūraṇamatte vā daṭṭhabbo. Yadā hi suvaṇṇameva sovaṇṇanti ayamattho,
anya-e0803n:2781_8: tadā suvaṇṇassa vikāro sovaṇṇamayanti vikāratthe mayasaddo daṭṭhabbo. Nibbattiatthotipi
anya-e0803n:2781_9: vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Yadā pana suvaṇṇena nibbattaṃ sovaṇṇanti ayamattho, tadā sovaṇṇameva
anya-e0803n:2782_0: Mesaddo “kicchena me adhigataṃ, halaṃ dāni pakāsitu”ntiādīsu karaṇe āgato. Mayāti
anya-e0803n:2782_1: attho. “Tassa me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu sampadāne, mayhanti
anya-e0803n:2782_2: atthoti vadanti. “Pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva
anya-e0803n:2782_3: sato”tiādīsu sāmiatthe, mamāti atthoti ca vadanti. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0803n:2783: Karaṇe sampadāne ca, sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e0803n:2785_0: Ettha pana ṭhatvā aṭṭhakathācariyehi kate te mesaddānamatthavivaraṇe vinicchayaṃ
anya-e0803n:2785_1: brūma tesamadhippāyappakāsanavasena sotūnaṃ saṃsayasamugghāṭanatthaṃ. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā
anya-e0803n:2785_2: temesaddānaṃ sampadānatthavasena “tuyhaṃ mayha”nti atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇesuṃ, sāmiatthavasena
anya-e0803n:2785_3: pana “tava mamā”ti. Evaṃ yvāyaṃ tehi asaṅkarato niyamo dassito, so sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake
anya-e0803n:2785_4: buddhavacane kuto labbhā. Tathā hi temesaddatthavācakā tuyhaṃ mayhaṃsaddā tava mamasaddā
anya-e0803n:2786_0: Tatrime payogā – idaṃ tuyhaṃ dadāmi. Tuyhaṃ vikappemi. Tuyhaṃ maṃsena medena, matthakena
anya-e0803n:2786_1: ca brāhmaṇa, āhutiṃ paggahessāmi. Esa hi tuyhaṃ pitā narasīho. Tuyhaṃ pana mātā kahanti.
anya-e0803n:2786_2: Mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, na aññesaṃ, mayhameva sāvakānaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, na aññesaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2786_3: Na mayhaṃ bhariyā esā. Assamo sukato mayhaṃ. Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ. Tāta mayhaṃ
anya-e0803n:2786_4: mātu mukhaṃ aññādisaṃ, tumhākaṃ aññādisaṃ. Mayhaṃ sāmiko idāni marissati. Tava dīyate,
anya-e0803n:2786_5: tava silāghate, mama silāghate, pabbajjā mama ruccati. Tava putto. Ubho mātāpitā
anya-e0803n:2787_1: sabbattha anaññaṃ, tatiyāpañcamīnaṃ bahuvacanañcā”ti. Yadi evaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyā
anya-e0803n:2787_2: “namo te purisājañña. Namo te buddha vīratthū’tiādīsu tuyhaṃsaddassa vasena sampadāne,
anya-e0803n:2787_3: tuyhanti hi attho. ‘Kinte vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariya’ntiādīsu sāmiatthe, tavāti
anya-e0803n:2787_4: hi attho”tiādīni vadantā “ayuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ saṃvaṇṇesu”ntipi, “passitabbaṃ na passiṃsū”tipi
anya-e0803n:2787_5: āpajjantīti? Yuttaṃyeva te saṃvaṇṇayiṃsu, passitabbañca passiṃsu. Tathā hi te “saddasatthampi
anya-e0803n:2787_6: ekadesato sāsanānukūlaṃ hotī”ti paresamanukampāya saddasatthato nayaṃ gahetvā sampadānatthavasena
anya-e0803n:2787_7: te mesaddānaṃ “tuyhaṃ mayha”nti atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇayiṃsu, sāmiatthavasena pana “tava
anya-e0803n:2787_8: mamā”ti. Saddasatthe hi catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sabbathā visadisāni, sāsane pana sadisāni.
anya-e0803n:2787_9: Tasmā sāsane sāmaññena pavattāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni saddasatthe visesena pavattehi
anya-e0803n:2787_10: catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpehi samānagatikāni katvā paresamanukampāya sampadānatthe tuyhaṃ
anya-e0803n:2787_11: mayhaṃsaddānaṃ pavattiniyamo, sāmiatthe ca tava mamasaddānaṃ pavattiniyamo dassito.
anya-e0803n:2787_12: Yasmā pana paresamanukampāya ayaṃ niyamo, tasmā karuṇāyevāyaṃparādho, na aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2787_13: Tāya eva hi tehi evaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā katāti.
anya-e0803n:2788_0: Keci panettha evaṃ vadeyyuṃ – nanu ca bho aṭṭhakathācariyehi saddanayaṃ nissāya te
anya-e0803n:2788_1: mesaddānaṃ sāmiatthe vattamānānaṃ “tava mamā”ti atthavacanena “tuyhaṃ maṃsena medena,
anya-e0803n:2788_2: na mayhaṃ bhariyā esā”tiādīsu sāmivisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā
anya-e0803n:2788_3: vattuṃ, tathā saddanayaññeva nissāya te mesaddānaṃ sampadānatthe vattamānānaṃ “tuyhaṃ
anya-e0803n:2788_4: mayha”nti atthavacanena “bhattaṃ tava na ruccati. Pabbajjā mama ruccatī”tiādīsupi
anya-e0803n:2788_5: sampadānavisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattunti? Na sakkā, gāthāsu
anya-e0803n:2788_6: viya cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhānepi tuyhaṃ mayhaṃ tava mamasaddānaṃ aniyamena dvīsu atthesu
anya-e0803n:2788_7: pavattanato. Na hi īdise ṭhāne gāthāyaṃ vā cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhāne vā vibhattivipallāso
anya-e0803n:2788_8: icchitabbo. “Tassa rajjassahaṃ bhīto. Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmī”tiādīsuyeva
anya-e0803n:2789_0: Yadi saddanayaṃ nissāya “tuyhaṃ maṃsena medenā”tiādīsu vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo
anya-e0803n:2789_1: siyā, “brāhmaṇassa piyaputtadānaṃ adāsi. Brāhmaṇassa pitā adāsī”tiādīsupi saddanayaṃ
anya-e0803n:2789_3: satthe visuṃ vacanato. Evañca sati ko dosoti ce? Attheva doso, yasmā dānayoge vā
anya-e0803n:2789_4: namoyoge vā āyādesasahitāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane
anya-e0803n:2789_5: nupalabbhanti, tasmā “brāhmaṇāyā”tiādinā vibhattivipallāsatthavacane ayaṃ doso yadidaṃ
anya-e0803n:2789_6: avijjamānaggahaṇaṃ. Yasmā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu vibhattivipallāsakaraṇaṃ sāvajjaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2789_7: tasmā “tuyhaṃ maṃsena medenā”tiādīsupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n:2790_0: Catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni hi anaññāni dissanti “purisassa adāsi, purisassa dhanaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2790_1: adāsi, brāhmaṇānaṃ santaka”nti. Tathā hi pāvacane sa naṃsaddā sampadānasāmiatthesu
anya-e0803n:2790_2: sāmaññena pavattanti, tappavatti “aggassa dātā medhāvī”tiādīhi payogehi dīpetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2790_3: “Aggassa dātā medhāvī”ti ettha hi “aggassā”ti ayaṃ saddo yadā kriyāpaṭiggahaṇaṃ paṭicca
anya-e0803n:2790_4: sampadānatthe pavattati, tadā “aggassa ratanattayassa dātā”ti atthavasena pavattati.
anya-e0803n:2790_5: Yadā pana kriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūte sāmiatthe pavattati, tadā “aggassa deyyadhammassa
anya-e0803n:2790_6: dātā”ti atthavasena pavattati. Evaṃ sabbathāpi vipallāso tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ na hotīti.
anya-e0803n:2790_7: Tathā saddanayaṃ nissāya “sampadānavacana”nti tumhehi daḷhaṃ gahitassa mayhaṃsaddassa
anya-e0803n:2790_8: sāmiatthavasena paṇṇattiyaṃ dassanato vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ na hoteva. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n:2793_0: Ettha mayhakoti ekāya sakuṇajātiyā nāmaṃ. So hi loluppacāritāya “idampi mayhaṃ, idampi
anya-e0803n:2793_1: mayha”nti kāyati ravatīti mayhakoti vuccati mayhasaddūpapadassa ke re ge saddeti dhātussa vasena.
anya-e0803n:2794_0: Atrāyaṃ padasodhanā – yadi tuyhaṃ mayhaṃsaddā dhuvaṃ sampadānatthe, tava mamasaddā
anya-e0803n:2794_1: ca sāmiatthe bhaveyyuṃ, evaṃ sante lokavohārakusalena sabbaññunā tassa sakuṇassa
anya-e0803n:2794_2: “mayhako”ti paṇṇatti na vattabbā siyā anantogadhasampadānatthattā, antogadhasāmyatthattā
anya-e0803n:2794_3: pana “mamako” icceva paññatti vattabbā siyā. Etthapi “mayhako”ti idaṃ vibhattivipallāsavasena
anya-e0803n:2794_4: vuttanti ce? Na, paṇṇattivisaye vibhattivipariṇāmassa aṭṭhānattā anavakāsattā.
anya-e0803n:2795_0: Apicettha mayhaṃsaddo sarūpato vibhatyantabhāvena tiṭṭhati kasaddena ekapadattūpagamanato,
anya-e0803n:2795_1: evaṃ santepi “mayhako”ti ayaṃ sakuṇavisesavācako saddo paccattavacanabhāve ṭhitoyeva
anya-e0803n:2795_2: īsakaṃ sāmiatthampi jotayati sujampati rājapurisasaddā viya. Imināpi kāraṇena vibhattivipallāso
anya-e0803n:2795_3: tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ na hoti. Iti “mayhako”ti paṇṇattiyaṃ vattamānassa padāvayavabhūtassa
anya-e0803n:2795_4: mayhasaddassa avipallāsavacanalesena tuyhaṃ tava mamasaddesupi vibhattivipallāso
anya-e0803n:2795_5: na icchitabboti siddhaṃ. Tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyehi sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena
anya-e0803n:2795_6: pavattānampi samānānaṃ tuyhaṃ mayhaṃ tava mamasaddānaṃ saddanayaññeva nissāya paresamanukampāya
anya-e0803n:2798: Evaṃ santepi etesaṃ, niyamo natthi pāḷiyaṃ;
anya-e0803n:2799: Koci tesaṃ viseso ca, diṭṭho amhehi taṃ suṇa.
anya-e0803n:2801: “Tuyhaṃ mayha”ntime saddā, te payogā na dullabhā.
anya-e0803n:2803: Sampadāne yahiṃ honti, te payogā panappakā.
anya-e0803n:2806: Sabbāpi imā nītiyo paramasukhumā sududdasā vīrajātinā sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0803n:2807_1: “Kacci vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā”tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati. “Gacchatha bhikkhave
anya-e0803n:2807_2: paṇāmemi vo”tiādīsu upayoge. “Na vo mama santike vatthabba”ntiādīsu karaṇe. “Vanapatthapariyāyaṃ
anya-e0803n:2807_3: vo bhikkhave desessāmī”tiādīsu sampadāne. “Sabbesaṃ vo sāriputtā subhāsita”ntiādīsu
anya-e0803n:2807_4: sāmivacane. “Ye hi voariyā parisuddhā kāyakammantā”tiādīsu padapūraṇamatte. Etthetaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0803n:2811_1: ca vattati. Ayañhi “gāmaṃ no gaccheyyāmā”ti ettha paccatte dissati. “Mā no ajja vikantiṃsu,
anya-e0803n:2811_2: rañño sūdā mahānase”tiādīsu upayoge. “Na no vivāho nāgehi, katapubbo kudācana”ntiādīsu
anya-e0803n:2811_3: karaṇe. “Saṃvibhajetha no rajjenā”tiādīsu sampadāne. “Satthā no bhagavā anuppatto”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:2811_4: sāmivacane. “Na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenā”ti ettha avadhāraṇe. “Abhijānāsi no tvaṃ
anya-e0803n:2811_5: mahārājā”tiādīsu nusaddatthe, pucchāyantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. “Subhāsitaññeva bhāseyya,
anya-e0803n:2811_6: no ca dubbhāsitaṃ bhaṇe”tiādīsu paṭisedhe. “Na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñcī”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:2815: Idāni sabbanāmānaṃ yathārahaṃ saṃkhittena missakapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n:2816_0: Yo so, ye te. Yaṃ taṃ, ye te. Yena tena. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Yā sā, yā tā. Yaṃ
anya-e0803n:2816_1: taṃ, yā tā. Yāya tāya. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ, yāni tāni. Sesaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2817_0: “Eso so, ete te. Ayaṃ so, ime te. So ayaṃ te ime”tiādinā yathāpayogaṃ padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n:2817_1: Tathā hi “yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako. Ete te bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma
anya-e0803n:2817_2: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā. Ayaṃ so sārathi etī”ti evamādayo vicittappayogā
anya-e0803n:2824: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2831_0: Yā hi sā heṭṭhā amhehi eka dviti catuiccetesaṃ saṅkhyāsabbanāmānaṃ nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:2831_1: kathitā, taṃ ṭhapetvā idha asabbanāmānaṃ pañca cha sattādīnaṃ saṅkhyānāmānaṃ nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n:2831_2: bhūdhātumayehi aññehi ca rūpehi yojanatthaṃ vuccate –
anya-e0803n:2832_0: Pañca, pañcahi, pañcabhi, pañcannaṃ, pañcasu. Sattannaṃ vibhattīnaṃ vasena ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2832_1: “Pañca bhūtā, pañca abhibhavitāro, pañca purisā, pañca bhūmiyo, pañca kaññāyo, pañca
anya-e0803n:2832_2: bhūtāni, pañca cittānī”tiādinā sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Cha, chahi, chabhi, channaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2832_3: chasu, chassu itipi. “Chassu loko samuppanno, chassu krubbati santhava”nti hi pāḷi.
anya-e0803n:2832_4: Satta, sattahi, sattabhi, sattannaṃ, sattasu. Aṭṭha, aṭṭhahi, aṭṭhabhi, aṭṭhannaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2832_5: aṭṭhasu. Nava, navahi, navabhi, navannaṃ, navasu. Dasa, dasahi, dasabhi, dasannaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2832_6: dasasu. Evaṃ ekādasa. Dvādasa, bārasa. Terasa, tedasa, teḷasa. Catuddasa, cuddasa.
anya-e0803n:2832_7: Pañcadasa, pannarasa. Soḷasa. Sattarasa. Aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhārasahi, aṭṭhārasabhi, aṭṭhārasannaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2833_0: Ekūnavīsati, ekūnavīsaṃ iccādipi. Ekūnavīsāya, ekūnavīsāyaṃ, ekūnavīsa bhikkhū tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0803n:2833_1: ekūnavīsaṃ bhikkhū passati, evaṃ “kaññāyo cittānī”ti ca ādinā yojetabbaṃ. Ekūnavīsāya
anya-e0803n:2833_2: bhikkhūhi dhammo desito, ekūnavīsāya kaññāhi kataṃ, ekūnavīsāya cittehi kataṃ, ekūnavīsāya
anya-e0803n:2833_3: bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ deti, ekūnavīsāya kaññānaṃ dhanaṃ deti, ekūnavīsāya cittānaṃ ruccati,
anya-e0803n:2833_4: ekūnavīsāya bhikkhūhi apeti. Evaṃ kaññāhi cittehi. Ekūnavīsāya bhikkhūnaṃ santakaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2833_5: evaṃ kaññānaṃ cittānaṃ. Ekūnavīsāyaṃ bhikkhūsu patiṭṭhitaṃ. Evaṃ “kaññāsu cittesū”ti
anya-e0803n:2834_0: Vīsati, vīsatiṃ, vīsatiyā, vīsatiyaṃ. Vīsa, vīsaṃ, vīsāya, vīsāyaṃ. Tathā ekavīsa
anya-e0803n:2834_1: dvāvīsa bāvīsa tevīsa catuvīsa iccādīsupi. Tiṃsa, tiṃsaṃ, tiṃsāya, tiṃsāyaṃ. Cattālīsa,
anya-e0803n:2834_2: cattālīsaṃ, cattālīsāya, cattālīsāyaṃ. Cattārīsa iccādipi. Paññāsa, paññāsaṃ, paññāsāya,
anya-e0803n:2834_3: paññāsāyaṃ. Paṇṇāsa, paṇṇāsaṃ, paṇṇāsāya, paṇṇāsāyaṃ. Saṭṭhi, saṭṭhiṃ, saṭṭhiyā,
anya-e0803n:2834_4: saṭṭhiyaṃ. Sattati, sattatiṃ, sattatiyā, sattatiyaṃ. Sattari iccādipi. Asīti, asītiṃ,
anya-e0803n:2834_5: asītiyā, asītiyaṃ. Navuti. Navutiṃ, navutiyā, navutiyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2835_0: Itthañca aññathāpi saṅkhyārūpāni gahetabbāni. Ekūnavīsehi, ekūnavīsānaṃ, ekūnavīsesu.
anya-e0803n:2835_1: “Channavutīna”nti ca ādināpi saṅkhyārūpānaṃ katthaci dassanato keci saddasatthavidū
anya-e0803n:2835_3: ānavuti ekavacanantā itthiliṅgā”ti vadanti. Keci panāhu –
anya-e0803n:2838_0: Ettha dvivacanaṃ chaḍḍetabbaṃ buddhavacane tadabhāvato. Sabbesampi ca tesaṃ yathāvuttavacanaṃ
anya-e0803n:2838_1: kiñci pāḷippadesaṃ patvā yujjati, kiñci pana patvā na yujjati vīsativīsaṃtiṃsaṃiccādīnañhi
anya-e0803n:2838_2: saṅkhatthānaṃ saddānaṃ bahuvacanappayogavasenapi pāḷiyaṃ dassanato, kaccāyane ca
anya-e0803n:2839_0: Atthinatthisaddā hi nipātattā ekattepi bahuttepi pavattanti “puttā matthi dhanammatthi.
anya-e0803n:2839_1: Natthi attasamaṃ pemaṃ. Natthi samaṇabrāhmaṇā”tiādīsu. Aliṅgattepi panetesaṃ katthaci
anya-e0803n:2839_2: itthiliṅgabhāvo diṭṭho. Abhidhamme hi dhammasenāpatinā anudhammacakkavattinā vohārakusalena
anya-e0803n:2839_3: vohārakusalasādhakena “atthiyā nava. Natthiyā navā”ti ekavacanantaṃ itthiliṅgarūpaṃ
anya-e0803n:2839_4: dassitaṃ, tasmā vīsativīsatimiccādīnampi yathāsambhavaṃ yathāpāvacanañca itthiliṅgabhāve
anya-e0803n:2840_0: Tattheke “hetuyā adhipatiyā”ti ca idaṃ liṅgavipallāsavasena gahetabbaṃ maññanti.
anya-e0803n:2840_2: iccevattho. Atha vā “hetuyā adhipatiyā”ti dvayamidaṃ itthiliṅgarūpapaṭibhāgaṃ pulliṅgarūpanti
anya-e0803n:2840_4: vijjamānattā, “atthiyā natthiyā”ti idaṃ pana liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttanti na gahetabbaṃ
anya-e0803n:2840_5: atthi natthisaddānaṃ aliṅgabhedattā. Na hi atthi natthisaddā tīsu liṅgesu ekasmimpi
anya-e0803n:2840_6: antogadhā. Etesu hi atthisaddo ākhyātanipātavasena bhijjati “atthi santi saṃvijjati.
anya-e0803n:2840_7: Atthikhīrā brāhmaṇī”tiādīsu, natthisaddo pana nipātoyeva. Iccevaṃ atthi natthisaddānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2840_8: nipātānañca liṅgavacanavasena kathanaṃ yujjati itthiliṅgādivasena ekattādivasena
anya-e0803n:2842: Vacanesu ca sabbesu, yaṃ na byeti tadabyaya”nti.
anya-e0803n:2843_0: Ettha siyā – nanu ca bho “atthi sakkā labbhā iccete paṭhamāyā”ti vacanato atthisaddo
anya-e0803n:2843_1: paṭhamāya vibhattiyā yutto, evaṃ sante kasmā “sadisaṃ tīsu liṅgesū”tiādi vuttanti?
anya-e0803n:2843_2: Saccaṃ atthisaddo paṭhamāya vibhattiyā yutto, tathā natthisaddo atthisaddassa vacanalesena
anya-e0803n:2843_3: gahetabbattā yugaḷapadattā ca. Idaṃ pana “sadisaṃ tīsu liṅgesū”tiādivacanaṃ upasagganipātasaṅkhāte
anya-e0803n:2843_4: asaṅkhyāsadde sandhāya vuttaṃ, na ekekamasaṅkhyāsaddaṃ sandhāya. Tathā hi “asaṅkhyā”ti
anya-e0803n:2843_5: ca “abyayā”ti ca laddhavohāresu upasagganipātesu upasaggā sabbepi sabbavibhattivacanakā.
anya-e0803n:2843_6: Nipātānaṃ pana ekacce paṭhamādīsu yathārahaṃ vibhattiyuttā, ekacce avibhattiyuttā.
anya-e0803n:2843_7: Tattha ye yadaggena vibhattiyuttā, te tadaggena tabbacanakā. Upasagganipātesu hi
anya-e0803n:2843_8: paccekaṃ “idaṃ nāma vacana”nti laddhuṃ na sakkā, sabbasaṅgāhakavasena pana “sadisaṃ
anya-e0803n:2843_9: tīsu liṅgesū”tiādi pubbācariyehi vuttaṃ. Kaccāyanācariyenapi imamevatthaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0803n:2843_10: “sabbāsamāvusopasagganipātādīhi cā”ti vuttaṃ. Na hi āvusosaddato sabbāpi vibhattiyo
anya-e0803n:2843_11: labbhanti, atha kho ālapanatthavācakattā ekavacanikaanekavacanikā paṭhamāvibhattiyoyeva
anya-e0803n:2844_0: Keci pana sabbehipi nipātehi sabbavibhattilopaṃ vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. “Atthi
anya-e0803n:2844_1: sakkā labbhā iccete paṭhamāya. Divā bhiyyo namo iccete paṭhamāya ca dutiyāya cā”tiādivacanato,
anya-e0803n:2844_2: padapūraṇamattānañca avibhattiyuttānaṃ atha khalu vata vatha iccādīnaṃ nipātānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2844_3: vacanato. Etthāpi siyā “nanu ca bho avibhattiyuttānampi nipātānaṃ sambhavato atthi
anya-e0803n:2844_4: natthisaddānaṃ avibhattiko niddeso kātabbo, atha kimatthaṃ ‘atthiyā nava, natthiyā
anya-e0803n:2844_5: navā’ti savibhattiko niddeso kato”ti? Sabbathā vibhattīhi vinā atthassa niddisitumasakkuṇeyyattāti.
anya-e0803n:2845_0: Yadi evaṃ “atthi sakkā labbhā iccete paṭhamāyā”ti vacanato atthi natthisaddā luttāya
anya-e0803n:2845_1: paṭhamāya vibhattiyā vasena paṭhamāvibhattikāyeva niddisitabbā, evamakatvā kasmā
anya-e0803n:2845_2: sattamyantavasena “atthiyā natthiyā”ti niddiṭṭhāti? Saccaṃ, atthi natthisaddā paṭhamāvibhattiyuttāyeva
anya-e0803n:2845_3: niddisitabbā, tathāpi “atthipaccaye nava, natthipaccaye navā”ti etassatthassa paridīpane
anya-e0803n:2845_4: paṭhamāya okāso natthi, sattamiyāyeva pana atthi, tasmā “atthiyā nava, natthiyā navā”ti
anya-e0803n:2845_5: vuttaṃ. Iti atthiyānatthiyāsaddānaṃ sattamyantabhāve siddheyeva tatiyācatutthīpañcamīchaṭṭhiyantabhāvopi
anya-e0803n:2845_6: siddhoyeva hoti. Tasmā “atthibhāvo atthitā”tiādīsupi atthiyā bhāvo atthibhāvo, natthiyā
anya-e0803n:2845_7: bhāvo natthibhāvo, atthiyā bhāvo atthitābhiādinā samāsataddhitaviggaho avassamicchitabbo.
anya-e0803n:2845_8: Yadidamamhehi vuttaṃ, taṃ “pāḷiyā virujjhatī”ti na vattabbaṃ pāḷinayānusārena vuttattāti.
anya-e0803n:2846_0: Evaṃ hotu, kasmā bho “atthiyā, natthiyā”ti itthiliṅganiddeso kato, nanu nipātopasaggā
anya-e0803n:2846_1: aliṅgabhedāti? Saccaṃ, idaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ atīva sukhumaṃ, tathāpi pubbācariyānubhāvaññeva
anya-e0803n:2846_2: nissāya vinicchayaṃ brūma. Yathā hi vīsatiiccādīnaṃ saṅkhyāsaddānaṃ sarūpato adabbavācakattepi
anya-e0803n:2846_3: dabbavācakānaṃ latāmatirattiitthī yāguvadhūsaddānaṃ viya itthiliṅgabhāvo saddasatthavidūhi
anya-e0803n:2846_4: anumato, evaṃ adabbavācakattepi atthi natthisaddānaṃ katthaci itthiliṅgabhāvo saddhammavidūhi
anya-e0803n:2846_5: anumato. Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati “atthiyā nava, natthiyā navā”ti. Atha vā “atthiyā,
anya-e0803n:2846_6: natthiyā”ti imāni liṅgabhāvavinimuttāni sattamiyantāni nipātapadānītipi gahetabbāni,
anya-e0803n:2846_7: na ettha codetabbaṃ, evarūpāni nipātapadāni pubbācariyehi vuttāni na santi, tasmā
anya-e0803n:2847_0: Pāvacanasmiñhi garūhi aniddiṭṭhānipi anekavihitāni nipātapadāni sandissanti, nāpi
anya-e0803n:2847_1: “hetuyā, adhipatiyā, atthiyā, natthiyā”ti evamādīsu “apasaddā ime”ti virodho uppādetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2847_2: Na hi acinteyyānubhāvena pāramitāpuññena nipphannena anāvaraṇañāṇena sabbaṃ ñeyyamaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0803n:2847_3: hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya paccakkhaṃ katvā passato buddhassa vacane aññesaṃ vācāvippalāpo
anya-e0803n:2847_4: avassaṃ labbhatīti. Nanu ca bho “hetuyā, adhipatiyā, atthiyā, natthiyā”ti ca idaṃ
anya-e0803n:2847_5: sāriputtattheravacanaṃ tena nikkhittattā. Tathāgatena hi tāvatiṃsabhapane desitakāle
anya-e0803n:2847_6: imāni padāni na santi, evaṃ sante kasmā “buddhavacana”nti vadathāti? Buddhavacanaṃyeva
anya-e0803n:2847_7: nāma. Āyasmato hi sāriputtassa tathāgatena nayo dinno, tenapi pabhinnapaṭisambhidena
anya-e0803n:2847_8: satthukappena aggasāvakena satthu santikā nayaṃ labhitvā byañjanaṃ suropitaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e0803n:2847_9: Sabbepi hi paṭisambhidappattā ariyā dunniruttiṃ na vadanti niruttipabhedasmiṃ sukusalattā,
anya-e0803n:2847_10: tasmā aññesamavisayo esa ariyānaṃ vohāroti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2849_0: Sataṃ, satāni, satā. Sataṃ, satāni, sate. Satena, satehi, satebhi. Satassa, satānaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2849_1: Satā, satasmā, satamhā, satehi, satebhi. Satassa, satānaṃ. Sate, satasmiṃ, satamhi,
anya-e0803n:2849_2: satesu. Evaṃ sahassaṃ, sahassānīti yojetabbaṃ. Dasasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ dasasatasahassanti
anya-e0803n:2849_3: etthāpi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ panettha payogo “sataṃ bhikkhū, sataṃ itthiyo, sataṃ cittāni.
anya-e0803n:2849_4: Bhikkhūnaṃ sataṃ, itthīnaṃ sataṃ, cittānaṃ sataṃ. Sahassādīsupi eseva nayo. Itthañca
anya-e0803n:2849_5: aññathāpi saddarūpāni bhavanti. Koṭi, koṭī, koṭiyo. Rattinayena ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2851: Saṅkhyā tāva sā saṅkhyeyya-ppadhānāti garū vaduṃ.
anya-e0803n:2852: Vīsatito yāva satā, yā saṅkhyā tāva sā pana;
anya-e0803n:2855: Vīsato yāva koṭiyā, saṅkhyā tāva hi sā khalu;
anya-e0803n:2857: Tathā hi “asīti koṭiyo hitvā, hiraññassāpi pabbaji”nti, “khīṇāsavā vītamalā, samiṃsu satakoṭiyo”ti ca pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0803n:2858_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne sabbesaṃ saṅkhyāsaddarūpānaṃ pākaṭīkaraṇena viññūnaṃ sukhumañāṇapaṭilābhatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:2858_1: sāṭṭhakathaṃ udānapāḷippadesaṃ aññañca pāḷippadesamaṭṭhakathāvacanañca āharitvā dassayissāmi –
anya-e0803n:2859_0: “Yesaṃ kho visākhe sataṃ piyāni, sataṃ tesaṃ dukkhāni, yesaṃ navuti piyāni, navuti
anya-e0803n:2859_1: tesaṃ dukkhāni. Yesaṃ asīti…pe… yesaṃ sattati. Yesaṃ saṭṭhi. Yesaṃ paññāsaṃ, yesaṃ
anya-e0803n:2859_2: cattārīsaṃ, yesaṃ tiṃsaṃ. Yesaṃ kho visākhe vīsaṃ piyāni, vīsati tesaṃ dukkhāni.
anya-e0803n:2859_3: Yesaṃ dasa. Yesaṃ nava. Yesaṃ aṭṭha. Yesaṃ satta. Yesaṃ cha. Yesaṃ pañca. Yesaṃ cattāri.
anya-e0803n:2859_4: Yesaṃ tīṇi. Yesaṃ dve. Yesaṃ ekaṃ piyaṃ, tesaṃ ekaṃ dukkha”nti.
anya-e0803n:2860_0: Tattha sataṃ piyānīti sataṃ piyāyitabbavatthūni. “Sataṃ piya”ntipi keci paṭhanti.
anya-e0803n:2860_1: Ettha ca yasmā ekato paṭṭhāya yāva dasa, tāva saṅkhyāsaṅkhyeyyappadhānā, tasmā “yesaṃ
anya-e0803n:2860_2: dasa piyāni, dasa tesaṃ dukkhānī”tiādinā pāḷi āgatā. Keci pana “yesaṃ dasa piyānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2860_3: dasa tesaṃ dukkhāna”ntiādinā paṭhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Yasmā pana vīsatito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0803n:2860_4: yāva sataṃ, tāva saṅkhyeyyappadhānā saṅkhyāppadhānā ca, tasmā tatthāpi saṅkhyeyyappadhānaṃyeva
anya-e0803n:2860_5: gahetvā “yesaṃ kho visākhe sataṃ piyāni, sataṃ tesaṃ dukkhānī”tiādinā pāḷi āgatā.
anya-e0803n:2860_6: Sabbesampi ca yesaṃ ekaṃ piyaṃ, ekaṃ tesaṃ dukkhanti pāṭho, na pana dukkhassāti.
anya-e0803n:2860_7: Ekasmiñhi padakkame ekarasāva bhagavato desanā hotīti. Tasmā yathāvuttanayāva pāḷi
anya-e0803n:2861: Idāni añño pāḷippadeso aṭṭhakathāpāṭhappadeso ca nīyate –
anya-e0803n:2865_0: Pāḷi. Ettha “sataṃ hatthī”tiādīni visesitāni, “sahassānī”ti visesanaṃ, tasmā sataṃsaddaṃ
anya-e0803n:2865_1: sahassasaddena yojetvā “hatthī”tiādīni pana upapadaṃ katvā attho gahetabbo. Hatthī
anya-e0803n:2865_2: sataṃ sahassāni. Assā sataṃ sahassāni. Assatarīrathā sataṃ sahassāni. Āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalā
anya-e0803n:2865_3: kaññā sataṃ sahassāni. Idaṃ saṅkhyeyyappadhānavasenatthagahaṇaṃ. Saṅkhyāppadhānavasena
anya-e0803n:2865_4: pana ayampi attho gahetabbo “hatthīnaṃ satasahassaṃ, assānaṃ satasahassaṃ, assatarīrathānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2865_5: satasahassaṃ, āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalānaṃ kaññānaṃ satasahassa”nti. Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu
anya-e0803n:2865_6: ṭhānesu netabbo. “Yojanānaṃ satānucco, himavā pañca pabbato”ti ayamaṭṭhakathāpāṭho.
anya-e0803n:2865_7: Ettha “pañcā”ti saddaṃ satasaddena saddhiṃ yojetvā “sippikānaṃ sataṃ natthī”ti ettha
anya-e0803n:2865_8: viya himavā pabbato yojanānaṃ pañca satāni uccoti saṅkhyāppadhānavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2865_9: “Pañca satānī”ti ca addhuno accantasaṃyogavasena upayogavacanaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi
anya-e0803n:2865_10: īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo. Satamiti saddo “sataṃ homi, sahassaṃ homī”tiādīsu ekavacano.
anya-e0803n:2865_11: “Athetthekasataṃ khatyā, anuyantā yasassino”tiādīsu bahuvacano. Evaṃ sahassādīnampi
anya-e0803n:2865_12: ekavacanabahuvacanatā labbhati. Tathā hi “bhiyyo naṃ satasahassaṃ, yakkhānaṃ payirupāsatī”ti
anya-e0803n:2865_13: ettha “satasahassa”nti ekavacanaṃ. “Parosahassaṃ kho panassa puttā bhavissantī”ti
anya-e0803n:2868_0: Pāḷi. Ettha “kappe ca satasahasse caturo ca asaṅkhiyeti sāmiatthe upayogabahuvacanaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2868_1: tasmā “mahākappānaṃ satasahassānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhiyānaṃ matthake”ti attho gahetabbo,
anya-e0803n:2868_3: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2870: Etthantare yaṃ caritaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ bodhipācana”nti
anya-e0803n:2871_1: kappasaddasambandhena cāyaṃ pulliṅganiddeso upayoganiddeso ca. Samānādhikaraṇañhi
anya-e0803n:2871_2: idaṃ kappasaddena. “Caturo ca asaṅkhiye”ti acchantasaṃyogavasena upayogabahuvacanāni.
anya-e0803n:2871_3: Kassa pana asaṅkhiyeti? Aññassa avuttattā kappassa ca vuttattā pakaraṇato “kappāna”nti
anya-e0803n:2871_4: ayamattho viññāyateva. Na hi vuttaṃ vajjetvā avuttassa kassaci gahaṇaṃ yuttanti.
anya-e0803n:2871_5: Casaddo sampiṇḍanattho “mahākappānaṃ caturo asaṅkhyeyye satasahasse ca mahākappe”ti.
anya-e0803n:2871_6: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2872_0: “Ghaṭānekasahassāni, kumbhīnañca satā bahū”ti pāḷi. Ettha ghaṭāti ghaṭānaṃ. Sāmiatthe
anya-e0803n:2872_1: hi idaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. “Ghaṭānaṃ anekasahassāni” iccevattho. Kumbhīnañca satā bahūti
anya-e0803n:2872_2: anekāni ca kumbhīnaṃ satāni. Ettha nikāralopo daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2875_0: Pāḷi. Ettha dasavīsasahassānanti dasasahassānaṃ vīsasahassānañca. Dhammābhisamayoti
anya-e0803n:2875_1: catusaccappaṭivedho. Ekadvinnanti sīsamattakathanaṃ, tena “ekassa ceva dvinnañca
anya-e0803n:2875_2: tiṇṇaṃ catunnaṃ…pe… dasanna”ntiādinā nayena asaṅkhyeyyoti attho. Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi
anya-e0803n:2878_0: Pāḷi. Ettha cattāri satasahassānīti idaṃ liṅgabhedavasena “chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā”ti
anya-e0803n:2878_1: imehi dvīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇaṃ. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu asaṅkhyeyya vācakopi saddo
anya-e0803n:2878_2: napuṃsakova hoti, tasmā “cattāri satasahassānī”ti ca “chaḷabhiññā”ti ca “mahiddhikā”ti
anya-e0803n:2878_3: ca etaṃ padattayaṃ samānādhikaraṇaṃ. Atha vā chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikāti chaḷabhiññānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2878_4: mahaddhikānanti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imasmiṃ panatthe “cattāri satasahassānī”ti
anya-e0803n:2878_5: ayaṃ saṅkhyāvacano bhavati. “Tīṇi satasahassāni, nāriyo samalaṅkatā”tiādīsupi ayaṃ
anya-e0803n:2878_6: nayo netabbo. “Tā ca satta satā bhariyā, dāsyo satta satāni cā”ti pāḷi. Ettha satāti
anya-e0803n:2878_7: “satānī”ti napuṃsakavasena gahetabbaṃ, na itthiliṅgavasena. “Satā”ti hi “pañca cittā
anya-e0803n:2878_8: vipākā”tiādīni viya napuṃsakarūpaṃ. Itthiliṅgabhūtā hi satasaddo natthi, tathā pulliṅgabhūto.
anya-e0803n:2878_9: Yadi ca dviliṅgo satasaddo siyā, evañca sati “puriso, kaññā”ti ca okārantapulliṅgaākārantitthirūpehipibhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2878_10: Rūpadvayampi satasaddassa natthi, tena ñāyati “satasaddo ekantanapuṃsako”ti.
anya-e0803n:2879_0: Nanu ca bho “tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā”ti ettha satasaddo itthiliṅgo hutvā dissatīti?
anya-e0803n:2879_1: Na, napuṃsakoyevāti. Nanu ca bho devatāsaddena samānādhikaraṇoti? Saccaṃ samānādhikaraṇo,
anya-e0803n:2879_2: tathāpi napuṃsakoyeva. Īdisesu hi saṅkhyāvisayesu samānādhikaraṇabhāvo appamāṇo.
anya-e0803n:2879_3: Tathā hi “pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciravāsino ahesu”nti
anya-e0803n:2879_4: napuṃsakaliṅgena pulliṅgassa samānādhikaraṇatā dissati, tasmā “tā devatā sattasatā
anya-e0803n:2879_6: datvā”tiādīsupi satasaddo napuṃsakoyeva. Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2880_1: vā “bhikkhūnaṃ navutikoṭisahassehī”ti vā saṅkhyeyyasaṅkhyāpadhānavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2880_2: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2881_0: “Satasahassavassāni, āyu tassa mahesino”ti pāḷi. Ettha “satasahassavassānī”ti kālassa
anya-e0803n:2881_1: accantasaṃyogavasena upayogavacanaṃ. Tathā “dasavassasahassāni, agāra’majjha so vasī”ti
anya-e0803n:2881_2: pāḷiyampi. Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2882_0: “Ito satasahassamhi, kappe uppajji nāyako”ti pāḷi, “ekanavute ito kappe”ti pāḷi ca.
anya-e0803n:2882_1: Ettha satasahassamhi kappeti satasahassānaṃ kappānaṃ matthake. Ekanavute kappeti
anya-e0803n:2882_2: ekanavutiyā kappānaṃ matthaketi bhummavacanassa sāmibhummavacanavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2882_3: Tathā hi “bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti ettha bhummavacanassa “bhagavato santike”ti
anya-e0803n:2882_4: sāmibhummavacanavasena attho gahito. Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2884: Nevamhākaṃ bhayaṃ koci, vane vāḷesu vijjatī”ti
anya-e0803n:2885_0: Pāḷi. Ayametassā attho – tattha vane vāḷānaṃ sahassāni ca satāni ca nahutāni ca yadi
anya-e0803n:2885_1: vijjanti. Atha vā sahassāni satānīti satasahassāni, vāḷānaṃ satasahassāni ca nahutāni
anya-e0803n:2885_2: ca yadi vijjanti, evaṃ vijjantesupi vāḷesu kocīti kvaci. Kocisaddo hi “ko te balaṃ
anya-e0803n:2885_3: mahārājā”ti ettha kosaddo viya kvasaddatthe vattati, nimittatthe cāyaṃ niddeso. Tena
anya-e0803n:2885_4: “koci kvaci kismiñci vāḷe ekassapi vāḷamigassa kāraṇā nevamhākaṃ bhayaṃ vijjatī”ti
anya-e0803n:2885_5: attho gahetabbo. Atha vā kocīti kiñci appamattakampi. Ettha pana “vāḷesū”ti nimittatthe
anya-e0803n:2885_6: bhummaṃ. Vāḷānaṃ kāraṇā appamattakampi amhākaṃ bhayaṃ na vijjatīti. Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi
anya-e0803n:2888_0: Aṭṭhakathāpāṭho. Ettha yasmā saddato samānavibhattiliṅgavacanānaṃ padānaṃ asamānavibhattiliṅgavacanānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2888_1: vā atthato pana samānānaṃ dūre ṭhitānampi ekasambandho hoti, itaresaṃ samīpe ṭhitānampi
anya-e0803n:2888_3: idaṃ pana “satasahassānī”timinā sambandhitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2891_2: cā”ti imāni “duve cattārī”ti imehi visesitabbattā “dvisatasahassaṃ catunahuta”nti
anya-e0803n:2891_4: saṅkhyāsaddehi samānādhikaraṇatā pubbācariyehi na vuttā. Yasmā pana yathā “duve puthujjanā
anya-e0803n:2891_5: vuttā. Satasahassaṃ bhikkhū”tiādīsu samānādhikaraṇatā labbhati dabbavācakattā visesitabbapadānaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2891_6: na tathā “duve satasahassānī”tiādīsu adabbavācakattā visesitabbapadānaṃ, tasmā īdisesu
anya-e0803n:2891_7: ṭhānesu samānādhikaraṇatā na icchitabbā yuttiyā abhāvato. Yadi evaṃ “kusalā, rūpaṃ,
anya-e0803n:2891_8: cakkhumā”tiādīnaṃ viya imesamaññamaññasambandharahitā siyāti? Na, visesanavisesitabbabhāvena
anya-e0803n:2891_9: gahitattā. Yajjevaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvo laddhabboti? Na, niyamābhāvato. Ekantena
anya-e0803n:2891_10: hi guṇaguṇīnaṃyeva visesanavisesitabbānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvo, na itaresaṃ visesanavisesitabbattepi.
anya-e0803n:2892_0: Tattha “ettaka”nti pamāṇavacanaṃ. “Bahalattenā”ti visesane tatiyā. Ubhayena imamatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:2892_1: dasseti “ayaṃ vasundharā bahalattena yojanānaṃ duve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni
anya-e0803n:2892_2: ca ettakaṃ saṅkhātā”ti. “Ettaka”nti padassa ca “duve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni
anya-e0803n:2892_3: cā”ti imehi vā “vasundharā”ti iminā vā samānādhikaraṇatā na icchitabbā. Ettakanti
anya-e0803n:2892_4: hi bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, yaṃ saddasatthe kriyāvisesananti vadanti. Tassa “ettakena pamāṇena”iccevattho.
anya-e0803n:2892_5: Apica “duve satasahassāni cattāri na hutāni cā”ti imesampi “vasundharā”ti iminā samānādhikaraṇatā
anya-e0803n:2892_6: na icchitabbā “bhikkhūnaṃ sata”nti ettha satasaddassa viya saṅkhyāvacanamattattā.
anya-e0803n:2892_7: Tathā hi “ettaka”nti vuttaṃ. “Saṅkhātā”ti pana “aya”nti ca imesaṃ “vasundharā”ti
anya-e0803n:2892_8: iminā samānādhikaraṇatā labbhati. Sabbopāyaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2894: Cha piṅgalā pannarasa, haliddā tā catuddasā”ti
anya-e0803n:2895: Pāḷi. Ettha cha piṅgalā pannarasāti cha ca pannarasa cāti ekavīsati piṅgalā rājiyoti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2898: Asīti dasa eko ca, indanāmā mahabbalā”ti
anya-e0803n:2899: Pāḷi. Ettha pana “ekanavutī”ti vattabbe “asīti dasa eko cā”ti vuttaṃ. Vicitrasaddaracanañhi pāvacanaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2901: Yesaṃ samaṃ na passāmi, kevalaṃ mahi’maṃ cara”nti
anya-e0803n:2902_0: Pāḷi. Ettha “purisānaṃ tiṃsasahassāni navuti ca satāni tiṃsa nāvutyo”ti vuccanti.
anya-e0803n:2902_1: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne tiṃsasaddato sahassasaddassa navutisaddato ca satasaddassa lopaṃ
anya-e0803n:2902_2: katvā “tiṃsa nāvutyo”ti vuttanti na gahetabbaṃ. Evañhi gahaṇe sati yattha katthacipi
anya-e0803n:2902_3: edisī saddaracanā kātabbā siyā, katāya ca edisāya saddaracanāya atthāvagamo vinā
anya-e0803n:2902_4: upadesena suṇantānaṃ na siyā, tasmā nevaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Evaṃ pana gahetabbaṃ – “tiṃsa
anya-e0803n:2902_5: nāvutyo”ti idaṃ lokasaṅketarūḷhaṃ vacanaṃ, saṅketarūḷhassa pana vacanassattho yasmā
anya-e0803n:2902_6: gahitapubbasaṅketehi sutvā ñāyate, na upadesato, tasmā brahmadattena raññā vuttakālepi
anya-e0803n:2902_7: satthārā taṃ kathaṃ āharitvā vuttakālepi sabbe manussā vināpi upadesena vacanatthaṃ
anya-e0803n:2903: Tiṃsañceva sahassāni, navuti ca satāni tu;
anya-e0803n:2905: Yasmā pāvacane santi, nayā ceva acintiyā;
anya-e0803n:2908: Upadesaṃ sadā gaṇhe, garuṃ sammā upaṭṭhahaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2915: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
anya-e0803n:2925: Tasmā tāva bhūdhātuto pavattassa bhūtasaddassa atthuddhāro nīyate –
anya-e0803n:2931_1: dissati. “Bhūtamidanti bhikkhave samanupassathā”tiādīsu hi ayaṃ pañcakkhandhesu dissati.
anya-e0803n:2931_2: “Yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatānī”ti ettha amanusse. “Cattāro kho bhikkhu mahābhūtā hetū”ti
anya-e0803n:2931_3: ettha dhātūsu. “Bhūtasmiṃ pācittiya”ntiādīsu vijjamāne. “Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto”ti
anya-e0803n:2931_4: ettha khīṇāsave. “Sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke samussaya”nti ettha satte. “Bhūtagāmapātabyatāyā”ti
anya-e0803n:2931_5: ettha rukkhādīsūti. Mūlapariyāyasuttaṭṭhakathāya vacanaṃ idaṃ. Ṭīkāyamādisaddena
anya-e0803n:2931_6: uppādādīni gayhare. Vuttañhetaṃ – “jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhata”ntiādīsu bhūtasaddo uppāde
anya-e0803n:2931_7: dissati. Saupasaggo pana “pabhūtamariyo pakaroti puñña”ntiādīsu vipule. “Yebhuyyena
anya-e0803n:2931_9: “Abhibhūto māro vijito saṅgāmo”tiādīsu vidhamane. “Parābhūtarūpokho ayaṃ acelo pāthikaputto”tiādīsu
anya-e0803n:2933_0: Bhavituṃ, ubbhavituṃ, samubbhavituṃ, pabhavituṃ, parābhavituṃ, atibhavituṃ, sambhavituṃ,
anya-e0803n:2933_1: vibhavituṃ, bhotuṃ, sambhotuṃ, vibhotuṃ, pātubhavituṃ, pātubbhavituṃ vā, pātubhotuṃ.
anya-e0803n:2934_0: Paribhotuṃ paribhavituṃ, abhibhotuṃ abhibhavituṃ, adhibhotuṃ adhibhavituṃ, atibhotuṃ
anya-e0803n:2934_1: atibhavituṃ, anubhotuṃ anubhavituṃ, samanubhotuṃ samanubhavituṃ, abhisambhotuṃ abhisambhavituṃ.
anya-e0803n:2934_2: Imāni sakammakāni tumantapadāni, sabbānetāni suddhakattari bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2935: “Bhāvetuṃ, pabhāvetuṃ, sambhāvetuṃ, vibhāvetuṃ, paribhāvetuṃ”iccevamādīni hetukattari tumantapadāni, sabbānipi hetukattari tumantapadāni sakammakāniyeva bhavanti. Uddesoyaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2936_0: Tatra samānatthapadesu ekamevādipadaṃ gahetvā niddeso kātabbo – bhavitunti hotuṃ
anya-e0803n:2936_1: vijjituṃ paññāyituṃ sarūpaṃ labhituṃ. Ettha vuttanayānusārena sesānampi tumantānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2936_2: niddeso vitthāretabbo, sabbāni tumantapadāni catutthiyatthe vattanti “tvaṃ mama cittamaññāya,
anya-e0803n:2936_3: nettaṃ yācitumāgato”ti ettha viya. Yācitunti hi yācanatthāyāti attho. Tasmā bhavituntiādīnampi
anya-e0803n:2936_4: “bhavanatthāyā”ti vā “bhavanattha”nti vā “bhavanāyā”ti vā ādinā attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n:2936_5: Apica “nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato”ti ettha “daṭṭhu”nti padassa “disvā”ti atthadassanato
anya-e0803n:2936_6: yathārahaṃ tumantāni tvāsaddantapadatthavasenapi gahetabbāni. Etāni ca nipātapadesu
anya-e0803n:2936_7: saṅgahaṃgacchanti. Vuttañhi niruttipiṭake nipātapadaparicchede “tuṃ iti catutthiyā”ti.
anya-e0803n:2936_8: Tatrāyamattho “tuṃ iti etadanto nipāto catutthiyā atthe vattatī”ti.
anya-e0803n:2939_0: Bhavitvā, bhavitvāna, bhavituna, bhaviya, bhaviyāna. Ubbhavitvā, ubbhavitvāna, ubbhavituna,
anya-e0803n:2939_1: ubbhaviya, ubbhaviyāna. Esa nayo “samubbhavitvā, parābhavitvā, sambhavitvā, vibhavitvā,
anya-e0803n:2939_2: pātubbhavitvā”ti etthāpi. Imāni akammakāni ussukkanatthāni tvādiyantapadāni.
anya-e0803n:2940_0: Bhutvā, bhutvāna, paribhavitvā, paribhavitvāna, paribhavituna, paribhaviya, paribhaviyāna,
anya-e0803n:2940_1: paribhuyya. Abhibhavitvā, abhibhavitvāna, abhibhavituna, abhibhaviya, abhibhaviyāna,
anya-e0803n:2940_2: abhibhuyya. Esa nayo “adhibhavitvā, atibhavitvā, anubhavitvā”ti etthāpi. Idañcettha
anya-e0803n:2940_3: nidassanaṃ. “Tamavoca rājā anubhaviyāna tampi, eyyāsi khippaṃ ahamapi pūjaṃ kassa”nti.
anya-e0803n:2943: Idamettha pāḷinidassanaṃ, imāni sakammakāni ussukkanatthāni tvādiyantapadāni. Imāni cattāri suddhakattariyeva bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2944_0: “Bhāvetvā, bhāvetvāna. Pabhāvetvā, pabhāvetvāna. Sambhāvetvā, sambhāvetvāna. Vibhāvetvā,
anya-e0803n:2945_0: Tatra samānatthapadesu ekamevādipadaṃ gahetvā niddeso kātabbo – bhavitvāti hutvā
anya-e0803n:2945_1: paññāyitvā sarūpaṃ labhitvā. Evaṃ vuttanayānusārena sesānampi tvādiyantapadānaṃ niddeso
anya-e0803n:2945_2: vitthāretabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso bhutvāti sampattiṃ anubhutvāti sakammakavasena attho
anya-e0803n:2945_3: gahetabbo. Bhutvā anubhutvāti imesañhi samānatthataṃ saddhammavidū icchanti. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0803n:2947: Atthaṃ sūcenti “hutvā”ti, padassa pana neva te.
anya-e0803n:2956_0: Evaṃ ussukkanatthe pavattāni tvādiyantapadānipi niddiṭṭhāni, sabbānetāni avibhattikānīti
anya-e0803n:2956_1: gahetabbāni. Niruttipiṭake hi nipātaparicchede avibhattikāni katvā tvādiyantapadāni
anya-e0803n:2956_2: vuttāni. Saddatthavidūnaṃ pana mate paṭhamādivibhattivasena savibhattikāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n:2957_0: Imasmiñca pana tvādiyantādhikāre idañcupalakkhitabbaṃ – bhutvā gacchati, bhutvā gato,
anya-e0803n:2957_1: bhutvā gamissasi, kasitvā vapati. Umaṅgā nikkhamitvāna, vedeho nāvamāruhi. Bhutvāna
anya-e0803n:2957_2: bhikkhu bhikkhassu iccādī samānakattukānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pubbakāle tvādisaddappayogā.
anya-e0803n:2957_3: “Bhutvā gacchatī”ti ettha hi “bhutvā”ti idaṃ pubbakālakriyādīpakaṃ padaṃ. “Gacchatī”ti
anya-e0803n:2957_4: idaṃ pana uttarakālakriyādīpakaṃ, samānakattukāni cetāni padāni ekakattukānaṃ kriyānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2957_5: vācakattā. Tathā hettha yo gamanakriyāya kattā, so eva bhuñjanakriyāya kattubhūto
anya-e0803n:2957_6: daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2960_0: Iccādīnipi pana samānakattukānaṃ samānakāle tvādisaddappayogā. Ettha hi “nihantvānā”ti
anya-e0803n:2960_1: padaṃ samānakālakriyādīpakaṃ padaṃ. “Udito”ti idaṃ pana uttarakālakriyādīpakaṃ padanti
anya-e0803n:2960_2: na vattabbaṃ samānakālakriyāya idhādhippetattā. Tasmāyeva samānakālakriyādīpakaṃ
anya-e0803n:2960_3: padanti gahetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n:2961_0: Keci pana “mukhaṃ byādāya sayati, akkhiṃ parivattetvā passatī”ti udāharanti. Apare
anya-e0803n:2961_1: “nisajja adhīte, ṭhatvā kathetī”ti. Tattha byādānaparivattanuttarakālo byādānūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0803n:2961_2: passanakriyāya lakkhiyati. “Nisajja adhīte, ṭhatvā kathetī”ti ca samānakālatāyapi
anya-e0803n:2961_3: ajjhenakathanehi pubbepi nisajjaṭṭhānāni hontīti sakkā pubbuttarakālatā sambhāvetuṃ,
anya-e0803n:2961_4: tasmā purimāniyeva udāharaṇāni yuttāni. Udayasamakālameva hi tannivattanīyanivattananti.
anya-e0803n:2962_1: panettha pavisanakriyā purimā, āvaraṇakriyā pana pacchimā, tasmā “āvaritvā”ti idaṃ
anya-e0803n:2962_2: aparakālakriyādīpakaṃ padanti veditabbaṃ. “Pavisatī”ti idaṃ pana pubbakālakriyādīpakaṃ
anya-e0803n:2962_3: padanti. Ayaṃ nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo. Apare “dha’nti kacca patito
anya-e0803n:2962_4: daṇḍo”ti udāharaṇanti. Abhighātabhūtasamāyoge pana abhighātajasaddassa samānakālatā
anya-e0803n:2962_5: ettha labbhatīti idhāpi purimāniyeva udāharaṇāni yuttānīti.
anya-e0803n:2963_0: “Pisācaṃ disvā cassa bhayaṃ hoti. Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā”iccādi asamāne
anya-e0803n:2963_1: kattari payogo. Ettha hi pisācaṃ disvā purisassa bhayaṃ hoti, paññāya disvā assa
anya-e0803n:2963_2: puggalassa āsavā parikkhīṇā. Evaṃ samānakattukatā dhātūnaṃ na labbhati dassanakriyāya
anya-e0803n:2963_3: purisesu pavattanato, bhavanādikriyāya ca bhayādīsu pavattanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
anya-e0803n:2964_0: Idampi panettha upalakkhitabbaṃ “appatvā nadiṃ pabbato, atikkamma pabbataṃ nadī”iccādi
anya-e0803n:2964_1: parāparayogo. “Sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hoti, ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ jāyate, ‘dha’nti katvā
anya-e0803n:2964_2: daṇḍo patito”iccādi lakkhaṇahetuādippayogo. “Nhatvā gamanaṃ, bhutvā sayanaṃ. Upādāya
anya-e0803n:2965_0: Iccevaṃ sabbathāpi samānakattukānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pubbakāle tvādisaddappayogo, samānakattukānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2965_1: samānakāle tvādisaddappayogo, samānakattukānaṃ aparakāle tvādisaddappayogo, asamānakattukānaṃ
anya-e0803n:2966_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā kaccāyane “pubbakālekakattukānaṃ tuna tvāna tvā vā”ti pubbakāleyeva
anya-e0803n:2966_1: ekakattukaggahaṇaṃ katanti? Yetuyyena tvādiyantānaṃ padānaṃ purimakālakriyādīpanato.
anya-e0803n:2966_2: Kaccāyane hi yebhuyyena pavattiṃ sandhāya “pubbakālekakattukāna”nti vuttaṃ. Yasmā
anya-e0803n:2966_3: pana “iti katvā”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ hetuatthavasenapi pubbācariyehi attho saṃvaṇṇito,
anya-e0803n:2966_5: yathāpayogaṃ “bhavanahetu pacanahetū”tiādinā hetuatthopi gahetabbo. Atridaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0803n:2971: “Gacchāmi dāni nibbānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socati”;
anya-e0803n:2975: Evaṃ bhūtasaddassa atthuddhāro ca tumantapadañca tvādiyantapadañcāti atthattikaṃ vibhattaṃ.
anya-e0803n:2980: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṃ
